Baking at home does that sound difficult. Look no further. This is the perfect course for you to learn and take your baking skills to the next level

courses.description:
Hi,
I'm Ersin founder of Overdose Coffee and Owner of "Kahve Sakal" YouTube channel. I trained dozens of coffee veterans who benefited from the courses I gave at Overdose Coffee Academy, but I decided to do an online course in order to make this work more accessible. Whether you're just starting the coffee. Whether you are a barista who works actively and wants to improve. This course will add new knowledge and skills to you.
So what exactly will we learn in this course? For this course, I have worked on an introduction and advanced level collection of what a barista should know about coffee and espresso. I tried to convey what you need to know in order to produce less stress behind the bar, a more enjoyable working environment, and good coffee.
Starting from the history of coffee, its cultivation and processing, espresso machine types, espresso mechanics, espresso-based drinks, milk frothing and latte art, bar layout, hygiene, and workflow.
This course is a very good starter course for those who want to be a barista or who want to make better coffee at home but do not want to give thousands of dolars to the courses.
If you want to improve yourself more in the coffee world you have entered with this course. Do not forget to follow our expert-level course modules that we will publish in the future.

courses.description:
"The Crispy Pizza: Secrets to Making Crunchy Pizza Every Time" is an online course designed to help pizza lovers of all levels perfect their pizza-making skills. This course is ideal for anyone who wants to create a delicious and crispy pizza that rivals those found in the best pizzerias.
The course will cover everything from the basics of pizza making, to the secrets that professional pizza chefs use to create a perfectly crispy crust. You will learn how to make different types of dough, including classic Neapolitan and New York-style crusts. You'll also learn how to properly stretch and shape your dough, and how to choose the right toppings and sauces for your pizza.
Throughout the course, you will receive step-by-step instructions and tips from experienced pizza chefs. You will also have access to a community of pizza enthusiasts where you can share your progress, ask questions, and receive feedback.
"The Crispy Pizza: Secrets to Making Crunchy Pizza Every Time" is a self-paced course that allows you to learn at your own pace. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced cook, you will benefit from the knowledge and expertise of the instructors.
By the end of the course, you will be able to make a crispy, delicious pizza that is sure to impress your family and friends. You will have the confidence and knowledge to experiment with different doughs, sauces, and toppings, and you'll be able to create your own signature pizza recipes.
Overall, "The Crispy Pizza: Secrets to Making Crunchy Pizza Every Time" is the perfect online course for anyone who wants to take their pizza-making skills to the next level.
target_audience: This course is perfect for anyone who loves pizza and wants to take their homemade pizza to the next level! Whether you're a seasoned home cook or a complete beginner, our course is designed to help you master the art of making a perfectly crispy pizza crust. If you've ever struggled to get your crust just right, this course is for you. By learning the techniques and tips that professional pizza makers use, you'll be able to create delicious, crispy crust pizzas that will rival those from your favorite pizzeria. Our course is also ideal for anyone who loves experimenting with different pizza toppings, as the skills you'll learn in this course will allow you to add any toppings you desire without compromising the crunchiness of your crust. So whether you're a pizza purist or a creative pizza chef, this course is sure to take your pizza-making skills to the next level!
For begginer who loves pizza and what to get know more about it and about italian passion for good quality food
For advanced cook who wants to now everything about pizza or wants to learn how to make crispy crust neapolitan pizzapizza
For anybody who wants to suprise their friends with best taste pizza

In this online cooking class, we have compiled a collection of popular character bento recipes and teach them in a simple, easy-to-understand approach. The characters are Doraemon, Totoro, Pikachu, Anpanman, Rirrakuma, and Mickey mouse. Also included are recipes for 3 popular bento side dishes such as Tamagoyaki (Egg omelet), Octopus sausage, and karaage (Fried Chicken).


In this course, you will learn cooking techniques that will help you improve your skills in making cute bento boxes. Step by step instructions, and demonstrations as well as helpful tips will guide you to prepare delicious Japanese bento lunch box at home.  Also, you can find a course ebook at the end of this course which students can download. The ebook contains the complete recipes for the dishes taught in this course.

In this course, each section is independent, so you can start learning from the recipe you want to make.
The lists of ingredients are available to download. They will help you to cook again on your own after finishing this course.


Once you have taken this course, you will get ideas for creating a variety of other characters. It will also make making bento easy and fun. I hope you will make bento for your beloved ones and enjoy it together!
target_audience: This Japanese cooking class is for those who want to get the recipes of Japanese Bento box with 6 popular characters.
This course is recommended for those who are interested in making a variety of character bento boxes. Once you take the course, you can apply the techniques to other applications.
It is also recommended for parents with young children and those who like Japanese animation and characters.

courses.title: 30 Tea Cultures Around the World
courses.bio: A course that goes into detail about the histories, myths, and legends surrounding tea cultures around the world.
objectives: An understanding of the basics of tea - including the six different types with tea, different tea processing methods, and the health benefits associated with different teas
The histories, myths, and stories surrounding tea in 30 cultures around the world, and the cultural significance of each one
Traditional tea brewing methods in rural and nomadic societies that you can recreate at home
The roles of other culturally significant beverages, including beverages that are used for recreational, aphrodisiac, and hallucinogenic purposes

Different types of tea ceremonies, from the classic Japanese chadō to the Wu-Wo ceremony to the Gongfu ceremony, to lesser known ceremonies in Morocco, Iran, Mongolia, and Russia, along with many other
Cultural idioms surrounding tea, and how to say the word 'tea' around the world
requirements: Be passionate!

We highly recommend that you drink tea as you learn with the course, and try the tea recipes at home! It will give you a further understanding of the tea in each culture and why the locals love it so much!
courses.description:
Argentina, Mongolia, Hong Kong, Iran, Kenya, New Zealand, the Sahara Desert… What would you say that all of these places have in common? As it just so happens, it’s tea!
Whilst the customs and traditions differ greatly between each country, the heart of the ceremony is always the same - that much-loved beverage usually made from the leaves of the camellia sinensis plant. Used for personal, community, health, spiritual, or physical benefits, there’s a reason why this one drink plays such a large significance in cultures all across the world.
In this course, you will learn about the basics of tea, different tea processing methods, the histories, myths, and stories surrounding tea in 30 cultures around the world, traditional brewing methods in rural and nomadic societies, the health benefits (and disadvantages) of tea, the roles of other culturally significant beverages (including beverages that exist solely to get you high!), different types of tea ceremonies, and how to say the word ‘tea’ in a variety of languages across the globe. I hope that just about covers what you came here to learn about!
Whilst this course may only take a few hours or days to complete, it will be with you for your whole life! The insights gained from this course are ideal for any budding tea master, tea blogger, tea journalist, or tea enthusiast - and everyone in between!
Kick back with a mug of your favourite brew and allow yourself to be transported to the desert sands of the Sahara, the warm roadside Chai Dhabas, a Mongolian gur in the rural mountainside, a busy cafe in the middle of bustling Hong Kong… with the idea of tea at the heart of it all.
At the end of the course, you will receive your very own certification of completion, so that you can show off your newfound knowledge to all those you meet! Along with that, a wonderful British graphic designer has created a FREE printable poster which displays the most unique tea cultures across the world, which you can keep forever!
target_audience: Anyone with a passion for tea, learning, and understanding different cultures. Regardless of whether you are a tea blogger, business owner, foodie, tea master, or coffee lover, there is a lot that you will love about the course!

courses.description:
Over 25 years I have trained more than 30000 of the world's finest cocktail bartenders and now, for the first time I am making this same cocktail mixing course available online for less than 2% of the live training price..... to everyone.
Whatever your experience, this course will leave you making world-class examples of 16 of the most popular cocktails of our time.
Indeed, this course is for absolutely anyone that would like to mix word-class cocktails. Whether you are a home enthusiast or a professional bartender, this course will guide you through the principals and techniques for mixing truly fabulous drinks.
You will learn key mixing techniques, how to produce the finest examples of the great classic cocktails, the secrets and methods for producing the most popular contemporary cocktails perfectly, and finally how to produce some show-stopping cocktail garnishes to give your cocktails that 'rock-star' presentation. By the end of this course, I will have helped you to master 16 of the most popular cocktails including mixing a perfect Mojito, a sublime Cosmopolitan and a Dry Martini that will satisfy the thirst of the most demanding guests.
This easy to follow course is designed to demystify the whole topic of mixology, sharing all the best advice and knowledge from my 25 year career, allowing students to create the standard of cocktails that will have their guests wanting more!
In addition to Udemy's 30-day money back guarantee, I offer my personal promise that you will be accessing the very same level of training delivered by me to thousands of the world's most talented mixologists. In addition, to give you a 'try before you buy' experience, I have made 2 of my masterclass lectures available for FREE PREVIEW, so why not take a look? Finally, if the course isn't what you were looking for, you can get a refund, NO QUESTIONS ASKED, at any time within the first 30 days.
So, what are you waiting for? If you are ready to start making some amazing cocktails, Enrol Now.....
Look forward to seeing you on the course.
target_audience: This course is ideal for the home enthusiast looking to produce professional quality cocktails for their family and friends.

This course is perfect for the professional bartender or mixologist looking to raise the standard of their skills, produce the highest quality cocktails & mixed drinks and deliver a mind-blowing customer experience.
This course is also perfect for bartenders with no mixology experience that wish to break in to the world of cocktail mixology.

courses.description:
In this easy step by step free video course you will learn how to make the perfect buttercream for flower piping and learn how to make a Sunflower cake that will leave friends and family amazed. This course is not only perfect for children and beginners that's interested in cake decorating, professionals can learn a few tips too.
Have you ever admired those beautiful buttercream flower cakes, but think it is only for artists and professionals?
Well think again, because I have purposefully created a mini course, giving you all the tools, tricks and techniques to pipe a Sunflower cake that will make family and friends think you are most talented. You won't need any special equipment like nozzles or piping nails, just some piping bags that you can get from the local baking shop, a few gel colors and buttercream.
I show you step by step how to make the most stable buttercream with only two ingredients for piping flowers and you will be amazed at how uncomplicated it is.
I tried to keep the course short and to the point and with the skills you'll learn here, you might just discover a new found passion to explore buttercream flowers with my easy approach where I teach you everything you need to know  on how to create a Sunflower flower cake.
Sometimes training ends in disappointment as learners struggle to manage the piping of flowers after the course ended, but my aim is to simplify everything, from making the buttercream right through to piping the flowers to inspire you to explore the world of buttercream flowers. I taught children as well as my own daughter, Eden, who now at the age of 17 has her own thriving business... Eden Custom Cupcakes.
Try it out! You could discover the artist in yourself!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to decorate a beautiful flowercake to stun family and friends
This tutorial is perfect for children from the age of 10 that wants to learn how to pipe flowers and are interested in cake decorating

courses.description:
Hello and welcome to Sweets Academy Japan, INDY ASSA!
My name is Asami, a pastry chef from Japan.


In this course, I’d like to introduce you to Minimalist cake.
Have you heard of Minimalist cake which has become popular in Korea and around the world lately?
In the past, cakes with lots of fruit and dramatic decorations were popular, but recently simple designs have also become popular as they are refreshing, stylish and sleek. This recipe is similar to the Western style buttercream cake, but personally, I prefer a light, not too sweet cake rather than a dense sponge cake with rich buttercream. Therefore, I have taken the time to perfect it in my own style. I am excited to share it with you!


In this course, we’re gonna learn soft and fluffy Japanese sponge cake, a rich yet light cream cheese filling and a silky buttercream for the outside.


Whether you want to make this cake for your loved one's birthday or you are a professional chef who wants to add another dessert to your repertoire, this cake is just what you need.
I’m going to show you not only the recipe, but common mistakes and the solutions, and other helpful tips. Unlike when you just watch the average cooking video, you can ask me questions anytime on my Q&A page.


Are you ready to jump in and learn new styles of delectable cakes?
Let’s get started!
target_audience: For Japanese sweets lovers, baking lovers, sweets lovers, Japanese food lovers...for everyone!

courses.description:
CULINARY PSYCHOLOGY - Chris Sivewright
Culinary psychology is an exciting field where food and the mind intersect. It explores how the things we eat impact our emotions, and how our feelings and relationships influence our eating habits. This course blends psychology, lifestyle medicine, and the culinary arts to dive into topics like cravings, memory, culture, connection, and the healing potential of food. After all, food is more than just sustenance—it’s a way to show love, find comfort, create memories, and feel a sense of control.
We’ll cover a variety of fascinating and timely subjects. We’ll start with the psychology of appetite and cravings, exploring why certain foods feel irresistible during times of stress or overwhelm, and how biology and early life experiences shape these patterns. We’ll also examine how family, culture, and memory influence our relationship with food, including how childhood meals impact our choices as adults.
Key topics include emotional regulation and disordered eating, with a focus on how culinary psychology can provide compassionate, evidence-based support for those navigating food-related stress. We’ll also explore how nutrition impacts mood, cognition, and physical health, drawing on principles from lifestyle medicine to understand the relationship between diet and mental well-being.
We’ll also examine food rituals, cultural identity, and the psychology of hospitality, exploring how shared meals foster connection, community, and belonging.
Whether you’re a therapist, chef, health coach, educator, or someone curious about the deeper significance of food, this course offers valuable insights, inspiration, and practical tools
Topics covered:
· Unlocking the Secrets of Culinary Psychology and Lifestyle Medicine
· The Psychology of Eating: Building Habits for a Healthier You
· Stress, Emotions, and the Hidden Forces Behind Your Eating Habits
· The Gut-Brain Connection: How Your Second Brain Shapes Your Mind
· Gastrophysics Revealed: The Art and Science of Sensory Dining
· Neurogastronomy: Decoding the Science of Flavour and Taste
· Mindful Eating Unleashed: The Psychology Behind Every Bite
· The Future of Culinary Psychology: Food, Identity, and the Art of Healing
Note: there is a shorter, similar course at Oxford University - covering fewer topics but with prestigious speakers - it costs £890+
EATING DISORDER THERAPY
This is a course about a major problem of healthy eating - eating disorder therapy - when the 'healthy' aspect become UNhealthy. There are two Instructors: Chris Sivewright and Johana Alandete.
Johana writes:
"I start by clarifying that I am not a health professional, I am not a doctor, a psychiatrist, a psychologist, or anything like that. I am, in fact, a Master in Administration, a writer by passion, a singer, an actress and a comedian with my friends and family... In fact, I always dreamt of being a comedy actress. BUT mental issues are important for me, reason why I research a lot from science papers, books, experts, and people who lives with. I am also a person who has gone through a depression diagnosed as severe, according to my psychiatrist. The madness (that is what I called my depression), manifested itself after I developed an eating disorder that began in near anorexia-bulimia and mutated into an orthorexia (not yet included in the DSM-5). At first, I started removing certain foods from my diet (sugar, grease, carbs, process food, some fruits), until I was afraid to eat two leaves of lettuce because it was too much. When I was almost in the bones, the depression began... I isolated myself, became almost a zombie, a body without a soul and the histrionic Johana who used to speak so much, who was exaggerating everything as a joke, who loved to laugh out loud, had become only "something", a physical body that inhabited an empty space. I stopped being someone."
Orthorexia is an eating disorder that haven't been included yet on the DSM because is relative "new" in comparison with Bulimia, Anorexia and Binge Eating Disorder.
Vegans, Vegetarians, Fitness people, Athletes, often have this condition because is an absolutely control for what you eat and the way it was prepared.
How clean is, how many calories does it has, how many macros... if it has a any quantity of carbs and you have a dinner with your family, so you discount all the carbs in your day to drink a wine at night.
To social meetings use to take their own meals and the food becomes their whole world, triggering an absolutely stress to the point they start to isolate, feeling guilty all the time, feeling sad, their personal relationships collapse, their mind is a calculator of macros and calories to the point they don't think in anything else, they have purges like vomit, laxatives and the body begins to feel unbalanced, and the person begin to lack vitamins and minerals.
Also, they have binge, mostly of peanut butter and have a high intensity training everyday. Sometimes, when they feel ate "bad", because they ate for example, two cookies, so the go to the gym to do up to 3 or 4 hours of training.
Finally, this take the people to a severe depression and high levels of anxiety.
Johana writes: "I lived with the illness for 5 years and is not so "Nice". So, now in the social media era, where the teen and young adult users who spend the most time on Instagram, and other digital platforms, showed a substantially higher rate of depression (13 to 66 percent) than those who spend less time on their cell phones. Study by the Child Mind Institute 2017. Is absolutely important to be armored because the comparison between lives, bodies, success and all that things, are ruining our lives."
This includes Johana's articles from the website "Asunto de Mujeres" (Women Affairs).
Eating disorder therapy - orthorexia - obsession.


Topics covered in the 2024 update:
Therapeutic Options for Eating Disorders
1. Psychological Therapies
Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
Family-Based Therapy (FBT)
Maudsley Anorexia Nervosa Treatment for Adults (MANTRA)
Specialist Supportive Clinical Management (SSCM)
2. Nutritional Education and Support
3. Medical Monitoring and Treatment
4. Medication
5. Support Groups and Peer Support


Coping Strategies for Individuals with Eating Disorders
1. Establishing a Support Network
2. Engaging in Therapy
3. Practicing Self-Care
4. Setting Realistic Goals
5. Utilizing Nutritional Guidance
Plus Case Studies and specific art therapy exercises written especially for people with an Eating Disorder.
target_audience: All who pursue healthy eating
Anyone worried that they may have an Eating Disorder
Any therapist who wishes to have new input on dealing with Eating Disorders
A parent worried about their child/children as they suspect they have an eating disorder
Any schoolteacher who needs to increase their knowledge about eating disorders
Chef
Health Coach

Blue Curaçao is a popular blue colored liqueur that is used in numerous cocktails, drinks and Juices throughout the world. In this course, I’ll explain to you more about it including what it tastes like and how you can make it.
Blue Curaçao is a popular liqueur used in numerous cocktails, drinks and Juices such as the Blue Lagoon.
Its flavor comes from the peel of the Laraha Citrus Fruit (which has been dried) and is grown on the island of Curaçao, hence the name. The blue color in the liqueur comes from food coloring which has been added to give it the distinctive coloring.  It is similar to Triple Sec in that it is citrus flavored.

courses.title: Alfacurso gluten free. Alfajores sin gluten para emprender.

objectives: 8 variedades de alfajores sin gluten.

requirements: No necesitas experiencia previa. Aprenderemos desde el comienzo paso a paso.

Únicamente deberás conseguir una balanza de cocina para pesar todo con exactitud.
courses.description:
Estoy segura de que vos también, cómo yo, has notado que el mundo está cambiando y cada vez apostamos más por los emprendimientos. Sobre todo cuando hablamos de gastronomía.
¡Al fin estamos todos entendiendo una verdad muy importante! Y es qué, un producto hecho de principio a fin por unas manos cuidadosas y amorosas siempre va a tener un sabor muchísimo mejor. Y que los ingredientes que componen cada parte de un alimento ¡si importan!
Así mismo, cada vez son más las personas diagnosticadas con intolerancia, sensibilidad al gluten o celiaquía, que buscan una opción deliciosa y apta.


Si estabas esperando un empujoncito para dar el paso y tener tu emprendimiento propio, ¡yo hoy vengo a dártelo!


¡Te presento el ALFACURSO GLUTEN FREE!
Un curso online dónde veremos 8 variedades de alfajores sin gluten para vender:
Alfabrownies.
Alfacookies chocolatosos.
Alfacookies chips.
Alfajores santafesinos glaseados.
Alfajores de miel.
Alfajores de maicena.
Alfajores de chocolate.
Alfajores de coco.


Además te enseñaré técnicas prácticas para la conservación y el empaquetado, así podrás comenzar pronto el cambio hacia la vida emprendedora.
¡Sin mix comerciales! Hacemos nuestras propias premezclas y combinaciones de harinas. Los principales ingredientes que usamos para esto son:
Almidón de maíz.
Fécula de mandioca.
Harina de sorgo o arroz integral.
Leche en polvo ( te enseño personalizadamente como reemplazarla es caso de intolerancia).
Goma xántica o guar.
¡Podés aprender a tu propio ritmo y en tus horarios disponibles! Tenés acceso de por vida a los videos, podrás verlos cuantas veces necesités, pausarlos, y volver a retomar desde los puntos que necesités, en los momentos que vos elijas.
No es necesario que tengas ninguna experiencia previa, ¡con muchas ganas de aprender es suficiente!


Con mí técnica y con tu toque especial estoy segura de que tu emprendimiento será único.
¿Me dejás guiarte en este alfamundo emprendedor?
target_audience: Emprendedores que deseen comenzar un negocio de venta de productos sin gluten.

Aficionados a la cocina y chefs interesados en ampliar sus conocimientos.

CAFA Formations est un centre de formation professionnelle pour adultes dans l'hôtellerie restauration qui a crée une Ecole internationale en Vins et Spiritueux depuis 1986. courses.description:
Lezzet nedir ? Bir şeyin Lezzetli olduğunu nasıl anlarız ? Bazı şeyler bize neden lezzetli gelir ? Bu soruları kendinize sormayı seviyorsanız karışımları tek düze ve doğaçlama lezzetler olmadığını düşünüyorsanız Tat algımızı yeniden inşa edeceğimiz mixology üzerine eski ve modern tekniklerin harmanlandığı bu eğitim tam size göre. Efsane Jerry Thomastan bu yana barmenler kendilerini hep geliştirdi farklı şeyler üretti insanların hayatlarına dokundu, bu eğitimdeki teknikler ile sizde farklı anılar yaratıp insanları bunlara ortak edebileceksiniz. Bitter yapımı , likör yapımı farklı infüzyon teknikleri ve bir kokteyl yaratırken bir hikâyeden nasıl esinlenilir gibi mixology nin temel taşı olan pek çok farklı ders işte burada. Eğitim esnasında oluşacak soruları not almanızı ve e-posta yoluyla sormanızı rica ediyorum . Birlikte yapacağımız pratikler ile konular çok daha iyi oturacak ve kendi lezzetlerinizi üretirken tamamen kendiniz olabileceksiniz . Katılmanız için bir barmen olmaya ihtiyacınız yok meraklı ve ilgili herkes bu eğitimi başarılı bir düzeyde tamamlayabilir. Sürekli notlar alıp mevcut bilgileri her hafta birkaç saat bile olsa tekrar ettiğimiz zaman bir süre sonra uygulayabilir hale geleceksiniz , unutmayın bu eğitim yüz yüze verdiğim müfredat ile aynı ve devam videolarını takip etmeyi unutmayın. Temel mutfak gereçlerine sahip iseniz çeşitli temel baharat ve turunçlar ile basit bar ekipmanları ile tüm bunları pratik edebilirsiniz. Kendi barınızın barmeni olmanın tam zamanı
7 dersten oluşan eğitimde 3 saat 47 dakikalık video içerik ile; Bitter yapımı ve infüzyon teknikleri, Kokteyl yaratma sanatı ve miksoloji felsefesi ve tıbbi ve aromatik bitkilerin karışımlara nasıl eklenebileceği konularını işleyeceğiz.

Bölüm 1
Ders 1 – Bitter Yapımı Ve Tarihi
Ders 2 – İnfüzyon Çizergesi ve Teknikleri
Bölüm 2
Ders 1 – İnfüzyon Teknikleri
Ders 2 – Likör Yapımı
Ders 3 – Tentür
Bölüm 3
Ders 1 – Tatlandırıcılar
Bölüm 4

Saying that fruits which have thick skins like Lemon , orange and banana are still safer comparatively but need to be washed properly

Avoid chemicals.

Enjoy better taste.

Avoid hormones, antibiotics and drugs in animal products.
Preserve our ecosystems.

In every celebration you think of what you can buy and do to your guests , it also costs you a lot of money when you go to buy a canape , finally we are here for you , you will not spend a lot of money again with a small ingredients that sure you have it at home and it doesn't took a lot of time to do it .
Salizon Fresh Appetizers for Birthday filling with Caviar
A canapé is a type of hors d'oeuvre, or small, easy to eat food, made with a base of a small piece of bread or pastry with a variety of toppings, and traditionally served before dinner, piece of bread or toast or a cracker topped with as caviar or cheese
These finger foods are made to be held with one hand, so that you can hold a drink in your other hand.
They’re simple and delicious!
Ingredients
Choux pastry
Herring
Avocado Salad
Smoked Turkey
Thyme
Carrots
Walnuts
Ketchup
Tomatoes
Choux pastry
Choux is the French word which is different to other pastries as it is cooked twice; once to make the choux paste itself and again to transform the paste into a puffed up hollow pastry
Choux pastry is a light crisp, airy pastry that can be used to make profiteroles drowned in chocolate sauce, cream filled éclairs
You can consider choux pastry a little like a puff pastry. It rises up when baked in the oven giving it it’s super light and airy texture.
Once you’ve mastered this pastry you’ll be making perfect profiteroles, amazing éclairs .
Herring
Herring is a white fish that hatches in freshwater but spends most of its life in the ocean.
Herring is a nutritionally dense food that you can add into many recipes from cuisines around the world. Whether you can make herring the star of a dish or use it as a protein-packed snack.
Herring is rich in vitamins, with significant amounts of vitamin A, vitamin D, and vitamin B12. When you dine on this fish, you’ll also take in smaller amounts of minerals like potassium, phosphorus, and selenium.
Benefits
Safe for Pregnant Women
Boosts Brain Health
Supports Heart Health
Reduces Inflammation
Avocado Salad
They’re filled with bright flavors and a variety of delicious textures. salads help sharpen your eyesight. it is loaded with vitamin A carotenoids, zeaxanthin and lutein.
Eating healthy is about balance and making sure that your body is getting the necessary nutrients it needs to function properly.
Its Benefits
Keeps skin, teeth, and eyes healthy
Supports muscles
Boosts immunity
Strengthens bones
Lowers risk of heart disease and some cancers
Supports healthy pregnancies and breastfeeding
Smoked Turkey
Smoked turkey has 71.4 calories per serving one thick slice of light or dark meat without skin or bones that weighs about 1.5 ounces. One serving of smoked turkey contains 2.1 grams of fat, which makes up 26 percent of the calories.
A serving of this meat provides 12.3 grams of protein, which your body requires for muscle development, hormone production and energy.
smoked turkey contains many B vitamins. It serves as a good source of vitamin B-3. The vitamin B-3 in smoked turkey promotes the health of your skin and nerves and influences the way your body uses calcium.
Thyme
Thyme is a robust, shrubby herb with trailing green-gray leaves and an intense aroma and flavor.
Thyme adds instant flavor to cooking, but it can also offer health benefits when consumed in fresh or dried form.
Thyme also contains a variety of minerals and vitamins that promote good health.
Thyme is full of vitamin C for immune support, potassium for healthy cells, and manganese for bone development and blood clotting.
Carrots
Carrots contain a variety of nutrients and antioxidants, along with vitamin C, that will boost your immune system.
Carrots provide your hair with vital vitamins, making your locks stronger, thicker and shinier than ever before.
Carrots can benefit your eyesight and boost your immune system since they are high in vitamin A.
Eating carrots can also help protect your skin from UV radiation damage.
Walnuts
Walnuts are round, single-seeded stone fruits that grow from the walnut tree. They are a good source of healthful fats, protein, and fiber. They may enhance heart and bone health and help in weight management
You may think of walnuts as a dessert ingredient in cookies, brownies. But walnuts are also perfect for snacking, or as a topping for salads, cooked veggies
Walnuts are primarily made up of protein and polyunsaturated fat. They contain a relatively high percentage of omega-3 fat, which has been linked to various health benefits.
Its Benefits
The Cardiovascular System
Bone Health
Reducing The Risk Of Gallbladder Disease,
Treating Epilepsy
Tomatoes
Tomatoes are the major dietary source of the antioxidant lycopene, which has been linked to many health benefits, including reduced risk of heart disease and cancer.
They are also a great source of vitamin C, potassium, folate, and vitamin K.
Including tomatoes in the diet can help protect against cancer, maintain healthy blood pressure, and reduce blood glucose in people with diabetes.
Ketchup
Ketchup is a tomato-based condiment commonly used to top foods like French fries or hot dogs.
Ketchup contains vitamin A, which is key for a healthy immune system and, perhaps crucially, good vision.
Its Benefits
It makes actually healthy food bearable to eat
It reduces risk of prostate cancer
It cuts cholesterol
It improves your eyesight
Let’s Start the Course

courses.title: Heartwarming Desserts for your Family
courses.bio: Great variety of desserts with different pastry and classic pastry techniques
objectives: You will learn a wide variety of desserts with different methods and techniques: preparation, assembly and decoration.
Secrets and tips of Pastry and confectionery, which you can apply to other recipes.
You will learn to determine the costs and sales price of desserts.
You will be able to create combinations with the recipes that we teach you to create other versions or new desserts.

Cheese Cake: Introduction and preparation of the mold

requirements: Basic knowledge of pastry, having an oven, mixer and basic tools.
courses.description:
Module 1: Introduction


Modulo 2: Recipes and Materials


Module 3: Cornstarch Alfajores - You will learn how to make and flavor the dough to give it that citrus touch; You will know a technique to cut the dough so that it is the same thickness. You will know the tips for baking and decorating with grated coconut; and you will also learn how to make the delicious dulce de leche, characteristic of alfajores.


Module 4: Alfajores Marplatenses - Originating from Mar de Plata, made from a chocolate cookie with a touch of tangerine, filled with dulce de leche and covered in chocolate. You will learn how to make and flavor the dough; baking tips, you will learn how to cover with chocolate and the "scratching" technique for decoration.


Module 5: Cheesecake - You will learn how to make an almond base, which you can use to make any pie. You will learn a technique for baking cheesecakes, how to make the caramel, as well as the assembly and decoration.


Module 6: Pavlova - In this module you will learn the technique for preparing meringues. You will discover how to make a ganache and a white chocolate cream to fill; as well as a technique so that the meringues do not become moist and retain that texture for longer.


Module 7: Macarons - Continuing with the preparation of meringues, you will learn an infallible technique to prepare macarons step by step; from preparing the meringue, forming, flavoring, baking, filling and decorating. 3 different flavors are made, which will be used to fill other types of preparations such as cookies or cakes.


Module 8: Brownies - You will learn how to make delicious chocolate brownies, with their ideal consistency and flavor; and with several options to decorate.


Module 9: Chocolate Mousse - You will learn a version of chocolate mousse with an exquisite flavor, its soft foam texture; and with the advantage that it is not made with raw eggs. You will also love learning how to make very pretty decorations with chocolate.


Module 10: Tiramisu - A classic of Italian pastry, made with soles and a perfect combination of coffee and mascarpone cheese. You will learn its preparation step by step; as well as tis to decorate and preserve.


Module 11: Eclairs - You will learn the double cooking technique required to make delicious eclairs and profiteroles. You will learn how to make the classic Pastry Cream and Chantilly Cream, and with it different ways of assembly and decoration.


Module 12: Opera Cake - And finally, the favorite of many people, a classic of French pastry; based on several layers combining different textures and flavors. You will learn how to make almond cake, coffee buttercream, chocolate ganache, chocolate coverage; as well as decorate and write on the cake.
target_audience: People who want to learn new techniques and new pastry recipes
People who have a business or want to start a pastry and fine pastry business.
Moms who want to pamper their family and friends by preparing delicious desserts from home.

これさえあれば直前スタートでも間に合う【永久保存版】準備リストと段取り表: 【永久保存版】43品目準備リストで買い忘れなし！

courses.description:
■お正月家族でゆっくり〜まったり過ごせます。


元旦家族て初詣
２日ママと娘でデパートへ初売り
３日みんなで小旅行


三が日食べ続けるおせち料理。


準備はちょっとだけですが大変…


作る価値あり！


たっぷりの手作りおせちがあれば


心豊かなお正月を過ごすことができます。




■「何」を「いつから」準備したらよいか、手順が分かります


16の品数に5つ以上の手順
作業工程は80以上
揃えなきゃいけない食材の数は40以上


12月中旬から準備スタートしましょう。


作業がぐっと楽になります。

工程がわかれば1以降の作業はとても簡単

です。



■私にもできる〜簡単レシピとコツが満載です


ローストビーフ・鮭の塩麹焼き・田作り・数の子の松前漬・黒豆・エビのうま煮・なます・伊達巻き・煮しめ・お雑煮・重箱の詰め方には詳しい料理動画がついています。

動画を見てから解説を聞くことで、より理解が深まり、作ってみよう！ と行動に移すことができます。


料理が苦手な講師が、独自に考えた、「道具を汚さない」「保存まできっちりと」「手早く仕上げる」コツが分かります。




■ありがとうございます！ 受講後の感想はこちらです


しっかりとした段取りや具体的な買い物リスト等、ここまで教えてもらえるのかと嬉しい誤算でした。醤油ドッサリだったもので。
受講前は、料理本みても難しい、簡単には作れない敷居が高いような気持ちでテンションが下がり、自分には作るというものは縁がないものと思っていました。材料・材料の購入時・作り方・保管方法なども伝授し、私にも出来るかもとイメージが湧きました。 今年は、段取り表を見て少しずつ作っていきたいと思います。
面倒だけど、娘たちに伝えたい！そして、どうせなら、美味しく作りたい！！そんな思いをおせちに持っています。もう怖くない（笑）段取り表で、やることもピックアップされているので、その通りにやる。
冷凍可能な食材やメニューが分かって、おせち作りのハードルがグッと下がりました。


段取りシート、準備するものリストは永年保存^ ^お嫁さんにもシェアします！


■お料理を通して、「自分にもできる！」目標達成の爽快感を味わいましょう！！


■講師の評価とご感想をお聞かせください(//∇//)


コース途中に講師評価のご案内が流れます。
評価と講座のご感想をぜひともお聞かせ下さい！
励みになります！！
次の講座作りの参考にさせていただきますね。
target_audience: 簡単にシンプルなおせち料理を、手早く完成させたい人

courses.title: Confeitaria para Iniciante
courses.bio: Cake Design Iniciante: Bolo Floresta Encantada
objectives: As técnicas certas e ferramentas necessárias para fazer um bolo bem estruturado e com acabamento perfeito, lindo por fora e claro, super gostoso por dentro!

Massa amanteigada, ideal para fazer um bolo bem estruturado; Textura ideal do Recheio (tradicional brigadeiro) + Calda para deixar o bolo molhadinho; Nivelamento; Quinas perfeitas com blindagem de ganache; Arte em pasta americana com o tema de decoração 'Floresta Encantada': como trabalhar a pasta americana para fazer modelagem 3D e recorte 2D.

Decoração do bolo: Cobrindo o bolo com pasta americana

requirements: Desejo de aprender a arte da confeitaria
Não é necessário ter conhecimento de confeitaria
courses.description:
Fazer um bolo gostoso, bem estruturado e ainda bem decorado é um desafio. Mas, quando você tem o conhecimento de algumas técnicas coringas, tudo fica muito mais fácil! Nesse curso vamos te mostrar que com as técnicas certas e algumas poucas ferramentas, você pode fazer um bolo bem estruturado e com acabamento perfeito, lindo por fora e claro, super gostoso por dentro!


Vamos ensinar cada detalhe:
Massa amanteigada, ideal para bolo bem estruturado
Textura ideal do Recheio (tradicional brigadeiro) + Calda para deixar o bolo molhadinho
Nivelamento
Quinas perfeitas com blindagem de ganache
Arte em pasta americana com o tema de decoração 'Floresta Encantada': você aprenderá como trabalhar a pasta americana para fazer modelagem 3D e recorte 2D.


E mais! Você vai aprender tudo sobre quais materiais e utensílios precisará para fazer seus bolos. De bônus você ainda aprenderá a decoração de um bolo floral, com rosas de açucar e modelagem de laço.


Pensamos nesse curso com muito carinho! Depois de assistir todas as aulas e colocar a mão na massa, você vai se sentir confiante para iniciar o seu negócio de confeitaria e ganhar novos clientes!


E não é só isso! Você ainda receberá apostila e certificado:


Apostila: preparamos uma apostila completa, com todas as receitas de massa, recheios, calda, coberturas e ainda dicas super úteis de confeitaria. De bônus você terá uma apostila exclusiva com 10 recheios extras.
Certificado: Após a conclusão do curso, basta você postar no instagram uma foto do seu bolo com a #cursoonlinemarycon para receber no seu email um certificado lindo de conclusão do curso cake design iniciante.
target_audience: Aqueles que desejam iniciar seu negócio de confeitaria, ganhar novos clientes e fazer uma renda extra.
Aqueles que quem tem a confeitaria como hobby e desejam aprimorar seus conhecimentos.

objectives: How to Cook Thai Cuisine
Learn a little Thai Language
Learn Asian Cooking Basics

Learn to Cook Pad Thai: How to Cook Tom Yum Goong
How to Cook Mango with Sticky Rice
How to Cook Sala Thai Chicken Wings and Fresh Spring Rolls

How to Cook Shrimp Paste Fried Rice
How to Cook Thai Chicken Noodle Soup

requirements: No
courses.description:
Sawadee-ka!
If you're a fan of Thai food then you're going to LOVE this video course.
Join husband and wife team, Dean Rainey and Nuchjana "Jean" Guntong for TRY THAI TONIGHT - the freshest and funniest Thai Cooking Class online!
Jean is a Chef from Thailand, and Dean is a TV producer from Canada. Together, they've mashed up their skills to produce this video course teaching you how to make authentic Thai dishes.
Through this course, you'll learn the history of each dish, its influences, the health benefits of its ingredients, potential substitutes, and of course, how to prepare and eat each dish.
You'll be surprised how easy it is to prepare flavourful, healthy Thai food right in your own kitchen! (Your family will thank you!)
Dean and Jean also celebrate Thai culture by sharing stories of their lives together, and what life is like in Thailand. It's an entertaining learning experience!
In Try Thai Tonight, Dean & Jean will walk you through 12 quick and easy recipes for authentic Thai dishes:

Pad Thai
Tom Yum Goong
Green Curry
Beef Laab
Green Curry
Papaya Salad
Penang Curry
Sala Thai Chicken Wings & Fresh Spring Rolls
Spicy Beef Salad
Shrimp Fried Rice
Thai Chicken Noodle Soup
Thai Fast Food
Cooking Show Meets Cooking Class
This course has been professionally written and filmed in High Definition with lots of production value, delicious food porn, and cheesy dad jokes.
Presented in the style of a Food Network television show, this entertaining video course will enlighten and educate. Join Dean and Jean as they walk you step-by-step through the preparation of 6 mouthwatering Thai dishes:
It's a fun, easy-to-follow TV series that is perfect for those just learning to cook, or those with more kitchen experience.
target_audience: Beginning to Experienced Cooks; People who love Thai food

courses.title: Start Your fondant figurine journey today: Enroll Now!
courses.bio: Learn the art and science of creating visually captivating advanced 3D fondant figurine
objectives: Learn the techniques on fondant figurines
Learn the making of fondant animalsa
Learn how to make fondant birds
Learn how to make fondant birds and Animals
requirements: No prior experience is required for this program
courses.description:
Embark on a Journey of Fondant Artistry and Cake Design with Chef Thad's Exclusive Online Class!
This program will guide you through the fundamentals of fondant art, focusing on crafting intricate animal and bird figurines. Imagining and sculpting figurines require formal training, and Chef Thad will expertly lead you through the process. Crafting animal faces, hands, legs, bodies, and achieving balance among these elements can be challenging tasks, demanding attention to body proportions and heights. Additionally, Chef Thad will delve into the intricacies of color schemes and techniques to achieve desired effects.
Unleash Your Artistry in Cake Designing and Fondant Figurines with Chef Thad's Online Class!
This program will cover the creation of six distinct figurines:
Dragon
Elephant
Koi Fish
Lion
White Stallion
Parrot
Indulge your passion for cake designing and elevate your skills to create stunning fondant figurines with Chef Thad's exclusive online program. Chef Thad, a master in crafting artistic showpieces, shares his expertise in wedding cakes, cupcakes, and intricate fondant figurines—all comprehensively addressed in this transformative online learning experience.


Chef Thad's Online Program Highlights:
Comprehensive Figurine Designing: Learn the art and science of creating visually captivating figurines.
Don't miss this golden opportunity to learn from Chef Thad, a true artisan in the world of cake designing and fondant artistry. Enroll now in Chef Thad's masterclass and unlock the secrets to creating edible masterpieces that captivate hearts and palates alike!
target_audience: this course is for everyone who want to learn fondant figurines

courses.title: Beginners Course to Making Sourdough Bread from Scratch
courses.bio: The sourdough baking process in simple terms, with optional ideas explained.
objectives: The Basics to Get Started
Creating a Sourdough Starter from Scratch
The Sourdough Process from Start to Finish
Shaping Techniques
Scoring Techniques
Sourdough Discard

The Basics to Get Started: Starting a Sourdough Starter from Scratch
The Whole Sourdough Process: Preparing Starter/Levain to use for Making a Loaf
Strengthing Dough - Stretch and Folds Method

requirements: You will learn the basic skills needed! All you need is basic kitchen equipement, such as bowls, utensils, kitchen towels, jars.
There are special "sourdough" equipment you can buy, but none are necessary to start baking beautiful bread.
All you need is flour, water, salt and patience!
courses.description:
This course is for very beginners who have never baked sourdough before.  I am a self taught sourdough baker, and have been baking sourdough for 3.5 years.  This course teaches you what I have learned and what my process is. Everyone's process is different, but this is what works for me!  There are lessons on equipment needed, ingredients, and step by step how to make a loaf from start to finish.


I have broken it down into simple terms, with repetition and short videos to help keep you on track.  You will need patience to make sourdough bread, as there are a lot of steps that involve just waiting! But don't worry, in a few weeks you'll be baking your first loaf no problem.  I've included definition slides as well, to help you understand some of the terms we use in sourdough baking.  There is a troubleshooting section as well.  I haven't run into a lot of problems, but if you have problems, I can probably give you a pretty good idea what might be wrong!


This course also includes a few videos on how to bake other sourdough products, such as bagels and dinner rolls.


Feel free to ask any questions! I love teaching people about sourdough baking and am happy to help.
target_audience: Wanting to learn how to make sourdough bread as an absolute beginner? This is a basic course for the average person to bake bread at home. I start by teaching you how to do everything from making your own starter, to the whole process of baking a loaf, and some extra information and tips along the way.
I want to make this process as simple as possible for you, while also explaining it in enough detail so that you actually learn how to do it without having a lot of questions.

I have added a couple of sections with additional recipes as well, in case you want to try something besides just a loaf! Most things start with the same basic principles and dough strenthening methods.

requirements: Stovetop, Pans, Knives.
Very Basic Cooking Abilities
courses.description:
In this comprehensive video course, students will learn how to cook and prepare their favorite Israeli and Middle Eastern Dishes Step by Step in a clear, concise and relatable manner so they will be able to easily replicate the lesson in their own kitchens and enjoy the flavors of the holy land right on their own plates.
Sit back and press play and start your culinary journey into the savory dishes of Israeli street food to Shabbat dinner dishes to everyday mealtime flavors from the Israeli table. Hummus, Falafel, Majadra, Schnitzel, Salads, Pita Bread, Ice Cream and more will all be presented in an easy to follow and easy going manner by Guy.
Guy was raised in a family where the kitchen was the center of the household and family life and his fondest childhood memories always include the smells and flavors of his parents' cooking and the noise and happiness of the large Shabbat gatherings around the extra long dining room table where relatives and neighbors are always welcome to celebrate and dine together.
Guy interweaves stories from his childhood home while he teaches you how to make the actual dishes he so clearly remembers so that students will get to experience a childhood in Israel even if they didn't grow up there. Guy invites you on this journey of body, mind and spirit into the delicious and nutritious and multi-cultural Israeli cuisine and hopes that you will feel as if you have landed in Israel for a few hours and are literally tasting holy land food prepared by your own self.
target_audience: Anyone interested in creating delicious Israeli dishes from scratch

courses.description:
Keine Lust mehr auf 0-8-15 Bier? Du willst deine Freunde mit einem selbstgebrauten Bier überraschen? Aber du bist dir nicht sicher, wie du das anstellen sollst, und die schlauen Bücher lassen dich ratlos zurück?
Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für dich! Braue dein erstes Bier selbst - ganz entspannt zu Hause! Ohne unnötige Theorie mit Wissen von einem langjährigen Hobbybrauer in diesem Online Kurs Schritt-für-Schritt auf den Punkt gebracht.
Beginne noch heute mit der Kunst des heimischen Bierbrauens und genieße nach dem Kurs mehrere Liter selbstgebrautes Hefeweizen/Weißbier in Bügelflaschen.
Darauf kannst du dich in diesem Kurs freuen:
Du lernst, für dich und deine Freunde ein richtig leckeres Bier zu brauen.
Du brauchst keine teure Ausrüstung
Rezepte die zu 100% funktionieren
Du kannst von Überall aus teilnehmen
Du hast uneingeschränkter lebenslanger Zugriff
Nach dem Kurs kennst du die wichtigsten Grundlagen, um andere Braurezepte nachzubrauen.
Diese Utensilien benötigst du:
Für meinen Kurs brauchst du kein Braukit, kein Brauset und keine Brauanlage, denn das meiste hast du bereits in deiner Küche zu Hause: Töpfe, Nudelsieb und Schöpfkelle. Alles, was du brauchst, sind die richtigen Zutaten und ein paar Brauutensilien, die du wahrscheinlich noch nicht hast. Und keine Sorge, sie sind nicht teuer und du wirst sie immer wieder brauchen.
Mit der Buchung des Kurses bestätigst du, dass du das gesetzliche Mindestalter für Alkoholkonsum in deinem Land erreicht hast.
target_audience: Bierliebhaber
Alle, die schon einmal selber Bier brauen wollten mit einer einfachen Schritt für Schritt Anleitung
Einsteiger: Ohne Erfahrungen im Bierbrauen und ohne Ausrüstung
Nicht geeignet für alle die bereits mehrfach Bier gebraut haben (ihr seid natürlich herzlich eingeladen, hätte aber Sorgen, dass der Kurs für euch zu basic ist)

courses.description:
Hola que tal ¡ bienvenido a mi curso para aprender repostería creativa, crear tu negocio y ser por fin independiente!!
No necesitas ser un profesional en repostería, no necesitas conocimientos previos, no importa si eres hombre o mujer, ni siquiera importa tu edad!! Conmigo aprenderás paso a paso como iniciar tu negocio de repostería desde casa, te enseñare las recetas que yo utilizo, lo que me ha funcionado, mis técnicas para lograr tener éxito desde casa.
En este curso descubrirás que no necesitas de instrumentos industriales caros ni mucho menos! Veraz lo económico y fácil que es iniciar tu negocio de repostería desde casa!
Te mostrare de que manera lograr lo que todos queremos! El ser tu propio jefe!!
Conmigo tendras acceso a videos explicados de una manera super practica, No necesitaras horarios, No necesitaras ir a ningún sitio, podras aprender en cualquier parte que te encuentres, pausar los videos para tomar anotaciones, repetir cuantas veces quieras el contenido y lo mas importante aprender a tu propio ritmo desde tu celular o computadora!!
Te aseguro que si decides tomar este curso, te daras cuenta que estas a un solo paso de iniciar desde casa y de una manera cero costosa tu propio negocio!
¿Cuáles son los requisitos para tomar este curso?
No necesitas tener absolutamente ningún conocimiento en repostería, solo necesitas tener ganas de iniciarte en este mundo tan bonito de la repostería creativa y claro de algunos materiales básicos que probablemente ya tengas en casa!!
¿Qué voy a aprender en este curso?
Al finalizar este curso seras capaz de:
-Preparar harina de vainilla para cupcakes y pasteles.
-Preparar harina de chocolate para cupcakes y pasteles.
-Rellenar pasteles.
-Evitar que se peguen los pasteles al hornear.
-Desmoldar pasteles sin que se desbaraten.
-Hornear cupcakes

-Como utilizar crema batida y evitar que se “caiga” o derrita, Mi secreto!!
-Preparar buttercream.
-Decorar Cupcakes con fondant
-Decorar un mini pastel de dos pisos
-Mi técnica para cubrir pastel con crema de 2 formas diferentes.

EXTRA!!
-PREPARA TU PROPIO FONDANT PROFESIONAL!

-Consejos que yo he aplicado durante mi tiempo vendiendo cupcakes que te seran de muchicisma ayuda!
target_audience: Este curso va dirigido a cualquier persona, de cualquier edad, que este dispuesta a aprender algo nuevo para desarrollarse personalmente.

courses.description:
You are CRAZY ABOUT GOOD PASTRIES and are very DEMANDING in terms of tastes. You want to REPRODUCE high-end french pastries.
You're exactly in the right place if:
You tested french pastry during a previous trip,
Or maybe you're are just expecting to taste one french pastry in your life.
You want to impress your friends; treat your family to a meal
Or simply increase your pastry's skills,
Unfortunately, the best ( and true) french recipes are not easy to find.
It's ancient history now. All the best tips from famous french pastry chefs are in this course.


Why should you enroll in this course?
I'm a french girl living in the Paris region since my birth. I have been passionate about French pastry for almost 10 years now. From simple chocolate cake to wedding cake made for birthdays, to cannelés or macarons, I spent years perfecting my pastry techniques. Always trying to stay up-to-date and inclined to improve and perfect my knowledge, I'm looking for the best Parisian pastries with the tastiest flavors. Intrigued by the techniques of the greatest French chefs, I search and study the smallest details of each to create high-end pastries.
Aware of the difficulty to find the real secrets and recipes of the best, it's with great excitement that I will share all the knowledge I have accumulated over these ten years.
Whether it is in the baking, the structure, the visual/presentation, the texture of a cream, the balance of flavors and textures, I have managed to gather the best advices to reproduce the best French pastries at home.


I can guarantee you that :
In this class, you will learn how to make a perfect croissant, have a beautiful turning with layers of butter, and shape a crispy and airy croissant for your breakfasts.
Learn, step by step all the techniques and gestures, and discover how to have perfect buttered and balanced flavors.
From the very beginner level to the harder skills, you will easily understand what makes the french pastry so famous in the world (a clue: details matter).
I will provide videos and printable recipes to ease your learning process. All steps are understandable for intermediate bakers as well as for beginners. And if you have any questions, feel free to ask, I would be glad to help you as soon as I'm online.
And the icing on the cake: at the end of the course, you will find a bunch of my personal highly recommended addresses if you are passing through Paris (and you want to taste some high-end French croissants).


With our 30-day 100% money-back guarantee, there is nothing holding you back from jumping in right now and trying the course out.
Are you ready to take action? See you in the first lesson!
Lea AMK
target_audience: Any one wanting to prepare the most famous French pastry/viennoiserie in the world

courses.description:
Do you love Thai food and always wanted to learn how to make your own flavourful vegan Thai dishes?


Not sure what ingredients and spices to use to create that super tasty Thai curry? Where to find green papaya for a delicious green papaya salad? And how to recreate that amazing Thai iced tea you enjoyed on the beach in Thailand?


Join me for a delicious Thai class, learning to make mouthwatering dishes all from scratch, in the comfort of your own kitchen, and at your own pace.


We will make simple, delicious recipes that don’t need any special equipment.


Enjoy an intimate experience at your own home, as we meet new ingredients and flavors, learn helpful kitchen tips, and prepare yummy recipes from scratch, in a wonderful hands-on experience!


This class includes 9 dishes - appetizers, mains, condiments, sides, a drink and dessert too - each dish has its own step by step video, written recipe, ingredient and equipment list!


I spent a couple of months in Thailand, and each meal I had, whether it was a hole in the wall restaurant, a food stall in the market, or a fancy restaurant - it was always so fresh and absolutely delicious!


There is something really special about Thai food, and I don’t think I know anyone who doesn’t like it!


Thai food is very vegan friendly and in this class we are going to make some of my favorite dishes that are inspired by my travels in Thailand!


So join me and learn how to make your own delicious vegan Thai food!


Special Notes:
Equipment required: blender (needed for 2 recipes: Green Curry Paste and Mango Coconut Lime Sorbet)
All recipes in this class can be made gluten-free & nut-free
target_audience: People who want to learn how to make delicious vegan Thai food at home
Curious home cooks that want to develop new kitchen skills

You can enjoy my classes whether you are a beginner – as I go through every step of each recipe – or if you have been cooking for a while and are looking for some new inspiration in the kitchen.

requirements: Kursta anlatılanları denemek için en azından bir V60, tartı ve kettle sahibi olmanız gerekiyor.
courses.description:
Merhaba,
Ben Ersin Overdose Coffee ve Perk Up Coffee'nin kurucusu ve Kahve Sakal Youtube kanalinin sahibiyim. Beyaz yaka işimi bırakıp kahve işine başlamadan önce kahveye duydugum tutku beni bugünlere getirdi. Perk Up Coffee bünyesinde verdigim kurslardan faydalanan onlarca kahve neferi yetistirdim ama bu isi daha erisilebilir yapmak adina online bir kurs yapma karari verdim. Ister kahveye yeni basliyor olun. Ister aktif çalisan ve kendini gelistirmek isteyen bir barista. Bu kurs size yeni bilgiler ve yetenekler katacak.
Peki bu kursta tam olarak ne ögrenecegiz? Kursumuzda üçüncü dalga kahve ile hayatımızda daha çok yer etmeye başlamış demleme yöntemlerinden ve püf noktalarından bahsedeceğiz. Demleme mekanikleri, tarif yapısı, değişkenler ile doğru yaklaşımları öğrenip. V60, Chemex, Aeropress, Syphon gibi demleme ekipmanlarının kullanımlarını öğreneceğiz.
Bu kurs barista olmak isteyen ya da evinde daha iyi kahve yapmak isteyen ama kurslara binlerce lira vermek istemeyenler için çok iyi bir baslangiç kursu hatta kurslara harcayacaginiz paranin bir kismi ile evinize ekipmanlar alip antremanlarinizi bu makine ile yapabilirsiniz.

courses.title: Tea Fundamentals III
courses.bio: Tea Processing & Evaluation
objectives: Learn the different steps of tea processing
Understand how fermentation changes the flavor of tea
Distinguish the differences in processing different categories of tea
Evaluate different types of tea

How Are The Best Teas Made? The Sophisti: Overview of Processing Steps for Truly Fine Teas
How Tea Flavor Changes with Fermentation
White Tea Processing: Wild Bai Hao Yin Zhen
Pu Er Sheng Cha Processing: Ban Po Lao Zhai
Tea Evaluation and Final Exams: Tea Evaluation: Telling the Good from the Bad Part 1
Tea Evaluation: Telling the Good from the Bad Part 2
Tea Evaluation: Telling the Good from the Bad Part 3

requirements: This is part three of a three-tier course, finishing part one and two first is recommended.
courses.description:
Part three of our three-tier Tea Fundamentals Course focuses on the third pillar of teamaking: the processing or crafting of the tea leaves into fine tea. In previous parts we discussed the first two pillars: terroir and cultivar. The process of making the best teas involves a series of meticulous steps designed to optimize and preserve the flavor and aroma of the leaves. These steps vary depending on the type of tea being produced, but they all share a common goal: to create the perfect balance of taste and aroma.
Harvesting and sorting, withering, rolling and oxidation, more sorting and firing all are important steps in the tea process; we'll discuss them all using examples of each tea category as illustration. For green tea we focus on Xi Hu Long Jing, yellow tea is represented by Huang Ya, we have wild Bai Hao Yin Zhen for the white category, Song Zhong and Shui Xian for dan cong wu long and yan cha wu long respectively, Chi Gan for red tea and finally Ban Po Lao Zhai for pu er.
In the last part before we'll quiz you about essential topics regarding tea, we'll share some knowledge about how to properly evaluate teas of different caliber and blind taste test some teas.
target_audience: For people who want to dive even deeper into tea and learn about specific processing characteristics

courses.title: Traditional Algerian Dishes : Bourak, Chakhchoukha,Mahjouba
courses.bio: Learn to Cook Traditional Algerian Dishes: Bourak, Chakhchoukha, and Mahjouba
objectives: Master the art of preparing three iconic Algerian dishes: Bourak, Chakhchoukha, and Mahjouba.
Learn essential Algerian cooking techniques, including dough preparation, filling creation, and assembling traditional recipes.
Understand the cultural significance and flavors behind Algeria’s rich culinary heritage.
Gain confidence in recreating authentic Algerian recipes to share with family and friends.

Introduction: Welcome to the Course: Exploring Traditional Algerian Cuisine
First Recipe: Bourak: Introduction to Bourak: A Traditional Algerian Delight
Second Recipe: Chakhchoukha: Introduction to Chakhchoukha: A Hearty Algerian Dish
Therd Recipe: Mahjouba: Introduction to Mahjouba: A Flavorful Algerian Flatbread
Conclusion: Conclusion: Congratulations on Mastering Algerian Cuisine!

requirements: No prior experience is needed—this course is perfect for beginners!  You’ll need basic cooking tools (pots, pans, mixing bowl, rolling pin) and access to the ingredients used in the recipes. All steps will be explained clearly, so anyone can follow along.
courses.description:
Welcome to this comprehensive course on traditional Algerian cuisine! In this course, you will learn to cook three iconic Algerian dishes: Bourak, Chakhchoukha, and Mahjouba. These dishes are a reflection of Algeria’s rich culinary heritage, and by the end of the course, you'll be able to prepare them with confidence.
Throughout the course, you will:
Master the art of making Bourak, a crispy pastry filled with delicious savory fillings.
Create Chakhchoukha, a hearty dish made with traditional flatbread and stew, perfect for family meals.
Learn to make Mahjouba, a flavorful flatbread stuffed with vegetables and spices.
This course is designed for all skill levels, from beginners to experienced cooks. Each recipe is broken down into simple steps, making it easy to follow along and recreate these authentic dishes. You’ll also learn useful tips, cooking techniques, and insights into Algerian culture, traditions, and rich flavors.
Whether you're new to Algerian cooking or looking to expand your skills, this course offers step-by-step instructions to guide you. By the end, you'll have a deeper appreciation for Algerian cuisine and the skills to prepare these traditional dishes in your own kitchen. Let’s get cooking and bring the vibrant, delicious flavors of Algeria to life!
target_audience: This course is for anyone interested in learning traditional Algerian cooking. Whether you're a beginner or an intermediate cook, you'll discover how to make iconic dishes like Bourak, Chakhchoukha, and Mahjouba, while exploring Algerian food culture and flavors. Perfect for those looking to expand their culinary skills and try new recipes!

This course will cover all the steps you need to cook Hong Kong restaurant-level Char Siu at home using an air-fryer or a grill oven. Learn all the skills and tricks required from raw meat handling to plating and sauce making. The course is designed for both beginners and experienced cooks, so whether you're new to Chinese cuisine or a seasoned pro, you'll be able to follow along and create restaurant-level Char Siu that is flavoured with 20 kinds of ingredients and spices at home.

courses.title: WineMasters Cooking for Wine: Food & Wine Pairing Course

Learn to make the perfect wine pairings for dinner parties both at home and in the workplace.
Learn how you can enjoy every type of wine at the right moment and with the right food.
Do It Yourself: Recorded in a professional TV studio with interactive visual details and lots of humour.
English spoken course with subtitles available in many languages. Read, listen and watch at the same time.

Introduction: Special Edition - Wachau Riesling, Bandol Rosé & Super Tuscan

requirements: A love for wine and food!
courses.description:
In this course, World Champion Sommelier and skilled chef Andreas Larsson cooks the most delicious dishes with wines brought and made by his guests; world-famous winemakers. The guests bring a wine they produced themselves, and a blind surprise wine from a different region. It is up to Andreas to prepare the best dish to pair with the producer's wine, and he will have to improvise a dish for the surprise wine with ingredients in his fridge.
Of course Andreas explains why he made his decisions, and explains the way his dishes and the wines complement each other by describing all he tastes in the wine. The method he uses is universally applicable to all kinds of wines and dishes.
Cooking For Wine will teach you to choose best wine for every dish, every occasion and any budget. Whether your'e at home, in a restaurant or working as a wine professional. Recorded in a professional TV studio with interactive visual aid, and you can follow every step of the cooking process. Every lecture has its discussed wines listed in the description, so you can taste along from home!
Wine and food can complement each other, and when done well, you will be in heaven!

courses.title: Pastelería francesa sin gluten: sabor y tradición.
courses.bio: Descubre la magia de los sabores auténticos franceses 100% gluten free.
objectives: Crear iconos franceses sin gluten: Prepara éclairs, macarons, religieuse y más, auténticos y deliciosos, incluso sin gluten.
Innovar con creatividad: Experimenta con sabores y estilos, crea versiones únicas de clásicos franceses sin gluten.
Comprender fundamentos pastelería: Aprende masas, cremas y técnicas para improvisar y crear postres con confianza, sin gluten.
Dominar repostería sin gluten: Aprende a adaptar recetas clásicas, conociendo ingredientes y técnicas para postres franceses auténticos y sin gluten.

Aspectos teóricos de la pastelería franc: Aspectos técnicos a tener en cuenta.
Técnicas base de pastelería francesa sin: Glamour en Crema: Betún de Chantilly y Mascarpone
Recetas con Pâte à Choux: delicadas crea: Religieuse, encanto en crema y glaseado.
Recetas con Pâte Feuilletée. Hojaldre: D: Saint Honoré: exquisita armonía de texturas.
Millefeuille: sinfonía de texturas y sabores.
Flan Patissier: tradición en crema y hojaldre.

requirements: Para este curso necesitarás una balanza de precisión de cocina. No son necesarios conocimientos previos en pastelería ni en cocina sin gluten, te llevaré paso a paso desde el comienzo.
courses.description:
¡Bienvenidos al maravilloso viaje de la Pastelería Francesa sin gluten!
En este curso, te enseñaré las recetas base más tradicionales y deliciosas que forman el corazón de la Pastelería Francesa sin gluten:
1. Pâte à Choux: Descubre el secreto detrás de los éclairs y las religieuses. Suave y esponjoso, a la vez que crocante, te llevará a un mundo de sabores únicos.
2. Pâte Feuilletée (Hojaldre): ¿Te has preguntado alguna vez cómo se logra esas capas dorada y crujientes y casi infinitas? Aquí lo desvelaremos.
3. Génoise: La base para creaciones como los Entremet y la Torta Ópera. ¡Te sorprenderá su textura ligera y esponjosa!
4. Brioche: Aprende a hacer la auténtica Brioche sin gluten, totalmente emblemática.
5. Cremas: Explora la riqueza de las cremas pasteleras, ganaches y cremas de manteca.  Descubre cómo se prepara la Creme Brulée de tus sueños.


Con estas bases, estamos listos para elevar nuestras habilidades culinarias y ¡crear obras maestras de la Pastelería Francesa sin gluten!
Ahora bien, ¿qué podemos hacer con estas recetas? ¡Aquí viene la diversión! Usaremos nuestras bases para preparar postres icónicos y exquisitos:
1. Religieuse: Un dulce religioso que combina la delicadeza del pâte à choux y la suavidad de las cremas. ¡Un verdadero manjar!
2. Éclairs: Clásicos y elegantes, llenos de crema, chocolate y sin gluten. ¡Una verdadera tentación para cualquier ocasión!
3. Paris-Brest: ¡Un círculo de gloria! Descubre cómo hacer este delicioso y estilizado postre con sabor a frutos secos.
4. Saint-Honoré: Una explosión de texturas con pâte à choux y hojaldre, todo bañado en caramelo. ¡Una verdadera fiesta para el paladar!
5. Millefeuille: Las capas de hojaldre crujiente y su cremoso relleno te llevarán directo al paraíso pastelero.
6. Tarte Tatin: Caramelo y manzanas caramelizadas sobre hojaldre dorado. ¡Una delicia francesa que no puedes perderte!
7. Flan Patissier: Un postre tradicional con una base de hojaldre y una suave crema de vainilla. ¡Un clásico que no pasa de moda!
8. Entremet: Una elaboración más compleja pero muy gratificante, con distintas capas y sabores que te dejarán maravillado.
9. Torta Ópera: Elegancia y sabor se fusionan en este postre con capas de génoise, ganache y crema de café.
10. Tarta Tropezienne: Descubre los secretos de esta deliciosa tarta con bizcocho suave y crema de vainilla, todo libre de gluten. Un placer mediterráneo en tu paladar.
11. Creme Brulée: Aprende a preparar la delicada Creme Brulée de vainilla con su caramelo crujiente. Un postre francés elegante y exquisito.
12. Macarons: Cerraremos el curso con un toque dulce y colorido. Aprenderás a crear estos pequeños bocados de felicidad.
¡No necesitas experiencia previa, solo tu pasión por la repostería! Te guiaré paso a paso para que logres estas creaciones sin gluten que te transportarán a la magia de Francia.
¡Prepárate para sumergirte en un mundo de texturas, sabores y aromas inolvidables! ¿Estás listo para el desafío? ¡Inscríbete ahora y comencemos a hornear recuerdos juntos!
target_audience: Este curso está dirigido a todos aquellos apasionados de la repostería y la cocina que desean sumergirse en el encantador mundo de la Pastelería Francesa sin gluten. Si eres un entusiasta de la cocina y te enfrentas al desafío de adaptar recetas al formato sin gluten, este curso es perfecto para ti.

Si te gusta experimentar con sabores y estilos, este curso te invita a ser creativo y desarrollar tus propias versiones únicas de los clásicos franceses sin gluten. Aprenderás a dominar las técnicas específicas y los ingredientes alternativos para que puedas sorprender a tus familiares, amigos o clientes con tus exquisitas creaciones.

Ya seas un principiante curioso o un apasionado chef en busca de nuevas habilidades, este curso es para aquellos que deseen embarcarse en un emocionante viaje culinario, explorando sabores, texturas y aromas inolvidables.

courses.description:
The ultimate Udemy course designed to help baristas worldwide elevate their craft. My name is Eric, and as a seasoned barista teacher with over a decade of experience, I have served over a hundred thousand customers and mastered skills such as roasting, opening new coffee bars, and creating stunning latte art. This course is the culmination of my journey, aimed at helping you refine your barista skills.

We will cover essential topics such as espresso recipes, grinder adjustments, and the art of milk steaming. Designed for both beginner and intermediate baristas, this course provides valuable insights applicable in various settings, from Starbucks and bakeries to specialty cafes. Con las habilidades y herramientas que aprenderá en este curso, podrá no solo crear las mejores explosiones de sabor recomendadas por el chef, sino también explorar tu creatividad y crear cualquier cantidad de combinaciones.

courses.bio: We will weigh the beans and the espresso to set up and maintain consistency of our espresso shots. We will do late art.
objectives: Extract smooth espresso from a Breville Dual Boiler espresso machine

Introduction: Overview of my methodology and desired outcomes.

Theory: Real world grind, plotting quantity vs Size
Theory: Which home grinder should I buy?

requirements: Whilst these lessons are shown on a Breville Dual Boiler espresso machine, you can use any espresso machine with these 'brew ratio' techniques to get a consistent extraction.
courses.description:
I have designed this course to give you the knowledge and skills you need to make consistently outstanding coffee using the brilliant Breville range of dual boiler espresso makers.
We will look at:
The theory of grinders and help you look for the best grinder and make the most of your existing grinder.
The programming and operation of the Breville range of dual boiler espresso machines.
The elements that make up uniform coffee extraction.
How to get even coffee grind distribution in the basket and a good tamp.
What to look for in a coffee bean and the best way to store your beans.
How to minimise waste of your milk and beans.
How to choose and set the best brew boiler water temperature.
How to program the single and double shot buttons and extract a smooth shot of espresso.
How to texture your milk to the same temperature every time, without a thermometer.
How to texture your milk to a good consistency for late art.
How to pour a rosetta and simple hearts.
How to make a great chai latte and hot chocolate.
Like most professional baristas I started out with a desire to make a decent espresso based coffee at home.  That desire morphed into an obsession, and that obsession into a full time job as a barista.  That barista job morphed into the ownership of a specialty coffee cafe in the busy West End of Brisbane.  I have done my best to roll all of that experience into a single course based around my favourite home espresso machine, the Breville BES920.
It is absolutely possible to make outstanding coffee with the BES series of espresso machines, and it is my aim to give you the knowledge and skills you need to do so.
You will need an espresso maker, preferably but not necessarily a Breville dual boiler, a grinder and a set of digital scales accurate to 0.1g.
target_audience: This course is for the person that wants to learn how to consistently make a great cup of coffee on a home espresso machine.  This course is for anyone from an absolute beginner to the person that has had a home espresso machine for years and wants to learn a methodical, replicable, consistent way to make espresso based coffees.
This course is for the person thinking of purchasing a new or second hand Breville dual boiler espresso machine.
