courses.title: Mediterranean Cuisine by Master Chef
courses.bio: Selected classic Mediterranean Dishes
objectives: Learn Mediterranean Cuisine
Learn to make Tabbauleh and Filafel
Learn about Paella
Learn more about Tajine
requirements: No program experience required for this program
courses.description:
This program covers the Mediterranean cuisine picking up some selected classic famous dishes by mASTER cHEF
Mediterranean cuisine is the food and methods of preparation used by the people of the Mediterranean Basin. The historical connections of the region, as well as the impact of the Mediterranean Sea on the region's climate and economy, mean that these cuisines share dishes beyond the core trio of oil, bread, and wine, such as roast lamb or mutton, meat stews with vegetables and tomato (for example, Spanish andrajos), vegetable stews (Provençal ratatouille, Spanish pisto, Italian ciambotta) and the salted cured fish roe, bottarga, found across the region. Spirits based on anise are drunk in many countries around the Mediterranean.
Mezze Dip - Mezze Dips are simple to make dips that can be served as part of a Mezze type spread. Mezze is a way of dining, in which a selection of small dishes are served. They are meant to be shared, either as an appetizer or a light meal.
Greek Salad - Greek salad or horiatiki salad is a popular salad in Greek cuisine generally made with pieces of tomatoes, cucumbers, onion, feta cheese, and olives and dressed with salt, pepper, Greek oregano, and olive oil. Common additions include green bell pepper slices or caper berries
Lamb Shank Tagine - A mouth-watering Moroccan dish of tender lamb in a thick, aromatic sauce with flavours of pomegranate and almond.
Mix Paella - Mixed Paella is one of the most famous variants of the traditional paellla. The recipe contains not only different kinds of meat but also with a mix of different shellfish
The Israeli dish Shakshuka - an addictively spicy mix of tomatoes, chillies and garlic with fresh eggs cracked right into the sauce to poach. Served with flatbread
Tabbaouleh and Felafel - Tabbouleh is an Arab salad of cracked wheat mixed with finely chopped ingredients such as tomatoes, onions, and parsley served with Pocked bread. Falafel is a Middle Eastern dish of spiced mashed chickpeas or other pulses formed into balls or fritters and deep-fried, usually eaten with or in Pita Bread
Snapper Papilote provencale - Provençal style food, centered in the South of France, includes a love for fresh fish, extra virgin olive oil, and pungent garlic
target_audience: This program is suitable for both home cooks and Enthusiasts

courses.title: Moroccan Traditional Pancakes
courses.bio: Moroccan Traditional Breakfast: Pancakes “Beghrir”
requirements: Basic kitchen equipment.
Key ingredients such as flour, semolina, yeast, and oil.
courses.description:
Moroccan traditional pancakes, mostly knowns as Beghrir or baghrir, are spongy, melt-in-your-mouth made from a crepe-like semolina batter. Light and tender, these pancakes are characterized by a unique honeycomb-like appearance. This is a result of yeast in the batter, which causes hundreds of bubbles to rise and break on the surface of the pancake while it cooks.
Start your holiday breakfast tradition by making Moroccan pancakes, rarely eaten plain. Instead, a sweet topping can make a tasty difference. Moroccans are most likely to enjoy them dipped in syrup made from butter and honey, or they might be served with cream cheese, olive oil, or jam on the side.
Moroccan Pancakes are usually cooked only on one side. However, in some regions, the cooks will flip them over briefly; in that case, they might be called things.
By the end of the course, you will have the skills and knowledge to make delicious Moroccan pancakes in your kitchen and impress your friends and family with your newfound culinary expertise.
Note: I am fully committed to helping you learn and master the secrets of Moroccan cuisine. Let’s meet inside to build your first stunning Moroccan pancake.
Now it’s your time to shine.
target_audience: The Moroccan Traditional Pancakes course is for anyone who is interested in learning about Moroccan cuisine and how to make traditional Moroccan pancakes.

トックのレシピと作り方: トックに入れるズッキーニの炒め方

requirements: 気軽に一緒に楽しみましょう
courses.description: 今回は韓国の代表料理である白菜キムチを中心にポッサムとトックの作り方をレクチャーします。これまで「韓国料理教室　韓サモ」でいただいた質問や疑問、気づいた点などを網羅して可能な限りわかりやすく説明しています。遠方で「韓サモhansamo」に参加出来ない方に、また、復習にも活用いただけると思います。遠くにいても料理教室に参加している雰囲気で一緒に料理を楽しみましょう（＾＾）

courses.title: Mastering French Macarons
courses.bio: Step-by-step video instructions to make French Macarons from your home kitchen!
objectives: Step-by-step video instruction to make French Macarons from your home kitchen at your own pace
Exclusive recipe downloads (shells + four different fillings!)
Tips and tricks to troubleshoot and achieve consistent results
Complete list of equipment recommendations
requirements: I will provide a thorough list of my specific "nice to have" recommendations, but only a few things apart from normal kitchen equipment (bowls, sheet pans, rubber spatula, etc) are essential to begin:  Stand or hand-mixer, fine mesh sieve,  piping tip (~1cm recommended), piping bag (can use a gallon-size plastic bag), parchment paper or silicone baking mat, gel or powdered food coloring (optional)
courses.description:
Do you want to have THE go-to beautiful dessert to bring to parties? Or maybe you'd like to build your confidence as a baker as you master one of the most difficult French pastries. Well, you're in luck, because after selling thousands of my delicious macarons, I'm finally sharing all of my secrets ◡̈

Bakers from all skill levels will benefit from this macaron class! Whether you're newly exploring baking as a hobby, or are an experienced baker, you will love the step-by-step instruction, insider secrets, and proven recipes this course provides!

The class includes:
Exclusive recipe downloads (shells + four different fillings!)
Tips and tricks to troubleshoot and achieve consistent results
Complete list of equipment recommendations
I will provide a thorough list of my specific "nice to have" equipment recommendations, but only a few things apart from normal kitchen equipment (bowls, sheet pans, rubber spatula, etc) are essential to begin:
Stand or hand-mixer
Fine mesh sieve
Piping tip (~1cm recommended)
Piping bag (can use a gallon-size plastic bag)
Parchment paper or silicone baking mat
Gel or powdered food coloring (optional)
Additionally, the only ingredient that is not readily available at grocery stores is "powdered egg whites," but this can be omitted and still achieve good results.
target_audience: Bakers from all skill levels will benefit from this class!  Whether you're newly exploring baking as a hobby, or are an experienced baker, you will benefit from the step-by-step instruction, insider secrets, and proven recipes this course provides!

courses.title: Temperagem de chocolate fácil e limpa!
courses.bio: Aprenda a realizar um método de temperagem fácil, com adição de manteiga de cacau!
objectives: Método de temperagem fácil e limpa utilizando manteiga de cacau
Quais as diferenças sensoriais e de composição entre chocolates nobres e coberturas de chocolate
O que é temperagem e qual sua utilidade e importância
Quais são os tipos diferentes de chocolate existentes e suas diferenças de manipulação
Quais são os tipos de temperagem existentes, seus prós e contras
Equipamentos que facilitam a produção de ovos de páscoa e execução da temperagem com sucesso

Introdução: Temperagem de Chocolate: O que é e qual sua utilidade?
Qual o melhor método de temperagem para você?
Equipamentos e Ingredientes: Equipamentos para começar: dicas de compras
Método FÁCIL de Temperagem com Manteiga: Produção de um ovo de páscoa com o chocolate temperado
Finalização do ovo de páscoa e teste do "snap"!

requirements: Vontade de aprender e trabalhar com chocolates!
courses.description:
Esse curso é destinado para INICIANTES em nível BÁSICO de confeitaria e visa auxiliar quem quer fazer seus próprios ovos de páscoa esse ano ou ganhar um graninha extra nesse período delicioso!


Essa é uma AULA DEMONSTRATIVA, a qual você pode replicar em casa ao final da exposição.


Serão abordados os seguintes temas:


✨ Diferença entre COBERTURA e CHOCOLATE NOBRE!


✨ Tipos de chocolates nobres e suas diferenças de manipulação


✨ Importância da temperagem do chocolate


✨ DEMONSTRAÇÃO: Dicas de equipamentos baratinhos para temperagem


✨ DEMONSTRAÇÃO: Método para temperagem limpa e fácil com adição de manteiga de cacau
target_audience: Pessoas que querem aprender  o que é temperagem de chocolate
Pessoas que desejam trabalhar na páscoa vendendo ovos de páscoa de qualidade
Pessoas que desejam se aprimorar em confeitaria aprendendo nova técnica de temperagem de chocolate
Amantes de confeitaria ou pessoas que levam confeitaria como um hobby
Iniciantes na confeitaria profissional
Pessoas de nível básico em confeitaria
Leigos em confeitaria

courses.title: Diseño de Recetas de Cerveza
courses.bio: Nivel Básico
objectives: Formulación de Cerveza Artesanal/Casera

La etapa del diseño: Lista de Lúpulos y Esquema de Lupulización
Registros: Gestión de Recetas y de Lotes
Calculadoras y convertidores de unidades en línea

requirements: Uso de PC/Mac
Conocimientos básicos del proceso de elaboración de cerveza
Estar familiarizado con los Estilos de Cerveza
courses.description:
¿Te gusta la cerveza, ya sabes cómo se hace pero no sabes cómo diseñar tus propias recetas?
¿Quieres hacer que tus recetas no solo sean excelentes sino que sea únicas y que reflejen tu talento?
¿Quieres acortar el camino para ajustar tus recetas al punto que tengan un nivel que te permita comercializarlas?
¿No quieres limitarte a hacer recetas copiadas de la web?
¿Quieres hacer tu propia interpretación de algún estilo o marca exitosa?
¿Quieres crear tu propio estilo?
¡Este curso es para ti !
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Bienvenido al curso completo: Diseño de Recetas de Cerveza- Nivel Básico
Al finalizar este curso:
Serás capaz de seleccionar tu plataforma de diseño de recetas que mejor se ajuste a tus preferencias.
Podrás  interpretar cualquier receta de cerveza
Serás capaz de definir tu flujo de trabajo del proceso de diseño basado en tus requerimientos personales.
Podrás crear tus propias recetas
Podrás convertir cualquier receta a las unidades de medida de tu elección
Podrás escalar tus recetas a cualquier tamaño, tecnología y eficiencia de equipo.
Aprenderás a llevar una bitácora de tus lotes.
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Con tu gusto por la cerveza y procesando la información que te proporcionamos en el curso, estarás aprendiendo de manera estructurada desde la lección 1.
Asimismo, hemos incluido una serie de recursos que te ayudarán a formar tu caja de herramientas de software para que diseñar recetas sea fácil y gratificante. Deja los cálculos manuales y concéntrate en la parte creativa del proceso. Después de todo, tus cervezas serán un reflejo de tu personalidad y de tu talento cervecero y con éste curso podrás dar rienda suelta a tu creatividad.
¡Inscríbete ya!
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
NOTA IMPORTANTE: Este NO es un curso de Elaboración de Cerveza. Se asume, como se dice en la descripción que ya estás familiarizado con el proceso de elaboración. Si no es así, ó quieres reforzar tus conocimientos, te recomendamos que primero tomes nuestro curso sobre ese tema
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Nos vemos en el curso,
Atentamente:
Héctor López Maldonado
target_audience: Aficionados a la Cerveza, Cerveceros Caseros principiantes e intermedios, Personal de Centros de Consumo, Estudiantes de Gastronomía, Chefs.
Emprendedores del ramo cervecero que quieren entender el proceso de creación de cervezas.

courses.title: Party-Ready Cupcakes Made Easy
courses.bio: Perfect cupcakes for every celebration
objectives: Overcome fondant frustrations: combat heat and humidity, harden decorations, condition for a smooth finish (no cracks!), and colour your fondant
Use a variety of simple cutters for a versatile range of 2D designs, including a skull & crossbones, ice-cream cone and cookie, plus a rocket ship!
Sculpt and hand model 3D fondant decorations, including; flip-flops, a nail polish bottle, a pretty rolled rose and much more!
Apply a range of textures for that added detail and ‘wow’ factor, by using impression mats, your basic modeling tools and a Chux wipe
Marble your fondant toppers to replicate space for an eye-catching finish for your Galactic Adventure cupcake toppers
Use and apply gold lustre dust to create a beautiful gold finish
Use an edible pen for drawing on small details

Welcome Cake Lover!: Welcome to Party-Ready Cupcakes Made Easy!

requirements: No experience required
courses.description:
Say hello to a world of fondant fun as you learn the secrets to creating jaw-dropping cupcake toppers that will impress at any celebration.
Learn the secrets to mastering fondant with my expert tips and tricks! Discover how to conquer heat and humidity, condition your fondant like a pro, add vibrant colours, roll it out flawlessly and ensure your decorations are picture-perfect every time.
Then dive into learning how to create my four themed cupcakes sets, while exploring a range of modelling, texturing and cutter techniques. From the adorable Sweet Tooth cupcake set, adventurous Pirates Ahoy, girl’s night Pamper Party and out-of-this-world Galactic Adventure cupcakes.
In these six modules you are going to learn how to:
Overcome those fondant frustrations, including; combating heat and humidity, how to harden your decorations for better structural support, conditioning your fondant for that smooth finish (no more cracks!) and how to colour your fondant
Use a variety of simple cutters for a versatile range of 2D designs, including a skull & crossbones, ice-cream cone and cookie, plus a rocket ship!
Sculpt and hand model 3D fondant decorations, including; flip-flops, a nail polish bottle, a pretty rolled rose and much more!
Apply a range of textures for that added detail and ‘wow’ factor, by using impression mats, your basic modeling tools and a Chux wipe (don’t underestimate common household items!)
Marble your fondant toppers to replicate space for an eye-catching finish for your Galactic Adventure cupcake toppers
Use and apply gold lustre dust to create a beautiful gold finish
Use an edible pen for drawing on small details.


Get ready to unleash your inner decorator and take your cupcakes to the next level. Join me on this sweet journey and let the decorating adventures begin!
target_audience: Cake lovers who want to feel confident creating amazing cakes in their own kitchen

courses.title: Entremet masterclass by chef Lim from APCA chef online
courses.bio: This course will cover various French Cakes covering different recipes & techniques
objectives: Learn French Style Sakes
Learn Modern French Cakes
Learn advance french Pastries and Cakes
Learn french Gateau and pastries
requirements: No experience is required for this program
courses.description:
Chef Lim is an award winning In house Executive Pastry chef in APCA Malaysia who have curated this program for APCA chef online. this Program covers some advance level of Entremets or french Cakes. All the Entremet are composition of different components and finally give a great taste and texture.
This program is suitable for everybody as the entire program can be easily followed in a pastry kitchen. Students can also use this recipe and techniques to make their own version. Kindly understand that any recipe cannot be just followed as the acidity, sugar content, Fat content and water content which actually make the difference in the products need to be respected.
APCA CHEF ONLINE is a platform digitalizing all its professional programs of Pastry & Culinary programs which allows you to explore all the recipes by APCA renowned chefs, in a step by step structured way.
Conducted by our Inhouse Pastry & Culinary chefs, World Pastry champions, Asia Pastry Champions and Master chefs, you may learn from some of the best chefs all in one website!
This program consists of multiple levels, designed to suit the needs of professionals, teachers, students, home bakers and enthusiasts.
All the recipe in the Program covers a lots of sub recipes which include the base which could be sponge or biscuits, Crisp, Cream , Jelly, Graze and the final touch of Garnishes, which could be fruits or chocolate garnishes.
This topic cover following program -
Baileys
Enchanted
La Nature
Apricot and Passion Fruits
Black Forest
Indian summer
Raspberry Chocolate
Exotic Log
target_audience: This program is suitable for students, Teachers and professionals Pastry chefs

courses.title: Epic & Easy Home Sourdough Bread
courses.bio: Bringing bread back down to earth! Empower yourself with this simple ancestral skill for any busy lifestyle.
objectives: Bake amazing sourdough bread at home with ease
Understand all baking terms like 'hydration', 'proof', 'shape' and more
Learn to bake both in tins and open using a proofing basket
Understand the role of gluten in bread baking
See how to incorporate alternative grains into your bread
Start and maintain a sourdough starter
Understand the role different flours (refined white, whole wheat, emmer etc) in your bread

Bread Baking 1: Starting the Levain & th: Bread Making 1: Starting the Dough & Levain

requirements: This is for beginners and for bakers ready to lift their game. Except for an oven or toaster oven, you don't need any specific equipment!
courses.description:
Delicious, nutritious bread is the cornerstone of humanity, yet modern yeasted breads have left us with tons of gastric disorders and belly upsets. Wild yeast sourdough bread is digestible and incredible nourishing for the whole household, even those with gluten-intolerance. This course brings good bread back to the home level with clear, simple & easy procedures to fit sourdough bread baking into any busy lifestyle from life-long home bread baker & ancestral diet expert, Laura Christie Khanna.

The internet is a confusing & complicated place for learning bread making - this course is a down-to-earth approach to making delicious sourdough bread in about 15 minutes of active time. The real work is done by the wild yeast and bacteria during the natural fermentation process. Let food be thy medicine & empower yourself with the ancestral skill of baking nourishing bread at home! Your belly, your taste buds and your family will thank you.


The benefits of learning to bake your own sourdough bread are plenty! Firstly, the digestibility and nutrition of a sourdough loaf far surpasses any store bought bread. It also has an amazing moist texture, complex flavor & easily becomes the cornerstone of any meal. Sourdough is characterized by impressive savibility, and thus allows the baker to bake once a week and have bread for a whole household all week long!
target_audience: Everyone who is tired of eating lame store bought bread or paying $8 for an artisanal loaf!

courses.title: ٣ أيام نباتي
courses.bio: Online Vegan Course تجربة ٣ أيام كورس نباتي ..لحياه صحية أفضل
courses.description:
تجربة ٣ أيام كورس نباتي ..لحياه صحية أفضل، أنا سعيدة جداً بقرارك، أخيراً الالتزام بكورس ٣ أيام نباتي لحياه بشكل أفضل و هو دة أهم قرار.
النظام النباتي لتعليم كيفية تحسين الصحة و نمط الاكل ، بمكونات غذائية طبيعية و بدائل إقتصادية، و عملية تنقية الجسم من الجلوتين، الالبان، و السكريات. و استبدالها بمكونات غذائية كاملة العناصر.
النظام النباتي يشمل على فطار و غداء و عشاء ، و شاي و وجبات خفيفة (سناكس). والتي ستمدك بالطاقة ،نوم أفضل و حالة مزاجية أحسن وتأثيرات فعالة أخرى .
النظام النباتي حيساعدك على إعادة شكل بعض الأطعمه الغير محبوبه وتغيير مكوناتها و تقديمها بشكل أفضل .النظام النباتي يتكون من وجبات معدة بشكل جميل و مشبع كل الوجبات مكوناتها إما موجودة أو محلية و صنعت في مصر أو ممكن وجود بدائل أخرى ليها إقتصادية النظام مجرد بداية لأنظمة كتير صحية و في حالة عدم الإلتزام، ممكن البدء من أول و جديد
النظام لا يمس باي نصوص دينية أو شعائر و يحترم جميع النصوص الدينية، و هو فقط برنامج لتوعية الصحية التجربة صحية و سيشع الوجه و الجسم جمالا و إحساس بالصحة و الراحة العامة


3 Vegan Days. Hey, You’ve done it! You’ve committed to the most important element of living a healthy and happy lifestyle; nourishing your body. Try it! Chances are, you are ready to change some habits you’ve fallen into and are looking forward to change it. It can be extremely hard to get out of these cycles. And that’s where 3 Vegan Days come in for you.
target_audience: Arabic Vegan, Healthy Students

courses.title: Cupcakes & Pâtisserie : du cupcake au dessert raffiné !
courses.bio: Tout ce que vous devez savoir sur les cupcake et comment les hisser au rang de pâtisserie fine !
objectives: Apprendre à réaliser un cupcake moelleux avec de délicieux glaçages, sans arômes artificiels.
Maîtriser les différents types d'inserts : gelées, ganaches, pralinés faits maison
Connaître et maîtriser les ustensiles spécifiques.
Maîtriser les associations de saveurs et appliquer les techniques de pâtisserie française au cupcake.
requirements: Aucun prérequis, sinon l'amour de la pâtisserie et la curiosité !
courses.description:
Bonjour et bienvenue sur le cours Cupcakes & Pâtisserie !
Dans ce cours, vous apprendrez à réaliser des cupcakes, mais pas seulement : vous serez capable d'appliquer les techniques de pâtisserie française pour des cupcakes raffinés, riches en textures et surtout délicieux.
Vous aimez le visuel des cupcakes tout en souhaitant tirer le meilleur de la pâtisserie fine : ce cours est fait pour vous. Vous verrez en détail le secret des ingrédients et la composition idéale pour des cupcakes savoureux.
Vous apprendrez également à raisonner sur la structuration du cupcake, l'association de diverses saveurs, et la maîtrise d'ingrédients spécifiques.
Alors, je vous attends avec impatience pour partager ce moment avec vous.
Voici le contenu du cours :
- Structuration du cupcake et compréhension des textures.
- Présentation des ingrédients : sucres, chocolats, crèmes spécifiques.
- Présentation des ustensiles, et recommandations : moules, caissettes, douilles décoratives, matériel spécifique.
- Recette du cupcake matcha framboise. Techniques de gélification.
- Recette du cupcake citron meringué. Techniques de finitions meringuées.
- Recette du cupcake chocolat pécan. Techniques de praliné et de torréfaction.
- Bonus : présentation et tutoriel pour deux douilles décoratives supplémentaires.
- Questionnaires de fin de cours, recettes en fichier PDF téléchargeables, tableaux récapitulatifs modifiables des associations de saveurs.


Ce contenu exclusif n'attend plus que vous. A très bientôt !
target_audience: Les débutants qui s'intéressent déjà un peu à la pâtisserie, ainsi que les amateurs sont les bienvenus !

courses.description:
Do you ever find yourself lost in the complex world of whiskey? Whether you're a novice or a seasoned enthusiast, our Whiskey Tasting course is designed to address your whiskey-related pain points and elevate your appreciation for this timeless spirit.
You'll learn the fundamentals of whiskey tasting, from understanding the different types to selecting the perfect bottle. Gain the confidence to host your whiskey tastings, creating memorable experiences for your guests.
Our step-by-step lessons will teach you how to decipher whiskey flavors, choose the right glassware, and engage in meaningful toasts and conversations.
By the end of this course, you'll have the knowledge and skills to curate your own whiskey tasting events, impressing your friends with your whiskey expertise. Elevate your whiskey journey and become a master host and ready for an evening of fun and appreciation!
With the free E-Book as a companion guide, you'll never worry about how to host, give a toast, or talk about whiskey again!


You'll walk away with:
Confidence: Navigate whiskey labels with confidence and impress your friends with your selections.
Expert Tasting Skills: Master the art of whiskey tasting through practice and comparison.
Host Extraordinary Tastings: Become the go-to host for whiskey enthusiasts.

courses.title: Vinofilo's Degustation Course: Keys of Wine Tasting
courses.bio: Build your confidence to approach and analyze any wine in a structured way, using Vinofilo's methodology.
objectives: Skills to make an organized wine tasting
Approaches to carry out visual analysis of wine
Ways to make the olfactory and taste analysis of wine
Methods to efficiently describe and communicate a wine
requirements: No prerequisites required
courses.description: In Vinofilo, we offer exceptional Italian wines online to wine lovers and have decided to build this course to make our audience learn how to appreciate wines as much as possible. The key is a structured wine tasting experience - you need to have clear thoughts about viusal, olfactory and gusto-olfactory (taste) analysis to analyze a wine from every angle. First, you will start by analyzing various visual components like color, consistency and clarity. You will discover that small clues about the colour and consistency of wine will help us shapes our thoughts much better when it comes to olfactory analysis. Then, we will proceed to analyzing in depth the smell of wine and spend a lot of time understanding different aroma families. Finally, we will focus on understanding flavor mechanics of wine, like acidity, tannins, sapidity, alcohol, sugar and smoothness. You will not only grasp the internal dynamics of each of these groups, but also will build a great framework that allows you to appreciate the interplay between them. How does acidity evolve over time? What is the effect of smoothness on tannins? If you love building logical connections and understanding the "why"s behind thins, you will love this course.
target_audience: Anyone who is passionate for wine

courses.description:

Take your cookie decorating skills to new heights with this 3D Easter Basket Online Cookie Decorating Class! Whether you're a beginner or an egg-sperienced baker, this fun and hands-on class will guide you step by step to create an egg-straordinary three-dimensional Easter basket cookie. You’ll learn how to pipe a beautiful basket weave texture, decorate colorful eggs, and add adorable details like a bunny butt and an adorable bow to bring your Easter basket to life.
This class breaks down the process into easy-to-follow steps, making 3D cookie decorating approachable for all skill levels. You’ll also gain valuable tips on hand-cutting cookie dough, royal icing consistency, and royal icing piping techniques to ensure your basket looks amazing from every angle. Plus, I’ll show you how to mix and blend colors to make your cookies pop with vibrant Easter hues.
Included in this course:
Workbook with a supply list, recipes, a piping practice sheet, basket weaving practice sheet, templates, product links, and everything you need to know to decorate cookies
18 step-by-step video tutorials covering sugar cookie decorating basics and everything you need to know to build an egg-stra special 3D sugar cookie Easter basket

Hand cutting templates and all the cookie cutter STL files for 3D printing
So if you're curious about cookie decorating, frustrated with royal icing consistencies, want a unique Easter centerpiece or just looking to have a little sugar-filled Easter fun, this class is for you!
By the end of this class, you’ll have the skills to create stunning, dimensional cookies perfect for Easter celebrations, gifts, or impressing family and friends. So, don’t miss out—hop to it and sign up today!

objectives: A minha receita premiada de autêntico Pastel de Nata português (também conhecido como Pastel de Belém)

Bem-vindo!: Conteúdos do Curso de Pastel de Nata
História do Pastel de Nata: Breve História do Pastel de Nata
Fabrico da Massa Folhada: Massa base: com amassadeira e à mão
Massa folhada: como laminar a massa folhada
Como fazer o creme, ou seja, o recheio d: Como fazer o creme específico para Pastel de Nata.
Toques finais e cozimento: Como preparar os moldes de pastel de nata para o primeiro uso
Etapa final (e melhor!): Degustação!: Moldar a massa e dar os toques finais no creme

requirements: Este curso está aberto a TODOS os níveis - não é necessária experiência prévia em pastelaria.
Se é profissional de pastelaria ou já fez Pastel de Nata, incluímos também alguns segredos e truques para aperfeiçoar a sua técnica do Pastel de Nata.
Usamos ingredientes fáceis de encontrar em qualquer lugar do mundo - não se preocupe!
courses.description:
O Pastel de Nata é o doce mais famoso de Portugal. Conhecido como Pastel de Belém no Brazil, Egg Tart (dàntǎ) na Ásia e Portuguese Custard Tarts em muitas partes do mundo, estas delícias de massa folhada são recheadas com creme rico e é realmente difícil comer apenas um de cada vez. Depois de completar este curso, vai perceber o que torna o autêntico Pastel de Nata português diferente das variações de pastéis de nata, pastéis de Belém ou até "egg tarts" que já possa ter provado fora de Portugal.
Durante este curso completo (com legendas em Português, Inglês e Espanhol para facilitar o seguimento da receita e dicas) cobrimos todas as etapas da confecção do Pastel de Nata de uma forma fácil de seguir e mostro os truques para tornar os seus bolos tão profissionais quanto aqueles que encontra na confeitarias em Portugal. Vou dar recomendações para a massa e também dicas para o creme, de forma a equilibrar lindamente todos sabores e texturas.
Se já comeu Pastéis de Nata numa pastelaria portuguesa e gostaria de experimentar fazer esta receita em casa, este curso vai mostrar-lhe como o fazer. Se é um padeiro ou pasteleiro profissional que deseja servir pastéis de nata genuínos no seu estabelecimento, também vai receber muitas dicas profissionais ao longo deste curso! Muito obrigado!
target_audience: Pasteleiros e entusiastas da pastelaria em casa
Padeiros profissionais
Amantes da comida portuguesa

courses.title: Healthy Cooking Made Easy: Cook Delicious Recipes
courses.bio: Learn healthy cooking through easy follow-along lessons with simple ingredients so you can make quick, low-cost meals.
objectives: Master fundamental cooking techniques for beginners, including knife skills, meat cooking, and using your senses to confidently prepare a variety of dishes.
Acquire the knowledge to follow low-medium complexity recipes, expanding your culinary repertoire, and saving money by cooking for yourself.
Cultivate a stress-free kitchen space, with strategies to minimise mess, streamline cleanup and maintain a clean and organised cooking environment.
Master a range of recipes, including pea soup, pasta with tomato sauce, puff pastry pizza tart, and chicken stir-fry, to create impressive and satisfying meals
requirements: No Prior Cooking Skills Needed! Beginner-Friendly Course.
No Special Equipment Required. See The ‘Kitchen Equipment Guide' Video for Equipment Recommendations.
courses.description:
Welcome to Healthy Cooking Made Easy: Cook Delicious Recipes


Do you:
Find cooking too time-consuming, boring, or stressful?
Feel guilty seeing your bank account being drained on takeaway food?
Dislike the taste or quality of your own cooking.
Have a busy schedule, and don’t have time to cook for yourself?
Think cooking at home is expensive?
Feel ashamed of eating greasy and additive filled ready-meals that destroy your health?
View cooking as a chore that you would have to force your way through?
Fear making mistakes and ruining meals that you’ve slaved over in the kitchen?
Believe cooking is inconvenient and it’s faster to order a take-out meal?
Think that since you’ve never been taught and find it hard, there’s no point even trying?
Feel frustrated don’t know how to make delicious food for yourself?
Think cooking is messy, and hate scrubbing off burnt bits from pans and cleaning up a bomb site kitchen?
Hate the hassle of trying to find random special ingredients at the supermarket?


Don't worry, you're not alone! Many other people feel this way too!


Do you want to:
Experience the joy of nourishing yourself and your family and friends with healthy and delicious food.
Enjoy the process of creating something from scratch and seeing the results.
Relax, unwind, and have fun in the kitchen.
Find cooking to be an enjoyable and stress-relieving activity.
Feel proud of the savings in your bank account from cooking at home.
Love the taste and quality of your own cooking.
Prioritise cooking as a rewarding and essential part of your busy schedule.
Believe that cooking at home is a cost-effective and budget-friendly choice.
Take pride in preparing nutritious and health-conscious homemade food.
See cooking as a fulfilling and satisfying experience, rather than a chore.
Experience the joy of creating delicious and satisfying meals for yourself.


Don't let the lack of time or cooking skills hold you back! This course is designed to empower you with the practical skills needed to cook delicious, healthy meals without kitchen stress or supermarket hassle.


Why Choose This Course?


Designed for Busy Lives: We understand the demands of a busy schedule. All of our recipes take under 1 hour to make once practised —including cleaning and washing up time!— with some just taking 20 minutes, fitting perfectly into your evening routine.


Easy-to-Find Ingredients: No need to hunt down rare or specialist items. Our course uses a small, accessible ingredient list that can be easily sourced from any small local supermarket or convenience store. We provide an ingredient booklet for easy reference and shopping.


Beginner-Friendly: You don't need any prior cooking knowledge! We start from scratch, guiding you step by step, even if you've never picked up a knife before. Gain confidence as you progress through practical lessons and real recipes.


Streamlined Approach: No need to worry about complex culinary techniques or extravagant ingredients. We focus on the 80/20 skills that matter most to home cooks. Learn essential organisation, cooking, and flavouring skills that will transform your meals without overwhelming you.


Hands-On Learning: Theory is great, but practise is essential. That's why our course adopts a follow-along format, allowing you to learn by doing. Embrace the process, and truly absorb the skills as you create delicious dishes.




This course will cover everything you need to know to become a great cook, including:


Preparation skills
Holding a knife properly
How to safely use your guide hand
Keeping a knife sharp
Using a paring knife
Slicing, scoring and horizontal cuts for cutting soft produce
Power chop for cutting hard vegetables


Cooking skills
Understanding simmering versus boiling
How to cook pasta
Using our senses to cook along with recipe timings
How to make a salad dressing
Getting a feel for cooking with a frying pan
How to tell whether a non-stick pan is at the right temperature for frying
How to tell if meat/fish is cooked


Flavouring skills
Choosing a salt to use
Cooking versus finishing salts
Learn to season with salt


Organisational skills
Selecting equipment
Setting up a chopping board station
Working clean, and cleaning as you go
Prep workflow




So, What Are You Waiting For?
Take control of your meals and enjoy the rewards of cooking at home. Start your journey towards delicious, homemade meals that suit your tastes, lifestyle, and budget. Enrol now and say goodbye to mediocre meals forever!


Money Back Guarantee
I want this course to add loads of value to your life, so if you decide to purchase it but find the course doesn’t exceed your expectations, then no worries! We’ve got a 30 day money back guarantee, no questions asked!
target_audience: Designed for complete beginners in cooking, aiming to nail down the basics.
Ideal for busy professionals who have limited time for shopping and meal preparation.
Tailored for individuals who feel overwhelmed when cooking and want to make it a fun and rewarding experience.
Perfect for individuals desiring control over what they eat, or are seeking to save money by cooking at home.

objectives: Being able to identify and distinguish different types of spices
Achieving flavor balance in recipes by using spices correctly.
Learning the effects of spices on health and using them consciously in meals
Being able to create their own spice blends

Uses of Spices and Their Place in Different Cultures 2

Garam Masala, Ras El Hanout, Chinese Five-Spice, Herbes de Provence, Za'atar
Baharat, Jerk Seasoning, Cajun Seasoning, Italian Seasoning, Tandoori Masala
Spicy Sauces and Marinades: Sriracha Sauce, Chipotle Marinade, Thai Garlic Sauce, Jamaican Jerk, Harissa

requirements: No experience is required. Just having people who are eager to learn is enough.
courses.description:
Spices are the heart and soul of culinary traditions around the world, transforming simple ingredients into extraordinary dishes with their depth, aroma, and vibrant flavors. In this course, we’ll take a deep dive into the fascinating world of spices, exploring their origins, cultural significance, and the crucial roles they play in cuisines across the globe. You’ll learn to identify a variety of spices, understand their unique flavor profiles, and uncover the secrets to balancing and blending them for perfect harmony in your recipes.
Through engaging lessons and practical demonstrations, you’ll gain hands-on experience with creating spice blends tailored to specific dishes, from hearty main courses to delightful desserts and refreshing beverages. We’ll also explore how spices are used in iconic cuisines like Indian, Middle Eastern, and Mediterranean cooking, while providing tips on storage, preservation, and sourcing high-quality spices.
Whether you're a home cook eager to enhance your meals or a food enthusiast passionate about global flavors, this course will empower you to confidently use spices to elevate your cooking. By the end of this journey, you’ll not only understand how to unlock the full potential of spices but also create unforgettable dishes that leave a lasting impression. Join me in exploring the vibrant and aromatic world of spices!
target_audience: Everyone who is interested in gastronomy and ready to go on a taste journey!

courses.title: How to BBQ Ribs (Master Class) Fall Off The Bone Smoked Ribs
courses.bio: In this course we'll be slow smoking some barbecue ribs. These are st. Louis Style cut. A showstopper at any party!

Prepping ribs: Firing up the smoker along with accessories
Wrap the ribs and continue cooking

requirements: You will need a BBQ smoker not a grill
courses.description:
In this course I'll be teaching you through five lectures how to cook st. Louis-style spare ribs.
I'll start out by talking about different cuts of ribs as well as seasoning ingredients and different techniques of cooking.
We'll be slow smoking these ribs at 235 for a total of four and a half hours.
2 hours unwrapped and then we'll wrap them for 2 hours and put them back on for half an hour. The last 15 minutes of the cook will be applying our barbecue sauce.
This is a very classic way of smoking your ribs. To ensure that they're cooked and fall-off-the-bone ready.
I'll be using a Weber Smokey Mountain 18in smoker. This particular style rib I paid $10 for at Walmart.
Thank you so much for checking out this course if you have any questions leave them in the Q&A and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
Have a great time cooking!!!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to slow smoke BBQ ribs

courses.title: Hidromel (mead): Todas as etapas da sua produção na prática.
courses.bio: Aprenda a fazer três estilos de hidromel: Quick mead, tradicional e espumante. (Learn how to make three styles of mead)
objectives: Obter melhores resultados em cada experimento. Utilizar o conhecimento para produção artesanal ou direcionar o produto para vendas.
Observar e aprender cada etapa da produção do hidromel através de vídeos. Observar a diferença da efetividade na produção alcoólica de 4 leveduras diferentes.
Explorar três estilos de hidromel, sendo estes: o tradicional, quick mead e espumante.
Reunir informações através de tabelas e gráficos para serem comparadas com outros hidromeis que serão elaborados em um futuro próximo.

Apresentação geral do curso: Apresentação geral das atividades a serem desenvolvidas
Preparação do mosto: Tabela para definir o teor alcoólico
Tabela de correção da leitura do densímetro
Fermentação: Oxigenação do mosto e inoculação das leveduras
Trasfega: Uso do auto sifão para transferir o liquido sem a borra formada pelas leveduras
Análise da produção de álcool utilizando: Medidas da densidade como parâmetro para chegar ao teor alcoólico desejado

requirements: O novo produtor de hidromel, necessita apenas de uma força de vontade e determinação em executar os procedimentos de forma correta. Os valores investidos são relativamente baixos, apenas terá que adquirir o mínimo para iniciar a sua produção.
Não é necessário nenhum tipo de conhecimento, pois tudo será exemplificado em vídeos.
courses.description:
Iremos trabalhar com 4 leveduras (fermento) diferentes para criar hidroméis com suas próprias características, ou seja, o gosto, o cheiro, a cor, em cada hidromel será único, isso porque cada levedura tem uma grande influência na formação da bebida.


O curso vai apresentar todas as etapas da produção de hidromel na prática, sendo estas:


Produção do mosto: Líquido formado pela mistura de água e mel.
Definição da densidade inicial: Quantidade inicial de açúcar para obter o teor alcoólico desejado.
Starter: Ativar as leveduras, neste curso será utilizado 4 fermentos diferentes.
Fermentação: Observar a formação de gases, do álcool, e a redução do açúcar diariamente.
Trasfega: Como transferir a bebida para dentro da garrafa de forma segura.
Envase: Inserir a tampa com o arrolhador.

Serão elaborados diferentes estilos, destacando-se um destes, o hidromel de fermentação rápida (quick mead), onde será produzido uma bebida com uma grande quantidade de gás em 16 dias.


Será demonstrado todos os equipamentos utilizados, bem como, a importância de cada um.
Será feito tabelas e gráficos para ajudar o novo produtor de hidromel a entender todo o processo de fermentação através dos resultados obtidos.
Não é necessário conhecimento prévio, pois tudo será ensinado do básico ao avançado de forma simples e com aulas práticas.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


(English version):
We will work with 4 different yeast strains to create meads with their own characteristics, meaning that the taste, smell, and color in each mead will be unique, because each yeast strain has a significant influence on the formation of the beverage.
The course will present all stages of mead production in practice, including:
Mash production: Liquid formed by the mixture of water and honey.
Initial density determination: Initial amount of sugar to obtain the desired alcohol content.
Starter: Activating the yeast strains, in this course 4 different strains will be used.
Fermentation: Observing the daily formation of gases, alcohol, and sugar reduction.


Transfer: How to transfer the beverage into the bottle safely.
Bottling: Inserting the cork with the corker.
Different styles will be elaborated, highlighting one of them, the quick mead, where a beverage with a large amount of gas will be produced in 16 days.
All equipment used will be demonstrated, as well as the importance of each one.
Tables and graphs will be made to help the new mead producer understand the entire fermentation process through the obtained results.
No prior knowledge is required, as everything will be taught from basic to advanced in a simple and practical way.
target_audience: O curso é destinado para pessoas que possuem a curiosidade e vontade de alcançar sua própria produção de hidromel.

courses.title: Italian Cooking - Focaccia & Antipasto Vegs - Chef Antonella
courses.bio: Learn to make perfect focaccia from scratch and delicious grilled marinated vegetables for a stunning antipasto platter.
objectives: How to create Focaccia dough from scratch, a skill that will become second nature to you with a little practice.
Techniques from proofing dough and baking to achieve the perfect crispy exterior and fluffy interior that makes focaccia so special.
The art of chargrilling, roasting and marinating different antipasto vegetables, including eggplant and capsicum.
The marinating technique that transforms button mushrooms into mouthwatering delicious bites.
Preparing simple and flavourful dressings that perfectly finish and complement your veggies.
Balancing and preparing the different components of a perfect antipasto platter.

Antipasto Vegetables: Assembling the Antipasto Platter + 2 bonus recipes

requirements: No previous experience required.
courses.description:
Ciao and welcome to the Focaccia & Antipasto Vegetables Masterclass
Are you overwhelmed from collecting endless recipes and frustrated by numerous attempts to create authentic Italian dishes that taste as good as you imagine?
I’m Antonella, your Italian Chef and Food Coach and I’m here to guide you in discovering the true essence of Italian cooking through essential techniques and flavour-building secrets.
In this masterclass, we begin by mastering the beloved focaccia from scratch, achieving the crispy crust and fluffy interior it’s known for. We’ll then explore the vibrant world of grilled and marinated vegetables, adding colour and deliciousness to your table. Whether you choose to make a single dish or feel adventurous enough to craft an entire antipasto platter, you’re in for a treat with so many amazing flavours to explore!
At the end of the module, you’ll understand the key principles and features so you end up with an antipasto platter that’s loaded with lots of delightful items that are amazing on their own, but together they create an irresistible feast. Sometimes it’s a challenge to decide which to eat first!
Whether you’re a beginner wanting step-by-step guidance or a confident cook wanting to refine your techniques and knowledge, you’re in the right place as this course offers all the resources you need to succeed.
With my Italian heritage, professional chef training, and 18 years of teaching experience, I’m eager to share my everything I know in a nurturing and fun environment. Bring your passion for Italian cuisine and eagerness to learn, and I promise to help elevate your culinary skills. Students often say they receive more than expected, and I'm thrilled to share it with you.
This masterclass is one of a ‘six-module series’ taking you from antipasto to dolce. Each module is filled with tips and techniques to help you confidently recreate authentic dishes at home.
The beauty of this prerecorded video is that it’s on your schedule! Whether you prefer to watch it all first or cook along with me, the choice is yours. Feel free to stop, replay, and watch as many times as you need.
First: make sure you download the recipes, ingredient list, and equipment checklist to ensure you’re fully prepared before diving in.
If you have any questions, I’m here to help guide you and make your experience a good one! You're also invited to join our Facebook group, where you can share your photos and experiences with fellow enthusiasts.
I’m so excited, let’s get started!
target_audience: Suitable for beginners to confident cooks, this class is perfect for those looking to achieve authentic Italian flavours and add some spice to everyday cooking that family and friends will love.

Neste curso descobriremos como foi o surgimento e evolução da confeitaria e panificação, as propriedades e funções dos ingredientes mais utilizados pelo público geral e profissional, além de analisarmos 10 receitas básicas passo a passo, observando as reações químicas e biológicas presentes em cada uma!


Sendo assim, este curso online conta com:


- Análises sobre as propriedades únicas dos ingredientes mais usados na confeitaria e panificação;
- Uma breve história do surgimento da confeitaria e panificação;
- 10 receitas básicas explicadas e analisadas passo a passo;
- Ver receitas de preparos básicos da confeitaria e panificação como bolo, cookies, pães e cremes, mostrando o porquê daquele método de mistura e o que acontece nela, também como no seu assar e as reações químicas do mesmo e claro variações das receitas e o que dá uma estrutura mais crocante e macia.
- Livro explicativo original e aprofundado “A ciência por trás da confeitaria e panificação”!


Antes de iniciar , gostaria que vocês se perguntassem o seguinte.


O que o açúcar faz além de adoçar?
O que acontece dentro da massa quando colocamos a mesma para assar?
Por que às vezes fazemos tudo corretamente, mas sua massa acaba não ficando da forma certa?

courses.title: Barbacoa Fácil: técnicas profesionales para aficionados
courses.bio: Aprende cocinar carnes, pescados, verduras, arroces, setas y postres a la barbacoa. Control de calor y herramientas.
objectives: Decidir entre una barbacoa o una parrilla.
Elegir el modelo adecuado para su lugar y su uso.
Aplicar el combustible adecuado al producto, situación y número de comensales.

Elegir y adaptar el producto al fuego.
Conocer las herramientas fundamentales para cocinar carne o pescado a la brasa.
Conocer los accesorios que permiten cocinar otros platos en barbacoa.
Salar correctamente piezas de distinto tamaño.
Cocinar carne de cerdo, ternera y pollo a la brasa.
Cocinar distintos tipos de pescados y pulpo a la brasa.
Cocinar arroces, setas y verduras a la brasa.
Cocinar varios tipos de postres fáciles y café de puchero en la barbacoa.

Sistemas de encendido: Introducción a los sistemas de encendido
Combustibles y control de la temperatura: Herramientas básicas de la cocina a la brasa
Consideraciones legales: Aspectos legales de la barbacoa en España

requirements: No hacen falta conocimientos previos de cocina pero sí el interés y la curiosidad por aprender una práctica culinaria muy específica.
courses.description:
Cocinar con brasa y fuego es un placer. O puede serlo si sabes cómo...
Aprende cocinar carnes, pescados, verduras, arroces, setas y postres a la barbacoa con técnicas simples y concretas.
Aprende a controlar el fuego, las brasas, la temperatura, los tiempos de cocción y un montón de trucos que elevarán tus habilidades de pitmaster al siguiente nivel.

PARTE 1: TEORÍA
El curso comienza con una primera parte teórica en la que repasamos las diferencias entre los distintos tipos de barbacoas, parrillas, hornos y ahumadores que tienes a tu disposición. Conocerás las las herramientas fundamentales para empezar a cocinar. Aprenderás a diferenciar los distintos tipos de combustibles y a aplicar varios sistemas de encendido para estar listo en cualquier situación.

PARTE 2: A COCINAR!
La segunda parte del curso es completamente práctica. Aplicaremos todas las técnicas que aprendimos en la primera parte a casos concretos. Vamos a cocinar:
platos de ternera, cerdo, cordero y pollo
diferentes tipos de pescados y dos versiones de pulpo
verduras, setas y queso
paella, arroz marinero
postres y hasta café

EL RITUAL DEL FUEGO
Llevo años enseñando y cocinando a la brasa. Asesoro a algunos de los cocineros y restaurantes más importantes de España. He publicado libros, una revista y he tenido mi programa de televisión en Canal Cocina. Hoy quiero compartir mi pasión por el fuego con todos vosotros y vosotras.
Quiero que descubras que la cocina a la brasa puede ser sana, fácil y divertida. Y quiero que luego lo compartas con tus amigos.
- Juan Manuel Benayas
target_audience: Este curso va dirigido a aficionados a la cocina con brasa y fuego que se atreven a mirar allende el chorizo y la panceta.
El programa está especialmente pensado para principiantes y niveles intermedios.
Y va dirigido a aquellos entusiastas de nivel intermedio que necesitan clarificar mitos, fortalecer conocimientos y ampliar el repertorio de platos que saben preparar.
Y también a todos aquellas personas que tienen una barbacoa o una parrilla y no saben qué hacer con ella.
Deberían seguir este curso carniceros, pescaderos para asesorar mejor a sus clientes.
Deberían seguir este curso profesionales de la restauración que busquen ganar experiencia en cocina con brasa.

Next, you'll master essential preparation techniques, from cleaning and cutting to advanced cooking methods such as sautéing, roasting, grilling, and steaming. Discover how to bring out the best flavors and textures in your vegetables, making them the star of any meal.
Throughout the course, you will explore creative flavor pairings and combinations, enhancing your dishes with professional flair. Our step-by-step recipes and detailed guidance ensure that you gain the confidence to experiment and personalize your culinary creations.

Il presente corso è rivolto sia a baristi professionisti che aspiranti baristi e amatori, ed è strutturato per portare il corsista a saper operare nel modo più corretto sulla macchina per caffè espresso e creare tutte le relative bevande derivanti dalla preparazione del caffè.


Il corso inizia con una immediata immersione nel mondo della merceologia e della teoria (troppo spesso in diversi contesti non trattata o trattata sommariamente ma di fondamentale importanza!), qui vengono apprese le nozioni fondamentali che ogni barista dovrebbe conoscere, come la differenza tra coffea arabica e coffea robusta, tra caffè monorigine e miscela, inoltre permette di distinguere quale tra le miscele presenti sul mercato possa essere maggiormente appetibile per la propria clientela.


Le lezioni continuano quindi con la presentazione della macchina per espresso e le attrezzature che il barista deve sapere utilizzare durante il servizio. Alle spiegazioni teoriche si affiancano poi le simulazioni pratiche che vanno dalla corretta routine per preparare un espresso alla corretta montatura del latte secondo standard internazionali, fino ad arrivare alla preparazione delle bevande di base della caffetteria e alla pulizia delle attrezzature.


Il corso si conclude con una ampia carrellata sulle informazioni da conoscere riguardanti l'acqua da utilizzare per la preparazione dell'espresso e sulla degustazione di questa splendida bevanda.

objectives: Elaborar tu propia masa madre.

Introducción al curso: Introducción al curso de panadería casera
Glosario - Terminología de panadería: Glosario de términos panaderos usados en el curso

requirements: Ganas de disfrutar de la cocina y mancharse las manos.

courses.description:
Aprenderás a preparar 12 panes para tus desayunos. Panes integrales, panes dulces, pan de molde, scones o panes rústicos en formato individual entre otras delicias. Aprenderás a elaborar tu propia masa madre y a elaborar un pan con ella.


¿Qué aprenderás en este curso?
En este curso aprenderás a elaborar los prefermentos más usados y a utilizarlos, también aprenderás los distintos tipos de harinas dependiendo de su fuerza. Te enseñare por qué es interesante comer panes con harinas no refinadas y la importancia del gluten.
Te enseñaré a elaborar tu propia masa madre, a alimentarla, usarla y dormirla si no la vas a usar durante un largo período de tiempo. Te daré consejos para que te salgan los panes como a mí usando un horno casero sencillo.


Las recetas de panes que verás en este curso son:
- Molletes
- Pan de molde
- Pan con masa madre
- Panecillos con semillas
- Panecillos de leche
- Scones
- Pan de Viena
- Baguettes semiintegrales
- Pan de centeno
- Panecillos de yogurt
- Panecillos rústicos de Kamut
- Pan de soda


Puedes hacer este curso incluso si no has hecho nunca un pan, pero te mueres de ganas de hacer tu propio pan casero. A tu ritmo, en las horas que más te convengan y con todo el material didáctico descargable. Sólo tienes que tener deseos de aprender y ganas de pasar un buen rato con las manos en la masa y horneando conmigo.
target_audience: Aficionados a la cocina.

courses.title: Four Food Creativity Methods for Food Design
courses.bio: Instructions for creativity playing cards for chefs and food designers

Introduction: Video Introduction to Food Design Thinking
The four Food Design Thinking Methods: How to get the four methods

requirements: You will learn how to use the food creativity cards presented in 4 Food Design Thinking books
courses.description:
This introduces you to Food Design Thinking and course gives you detailed instructions on how to use four food creativity methods: StarChat, IdeaHive, IdeaMarket and IdeaShake, which are all available for purchase separately at fooddesignthinking dot org
With these methods you learn new ways to trigger your creativity and design new dishes, new food products, food services, or food events. With each of these four methods you use playing cards to generate new ideas. The playing cards make the games fun and playful creating a light atmosphere which is exactly what creativity loves.
Food Design Thinking is the process that triggers creativity and leads to innovative, meaningful, and sustainable propositions for new dishes, food products, food events, food services, food systems, and anything in between.
Restaurants, cafes, and other food businesses fail... All the time. Why? Most articles you’ll find list these reasons: location, lack of people management, lack of accounting skills, bad food execution, poor promotion, poor inventory, etc.
While these causes are all true, nobody talks about the number one reason why food businesses fail: lack of good ideas.
Food Design Thinking is the process that helps you generate ideas and final food concepts that are grounded in research, meaningful, and sustainable. Food Design Thinking is a complete process ideated by Dr. Francesca Zampollo. It consists of 52 methods most of which have been designed specifically for this process.
For any questions, don't hesitate to get in touch!
target_audience: Anyone interested in creating new dishes, new food products, new food services, and anything within food innovation

courses.title: リアル料理教室で300人が受講した！ 失敗しないあんこの炊き方！ 料理の楽しさを再発見できる講座
courses.bio: 白砂糖を使わずに、甘さ控えめのあんこを手作りすることで、和菓子を手作りすることができます。お菓子作りやお料理の苦手な方でも、自宅にある調理器具で手軽に作れるようになります！
objectives: 手作りあんこを、失敗せずに安定して作る方法がわかります
添加物フリーのスイーツを作れるようになります
料理やおやつ（スイーツ）の手作りにチャレンジするようになります
手作りができる自分に自信が持てるようになります

はじめに: なぜ、手作りあんこが凄いのか？
手作りあんこを作れるようになると: 手作りあんこを作れるようになると
あずきを煮る: あんこの炊き方Ⅰ 圧力鍋で炊く（動画解説）
あんこの炊き方Ⅱ 炊飯器で炊く
付録・おはぎの作り方（動画解説）: おはぎの作り方（動画解説）
付録・砂糖なしあんこの作り方: ドライフルーツあんこの作り方

requirements: 料理やお菓子作りの経験は不要です。
圧力鍋（電気・直火どちらでも可）か炊飯器のどちらかを使います
courses.description:
和菓子が大好きな方はぜひご覧ください！


〈こんなお悩みありませんか？〉
・和菓子は好きだけど、あんこが甘すぎる
・砂糖の量が気になる
・添加物も気になる
・和菓子をもっと手軽に食べた〜い！




〈この講座は、こんな方にオススメ〉
・スイーツは好きだけど、白砂糖は食べたくない
・あんこを手軽に作れるようになりたい！
・お菓子作りは初めて
・料理が苦手
・こどものおやつを手作りしたい！




〈この講座で学べること〉
・どうしたら失敗しないのか
・なぜ上手に炊けるようになるのか
を、理由を明確にした上で、作り方をお伝えします！
あんこの作り方をしっかりと身につけていただき、繰り返し作ることができるようになります！




この講座で学んでいただければ
今まで「できない」「苦手」と思い込んでいたあんこや和菓子が、
自分で作れるようになります。
それによって、自分に自信が持て、もっといろいろなものが作りたい！というチャレンジ精神が湧いてきます！


また、手作りの幅が広がることで、お料理のレパートリー拡大にもつながります！
target_audience: あんこや和菓子が好きな人
「手作り」は難しい、めんどうだと思っている人
アレルギー対応のおやつ作りに興味のある人

courses.title: Cook Like a Thai 5 Cooking Course
courses.bio: Thai cooking for homemakers & chefs taught by Chef Dao of Thai Chef School in Bangkok, fun teacher of Thai cooking
objectives: Learn about Thai ingredients
Master preparation of popular Thai dishes
Learn basic Thai cooking skills
Learn how to work with a wok, steamer, granite mortar & pestle
Learn how to prepare from scratch Thai pastes, dips, and sauces
Experience the awe of visiting a Thai fresh market
requirements: Course is designed for all skill levels.  No matter your skill level, you will learn more.
Just bring your desire to learn how to prepare tasty dishes from this popular cuisine
courses.description:
HAVE FUN LEARNING TO "COOK LIKE A THAI"
with Chef Dao & Thai Chef School
DO YOU WANT TO "COOK LIKE A THAI"?
Join this fun culinary adventure with me, and experience the fun and exotic world of authentic Thai cooking, one of the world's most popular cuisines. Visit Bangkok's largest fresh market and learn all about Thai ingredients. Master 8 popular Thai dishes plus many Thai cooking skills, dips, sauces, and pastes. Experience the beauty of Thai dishes when properly cooked, plated, lighted, and recorded. I also have more Thai cooking courses in Udemy. Please check them out too.
HAVE FUN LEARNING
Enjoy my fun, relaxed teaching style which comes from years of experience teaching students in Bangkok. Relax, laugh, cook, and eat the best tasting Thai dishes--GUARANTEED!
MORE FOR YOUR MONEY
1. 4 hours of fun learning (compare and see for yourself)
2. Take a fun tour of Bangkok's largest fresh market and be amazed
3. Learn basic Thai cooking skills and techniques
4. Learn 8 popular Thai dishes from scratch
ENHANCED QUALITY
Using HD quality video recording equipment, professional lighting, skilled photographers, and good English, we endeavor to present the very best viewing presentation possible. Compare for yourself.
IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU?
This course is taught by Chef Dao, a professional culinary instructor at Thai Chef School (an online culinary training school) and Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy in Bangkok for both beginners and professionals. Learn from a fun teacher used to teaching all skill levels the ins and outs of Thai cooking. Each dish is taught in 4 video segments (total about 20 minutes each):
1. Thai ingredients discussion with pictures
2. Preparation of all ingredients for cooking
3. Professional chef cooking demonstration
4. Food plating techniques
WHAT WILL YOU LEARN FROM THIS COURSE?
Familiarity with Thai ingredients
Mastery of selected popular dishes, dips, sauces, pastes
Achievement of correct Thai flavors, aroma, and appearance
Proper use of Thai cookware--woks, granite mortar & pestle, steamers
AND lots of fun and laughter.
WHO IS CHEF DAO?
I am a native of northeast Thailand, where my love for cooking was nurtured by my grandmother in her kitchen. After receiving my degree in Accounting, I moved to Bangkok. There I soon realized my love was for cooking and eating beans and not in counting them! To expand my culinary skills, I enrolled in Le Cordon Bleu where I learned Western cooking and basic culinary skills. After graduation, I then enrolled in Dusit Thani Culinary College to further my Thai cooking knowledge.
For the past 6 years, I have been fortunate to work as a professional culinary instructor at Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy and Thai Chef School, leading Thai cooking schools in Bangkok. During this time, I taught Thai cooking to many tourists as well as professional culinary students (aspiring chefs, yacht chefs, executive chefs) from around the world in weeklong private training courses. Additionally, I am a master fruit carver and a team building specialist.
I love eating, cooking, and teaching Thai cooking (oh, and my son too). Please join me and let's have fun learning together.
BANGKOK THAI COOKING ACADEMY & THAI CHEF SCHOOL
In affiliation with these cooking schools, this course relies on tried and proven recipes and teaching techniques developed over 10 years and taught to thousands of students in Bangkok. We teach Thai cooking to beginners and professionals alike. Please feel free to visit our websites.
OUR PROMISE TO YOU
My instruction is fun, clear, and easy to follow. Recipes are authentic and accurate. Videos are filmed in HD and well-lighted. Sound is good and English is good. Beautiful presentation of dishes is emphasized. If you have any questions about the course content, please post a question or send a direct message to me. I will answer your message promptly.
CHEF DAO
JUST CLICK THE ENROLL BUTTON, AND I'LL SEE YOU IN LECTURE #1.
target_audience: Home cooks learn to master tasty Thai dishes
Professional cooks and chefs improve your culinary skills and knowledge of Asian cooking

courses.title: Coctelería Moderna en Casa: Aprende Bartending Desde Cero
courses.bio: Conviértete en bartender y sorprende a todos con la clasificación esencial de cócteles por familias
objectives: Preparación de ingredientes base como syrups y garnish.
Familias de cocteles: recetas base y cocteles clásicos.
Técnicas de coctelería en casa.
Diseño de nuevos cocteles utilizando las familias.

Para Finalizar: Diseño de cocteles usando las familias

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa ni instrumentos especializados.
Dentro del curso aprenderás como utilizar instrumentos comunes en casa para comenzar.
courses.description:
Para este curso no necesitas tener ningún tipo de conocimiento previo porque vamos a ir paso a paso aprendiendo acerca de la materia prima, las técnicas, los instrumentos y lo mejor de todo, vas a aprender todos los cocteles clásicos con un toque moderno además de que te los enseñaré por familias. Las familias de cocteles funcionan como un árbol genealógico, donde a partir de 6 cocteles base, vas a poder hacer muchos más con plantillas bastante fáciles de seguir, a tal punto que te permitirán crear tus propias recetas. Además, no voy a hacerte leer nada ya que todo el contenido está en video en alta definición donde te explico todo paso a paso.
Para hacer las cosas mucho más relajadas he organizado el curso en 10 módulos donde los primeros 3 te enseñarán todo lo que necesitas saber para empezar a crear tu bar en casa, desde las bases; como entender que es un coctel hasta como preparar distintos syrups o jarabes, pasando por los ingredientes que debes adquirir. Los siguientes 6 módulos corresponden a las familias (Martini, Old Fashioned, Sour, Margarita, Highball y Fortificados) donde aprenderemos a hacer más de 35 cocteles clásicos que se dividen en sus diferentes plantillas, cada receta cuenta con su preparación paso a paso, en video en alta definición. Terminando con el módulo 10 que contiene tips finales y cómo utilizar las familias para elaborar tus propios cocteles.
target_audience: Este curso está diseñado para principiantes interesados en llevar su coctelería al siguiente nivel.

courses.title: Como fazer cerveja em casa com BIAB
courses.bio: Aprenda a fazer cerveja com o método Brew In A Bag (BIAB), utilizando o mínimo possível de equipamentos
objectives: Fazer a sua própria cerveja utilizando o método BIAB (Brew in a Bag)
Conhecer cada um dos insumos da cerveja
Ter acesso aos equipamentos básicos
Entender o processo de fabricação da cerveja artesanal

Introdução: Reinheitsgebot - a Lei de Pureza alemã

requirements: Não é necessário conhecimento prévio
Não é necessário ter formação acadêmica prévia
courses.description:
Este curso permite ao aluno entender os processos principais da produção da cerveja artesanal, com a utilização de um número reduzido de equipamentos. História da cerveja, insumos, equipamentos, processo produtivo e outros itens são apresentados de forma didática e ilustrativa, permitindo ao iniciante entender o passo a passo da fabricação da cerveja.
Vale lembrar que este curso foi produzido especificamente para o cervejeiro iniciante que não dispões de muito espaço para a produção artesanal. Ao longo das aulas, o aluno poderá perceber que é possível fazer cerveja artesanal dentro da sua própria casa ou apartamento, gastando muito pouco dinheiro nos equipamentos básicos necessários à produção.
Na primeira parte do curso, são abordados temas mais teóricos, como a história da cerveja, sua evolução, os insumos utilizados, a função de cada um deles no fabrico da cerveja etc. Esta é uma parte importante do aprendizado, pois permite ao aluno entender exatamente o que será feito durante o processo de produção.
A segunda parte é voltada à prática, onde o aluno terá contato com os equipamentos, a montagem da receita (neste curso será ensinada a receita de uma cerveja do estilo Session IPA), a fabricação e os cuidados que devem ser tomados durante cada uma das etapas. Enfim, é um curso para introduzir o aluno ao maravilhoso mundo da fabricação de cerveja artesanal!!!
target_audience: Cervejeiros iniciantes
Entusiastas da cerveja artesanal

courses.title: Fermentieren leicht gemacht: Alte Kunst, neuer Genuss
courses.bio: Alles rund ums Fermentieren – für Anfänger und Profis
objectives: Du lernst alle Details rund ums Fermentieren in Theorie und Praxis.
Du erfährst, was du zum Fermentieren benötigst (überraschend wenig!).
Du bereitest deinen eigenen veganen Frischkäse, ein schnelles Sauerteigbrot, Tempeh sowie viele verschiedene fermentierte Gemüse und Getränke zu.
Du stellst auch eigene Würz-Zutaten her, z. B. marokkanische Salzzitronen, fermentierte Chilis oder fermentierte Tomaten.
Du lernst, wie du deine Fermente in köstliche Gerichte verwandeln und in Rezepte integrieren kannst.

Einführung: Jannis Siegenthaler heisst dich herzlich willkommen
Jannis erklärt die Grundpfeiler der Fermentation
Milchsauer fermentiert: Milchsäurebakterien: Viel mehr als nur Sauerkraut
Sauerkraut mit Knoblauch und Kümmel passend in einem Hot Dog
Kimchi: koreanischer Chinakohl passend für einen Eintopf
Karotten mit Kurkuma und Senfsamen passend in einem Bulgur-Salat
Gurken mit Dill und Senfsamen passend zu knusprigen Kartoffeln
Aromatische Tomaten passend für einen Gazpacho oder Sugo
Bohnen mit Lorbeer und Thymian passend für einen Bohnensalat
Knollensellerie mit Apfel passend für einen Waldorfsalat
Rote Bete mit Meerrettich passend auf Brot mit Hummus
Blumenkohl-Turşu passend zu Couscous mit Joghurtsauce
Rotkraut-Gemüsemix mit Kreuzkümmel passend in einer Dinkel-Tortilla
Blaubeeren passend für eine Sauce oder als Topping
Salzzitronen passend für Spaghetti aglio e olio
Fermentierte Chilischoten mit Knoblauch passend für eine scharfe Sauce
Bekömmliches Roggenbrot – einfache Zubereitung, voller Geschmack
Frischkäse aus Cashewkernen passend als Füllung für Aprikosen
Getränke: Prickelndes Ingwerbier und Beeren-Soda mit Minze
Kreationen mit Wasserkefir – erfrischende Getränke mit Zitronen- und Pfirsichges
Rhizopus oligosporus: Tempeh aus Hülsenfrüchten passend in einem Burger

requirements: Für diesen Kochkurs sind keine Vorkenntnisse nötig.
courses.description:
22 Lektionen rund ums Fermentieren – für Anfänger und Profis
In unserem Fermentationskurs zeigt dir Profikoch Jannis Siegenthaler in 2 Theorie-Lektionen und 19 Praxis-Lektionen alles, was du wissen muss, um deine eigenen fermentierten Spezialitäten herzustellen.
Du lernst, wie du aus einfachen Zutaten gesunde, probiotische Lebensmittel zauberst, die nicht nur lange haltbar sind, sondern auch unglaublich aromatisch. Ob Sauerkraut, Kimchi, fermentierte Gurken, Brot, veganen Frischkäse, Ingwerbier, Kefir oder Kombucha – Jannis zeigt dir Schritt für Schritt, wie du diese Köstlichkeiten zu Hause herstellst.
In spannenden Lektionen erfährst du alles über die Grundlagen der Fermentation, die richtigen Zutaten und das Equipment, das du brauchst. Zusätzlich zeigt dir Jannis in jeder Lektion ein Rezept, in dem das jeweilige fermentierte Produkt verwendet wird. So lernst du gleich, wie du fermentierte Lebensmittel optimal einsetzen und in deinen Speiseplan integrieren kannst.
Doch Achtung! Fermentieren macht süchtig! Denn der Fermentationsprozess lässt so vielseitige und unglaublich gute Aromen entstehen, dass ganz neue Gerichte deinen Alltag versüssen werden (obwohl sie sauer schmecken). Fermentiertes ist einzigartig und natürlich auch unglaublich gesund. Viel Spass beim professionellen Fermentieren mit Jannis und beim genussvollen Kosten deiner Fermente!


Highlights im Kurs
- 22 Lehr-Videos mit Profikoch Jannis, der dir zeigt, wie die unterschiedlichsten Lebensmittel fermentiert werden – natürlich vegan.
- Über 7 Stunden Videomaterial
- Alle Rezepte stehen dir als PDF zum Download zur Verfügung.
- Du erhältst ein Zertifikat nach erfolgreichem Online-Abschlusstest (15 Fragen).


Kochkurs im Detail
Lektion 1: Herzlich willkommen
Herzlich willkommen zum Spezialkurs Fermentation in unserer veganen Kochschule. Du lernst Profikoch Jannis kennen, der dich durch den Kurs begleiten wird und dir schon einmal erzählt, was dich erwartet und was du alles zubereiten wirst.
Lektion 2 bis 3: Theorie
In zwei Theorie-Lektionen erklärt dir Jannis alles Wissenswerte rund ums Fermentieren – über die Geschichte der Fermentation, über den Fermentationsprozess, die beteiligten Mikroorganismen, die gesundheitlichen Vorteile fermentierter Speisen und vieles mehr.
Lektion 4 bis 18: Milchsauer Fermentiertes
Endlich geht es los mit dem Fermentieren! In diesem Teil des Kurses fermentierst du ganz unterschiedliche Gemüse, aber auch Beeren (als Topping oder Würze) und Getreide (für Brot). Auch deinen eigenen Frischkäse stellst du her. Die jeweiligen Lektionen enden aber nicht mit dem fertigen Ferment! Jannis zeigt dir stets auch ein einfach umsetzbares Rezept, mit dem deine fermentierten Köstlichkeiten so richtig zur Geltung kommen.
Lektion 19 bis 21: Fermentierte Getränke
In diesen drei Lektionen stellst du fermentierte Getränke her. Sie sind herrlich aromatisch, spritzig und vielfältig abwandelbar. Freu dich auf ein prickelndes Ingwerbier und ein Beeren-Soda mit Minze, auf gesunden Kombucha aus Grüntee oder Apfelsaft und auf zwei herrliche Kefir-Variationen. Natürlich erklärt dir Jannis in Sachen Kombucha und Kefir auch ganz genau, wie du die jeweiligen Kulturen pflegst und aufbewahren kannst, z. B. wenn du in den Urlaub fährst.
target_audience: Dieser Kurs richtet sich an alle die pflanzen-basiertes, gesundes und leckeres Fermentieren entdecken und von Zuhause aus von einem Profikoch lernen möchten.

courses.title: White Tea Guided Tastings
courses.bio: Shunan Teng, Founder of Tea Drunk guides you through brewing these exceptional teas
objectives: Specifics of White Tea
Terroir of Specific White Teas
White Tea Crafting
White Tea Cultivars

Bai Hao Yin Zhen (Silver Needle): Bai Hao Yin Zhen, First Pluck 2022
Bai Hao Yin Zhen, First Pluck 2021
Bai Hao Yin Zhen, First Pluck 2021 (Continued)
Bai Hao Yin Zhen, Comparison First Pluck 2021 & First Pluck 2022
Bai Hao Yin Zhen, Early Spring 2020
Guided Tea Tasting - Bai Hao Yin Zhen 2024

Wild Bai Mu Dan, Early Spring 2023
