Wu Liang Shan Bai Cha 2020 vs. Dian Hong Red Tea 2022
Comparative Tea Tastings - Bai Mu Dan 2023 vs. Wu Liang Shan White 2024

requirements: No previous knowledge needed.
courses.description:
We believe in presenting you with the best quality teas in the world to transport your senses and to show you firsthand all that true tea can be. Our Educational Tea Club is for tea explorers and adventurers, not just tea tourists.
Take a dive deep with us in discussions on history, quality and craftmanship in ways that allow us to continue to be perpetual students of tea and its history.
Explore the origins of tea and its fascinating history, from ancient China to its global popularity today.
In this course we will focus on the unique characteristics and brewing methods of white teas.
Dive into the intricate process of white tea production, from cultivation and harvesting to processing and packaging.
Discover the art of white tea tasting, including proper brewing techniques, using your own senses to evaluate aroma, flavor, and mouthfeel, and understanding the importance of proper brewing.
Immerse yourself in the rich tradition and cultural significance of Chinese white tea while enjoying heirloom Chinese tea cultivars sourced from historically significant terroir and crafted by age-old artisanship.
Shunan Teng, Founder of Tea Drunk guides you through brewing these exceptional white teas that are available for purchase on the Tea Drunk website.
target_audience: For people who want to deep dive into tea and learn about specific characteristics

courses.title: 発酵食「麹甘酒」と「塩麹」を手作りする実践講座です！　★発酵食パワーを実感しましょう★
courses.bio: 主宰している自然食料理教室で、特に人気のある「麹甘酒」と「塩麴」の「失敗しない作り方と続けられる発酵食」の講座内容を動画レッスンにしました。食生活を見直したい方へのメッセージが詰まっています
objectives: 免疫力をアップする「麹甘酒」「塩麴」の健康効果や特徴を分かりやすく解説します
「麹甘酒」を失敗せずに作り、保存する方法を紹介します
「麹甘酒」を飽きずに飲み続ける７つのアイデアの紹介します
体調を改善する食生活のポイントとコツが理解できます
万能調味料「塩麹」が、食材をどう変化させるかが分かります。
万能調味料「塩麹」の失敗しない作り方。保存方法を紹介します
食べ物の消化の仕組みと体調を改善する食べ物を紹介します

腸内環境を改善する食生活のポイント: 免疫力が上がる食生活のポイントと継続のコツを学ぶ
「麹甘酒」と「塩麹」を作る前に知っておきたい事: 貴方の腸内環境は、簡単に確認できます
腸内環境を改善すると体調が良くなる意味をお伝えします
麹甘酒とは？: 麹甘酒のパワーを知る
失敗しない「麴甘酒」の作り方: 米麹と残りご飯で「麹甘酒」を作ります。失敗しないコツを丁寧にお伝えします
麹甘酒を飽きずに食べ続ける７つのアイデア: 麹甘酒継続のアイデアレッスン
万能調味料「塩麹」の働きと便利な使い方: 塩麹の便利な使い方を紹介します
万能調味料「塩麴」の作り方: 「塩麹」を１時間で作る方法を紹介します
万能調味料「塩麹」の保存方法: 万能調味料「塩麴」を最後まで使い切る為の保存方法を紹介します

requirements: 電気炊飯器（保温機能のみ）を使用
調理の経験は問いません。
courses.description:
発酵食が「何故身体に良いのか」を、分かりやすい動画で紹介します。
口から入った食べ物が、どのように消化されるのか、消化の仕組みと発酵食の役割を理解すれば、何をどれだけ食べれば良いのかが理解できます。
ブームにもなった「麹甘酒」と「塩麹」は多くの市販品がありますが、手作り品には市販品にない「効果」があります。
自分で醸した発酵食品を最後まで大切に使い切り、無理のない発酵生活を続けていきましょう！
失敗せずに手作りするポイント、発酵食を続けるアイデアやコツが詰まったレッスン内容です。
target_audience: 健康的な食生活に興味がある老若男女
免疫力をアップする発酵食を手作りしたい方
発酵食を食生活に取り入れたい方
「麹甘酒」「塩麹」の市販品を購入している方
「麹甘酒」「塩麹」を失敗せずに作りたい方
「麹甘酒」「塩麹」の使い方や食べ方を知りたい方
「麹甘酒」「塩麹」を最後まで効率的に使いたい方
食生活を見直したい方
腸活に興味のある方

courses.title: How To Bake A Cake: Victoria Sponge - Introduction Lesson
courses.bio: Learn how to bake a classic victoria sponge cake in 30 mins. Wow your friends and family! We make it quick and simple.
requirements: A working oven
A selection of simple baking equipment
Someone who can eat your creations.
A selection of ingredients available from all supermarkets
courses.description:
This Victoria Sponge baking course is designed to help those who are less confident in the kitchen to understand the terminology and ingredients used in the baking world and be able to confidently create some wonderful cakes.
Please note is our pilot lesson shot to test ideas for our full paid course Baking basics. it was filmed quickly with a simple camera and no microphone to test to see if students enjoy the teaching style and get feedback to be able to justify paying for a professionally filmed course ( Now found as How to Bake: Baking Basics )
The course is broken into different lecture segments which cover
Equipment
Ingredients
Making the Cake
Making the Cake icing
Assembling the Cake
The course comes with a PDF download of the Victoria sponge recipe and step by step instructions.
You will enjoy this course if you are keen to learn how to bake or just want to learn.
target_audience: Novice bakers
Anyone who would like to become more confident in baking
Anyone who likes cake!

courses.title: Vegan decorated cake from scratch
courses.bio: A delicious and beautiful vegan cake is possible! Let me teach you how to bake, whip, and decorate a layered cake!
objectives: get to know the instruments to use in order to design a decorated cake from scratch
learn how to bake vanilla and chocolate sponge cakes without using milk or eggs
learn how to create a perfect vegan whipped cream and how to properlly use it to stack and decorate the cake
learn how to create white and dark chocolate drippings, how to use edible coloring and how to pipe different decorations using different piping tips.
requirements: no need of previous baking experience. if you want to create a propper beautiful cake you will have to purchase a rotating stand, a cake spatula and a scraping board. also some pipping bags a tips
courses.description:
This comprehensive online course is designed to empower you with the skills to craft a delectable and visually stunning vegan cake entirely from scratch! Many skeptics believe it's challenging to achieve a vegan cake that is both delicious and aesthetically pleasing, free from eggs and dairy. Fear not, as I will guide you through the process of baking a delightful fluffy sponge cake, offering variations in both vanilla and chocolate, all without the need for eggs and dairy.
Beyond baking, the course delves into the art of whipping a plant-based heavy cream substitute to perfection, ensuring an airy and smooth consistency. This whipped cream will serve as the foundation for filling, stacking, covering, and adorning your cakes. Explore the creation of two distinct fillings—decadent chocolate and luscious berries—accompanied by unique decorations. Gain insights into fashioning the ideal ganache for graceful drippings and mastering various piping tips for creating intricate designs.
Moreover, the course emphasizes accessibility, utilizing readily available materials found in any local supermarket. As you embark on this culinary journey, rest assured that I will be available via email to address any queries that may arise. Enroll today to unlock the secrets of crafting exceptional vegan cakes, not only enriching your repertoire but also enabling you to share the joy of delectable treats with family and friends. This course, priced equivalently to a single decorated cake, is not just an investment in skills but a pathway to substantial savings and the fulfillment of mastering the art of vegan baking!
target_audience: baking lovers, vegan or non vegan bakers who want to offer their costumers amazing deliciuos dairy & egg free decorated cakes.

courses.title: パーフェクトケーキvol.04 「ガトー・ショコラの作り方」
courses.bio: いつものお菓子が3倍おいしくなる製菓基礎技術
objectives: 失敗しないガトー・ショコラの作り方
道具や材料の選び方と正しい扱い方
手持ちのレシピが3倍おいしくなる。理論で学ぶ製菓技術
お菓子をきれいに作るためのコツとポイント

紹介: パーフェクトケーキシリーズ「ガトー・ショコラ」の概要紹介
ガトー・ショコラの作り方: 材料と道具の事前準備
ガトーショコラ生地作り前半
ガトーショコラ生地作り後半

requirements: お菓子作りの基礎を学びたい気持ち
量り、ボウル、木べら、ゴムベラ、ハンドミキサー、デコ型、オーブンなどの製菓道具
courses.description:
お菓子作りがもっと上手になりたい！そんな願いを叶える講座「パーフェクトケーキシリーズ」のガトー・ショコラ編です。
ガトー・ショコラは簡単なようでいて奥の深いお菓子です。毎年2月には「ガトーショコラ　膨らまない　へこむ」といったキーワード検索で、多くの人がミサリングファクトリーのホームページを訪れます。それくらい作る人は多いけどうまくいかない人も多いお菓子なのです。
チョコレートという素材はとても繊細で扱いにコツがいります。まず、チョコレートの性質を理解することが大切。と、言っても難しいことではなく、この講座を見れば「なるほど！」と納得できるでしょう。


「レシピ通りに作ってもうまくいかない」「いつもと同じに作っているのに仕上がりが違うことがある」そんな経験は誰にでもありませんか？それには明確な理由があります。パーフェクトケーキシリーズは、基本の製菓技術を身につけ、安定した仕上がりのお菓子が作れるようになるのと同時に、きれいに作るためにはどうしたらよいかがわかる新しい製菓講座です。



■お菓子作りの準備についても紹介しています。
スムーズに作るためにとても大事な材料や道具の準備についても解説しています。

■お菓子作りに重要な「混ぜ方」をしっかり見せます。
お菓子作りは温度管理がとても重要です。といっても、難しいお話ではありません。動画と補足の説明（PDF）を見れば「なるほど」とすぐにわかることばかりです。理由を知って自分らしくお菓子作りを楽しんでください。”混ぜる”は簡単なようでいて奥が深いのです。動画でイメージトレーニングをすることで、同じように作れるようになりますので、早送りせず何度も見てください。
■お菓子をきれいに作るコツ、道具の使い方がわかります。
どのくらいのサイズの道具を使うのがよいのか。きれいに作るためにするべきこと、動きがわかります。実際のミサリングファクトリーのレッスンと同じことをお伝えしています。


■「パーフェクトケーキシリーズvol.05 ガトー・ショコラ」の内容
ガトー・ショコラのレシピ
材料・道具の準備　道具のサイズ、材料の選び方
チョコレートの溶かし方と生地作り
ガトーショコラに適したメレンゲの立て方
チョコレート生地とメレンゲの混ぜ方と焼き方




■当「ガトーショコラ」レシピは商用利用が可能です。
カフェなどでの販売・教室でのレッスンなど自由にご利用ください。（著作権はミサリングファクトリーに属します。写真・レシピの転用はご遠慮ください。）



お菓子作りに興味を持ちきちんと学びたい子どもたち、お菓子作りがもっと上手になりたい人、一緒に学んでいきましょう。
お菓子作りが好きな方へのギフトにもどうぞ。
target_audience: お菓子作りや料理に興味がある人
お菓子作りの基礎を学びたい人
もっとお菓子作りが上手になりたい人
カフェなどのお店で手作りお菓子を出したい人
フリースクールや学童保育など子どもたちにおやつを作ったり教えたりする人
正しい道具のサイズや道具の扱い方を知りたい人

courses.title: All about Peruvian Cuisine by APCA chef online
courses.bio: This course will cover the 15 recipes covering starter, Main courses and seafood
objectives: Learn Peruvian Cuisine
Learn how to make ceviche
Learn how to make peruvian lomo saltado
Learn peruvian Aji de gallina
requirements: This program does not require and skills before hand
courses.description:
Ceviche ( Peruvian Sushi ) - Ceviche, also cebiche, seviche, or sebiche is a South American seafood dish that originated in Peru, typically made from fresh raw fish cured in fresh citrus juices, most commonly lemon or lime, but historically it was made with the juice of bitter orange
Aji de Gallina ( Peruvian Chicken Stew) - Ají de gallina is a Peruvian chicken stew. The dish is considered a popular Peruvian comfort food, and the name translates to "chicken chili" or "hen's chili" in English
Causa Reliena limena (Layered Potato Casserole ) -This versatile Peruvian potato dish makes a great light meal or a fine addition to a buffet spread. Causa can be layered with any number of fillings — chicken salad and tuna salad are favorites. Served cold, the dish is often topped with extravagant garnishes and sauces for a colorful presentation.
Rocoto Relience( Stuffed Red Peppers) - Rocoto Relleno is a healthy appetizer that originates from Arequipa and is emblematic of Peruvian cuisine. The pepper, famously served filled with creamy goodness, has conquered the hearts of tourists and locals alike.
Papa Relieno ( Stuffed Red Peppers) - Papa rellena, translating to "stuffed potato," is delicious comfort food, combining mashed potatoes . A seasoned ground beef filling, similar to an empanada filling, is enveloped in a layer of mashed potatoes, which is then formed into an oblong oval shape and deep-fried until it's golden brown and crispy. Kids love this meal, especially with ketchup on the side.
Yuquitas Fritas ( Yuka Fries) - Yuquitas fritas are like regular potato fries. One or two dry fries are tasty but after that, you'll need a sauce to make them more palatable.
Papa a la huancaino ( Peruvian Chilli Cheese Sauce ) - Papa a la huancaína is a Peruvian appetizer of boiled yellow potatoes in a spicy, creamy sauce called huancaína sauce. Although the dish's name is derived from Huancayo, a city in the Peruvian highlands, this dish is from Lima. It has become a staple of everyday and holiday cuisine throughout the country.
Sapa fuchifu - Sopa Fuchi-fu Peruvian Seasoning Mix For Fuchi-fu Soup Provenzal Sopa Fuchi- fu is a delicious soup in the chifas, fuchifú soup is also known as egg soup
Sea Food Soup - The Parihuela is a hearty and spicy seafood soup that has modest origins in the fishing communities of Peru and is very popular all along the coast.
Lomo Saltado (Stir Fry Beef) - Lomo saltado is a popular, traditional Peruvian dish, a stir fry that typically combines marinated strips of sirloin with onions, tomatoes, french fries, and other ingredients; and is typically served with rice.
Arroz con Pato (Duck with Rice ) - Arroz con Pato is one of the most typical dishes found in Peru is the Arroz con Pato (Duck with Rice), which, in terms of the seasoning in the rice, is a cooking style similar to the famous “Arroz con Pollo” found in many Latin American countries.
Arroz Tapado (Rice on Top) - A traditional rice and beef dish that’s very popular thanks to its deep savory flavor and simple ingredients. Arroz tapado gets its name from the rice that is first boiled and then lightly fried and placed on top of the beef. Cooked rice literally covers the juicy, flavor-infused meat.
Peruvian style beer can Chicken - Inspired by the Peruvian rotisserie chicken, this recipe combines 'pollo a la brasa' seasoning with the beer can cooking technique. The goal is to produce a tasty chicken with a crispy exterior and juicy interior. Serve it with fries and the salad of your choice.
Peruvian Jelea ( Fish and Seafood) - Jalea” is Spanish for “jelly.” This dish, however, has nothing to do with the sweet jams we’re used to spreading on toast for breakfast. In Peru, “jalea” is actually a dish consisting of fried fish and seafood served with fried yucca and chifles, which are fried slices of green plantain.
Quinoa Porridge - If you are someone who is in love with quinoa, then you would surely love this porridge. This is an easy-to-make porridge recipe, which is extremely tasty and can be made with just a few ingredients. This porridge is a great choice for those who are vegan, as its made using almond milk.
target_audience: This program is suitable for everybody from students, home cooks, Enthusiasts to professional

courses.title: Pizza in Teglia Romana
courses.bio: Croccante e Alveolata nel forno di casa
objectives: In questo corso imparerai a realizzare un impasto per pizza in teglia a casa tua;
Imparerai a realizzare una biga alternativa, in grado di dare maggior spinta all’impasto;
Realizzerai un impasto in impastatrice proprio come in pizzeria, passo dopo passo;
Apprenderai come gestire la massa e stagliare le pagnotte, per raggiungere il risultato migliore;
Cuoceremo in forno domestico prestando attenzione alla cottura in base alla base pizza che cuoceremo;
Ti mostrerò come stendere correttamente l’impasto in teglia, per non perdere struttura;
Troverai come realizzare basi per pizza: bianca, rossa, patate e baciata; 4 basi per realizzare infinite pizze.
requirements: Non è necessaria alcun tipo di esperienza per seguire il corso, ma è necessario avere un impastatrice o una planetaria.
courses.description:
Hai sempre sognato di sfornare pizze in teglia super croccanti e con una bella struttura aperta
Ma ogni volta la pizza risulta piatta, pensate e senza alveoli
Questo è il corso che cerchi
Questo corso è dedicato a appassionati, casalinghi e professioni, amanti della pizza in teglia Romana, che dispongono di una planetaria o un impastatrice, e vogliono apprendere tutti i segreti per realizzare una pizza in teglia Romana d’eccellenza, croccante e ben alveolata, non solo in forni professionali ma anche nel forno di casa
In questo corso verrete guidati passo passo nella realizzazione dell‘impasto per pizza, partendo da un prefermento Biga, vedremo come realizzarlo e come gestirlo in diversi ambienti e situazioni
Vi guiderò passo passo durante la fase più importante che è la realizzazione dell’impasto , in modo da non commettere errori e imparerete a gestire correttamente la lievitazione, che nel caso della pizza è una fase davvero importante per raggiungere il risultato che vogliamo
Vi mostrerò i segreti per una formatura corretta delle pagnotte, con i giusti pesi in base alla teglia che avete a disposizione e alla tipologia di pizza che realizzeremo, tra cui
Base bianca
Base rossa
Base patate
Base baciata
Le quattro basi che vi permettono di realizzare tutte le ricette di pizza in teglia che desiderate
Vi seguirò nel momento della stesura di ogni base pizza, mostrandovi tutti i segreti per una stesura perfetta che non attacchi alla teglia e infine vi mostrerò come riesco ad ottenere una cottura professionale usando semplicemente un forno domestico
Cosa aspetti
Ci vediamo in aula
target_audience: L’obbiettivo di questo corso è apprendere in maniera corretta la realizzazione di un impastoo per pizza in teglia perfetto, a casa ma non solo perchè il metodo è adatto anche per un laboratorio.

courses.title: From Tomatoes to Sauce: Home Business Guide
courses.bio: The Art of Homemade Tomato Sauce - Equipment, Labeling, Hygiene, Packaging and Profitability.
objectives: Develop a comprehensive understanding of tomato sauce production, from ingredient selection to packaging and labeling.
Gain the knowledge and skills to start a profitable tomato sauce business from the comfort of your own home.
Learn to create delicious tomato sauce for family and friends using simple and easy-to-follow techniques.
Master the production process, including tomato sorting, pureeing, sterilization, base creation, and ingredient selection.
Develop a deep understanding of preservation techniques and how to ensure production hygiene to maintain product quality.
Acquire critical marketing and research skills to maximize revenue, such as market research, cost-benefit analysis, and revenue generation.
requirements: No experience required , just an open mind to learn new things
courses.description:
Do you love tomatoes and dream of turning them into delicious and profitable tomato sauce? Look no further! Our comprehensive course will guide you through the entire process of creating and selling your own tomato sauce, all from the comfort of your home.


Whether you're already a tomato farmer or just starting, our easy-to-follow lessons will help you add value to your tomatoes and turn them into a tasty sauce that your family and friends will love. And if you dream of starting a tomato sauce business, this course is a MUST-ATTEND. You'll learn everything you need to know to start and ensure your success from the beginning.


Our lessons cover all the critical steps in the process, from sorting your tomatoes and making the puree to creating the base, adding ingredients, and preserving your sauce. You'll also learn about packaging and labelling, production hygiene, marketing, and conducting market research to ensure your business succeeds.


With our course, you can run a profitable tomato sauce business from home in no time. Learn a simple and easy way to add value to your tomatoes, whether you are a tomato farmer or seeking a business opportunity to invest in.



Don't miss this opportunity to turn your passion for tomatoes into a thriving business. Enrol today!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to start creating tasty tomato sauce for their family and friends.
Anyone dreaming of starting a tomato sauce business but don't know where to start.
A soon to be tomato sauce producer and seller who wants to get things right the first time.

(English dubbed version of previous course)
The roots of Italian cuisine are tied to the earth, to the sun and also to the heart.
This is the Italian cooking magic simplicity: Wheat, tomato, two simple ingredients that can be easily transformed into a work of art.
In this short free course I will teach you the two recipes that have become a symbol of Italy in the world. Pasta with tomato sauce and bread balls, which we can consider a symbol of Italian cuisine (this recipe is also suitable for vegetarians).
I would love to be able to entertain and delight you with these two recipes that, in their simplicity and delicacy have a great balance of flavors.
The ingredients used are simple (the main ingredients you will use are flour - water - tomato - eggs) and inexpensive and are also available to everyone.
No specific knowledge is required for the preparation of these two dishes, at the end of the course you will be able to prepare these recipes as if you were born in Italy and you will be able to amaze your guests with an all-Italian taste.
You will be guided step by step in the preparation, I will teach you the little secrets that my grandmother and my mother taught me.

courses.description:
Eating well and feeling good about cooking is just like the old saying “we eat with our eyes first.” This class is all about getting your fridge organized in order to help you feel happier in the kitchen.
The class is for anyone looking to learn how to store food and produce properly to give it longer life and make it easier to cook from.

Learn tips about keeping it clean and ready to be reloaded when you go grocery shopping or have leftovers.
By the end of this course, you will feel inspired by your new fridge! You will learn a practical skill that will help you keep a clean fridge for the rest of your life!
Having a clean and organized fridge will also allow you to eat better, waste less food, and feel proud of yourself every time you open the fridge.

requirements: No pre requirement as the entire program is professionally pre recorded and very easy to follow
courses.description:
APCA chef online Presents to our new topic specially curated by chef Gabriel Bonin, In house Executive Chef of APCA Malaysia, an International Pastry and curinaly school.
Veganism is a type of vegetarian diet that excludes meat, eggs, dairy products, and all other animal-derived ingredients. Many vegans also do not eat foods that are processed using animal products, such as refined white sugar and some wines.
On a vegan diet, you can eat foods made from plants, including:
Fruits and vegetables.
Legumes such as peas, beans, and lentils.
Nuts and seeds.
Breads, rice, and pasta.
Dairy alternatives such as soymilk, coconut milk, and almond milk.
Vegetable oils.
Research has shown that a vegan diet can help do the following:
Promote weight loss.
Reduce your risk of heart disease by lowering cholesterol levels.
Lower your chances of getting certain types of cancer, such as colon cancer.
Manage diabetes by lowering A1C levels.
In this program you will be learning a set program covering starters, salads, soups, Main as well as side dishes. There are 16 recipes you can learn. All the recipes are tried and tested in our kitchens and ensure that you have a great learning. In case you have any questions or doubt then you are welcome ask us questions or clear your doubts.
Menu of the Program -

Whether you are a barista who wants to level up his game or a coffee lover at home, this Latte Art course is designed to bring your skillset to the next level. I have created some beautiful, unique and overall easy figures, which you can use to create a WOW-factor to your customer or guest.

After that, we'll start with the latte art figures and hope you will practice while watching, because we believe in learning by doing. After completing this masterclass and some practice, you will be able to perform the same figures and I hope with these creative skills you will come up with pieces of art yourself!


I also endorse you to ask any question. I will definitely answer them all and will try to do this as quickly as possible. If there is a specific figure out there on the internet you would like to learn, please send me a message and I will try to make a how to video about it :)

courses.title: The healthiest way to cook lentil and bean dishes
courses.bio: BE YOUR OWN HEALTH CHEF AT HOME
objectives: in this module you will learn how to cook lentil and bean dishes at your own pace.
this module includes 5 video tutorials with step by step instructions , including pdf instructions on recipes

this is a great course for vegans, vegetarians and anyone who is just eager to learn how to cook very delicious lentil and bean dishes at home

How to cook Lentil and Bean dishes India: Video 1 -Mastering Legumes: An Introduction to Lentils and Beans
Video 2 - TADKA DAL ( yellow lentil stew)
Video 3 - WHOLE GREEN MOONG DAL WITH COCONUT CREAM ( green moong gram stew)
Video 4 - DAL MAKHANI ( Buttery black gram and red bean stew )
Video 5 - RED BEAN RAJMA ( red bean stew) WITH EGGPLANT

requirements: No experience needed to learn this course
courses.description:
Dear Friends,
Welcome to my online cooking school, where we explore the wonders of a plant-based diet infused with Indian Ayurvedic principles.
In this module, we dive into the world of legumes—lentils, beans, gram, and peas. I will guide you step by step on how to cook these legumes properly, ensuring improved digestibility and enhanced bioavailability. Through my personal experience, I've observed that many individuals, particularly from the West, lack knowledge in cooking legumes, while those from the East often rely too heavily on pressure cookers, compromising the nutritional value. Hence, I emphasize the importance of soaking legumes, which eliminates phytic acid and promotes germination for increased nutritional content.
Within this course, you will also learn about the spices that harmonize perfectly with lentils. These spices not only elevate the flavor but also aid digestion significantly. You can find a variety of spices on my website, MasalaMia, or explore numerous free recipes for garam masalas online and grind them yourself. I strongly encourage grinding your own spices rather than purchasing them from a store.
Incorporating legumes into your diet becomes crucial for vegetarians and vegans as they provide essential protein, minerals, and vitamins. My course will offer valuable tips on cooking legumes to retain their maximum nutritional value. Whether you are considering a vegetarian or vegan lifestyle or simply seeking to master the art of cooking lentils ( dals) , this course is for you.
Furthermore, lentils and beans play a significant role in nourishing our microbiome by providing insoluble fiber and butyrate. So, apart from their nutritional benefits, this course may deepen your appreciation for legumes and their positive impact on our gut health.
Wishing you a joyful cooking experience,
MasalaMia
target_audience: this course is designed for anyone how to  cook lentil dishes at home with the help of spices

courses.title: Healthy Meal Prep: Prepare a Week’s Worth of Nutritious Meal
courses.bio: Quick and Easy Meal Prep for a Healthy, Fit Lifestyle
objectives: Learn how to plan a week’s worth of healthy meals, ensuring balanced nutrition and variety.
Discover time-saving strategies to prep and cook healthy meals in just two hours.

requirements: This course is designed for beginners and experienced cooks alike. No previous cooking skills are necessary—just a desire to learn and improve your eating habits.
You will need basic kitchen equipment, such as a cutting board, sharp knife, measuring cups, pots, pans, and containers for meal storage.
courses.description:
In this Healthy Meal Prep Course, you will learn how to prepare a week's worth of nutritious and delicious meals in just two hours! This course is designed to help you save time, reduce stress, and maintain a balanced diet, all while promoting a healthier lifestyle. Whether you’re a beginner in the kitchen or an experienced cook, this course will provide you with easy-to-follow strategies for meal planning and prepping, so you can eat healthy all week long without the hassle.
Throughout the course, you’ll discover the benefits of meal prepping, including how it can help you control portion sizes, minimize food waste, and ensure you’re eating the right nutrients every day. We will guide you through selecting healthy ingredients, preparing them efficiently, and storing your meals for the week ahead. You’ll also learn how to balance macronutrients, create variety in your meals, and make your food both nutritious and satisfying.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the knowledge and skills to prepare a full week of healthy meals, giving you more time to focus on other areas of your life. Whether you're looking to maintain a fit body, manage your weight, or simply improve your overall well-being, meal prepping will help you stay on track. Get ready to take control of your diet and start enjoying healthier, more convenient meals today!
target_audience: Busy Professionals: If you have a hectic schedule and want to eat healthy without spending hours cooking, this course will teach you how to prepare a week’s worth of meals in just two hours.
Health-Conscious Individuals: Whether you're looking to lose weight, boost energy, or maintain a balanced diet, this course will help you create nutritious meals that support a healthy lifestyle.

courses.description:
Benvenut* nel corso "Naturalmente Carne"!
In questo corso, composto da oltre 40 video, ti porterò a esplorare il mondo affascinante della carne bovina. Scoprirai come fare la differenza nella tua vita quotidiana attraverso una comprensione approfondita della carne.
Ecco cosa imparerai:
Conoscenza Completa della Carne: Sviluppa competenze indispensabili per scegliere, preparare, utilizzare e presentare le carni in modo efficace.
Scelte Consapevoli: Impara a fare scelte informate e indipendenti durante la spesa, sia al macellaio che al supermercato.
Valorizzazione dei Tagli Economici: Scopri come risparmiare scegliendo tagli meno conosciuti ma deliziosi, valorizzandoli nelle tue ricette.
Tecniche di Preparazione: Acquisisci le competenze per eseguire tecniche fondamentali come il disosso, il taglio, le legature e molto altro ancora.
Comunicazione Efficace con il Macellaio: Impara a chiedere ciò che desideri davvero e a capire meglio le offerte del tuo macellaio.
Scopri come diventare un esperto nella scelta e preparazione della carne bobina, trasformando ogni pasto in un'esperienza culinaria straordinaria.
Imparerai a scegliere tagli meno conosciuti e più economici, massimizzando il valore della tua spesa e trasformando ogni piatto in un'opera d'arte culinaria.
"Esistono persone così folli da pensare di sapere già tutto. Ed esistono persone così sagge da sapere che tutto è ancora da imparare."

Who Is This Course For?
The Cook 5 Vegetarian Meals in 5 Days video course from Farhat Amin is designed for home cooks who want to quickly learn authentic Indian recipes from the comfort of their home.

It contains step by step video tutorials that are quick and easy to follow. Your time is limited, so the information is broken down into bite size lectures that can be easily completed in less than an hour. All the recipes are suitable for Vegans, apart from the vegetable kebabs - an egg is used, however that can easily be omitted.
The course goes through the steps from understanding Indian spices, to preparing your ingredients, to the exact steps showing you how to make 5 delicious Indian meals, that your friends and family will love.


What You Will Accomplish During This Course
Start from scratch and create awesome vegetarian meals that look professional and taste amazing by the end of the course. You'll no longer need to pay for expensive Indian take-aways. Hi, there,
have you ever travelled to China?  have you tried Chinese food?
if yes, then are you interested to learn Chinese cooking?  do you want to cook Chinese dishes by yourself?
if yes, then you are in the right place.
You will learn the Chinese cooking with a real Chinese who have been overseas for 20 years.
The Chinese diet is a fairly healthy style of eating, when we consider the typical ratio of protein to vegetables to starch.
Essential to any stir-fry, the wok is the heart of the Chinese kitchen.
in the lectures, I would like to show you some basics and you can follow with me to cook in practise like a real Chinese does.
This course focuses on some basics:
Learn the Chinese seasoning and how we use them
understand what 4 major Chinese cuisines are
more than 10 common dishes to make in practice (step by step)


during my 20 years stay aboard, most of my time, I cook Chinese dishes as I have a Chinese family. I just video my daily cooking and collect 11 representive dishes for the basics.


In those videos,  I will show you how to cook in both chinese traditional and innovative way, how to use seasoning and how to cook like a real Chinese.
Even with ingredients which are difficult to find in western world, I will tell you how to replace them with something else.


I hope you like chinese cooking and always remember Chinese cooking is simple and it's healthy, too.


so let's start! I hope you enjoy the cooking!

want to cook some basic chinese dishes

Foreign visitors to Japan are increasing dramatically. Now is the time with the weak yen. A more enjoyable visit to Japan.
Do you know the fact that Japanese cuisine - WASHOKU  is registered as an UNESCO World Heritage Site?  And The McGovern Report presented to US Congress in 1977 says , we should learn from traditional Japanese cuisine.  Do you know the fact that Japanese restaurants are spreading the world , now 187,000 restaurants?  And I cannot help telling you the fact rice ball - Onigiri becomes a hit in also Paris.
Become able to enjoy more and cook some Japanese dishes. You will be able to spend healthier foods life.   I want to introduce orthodox and traditional Japanese cuisine. You will be able to cook  the rice ball - ONIGIRI surely.
And also you will be able to understand the meaning the word  " ITADAKIMASU".
And at the same time, you can learn more about Japan and Japanese people. For example, Chinese character " KAN JI"  we are using and our onomatopoeia.
Me, YOSHIYUKI who has been the head of meat processing company and some restaurants for over 40 years. And I decided to offer ox-tongue to as souvenir of Japan. Nowadays grilled  ox-tongue is so popular food  in Japan.

creazione di un nuovo lievito madre e di: 3 gestioni per la pasta madre solida : in sacco, libera e in acqua
Li.co.li :gestione del lievito madre in forma liquida ( 100% di idratazione )
creazione di un nuovo lievito madre + TABELLA PDF

requirements: Non sono necessari requisiti
courses.description: In questo videocorso approfondirai la conoscenza del lievito madre partendo prima di tutto da come nasce e dalla sua composizione comprendendo i suoi differenti comportamenti dovuti ai vari fattori che verranno descritti. I questo modo avrai più consapevolezza per affrontare i vari problemi che possono spesso presentarsi nella gestione quotidiana. Troverai, a disposizione, una comoda tabella pdf riferita alle varie problematiche di acidità del lievito e le soluzioni da adottare. Imparerai a riconoscere il tuo lievito madre tramite i sensi in modo da poter capire quando avrà degli eccessi di acidità e quali saranno (eccesso di acidità lattica oppure acetica) in modo da assumere poi decisioni in merito. Acquisirai la conoscenza del significato di PH e quali sono i valori ottimali nelle varie fasi di vita del lievito.. Inoltre ti spiegherò diverse gestioni e le varie differenze tra esse in modo da poterti indirizzare a quella più adatta alle tue esigenze.  Descriverò quindi la gestione in sacco (metodo milanese) , la gestione in acqua (metodo piemontese) e la gestione libera.  Ho inoltre dedicato una lezione alla conoscenza del lievito madre in coltura liquida in modo da potervi informare su alcune importanti differenze rispetto alla pasta madre solida.  Ti parlerò della tecnica del bagnetto utilizzata per togliere l'acidità in eccesso : ti spiegherò quando va utilizzata e sopra tutto due differenti tecniche in quanto nulla del nostro lievito va sottovalutato. Alla fine di questo corso avrai compreso alcune importanti e basilari nozioni che ti accompagneranno sempre nell'affrontare le situazioni che si presenteranno.
target_audience: chi si approccia al mondo del lievito madre e chi vuole riflettere sulla gestione e i vari fattori che influenzano il lievito

courses.title: Three easy recipies for making moroccan pancakes msemen
courses.bio: Easy recipies of making moroccan pancakes msemen
objectives: Learn more about moroccan kitchen
How to make easy pancakes msemen
Step by step to make msemen
How to make a delicious pancakes msemen

Moroccan pancakes msemen: Part 2 of circulation of the dough

requirements: No requirements needed
courses.description:
Do u have an Idea about moroccan food ?
Have you  heard about moroccan pancakes msemen ?
You are in the right place if you want to make msemen
In this course i will share with you tree different recipies of making moroccan pancakes msemen step by step
My purpose for this course is to help you create delicious moroccan pancakes msemen


These square, laminated Moroccan pancakes are called msemen or sometimes rghaif. They’re a popular breakfast and tea time treat not only in Morocco, but also Tunisia and Algeria. If you haven’t tried one, it’s time you do!
Although easily bought at bakeries or as a street food, many Moroccans prefer to make msemen at home. That way the texture, flavor, size and quality can all be controlled.
Serve them plain—I like them this way hot off the griddle—or spread with butter, honey, jam or cheese. The most traditional way, however, is to dip msemen in hot syrup made from butter and honey. A bit messy to eat, but sticky sweet and delicious.


The elastic bread-like dough used to make msemen can be unleavened or barely leavened. For the latter, just a tiny bit of yeast is used. In recent years, I’ve seen some cooks replace the yeast with baking powder.
I prefer the barely leavened method, which is what my recipe below uses. It yields msemen with well-defined layers, a slightly crispy exterior and chewy interior. There is room to play in terms of changing ratios of flour or replacing some or all of the white flour with whole wheat, but if you’ve never made msemen before, I encourage you to try the recipe as is.
target_audience: For beginners

objectives: Cómo mejorar la alimentación en cuanto al consumo de pastelería integral.
Aprenderemos a realizar distintas técnicas de pastelería saludable con harinas integrales sin gluten de una forma fácil y rápida.
Pastelería saludable con harinas de semillas, legumbres, y cereales integrales sin TACC.
Aprendemos a reducir y eliminar incluso en algunos casos el uso de azucares refinadas. Utilizaremos materias grasas sanas.
Todos los cuidados que tenemos que tener para realizar preparaciones para celíacos.

Teoría. Primeros pasos para nuestra past: Bienvenido a este taller de pastelería saludable sin gluten.

courses.description:
En este curso vas a descubrir la gran variedad de preparaciones de pastelería deliciosa y saludable con harinas integrales sin gluten que existen. Nos enfocamos en una pastelería sencilla que podamos disfrutar todos juntos, nutriendo y cuidando nuestro cuerpo.
Realizamos preparaciones y técnicas de pastelería sana, sabrosa y aptas para celíacos, diabéticos y veganos.
Me interesa tanto como a vos que logres resultados óptimos, por lo cual podrás consultarme cuantas veces necesites si te surge alguna duda. ¡Estoy para guiarte y ayudarte!
Las preparaciones saludables y sin gluten que verás en este curso son:
Alfajorcitos de zanahoria.
Barritas de cereales.
Brownie de quinoa.
Budín integral con lino.
Cookies con semillas.
Crumble de manzana.
Cupcakes con garbanzos y maní.
Pepas de sarraceno.
Vainillas, postre en vasitos.
Torta húmeda de calabaza.
Trataremos temas importantes como:
El reemplazo de azúcares refinadas y grasas no saludables.
Cómo lograr una pastelería saludable, deliciosa, atractiva e inclusiva, apta para celíacos, diabéticos, veganos y rica para todos.
Los cuidados para lograr preparaciones aptas para celíacos.
¡Sin mix comerciales! Hacemos nuestras propias premezclas y combinaciones de harinas. Los principales ingredientes que usamos para esto son:
Harina de sarraceno.
Harina de sorgo.
Harina de arroz integral.
Harina de lino.

Harina de maíz.

Sémola
Harina de almendras.
Goma xántica o guar.


¡Podés aprender a tu propio ritmo y en tus horarios disponibles! Tenes acceso de por vida a los videos, podrás verlos cuantas veces necesites, pausarlos, y volver a retomar desde los puntos que necesites, en los momentos que vos elijas.
No es necesario que tengas ninguna experiencia previa, ¡con muchas ganas de aprender es suficiente!
target_audience: Personas interesadas en eliminar el gluten de su dieta, y comenzar a tener una alimentación más saludable y nutritiva incorporando productos integrales.

courses.description:
Inthis course will be learning how to cook brisket over a barbecue pit.
Total cook time on this brisket is 11 hours. A very common cook time for most briskets is around 12 to 13 hours.
In this course I'll be separating the point from the flat on the brisket,seasoning the brisket, getting our pit setup, smoking the meat, rapping the meat, cooking the brisket rest of the way ,then presenting.
I hope you enjoy this course on how to smoke a brisket. There are many different ways but this one has been the easiest way I know as well as the favored from party guests.
So grab a pen and paper feel free to take some notes if you have any questions give them in the Q&A and I'll get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to smoke a brisket

courses.description:
Travel cakes Master chef series by chef Lim, our in-house executive Pastry are something which does not need too much or a storage and great stuff for picnic and parties
This program will cover 8 world class travel cakes and tea cakes which can be easily replicated in the kitchen
Chestnut candy - A rich butter cake with dried Chestnut topped with a crumble crust. the texture combination makes it a delectable treat to serve or eat
Chocolate cake Breton - Chocolate cakes are a cross between a cookie and a brownie, that comes from the Basque region of France. You will learn a Breton with a filling and chocolate dough and a chocolate filling.
Earl Grey Tea cakes and Figs - Earl grey with fig as small cakes characterized by their bar shape with a nutty taste from brown butter. This variation is made with the addition of cherries.
Fruit cakes - A rich fruits cake with lots of soaked fruits and candies with a flakes on the outside. Can be used a s a classic fruits cakes or modern way of presenting it.
Grand classic- Ingot is named after a bar of gold. A melt in the mouth cake made with layers of chocolate sponge soaked in rum syrup and sanwiched with chocolate ganache.
Ispahan cakes - A small cake from northeastern France characterised by its shell shape. Learn to make these delectable butter cakes and achieve their signature bump.
Matcha & Red Bean cakes - Travel cake made with a heavenly combination of Matcha & Red Bean Cakes.
Tigre - A financier base topped with red fruits and paired along with a Dacquoise making it a lovely textural combination
This program will be a perfect base to understand French tea cakes and travel cakes with lots of different bases and components used in formation.
We hope this program will help you immensely to replicate these recipes in your home kitchen as well in any bakery or professional production
target_audience: This course is suitable for home bakers and professionals Both

courses.title: Cocktails 101
courses.bio: A Mixologist's Quick Guide to Mixing, Matching, Making, and Mastering the Art of Creating Amazing Cocktails
objectives: How to Make Cocktails
Cocktail Making

How to be a Mixologist

Cocktails 101: Part 4.1: The Essential Cabinet Fillers: Spirits & Liqueurs
Part 4.2: The Essential Cabinet Fillers: Spirits & Liqueurs
Part 5: Everything Else You'll Definitely Need
Part 7: Cocktails Every Mixologist Should Know

requirements: No experience necessary - All levels welcome - Beginners, Intermediate, & Advanced
courses.description:
Cocktails 101 is a simple audiobook designed to take beginners from having never made a cocktail before to being able to mix and shake like a pro.
All the basics are covered, including equipment, glassware, spirit selection, the science of taste, and the cocktails themselves, which means this is a single audiobook suitable for hobbyists or bar owners/managers alike who want to improve their skills and become true mixologists.
Listeners will come to grips with the basics first and learn the names and purposes of all the equipment present in a cocktail bar, as well as how to use them.
Shaking, breaking, pouring, and mixing are all covered in detail, which means anyone who listens to this audiobook can comfortably and confidently perform the core skills needed in mixology.
The science of taste is covered, too, explaining the science behind what makes a great cocktail great and giving a brief overview on the building blocks of cocktails.
Recipes for lots of cocktails perfect for any bar are presented in detail, too, with instructions, alongside proposed and recommended lists for new or changing bars that appeal to all tastes and proclivities.
This audiobook contains everything a mixologist needs to know before crafting awesome cocktails and is a concise quick-start guide to one of the most exciting skills in the world!
target_audience: Mixologist
Bartenders
Cocktail Enthusiasts

objectives: Güney Doğu Anadolu Bölgesi Yemekleri ve Mutfak Kültürü

Türk Mutfak Kültürü Hakkında Genel Bilgiler
requirements: Not kağıdı ve kalem
courses.description:
Herkese merhabalar. Türkiye’nin yemek çeşitlerine ve mutfak kültürüne daha yakından bakmaya hazır mısınız? Bu kursta Türkiye’nin yedi bölgesinin ve bu bölgelerde yer alan tüm illerin yöresel ve meşhur ürünleri hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaksınız. İllerimizin mutfak kültürlerini, içeceklerini, tatlılarını, kebaplarını, çorbalarını ve daha birçok bilgiyi bu kursta bulabilirsiniz.
Türkiye'nin her bölgesinde farklı bir kültürel miras yatmaktadır. Her bölgenin kendine özgü yüzlerce yemek çeşidi vardır. Bu yemek çeşitlerini daha çok ilin bulunduğu coğrafya belirlemektedir. Bu kursta illerimizin en meşhur ve bilinmesi gereken yemekleri ve mutfak kültürleri anlatılmıştır. Bunlar dışında Türkiye’de daha keşfedilmeyi bekleyen birçok lezzet bulunmaktadır. Bazı illerimizde yemek çeşitleri benzerlik gösterebilmektedir. Bu bölgelerde yapılan benzer yemekler farklı isimlerle karşımıza çıkabilmektedir. Bir şehirde yapılan meşhur bir yemek başka bir şehrin de yöresel lezzeti olabilmektedir. Türkiye’nin zengin mutfak kültürü daha detaylı ve derin bir şekilde incelenmeli ve araştırılmalıdır. Sizlerde öğrendiğiniz yöresel lezzetleri evlerinizde deneyerek Türkiye’nin mutfak kültürünün, ilerleyen nesillere aktarılmasında önemli bir rol oynayabilirsiniz.
Ayrıca kursumuzda Orta Asya dönemi, Anadolu Selçuklu ve Beylikler, dönemi, Osmanlı dönemi ve Cumhuriyet dönemi mutfak kültürlerine de değinilmiştir.
Kurs Başlıkları:
Giriş
Genel Bilgiler: Türk Mutfak Kültürü

requirements: Não é necessária nenhuma experiência anterior para este curso.
courses.description:
Me chamo Gabriel Grinberg, sou Chef de Cozinha internacional com especialização em enogastromia. Trabalho dentro desse métier a mais de 16 anos, aprendendo com os maiores nomes da gastronomia mundial e vivendo os principais segredos da harmonização entre "corpo e alma" (vinho e cozinha). Aproveite a oportunidade de mergulhar nesse universo de mais de 5 mil anos de maneira simples, com uma linguagem dinâmica, que certamente atenderá suas próprias expectativas e, desejamos que vá além. Surpreenda-se e viva cada taça em toda a sua potência.


Convidamos a cada um de vocês a vir conosco, aqui na “Domã Escola da Arte Culinária”, a conhecer e desvendar os segredos que estão por de trás desta bebida milenar. Aqui neste curso iremos aprender os princípios básicos e fundamentais, porém de suma importância, para se comprar vinhos com sabedoria, armazenar de forma apropriada e, claro, harmonizar alguns tipos de vinhos com pratos específicos, em um processo chamado “Enogastronomia”. Aprenderemos juntos que cada garrafa de vinho esconde um segredo que só é possível desvendá-lo com uma Degustação praticada com toda atenção. E não importa o preço de cada garrafa! Aqui entenderemos que o importante mesmo é o “valor” que cada sabor de um vinho pode proporcionar ao nosso paladar.
target_audience: Este curso é dedicado com muito carinho para os amantes do vinho ou os que logo se tornarão!

requirements: Vontade de cozinhar
Sentir que precisa variar mais o cardápio em casa
courses.description:
Mesmo com toda a evolução da sociedade, ainda somos nós mulheres, em sua grande maioria, que gerencia a casa. Somos nós que decidimos que carro comprar, qual vai será a cor das paredes e se o jantar será macarrão ou pizza.
Além de diversas decisões importantes a longo prazo, como a educação dos filhos, ainda temos que encontrar tempo para cuidar da carreira e da casa. Aceitar que as tarefas nunca terão fim e que teremos que delegar ou ignorar algumas funções é o primeiro passo para manter a sanidade mental.
Um ponto que não podemos negligenciar é a alimentação de nossos filhos. Tanto por questões de saúde, mas também pelas memórias afetivas que são criadas ao redor da mesa. Se você tem a sorte de ter alguém que te ajuda a preparar as refeições, que ótimo. Ainda assim parte das decisões do que será preparado deve partir de você.
Nesse curso eu trouxe 30 receitas passo-a-passo, com vídeo e lista de compras divididas semanalmente. Receitas simples, cheias de sabor, cor e pouca louça suja.
Além de uma aula de como melhorar o sabor dos pratos e uma aula completa de planejamento de cardápio, caso você prefira criar seus próprios cardápios desse curso em diante.
Logo na primeira aula do curso, no material complementar, está um livro com todas as receitas e dicas de como organizar a cozinha. No começo de cada semana temos o menu e a lista de compras no material complementar para que você possa deixar o menu na geladeira e a lista de compras dentro da bolsa.


Vamos juntas otimizar seu tempo na cozinha!
target_audience: Mães que trabalham fora e precisam gerenciar a carreira e a casa
Pessoas que procuram uma forma de simplificar e variar a comida do dia-a-dia

courses.title: How To Design, Sculpt, Model & Decorate An Isomalt Fish
courses.bio: Students will learn how to create and sculpt a fish and its base and support, including other features and decorations
objectives: Learn how to create a conceptual yet artistic fish design made out of Isomalt.
Learn how to model and sculpt the fish design.
Learn how to apply various techniques on structure and creation of decorations.
From the various techniques, learn how to put structure together and attach decorations.
You will be shown the right types of tools and equipment to use during the course.

Health and Safety: Health and safety measures and precautions to take when working with hot Isomalt
Tools, Equipment and Materials: Tools, equipment and materials to use for your Isomalt fish modelling/sculpting.
How To Cook and Colour Isomalt: Learn how to cook and colour your Isomalt.
How To Create The Base and Support Stand: How to create the base and support stand for the Isomalt fish
How To Pull, Blow and Shape Isomalt: Part 1: How To Pull, Blow and Shape Isomalt To Make Body of The Fish (Part 1)
Part 2: How To Pull, Blow and Shape Isomalt To Make Body of The Fish (Part 2)
How To Attach Isomalt Fish to Support St: Learn how to attach the Isomalt fish to its support stand
How To Make Tail, Fins and Eyes of Fish: How To Make The Lips and Extra Fin
How To Create/Make Corals: How to create corals as decoration for the Isomalt fish
How To Create/Make Water Effect & Decora: How to create water effect/splashes and decorations

requirements: From Beginner to Intermediate level.
You should have basic knowledge in cake decorating and sugar craft and art.
You will gain Beginner to Intermediate level knowledge in Isomalt decoration.
With regards to any tools and equipment to be used, you will be shown the suitable types to use.
courses.description:
In this training course, Beata Khoo will demonstrate her unique and special skills and show students how to design, create, model, sculpt and decorate a conceptual Isomalt fish, including how to create its base and support stand.
Also, how to securely attach the fish to its base and support stand. Students will learn how to make intricate features of the fish and also other effects and decorations from Isomalt, such as corals and water effect/splash. In the process, you will learn how to cook, colour, pull and shape Isomalt.
As an added bonus, students will get an additional video to have a closer look on how to pull and shape hot Isomalt. Last but not least, students will also learn how to store Isomalt for long periods of time so that you can reuse them when required.
All in all, students will learn very useful tips and tricks and more from Isomalt specialist, Beata Khoo of My Sweet Passion Cakes, who is based in Brighton, East Sussex in the United Kingdom.
So, don't miss this opportunity to gain new knowledge and skills in a unique skill not many cake decorators possess. With this knowledge and skill in Isomalt designing, modelling and decorating; students can wow their clients, customers, family and friends if lovingly applied and complemented to their cake designs.
target_audience: For Beginner to Intermediate cake makers.
You should be curious and interested in learning about Isomalt decorating and sculpting.
Students will gain Beginner to Intermediate level knowledge in Isomalt decoration.
At the end of this course, you will be equipped with the necessary knowledge in basic to intermediate Isomalt decorating skills.

courses.description:
Join me for an extra delicious class - learn how to make beautiful, mouthwatering vegan desserts!


We will make simple, delicious recipes that don’t need any special equipment, in the comfort of your own kitchen, and at your own pace.


Personally, I find that most store-bought treats are way too sweet - the desserts in this class will have beautiful flavours and will not be overpowered by the sweetness alone. Your family and friends will be wowed!


The sweeteners I am using in this class are dates, maple syrup and cane sugar (however, you could use other sweeteners if you prefer to do so).


Each dessert has its own step by step video, written recipe, ingredient and equipment list!


Enjoy an intimate experience at your own home, as we meet new ingredients and flavours, learn helpful kitchen tips, and prepare yummy recipes from scratch, in a wonderful hands-on experience!


So join me and learn how to make your own delicious vegan desserts!


Special Notes:
Equipment Required:
Blender
Food processor (needed for 1 recipe: Strawberry Lemon Pie)
All recipes in this class can be made gluten-free (except for 1 recipe: Chocolate Halva Babka)
All recipes in this class can be made nut-free (except for 1 recipe: Strawberry Lemon Pie)

You can enjoy my classes whether you are a beginner – as I go through every step of each recipe – or if you have been cooking for a while and are looking for some new inspiration in the kitchen.

Bienvenidos al mejor Curso de como hacer cupcakes y postres donde enseñaremos como preparar deliciosos cupcakes y postres en videos paso a paso, aprenderas diferentes tipos de masas y 20 decoraciones para tus cupcakes, 4 deliciosos postres y 4 Tortas, conocerás cada uno de los ingredientes y utensilios para preparar todas las recetas, nuestro contenido es único y original, no nos saltaremos ni un solo paso, nuestra experiencia en la filmación de cursos nos hace estar seguros de nuestra enseñanza, contamos con mas de 5 años de experiencia y la producción de 10 cursos diferentes, por eso la gran aceptación de nuestros alumnos. ahora estamos en Udemy para que todo el mundo pueda acceder a este super curso.
En esta serie de videos también aprenderás las preparaciones de las cremas básicas como la chantilly, cobertura de queso crema, el merengue italiano y fondant, con este último realizaremos varias figuras entre ellas una hermosa decoración navideña para cupcakes.
Otra de las grandes ventajas de nuestro curso es que aprenderás todo sin salir de casa, además los materiales e ingredientes se pueden encontrar fácilmente en el mercado o reemplazar si se desea para lograr nuevos sabores.
Al realizar este curso tendrás las bases necesarias para iniciar tu propia empresa o sorprender a toda tu familia con deliciosas recetas hechas por ti misma ya que los cupcakes están de moda en todo el mundo y cada dia crece mas y mas la pasión por estos deliciosos ponquesitos ideales para fiestas y eventos, por eso es el momento ideal para empezar con este maravilloso curso.

courses.title: Авторский Базовый курс Суши повара
courses.bio: Авторский курс от шефа, который учился в Японии. Пошаговые инструкции помогут новичкам стать настоящими профессионалами
objectives: Профессиональный подход к приготовлению суши и роллов
Секреты, лайфхаки и прочие фишки о которых молчат японцы
Подбор и хранение продуктов
Инвентарь и оборудование
Японская технология приготовления суши и роллов

Инвентарь и оборудование: Как заточить нож на водном камне
Рыба и морепродукты: Нарезка со стейка лосось и тунец

requirements: Опыта работы поваром или суши поваром не обязателен но будет плюсом
courses.description:
Автор курса сертифицированный суши шеф Тен Тимур с 15 летнем опытом работы. Этот курс суши подходит как и новичкам так и действующим суши поварам. Лекции упорядочены от начального до продвинутого уровня, чтоб вам было легче обучаться. Это самый полный курс по суши, который вы не найдете в просторах Интернета. Он специально разработан, чтобы показать вам, как приготовить суши в домашних условиях и как стать настоящим мастером на профессиональной кухне. Пройдя этот курс, вы сможете не только создавать свои собственные суши и роллы, а еще и узнаете о всех секретах и лайфхаках о которых молчат японцы. Все шеф повара после обучения в Японии, стараются не рассказывать о всех фишках и секретах, а в этом курсе я раскрою все тайны!)

Основной список навыков которые вы приобретёте:
1. Как выбрать необходимы инвентарь

requirements: No pre requirement for this program
courses.description:
Making a Sugar display or may be any display is not an easy thing
Reason being simple that before making a display you have to come up with a design. A design which is based on a theme, have all the components who want to add in order to hi light the theme. Second is the balance which could be balance of design , balance of the structure to stand , balance of the colours and lastly balance of the components.
If you dont have this balance then for sure the display will not look good.
One always have to understand that display showcase a little smile of people face who admise the creativity of the chef. in case the display is not good or not balance, offcourse the eye appeal will not be there.
Sugar  display specially need the understanding on the boiling of sugar , how to clean the sugar and how the colour and pulling of sugar work. The sugar is very hot and have to be done in a very professional and careful manner. This topic need a continous practise in order to get a good result
Chef Loi Ming Ai, World Pastry Champion in this workshop teaches you a great world class Sugar display which have different small to big components. He will be teaching you how to make boil sugat, colour the sugar , pull the sugar , blow the sugar, making blown sugar, ribbon  flower and casting of base to support.  You will also learn how to make pastillage dough, cout outs and dry it.

Ingredientes en la maceración: frutas (segunda parte)

requirements: Ser mayor de 18 años
No es necesario tener conocimientos previos sobre elaboración de bebidas
courses.description:
Bienvenidos, en este curso les explicaremos todo el esquema para la elaboración de licores, desde los insumos como las frutas y el alcohol, los procesos involucrados como la maceración, filtración y destilación, las distintas materias primas que pueden ser frutas, semillas, especias, hierbas, características de la maceración ya que esta puede realizarse en frío o en caliente, generalidades respecto al alcohol etílico para saber qué alcoholes son mejores y algunos contaminantes que éstos pueden tener, los jarabes y su mezcla con la infusión ya que hay que tener ciertos cuidados, distintas aplicaciones, entre otros.
Para ello, no necesitan conocimientos previos en la elaboración de bebidas ni química, ya que este es un curso básico-intermedio, les daremos todo lo necesario como distintas tablas, graficas, diagramas, además de distintos consejos y recomendaciones importantes para mejorar su calidad y duración. Con toda esta información, serán capaces de tomar sus propias decisiones, realizar pruebas y obtener licores de gran calidad.
Ya sea que utilicen licores en su negocio, como ser reposterías, heladerías o en la preparación de cocteles, quieran prepararlos para beberlos o si están con intenciones de emprender en este rubro, este curso les será muy útil.
Esperamos que el curso cumpla con sus expectativas, gracias.

courses.description:
Bake the Best Bread of Your Life — Right at Home
Imagine pulling a golden, crusty loaf from your oven — naturally fermented, deeply nourishing, and bursting with flavor. This is more than just baking. It’s a return to real food.
The Mooon Bread Method makes it simple. You'll learn how to turn just three ingredients — flour, water, and salt — into world-class sourdough bread. It is closer than you think.
What You’ll Get:
Step-by-step video course featuring real workshop footage and a walk-through of the instruction document
Lifetime access to the Mooon Bread Method living document — your go-to guide with recipes, equipment links, fermentation science, pro tips, and joyful extras
Mooon Bread Monthly - newsletter from Jordan including recipes and discounts and more to continue guiding you on your journey
Taught by Jordan, a passionate sourdough teacher who's already guided thousands in person. Now, he's on a mission to teach 9,999 more people the art of naturally-leavened bread — and you're next.
Join the growing movement of home bakers around the world bringing wild, whole grain bread back to the table. From starter to leaven to dough to loaf. Jordan is here to guide you all along the way.
Ready to bake your first loaf?
Enroll now and start today.

courses.title: Online Level 2 Food Safety and Food Hygiene Certificate
courses.bio: Meet Food Safety Standard | Achieve 5-Star Food Hygiene Rating | Boost Food Business | Master HACCP and Food Hygiene
objectives: Achieve a 5-Star Food Hygiene Rating (FHRS) by applying food safety management grounded in HACCP and aligned with ISO 22000/FSSC 22000 requirements.
Manage safe food handling, preparation, storage and hygiene by controlling time–temperature, segregation of raw/ready-to-eat food, and cleaning routine.
Explain your legal duties under UK food safety regulations and FSA/EHO expectations, and evidence due diligence with accurate food records.
Identify microbiological, chemical, physical and allergenic food hazards across the food chain and select effective, risk-based controls.
Apply core food technology principles—microbial growth factors, pH, water activity and the “danger zone”—to everyday food controls.
Use calibrated thermometers/probes and clearly defined critical limits to prevent food spoilage and contamination, with monitoring and corrective actions.
Maintain exemplary personal hygiene around food: handwashing, PPE, illness reporting and safe behaviours in food areas.
Design and maintain hygienic food premises: effective layout/flow, verified cleaning and disinfection, pest control, and compliant waste management.
Describe HACCP and its role in a robust food safety management system, including its integration with ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000.
Create, implement and maintain a site-specific HACCP plan that supports ISO 22000/FSSC 22000 documentation, continual improvement and audit readiness.
Embed best-practice food hygiene systems to strengthen consumer trust, brand credibility and inspection outcomes.
Recognise the 14 major food allergens, typical symptoms and legal information requirements to keep consumers safe.
Assess and manage food allergen risks via segregation, supplier assurance, validated cleaning, cross-contact prevention and accurate food information.

5 Star Food Hygiene Rating Scheme: Why is it Important for a Restaurant to Achieve?
Food Safety and Personal Hygiene: What is Food Safety and Why is it Important?
Top Tips to Achieve a 5 Star Rating: Top Tips to Achieve a 5 Star Rating

requirements: There are no requirements or prerequisites necessary to take this course
courses.description:
Build the practical skills and legal confidence to handle, prepare and serve food safely. This Level 2 Food Safety and Hygiene course is designed for anyone who works with food in catering, hospitality or retail. You’ll learn how to control food hazards, maintain excellent hygiene, manage temperatures and storage, and apply a simple HACCP approach to keep food safe and your business compliant.
One in ten people worldwide falls ill from contaminated food each year, according to WHO. Whether you work in a restaurant or prepare meals for your family, you need knowledge of food safety and hygiene.
This Food Safety Training is Ideal for chefs, cooks, kitchen porters, baristas, front-of-house staff, mobile vendors and anyone who handles food as part of their role. It’s also a solid refresher for seasonal workers and those returning to food roles.
This course is aligned with the Food Safety Act 1990, Regulation (EC) 852/2004 on the hygiene of foodstuffs and FSA guidance enforced by EHOs. It will also teaches the core HACCP principles at Level 2 so you can support your team’s food safety management system.
As you may know, day-to-day controls, such as good hygiene, temperature monitoring, cleaning verification and allergen control—support the requirements of ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000 in larger or certified food operations. So, you will be able to fullfill the ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000 requirements by following the guidance given in this course.


Why take this course?
Millions of foodborne illness occur each year. The risk escalates when food workers lack training in hygiene, temperature control and cross-contamination prevention. This course closes that gap by giving your team clear, actionable steps that improve food handling, reduce waste and support a 5-Star Food Hygiene Rating (FHRS). You’ll understand what EHOs look for and how to evidence your food controls.
Throughout this course, you will learn the methods and obligations of maintaining food hygiene and safety. Having a 5-star rating makes the food business stand out from other competitors, so we will focus on how to achieve a 5-star rating and its significance.
We will discuss potential risks that can occur in food production, how to prevent contamination, proper storage guidelines, and key legislation and regulations of food safety.
Because food safety and personal hygiene go hand-in-hand, as you progress, we will guide you on how to keep yourself clean properly while preparing or serving food to minimize the risk of contamination.
Food professionals must be extra careful about food allergies. Clients may be allergic to some ingredients, which can be life-threatening, so we created a whole module on food allergens and preventing, managing risk.
The course will also explore the principles of Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points (HACCP), a method of identifying and preventing possible food safety risks.
You will finish this course with a solid understanding of the importance of food safety and hygiene, as well as in-depth knowledge of the best procedures and regulations for ensuring safe and hygienic food production. This will enable you to act with confidence in any food sector business.


Enroll now to give your team practical food hygiene skills, align with HACCP and the best of ISO 22000 and FSSC 22000, and work confidently toward a 5-Star Food Hygiene Rating.


This course comes with the following Sections:


5-Star Rating: In this section, you will learn about the 5-star hygiene rating and the significance of achieving a 5-star hygiene rating for any restaurant. You will explore how a successful restaurant business mostly depends on how the customers rate the hygiene of that restaurant.


Food Safety and Personal Hygiene: In the restaurant business, food safety and personal hygiene are crucial. Throughout this section, we will talk about food safety and the legal obligations in maintaining food safety. Furthermore, you will learn how to ensure that personal hygiene is maintained while serving or preparing food. We will share case studies to train you practically on maintaining food safety and personal hygiene.


HACCP: Throughout this section of our course, you will learn about a systematic approach to food safety management, HACCP. We will discuss the 12 steps of HACCP for conducting food safety management efficiently.


Food Allergy Awareness: People have different kinds of food allergies. People in the food industry need to be alert regarding this. This section will exclusively describe all kinds of food allergies and manage risk accordingly.


Top Tips to Achieve a 5-Star Rating: Throughout this section of our Level 2 Food Hygiene: Achieving a 5-Star Hygiene Rating will describe how to get 5-star ratings with exclusive tips and tricks.
target_audience: Restaurant owners and managers aiming for a 5-star hygiene rating
Food handlers, chefs, and kitchen staff
Catering professionals and food service workers
Supervisors responsible for food safety and hygiene standards
Anyone interested in learning safe food handling and hygiene practices

courses.title: How to Prepare Royal Icing Consistencies-Master Class
courses.bio: Royal icing recipe and all consistencies neccesary for cookie decorating
objectives: The student will learn how to prepare royal icing and all the consistencies necessary to decorate cookies.
30 minutes
You will need a stand or hand mixer to take this class
At the end of the course you will have the icings ready to decorate cookies
requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
How to make royal icing and all the consistencies / Royal icing cookie decorating basic principles
The royal icing used to be known as the “egg white icing” and it dates back to the 1600’s. It was commonly used to decorate cakes and also was known as “edible glue” due to its quick hard drying properties.

In 1840 this icing changed its name to :”Royal Icing”, when Queen Victoria’s married Prince Albert. It was the first reported wedding cake to be decorated using a white icing and its intricate decoration. This icing was subsequently named Royal Icing in honor of this wedding cake.
I have been using this kind of icing to decorate cookies and over the years I came up with this easy but wonderful recipe.
When you want to decorate cookies, you will need to learn how to make royal icing from scratch and how to accurate prepare all the other consistencies that you will need to decorate cookies and in this course you will learn how to make royal icing step by step throughout a detailed video.  Also I will teach you how to make each of the other consistencies step by step, how to prepare a pastry bag, how to outline and flood a basic cookie.  Let's get started!
target_audience: For all people that want to learn the beautiful art of cookie decorating

requirements: Pelatihan ini dapat diikuti oleh siapapun terutama untuk ibu rumah tangga, pembuat kue, penjual makanan, pekerja kantoran dan para korban PHK. Tingkat kesulitan pelatihan ini adalah tingkat dasar/pemula.
courses.description:
Hai Sobat Ilmu! Pada kalangan masyarakat saat ini, berbagai jenis dan macam kue, cemilan, makanan dan minuman semakin banyak diperjual belikan. Semakin banyak jenis makanan penutup yang unik dan menarik yang digunakan sebagai ide bisnis makanan pada saat kini.
Pada kelas ini, kalian akan mendapatkan pengetahuan bagaimana cara untuk membuat makanan dan minuman kekinian yang sedang ramai diperbincangkan di tengah masyarakat Akhir-akhir ini. Kelas ini akan diajarkan langsung oleh Celebrity Chef yang terkenal dengan keahliannya serta sudah banyak menangani berbagai klien dari brand ternama, pastinya kelas yang diikuti akan seru dan juga memberikan banyak inspirasi.
Chef Chitra yang memiliki pengalaman yaitu Antrepreneur Femina Magazine, Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation 2013 di Bali, pernah mendapatkan penghargaan Top Chef Guest Judge Sebagai Life Juice Ambassador lalu Chef pemandu pada Masterclass yang diselenggarakan oleh Jakarta Culinary Feastival Ismaya pada tahun 2017 dan 2018. Selain itu chef chitra juga memiliki pengalaman Sebagai Chef di Warung Blanjong Bali dan Vin+ Jakarta, sebagai Chef di Wild Hog Bali dan merupakan Pemilik dari sebuah restoran bakso goreng gajah yang dikenal dengan Bagoja SCBD"
Selain diajarkan langsung oleh seorang trainer yang juga celebrity chef, dengan mengikuti kelas ini kalian juga akan mendapatkan tips and trick bagaimana mempromosikan ide jualan kalian baik melalui sosial media ataupun grabfood ataupun gofood. Yuk, langsung ikut kelasnya sekarang untuk mencari ilmu, sobat!

courses.title: Best Fine Dining Etiquette & Table Manners Etiquette Course
courses.bio: Elevate Your Dining Experience: A Comprehensive Course on Fine Dining Etiquette and Table Manners Etiquette
objectives: Master basic table setting and utensil use for fine dining
Build confidence in social dining situations
Learn to navigate dining challenges with poise
Understand international dining etiquette customs
requirements: No experience need. You will learn everything you need to know
courses.description:
This is a complete course on the guidelines of dining etiquette and table manners.
How you conduct yourself at the dining table can influence others’ perceptions of you, impacting your business and social relationships. Fine Dining Etiquette teaches you dining skills to help you appear more confident and feel more at ease when dining casually or formally, for business or for pleasure.
Do you want to impress that special someone on your dining date or build a special bond with them?
Do you need to up-skill your dining experience to fit into a business social atmosphere?
Well! Then this course is for you.
This program is all about making your fine dining experience comfortable with proper Table Manner Etiquette.
In this course, you will go through the dos and don'ts of dining both on a personal level as well as while dining out with business clients socially.
With this course:
You will be able to define what is fine dining and get an introduction to fine dining.
You will be able to list the cutlery laid out at the table setting and how to recognize the table setting
You will relate to the use of table napkins and the etiquette to be followed
You will be able to differentiate the different types of cutleries or silverware and glassware
You will get a visual demonstration of how to use cutlery while eating and the different styles of eating.
You will get to everything about Wine Etiquette
You will relate to the use of finger bowls and how to use the same with the correct dining etiquette.
You will be able to classify the do's and don'ts at the dining table.
Once you apply the techniques that are outlined in the modules of this course, you will enter through doors that were previously closed to you. Displaying proper etiquette at the dinner table is a valuable asset to have in your personal and professional life. Dining Etiquette is not a display of snobbery and arrogance. It is a tribute to elegance. This course offers valuable insights into the impact of life coaching on this subject.
Bonne appétit!
target_audience: This course on mastering fine dining etiquette is ideal for anyone who wants to improve their dining etiquette skills and feel more confident and comfortable in formal dining settings. It may be especially beneficial for individuals who frequently attend business dinners, social events, or other formal occasions where fine dining etiquette is expected. This course may also be useful for individuals who are planning to travel abroad or work in an international setting where knowledge of dining customs and etiquette is necessary.

courses.title: 初めてのねりきり（実践編）
courses.bio: 実際に季節のねりきり１２個を作ってみましょう！あなたの大切な人に手作り和菓子をプレゼントすることができるようになりますよ！
objectives: 季節のねりきり１２個を作れるようになる。
ねりきり餡作り、色つけ、包あんが上達する。
ねりきり作りの基礎的な技術をマスターする。
requirements: ねりきり餡作り、色粉、道具についての最低限の知識が必要です。ねりきり作りを初めて行う人は「初めてのねりきり（基礎編）」を見ていただくことをおすすめします。
courses.description:
季節のねりきり菓子１２個（１月〜１２月）の作り方をご紹介。動画を見ながら実際に作ってみることで、楽しみながらねりきり作りの基礎を身につけることができます！
各月毎のお菓子作りで学ぶ技法は以下のようになります。
＜菓名＞　　　　　＜使用する技法＞
１月（松の雪）　ー 色つけ、きんとんの植え付け方
２月（小梅）　　 ー 色つけ、包餡あん、まん丸く成形、三角ベラ・丸棒の使い方
３月（春の山）　ー 包餡、布巾絞り（「山」の作り方）
４月（乙女桜）　ー 包餡、もみあげ、花びらの起こし方（桜編）
５月（花菖蒲）　ー 張りぼかし、包餡、もみあげ、布巾絞り（「花芯」の作り方）
６月（四葩の花）ーぼかし、包餡、もみあげ、花びらの起こし方
７月（芙蓉）　　 ー 色つけ、包餡、空洞の作り方
８月（朝顔）　　 ー 色つけ、包餡、星形の作り方、布巾絞り（朝顔編）、シベ、グラス絞り
９月（桔梗）　　 ー 色つけ、包餡、包みぼかし、もみあげ、花びらの起こし方
１０月（姫菊）　ー 色つけ、包みぼかし、包餡、三角ベラの使い方、菊のシベつけ
１１月（紅葉）　ー 色つけ、張りぼかし、もみあげ、葉脈の入れ方
１２月（山茶花）ー色つけ、包みぼかし、包餡、もみあげ、布巾絞り、シベのつけ方

courses.title: All about Beef dishes by Master chef Ahmad
courses.bio: This program covers different recipes based on Beef
objectives: Learn beef based dishes
Learn to make beef burger
Learn to make beef stragnoff
Learn to Make Beed grilled sirloin steak

Introduction: Beef Carpacio with Rocket Salad & Shaved Parmesan

requirements: No experience required to learn this program
courses.description:
This program by Chef Ahmad, our in-house Executive Chef of APCA Malaysia, introduces you to a selection of classic beef dishes, showcasing both international favorites and timeless techniques. Designed to strengthen your skills in handling and cooking beef, this program ensures you can recreate these dishes with confidence. Please note that the entire program or all recipes are tried and tested which ensure that what you learn from the program is something you can easily replecate in your own kitchen. In case you still have any question or doubt then we welcome you to write us and we would be delighted to answer your quesry
Dishes Covered:
Beef Burger – The all-time favorite, juicy and perfectly seasoned.
Beef Carpaccio with Rocket Salad & Shaven Parmesan – A refined Italian classic of thinly sliced beef, balanced with fresh salad and parmesan.
Beef Goulash – A hearty Hungarian stew, slow-cooked with paprika and spices.
Beef Stroganoff – A creamy, comforting Russian-inspired dish with tender strips of beef.
Filet Mignon au Poivre – Premium cut of beef in a rich peppercorn sauce.
Grilled Sirloin Steak – A staple of beef cuisine, grilled to perfection.
Through this program, you’ll gain a deeper understanding of beef’s versatility, from rustic stews to elegant fine-dining preparations.
APCA Chef Online is a platform that digitalizes all of our professional Pastry & Culinary programs, giving you the opportunity to learn recipes by APCA’s renowned chefs in a structured, easy-to-follow way.
Conducted by our in-house pastry & culinary chefs, World Pastry Champions, Asia Pastry Champions, and Master Chefs, this platform brings together some of the best culinary expertise from around the globe—all in one place.
target_audience: This program is suitable for all beginner level and above

courses.title: Discover How to Make Perfect Omelets Every Time
courses.bio: A step by step video and text guide to preparing and cooking delicious omelets fast.
