Knife and cutting board
courses.description:
Learn the Perfect Omelets Every Time or POET Method of cooking delicious world-class omelets.  In this course you're going to learn the fundamentals of cooking professional omelets through step by step video training.
You'll learn basic egg, cheese, timing, and pan skills
How to cook with meat, veggies, and even seafood
How to produce omletets fast and easy
A well crafted omelet will impress and delight a romantic partner, your family, or your customers.  Learn the basics here over the course of a week and reap the rewards for a lifetime.
target_audience: Anyone who loves to cook breakfasts at home or professionally
People who struggle with making omelets turn out like they do at great restaurants

courses.title: Authentic Japanese Home Cooking: Growing Library of Recipes
courses.bio: Learn how to make everything from traditional Japanese recipes to modern fusion style dishes - at home!
objectives: Learn to cook a variety of authentic (and very delicious) Japanese dishes at home
Become familiar with Japanese ingredients and know how to use them
Learn how to make and use dashi (soup base and seasoning powder)
Learn how to make mentsuyu (soup base and multi-purpose sauce)

Soups: Udon Noodle Soup with Ankake Vegetables

requirements: Access to a kitchen with basic kitchen tools and cookware. A food processor or blender is required in some cases.
Specific ingredients will be required, these are available at most Asian grocery stores.
courses.description:
This course is designed to teach you how to make authentic Japanese dishes at home and includes instructions for making essential soup bases and sauces. Whether you are new to Japanese food, a novice in the kitchen or a seasoned pro, this course will get you cooking authentic Japanese food in your kitchen in no time!
This course is open-ended and a new video lecture will be added approximately every week, so please check back often. The goal will be to include 90% of the most common Japanese dishes (with an occasional fusion or Korean dish). Some of the videos are narrated in Japanese (subtitles included) however most are and will be in English.
You will become familiar cooking with key Japanese ingredients such as dashi, soy sauce, mirin, mentsuyu and many more... adding many new flavours and techniques to your cooking repertoire. Pretty much all of the ingredients should be easy to find in any asian food store or online.
For each video lecture, you will be provided with a basic understanding of each recipe and all recipe information will be additionally supplied in pdf format.
Feel free to contact me on Q&A dashboard, I am always available to answer questions!
target_audience: Anyone who is interested in cooking Japanese food

courses.title: Smoked Salmon 101 (Master Class) Secret Recipe

If you have any questions about this course or any step within it feel free to leave your question in the Q&A and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Unfortunately my family and friends took the salmon at the very end so there will be no footage of consuming the smoked salmon.

Thank you so much for checking out this course and have a blessed rest of your day.

courses.title: Moroccan Twist on the Mediterranean Diet
courses.bio: Diversify your Mediterranean diet with these incredibly healthy Moroccan dishes!

Learn how to make chicken tagine with ca: Chicken tagine with carrots and olives with English voive over and subtitles
Learn how to make baked soles with orega: Baked soles with oregano with English voice over and subtitles
Learn how to make beetroot juice: Beetroot juice with English voice over and subtitles
Learn how to make carrot and orange soup: Carrot and orange soup with English voice over and subtitles
Learn how to make vegetable tagine: Vegetable tagine with English voice over and subtitles
Learn how to make kefta tagine (ground b: Kefta tagine (ground beef tagine) with English voice over and subtitles

requirements: No previous knowledge needed
courses.description:
Elevate your Mediterranean diet with healthy and incredibly flavorful Moroccan dishes. An intermediate course for a delicious dietary adventure!
These incredibly delicious meals are staples in the Moroccan culture, so do not hesitate to try them whenever you are!
Follow the course taught by the Dadas (Chefs) in this course, and learn all the tricks to recreating the healthiest yet most delicious Moroccan classics.


The chefs teaching the course are Dadas, who are traditional Moroccan chefs with decades of experience in the field of cooking traditional Moroccan recipes. Many of the Dadas learned the art of Moroccan cooking at a young age from their mothers and grandmothers. Today, these women are head chefs at large catering businesses and famous Moroccan restaurants.
Watch the Dadas cook the dishes in these courses and learn all their secrets for perfecting the recipes at home.


The course includes step by step video tutorials and recipe cards to help you replicate the recipes at home. All videos include English subtitles, with English voice over or original audio (in Moroccan Arabic). All recipe cards are in English, and include measurements in both metric and imperial measurements.


In this class, you will learn how to make the following dishes:
- Moroccan Chicken Tajine with Carrots and Olives
- Moroccan Baked Soles with Oregano
- Moroccan Beetroot Juice
- Moroccan Carrot and Orange Soup


+ Free "Mediterranean Diet Flavors Cookbook" copy, with over 50 Moroccan recipes adapted to the Mediterranean diet, plus a weekly meal plan to get you started on the diet!


Watch the dadas cook these famous dishes, then replicate their techniques to create these delicious and unique dishes at home.
target_audience: Beginner to advanced cooks who are interested in exploring Moroccan cuisine

courses.title: Repostería sin gluten. Pastelería básica gluten free.
courses.bio: Aprendé pastelería sin gluten. Apta para celíacos, rica para todos, fácil y práctica.
objectives: Aprenderemos a realizar distintas preparaciones de pastelería sin gluten de una forma fácil y rápida.
Técnicas básicas de pastelería y repostería sin gluten: masas quebradas, masa batidas livianas, masas batidas pesadas.
Alfajores, galletas,cookies, masitas secas, postres típicos, biscochuelos, pionono, tartas.
Todos los cuidados que tenemos que tener para realizar preparaciones para celíacos.
¿Que es la contaminación cruzada con gluten y cómo evitarla?
Diferenciar celiaquía, intolerancia y sensibilidad.

Teoría, primeros pasos para lograr paste: Bienvenido a mi taller de pastelería sin gluten.
Tips importantes antes de comenzar a cocinar sin gluten.
Galletas y masitas secas sin gluten.
Cookies de frutos secos sin gluten.
Práctica. Masas batidas pesadas sin glut: Budín de zanahoria y naranja sin gluten.
¡REGALO! ¡Receta extra!: ¡REGALO! Receta de mi curso de Panadería fácil gluten free.

requirements: Contar con una cocina donde poder ir practicando las recetas, luego de las clases.
Utilizamos balanza de precisión de cocina para medir nuestros ingredientes.
courses.description:
Realizarás una amplia variedad de preparaciones dulces, con distintas técnicas de repostería que luego podrás aplicar a una infinidad de recetas. Abarcaremos las técnicas básicas de pastelería y la aplicaremos a nuestras preparaciones sin gluten: masas quebradas, método cremado y arenado; masas batidas livianas; masas batidas pesadas; postres típicos; cremas, ganaches y merengue italiano.
Con este curso súper completo estarás altamente calificado, una vez concluído, para realizar una gran variedad de preparaciones de pastelería 100% libres de gluten y aptas para celíacos. Ya que incluye: un componente teórico sobre la contaminación cruzada y como evitarla, y 10 recetas.
Me interesa tanto como a vos que logres resultados óptimos, por lo cual podrás consultarme cuantas veces necesites si te surge alguna duda. ¡Estoy para guiarte y ayudarte!
Las recetas sin gluten que verás en este curso son:
Alfajorcitos de maicena.
Brownie
Budín de zanahoria y naranja.
Brazo gitano.
Torta de chocolate.
Cookies de frutos secos.
Turrón alemán.
Chocotorta.
Galletas y masitas secas.
Lemon pie.
Trataremos temas importantes como:
La contaminación cruzada.
La limpieza necesaria para eliminar el gluten.
Qué hornos utilizar.
Utensilios aptos para la producción.
Celiaquía, intolerancia, sensibilidad y dieta sin gluten.
¡Sin mix comerciales! Hacemos nuestras propias premezclas y combinaciones de harinas. Los principales ingredientes que usamos para esto son:
Almidón de maíz.
Harina de arroz.
Fécula de mandioca.
Leche en polvo ( te enseño como reemplazarla es caso de intolerancia).
Goma xántica o guar.
¡Podés aprender a tu propio ritmo y en tus horarios disponibles! Tenes acceso de por vida a los videos, podrás verlos cuantas veces necesites, pausarlos, y volver a retomar desde los puntos que necesites, en los momentos que vos elijas.
No es necesario que tengas ninguna experiencia previa, ¡con muchas ganas de aprender es suficiente!
target_audience: Personas con intolerancia o sensibilidad al gluten o alergias.
Celíacos.
Dueños o empleados en establecimientos gastronómicos.
Emprendedores que deseen comenzar un negocio de venta de productos sin gluten.
Personas interesadas en eliminar el gluten de su dieta.
Aficionados a la cocina.
Chefs interesados en ampliar sus conocimientos.

courses.title: Buttercream Flower Basics
courses.bio: Buttercream Basics and 7 Buttercream Flower Designs
objectives: Prepare an American Buttercream recipe
Learn several ways to color the buttercream, including a technique to create darker colors without using a large amount of food coloring
Fill and prepare icing bags with little to no mess using simple kitchen supplies
Learn tips and tricks for successful buttercream flower piping
Learn the use of multiple icing tips
Create 7 beautiful buttercream flowers with the addition of several variations

Buttercream Basics: Buttercream Basics #2- Coloring and Bagging the Icing
Buttercream Basics #3- Preparing to Decorate Cupcakes

requirements: No previous cupcake or cake decorating experience required.  This course is designed to be a step by step tutorial for 7 different buttercream flowers plus some variations.
Learners will need the supplies listed in the resource titled "Supplies Needed".  These include icing bags, multiple icing tips, etc.
Students will need the supplies necessary to prepare the American Buttercream recipe.
courses.description:
In this Buttercream Flower Basic series, you will learn how to make the perfect American Buttercream recipe for decorating cupcakes, cakes, and a multitude of baked goods.  From there, we will work step by step through the process of coloring the buttercream, loading it into icing bags with ease and then preparing to decorate your cupcakes.
Section #2 of the series will be a step by step tutorial on how to create 7 different buttercream flower cupcakes with additional variations.  You will learn to create a hydrangea,  leaves, sunflower, rose/rosette, modified daisy/large petal flower,  drop flower/flower pot, ruffle flower, and the more difficult and detailed rose.
This is the perfect series for you if you love to bake and want to take your decorating skills to the next level.  By the end of our series and with a little additional practice, you will be able to impress your friends and family with beautiful floral cupcakes for all of your special events.
This is also the perfect series if you are wanting to start your own home bakery business. The tips and tricks I will share with you can be applied to lots of different designs and will help you to have the basic decorating techniques that can attract customers and increase your sales.
target_audience: Those who are beginning to intermediate cupcake/cake decorators. This course includes all the basics from how to make the perfect buttercream to how to create beautiful baked goods.
Those who love to bake for family and friends but want to take your decorating skills to the next level.
Those who are thinking of starting a home bakery business.  Great recipes are a must but decorating skills will attract customers and increase sales.

courses.title: How To Make Sri Lankan Ground Beef Curry, Sambol & Roti
courses.bio: Learn how to make a full meal including a meat dish, bread and sambol. Your mouth will water as you watch and listen.

Introduction and getting started: Download Recipes - I have found the hard to find items for you!
Add ground meat and let it brown
Juices will come out but we'll dry it out some
Let's talk about coconut milk (or powder)
Adding the curry and heat! Plus, startin: Adding more ingredients and starting on sambol
Coconut Rotis: Getting the roti consistency right, part 2
I'm here for your success! Plus, I want to say thank you!

requirements: Either a mortar and pestle, food processor or blender.  You must have basic kitchenware such as a pot, wooden spoon, cutting knives, etc.
courses.description:
Indulge in the flavors of Sri Lanka with our immersive culinary journey through the art of crafting a delectable Sri Lankan ground beef curry meal, complete with coconut roti and sambol. These dishes encapsulate the essence of Sri Lankan cuisine, where each bite transports you to the vibrant streets and bustling markets of this island nation.


Sri Lankan cuisine, often hailed as a harmonious fusion of Indian and Thai culinary traditions, captivates with its bold flavors and aromatic spices. Picture savory curries infused with the creamy richness of coconut, tantalizing your taste buds with every spoonful.


Born and raised in Sri Lanka before embarking on a journey to Wyoming, I understand the yearning for the flavors of home amidst a new landscape. Through this course, I offer you a guided expedition into the heart of Sri Lankan cooking, sharing my expertise acquired from years of honing these culinary treasures.


Step by step, I'll lead you through the intricacies of crafting a flavorful ground beef curry, the perfect balance of spice and succulence. You'll master the art of coconut roti, a beloved bread that serves as the ideal accompaniment to any Sri Lankan meal. And let's not forget the sambol, a fiery relish that adds a burst of flavor to your plate.


Worried about sourcing ingredients in the United States? Fear not! I've tailored this course to utilize readily available ingredients, ensuring that you can recreate these authentic flavors in your own kitchen.


Should you have any queries or require assistance along the way, rest assured that I'm here to support you through Udemy's convenient question and answer feature.


So, let's roll up our sleeves, ignite the stovetop, and embark on this culinary odyssey together. It's time to bring the taste of Sri Lanka into your home!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to prepare a Sri Lankan meal.

courses.title: Contemporary Neapolitan Pizza by hand - Pizza contemporanea
courses.bio: Neapolitan Pizza at home. Preparing it with a standardized process.
objectives: How to knead contemporary Neapolitan pizza dough by hand.
Come impastare a mano l'impasto per pizza napoletana contemporanea.
What are the deeds and the set of all stages of the process.
Quali sono le gesta e l'insieme di tutte le fasi del processo.
Manipulating a dough with high hydration.
A manipolare un impasto ad alta idratazione.
To learn important details of contemporary dough.
Ad apprendere dettagli importanti dell'impasto contemporaneo.
A standardized process that can be replicated all year round.
Un processo standardizzato e replicabile tutto l'anno.

Preparation of toppings for margherita p: Mozzarella Fior di latte di Agerola and Peeled tomatoes

requirements: A precision scale for weighing brewer's yeast.
Un bilancino di precisione per pesare il lievito di birra.
An oven that reaches at least 400° C (whatever it is)
Un forno che raggiunga almeno i 400° C (qualsiasi esso sia)
A laser pyrometer or cooking thermometer.
Un pirometro laser o un termometro da cucina.
courses.description:
Learn how to cook the homemade and kneaded by hand “Contemporary Neapolitan Pizza”.
Contemporary Neapolitan Pizza differs from the others for a much higher hydration, a lower cooking temperatura and meltable with a bit of “Crispy” and, at the same time, a stringy crumb.
Learn how to cook an high hydration and not sticky dough.
Download PDFs with process’ formulas and percentages.
Simples instructions that will lead you step by step.
For any doubt I will always be available.
In this video course, in addition to learn how to cook a dough with a standardized process, you will see also the Agerola mozzarella fior di latte and the peeled tomatoes preparation to realized a pizza Margherita.
To make this pizza you need four ingredients: flour, water, salt and fresh yeats.




Impara a realizzare la Pizza Napoletana Contemporanea fatta in casa ed impastata a mano.
La Pizza Napoletana contemporanea si differenzia dalle altre per una idratazione molto più alta, una temperatura di cottura più bassa e per una scioglievolezza al morso con un leggero "Crispy" e allo stesso tempo una mollica filante.
Impara a realizzare un impasto ad altra idratazione senza che appiccichi o si strappi.
Scarica i pdf con formule e percentuali del processo.
Istruzioni semplici che ti guideranno passo passo.
Per qualsiasi dubbio prima/dopo il corso sarò sempre a tua disposizione!
In questo corso oltre ad imparare a gestire un impasto diretto con un processo standardizzato, vedrai anche il taglio della mozzarella fior di latte di Agerola e la preparazione dei pomodori pelati per realizzare una pizza Margherita.
Gli ingredienti per realizzare questa pizza sono semplicemente quattro: farina, acqua, sale e lievito di birra fresco.
target_audience: Anyone with the goal of learning how to make a contemporary Neapolitan pizza at home.
Chiunque abbia l'obiettivo di imparare a fare una pizza napoletana contemporanea a casa.

courses.title: Easy Peasy Gluten Free Pizza
courses.bio: Join the pizza revolution! Fast, fun and fuss-free recipes for your best-ever GF pizza.
objectives: Make 5 different kinds of yeasted pizza dough: all vegan & gluten free
Concoct 7 different sorts of pizza sauce - not just tomato!
Explore 9 varieties of naturally gluten free flour.
Discover THE best way to bake your pizza, in four different kinds of oven including wood fired.
Learn just how fast, fun and 'foodie' gluten free pizza can be - then amaze your friends and family.
Gain the insights you need to let your culinary imagination run wild!

Butternut Squash Pizza: Making the Butternut Squash Pizza Dough
Red Lentil Pizza: Making the Red Lentil Pizza Dough
Baking: Ovens & Techniques: Check Out Four Different Types of Pizza Oven
Get the Best from your Domestic Electric Oven
Baking in a Wood Fired Oven
Be Safe: Don't Play with Fire!

requirements: A basic kitchen with an electric oven  is enough.
A ceramic pizza stone or a cast iron pan lid are a big help.
A wood fired oven is a luxury!
This course offers value for all levels, from novice to chef.
courses.description:
This course will revolutionise the way you think about pizza; especially gluten-free!
It delivers professional instruction and original recipes developed, tried and tested by the founders of The Artisan Bakery School.
It enables you to bake foodie-level, gluten-free & vegan pizza that is:
Healthy
Tasty
Beautiful
Super Fast
Absolutely Easy Peasy
Before you start, you print out the downloadable pdf of the comprehensive Course Handbook that's relevant to you. One version shows ingredients measured in grams, the other in cups and spoons.  Then pick a recipe, measure your ingredients and just follow the very simple video instruction.
In the first hands-on section, you learn how to make a Rustic Pizza Dough, and how to measure up a blend to keep in a jar for whenever you want an instant ‘pizza mix’. Demonstrations of Pizza Margharita and Pizza Proscuitto Crudofollow, with full recipes given in the Handbook. Vegan alternatives are also suggested.
The second section shows how to make an incredibly light, golden and tender Butternut Squash Dough, using a flour blend including sorghum, plus sesame oil. Butternut Florentina and Butternut Pepperoni are the topping suggestions, both of which can be made vegan.
Next up is a super-healthy, beetroot and quinoa Purple Queen Dough. Bake it two ways: Auber Genie (baby eggplant) and Spanish Fennel.
In the fourth section, you’ll discover the benefits of red lentil flour; low GI, high protein & fibre, great for potassium and iron. You’ll also discover how to make a Red Lentil Dough that has super lightness and structure and a secret ingredient along with its gorgeous colour. Try it as a Woodlander Pizza (think mushroom selection) or a Super Hot (vegan) Pepperoni
Last but not least of the Five Doughs is the fabulous Pizza Noire, a showstopping charcoal dough, which makes a dramatic foil to Rosemary & Potato or Funky Funghi Pizza.
Full instructions are given for making all the pizza sauces, oils and garnishes, so you can mix and match the recipes to suit your taste; the only limit is your imagination!
And of course, you can check out the videos for our essential pro tips on baking pizza, according to your kind of oven.
Ready to roll up your sleeves and get mixing?
Just click the button to Enroll!


NOTE: All the dough can be kept in the fridge for a couple days before baking. It can also be used for making bread, rolls or dough balls, so it is super-versatile.
target_audience: Pizza lovers of all sorts.
People with gluten allergies / sensitivities.
Vegans: all the doughs are vegan as well as GF, and the toppings can all be modified to suit.
Foodies interested in original pizza recipes.
Anyone wishing to build more nutrition into their diet.

requirements: Ter acesso a internet
courses.description:
O mercado de trabalho é bastante amplo e oferece muitas oportunidades de trabalho, pois existem milhares de casas de carne, açougues em supermercados espalhados por todo o Brasil.
Esse curso é para quem quer iniciar como auxiliar de açougueiro e fazer o atendimento no balcão do açougue, porém não tem noção nenhuma.
Esse curso oferece noções básicas e a fundamentação teórica para iniciar nessa área, além de oferecer um certificado ao final.


Entenda o que faz um auxiliar de açougueiro:
Diariamente atende aos pedidos dos clientes no balcão do Açougue: retira os produtos das câmaras e os disponibiliza em mesas, plataformas e suportes para agilizar o atendimento, acolhe o pedido, corta, moi ou fatia o produto visando minimizar perdas e manter os padrões de qualidade para a satisfação do cliente. Pesa, imprime a etiqueta precificada e embala.

Auxilia o Açougueiro na conferência das peças brutas de carne recebidas dos frigoríficos e seu armazenamento nas câmaras bem como pode atuar, sob sua estrita orientação, na desossa dessas peças realizando procedimentos de menor complexidade ou atividades de apoio, como afiar facões, lavagem de bandejas, por exemplo.

Cuida da organização e limpeza do local (balcão e câmaras frigoríficas) e instrumentos de trabalho removendo lixo e resíduos, higienizando pisos, superfícies e utensílios utilizados, etc. bem como observa os procedimentos de segurança e higiene pessoal no manuseio das carnes e uso apropriado dos EPIs.

Executa outras tarefas relacionadas com o cargo, a critério do superior, como por exemplo seguindo as ordens do gerente.
target_audience: para todos que desejam noções básicas de auxiliar de açougueiro com certificado

courses.title: Alta pastelería, apta y nutritiva. Vegan, gluten-sugar free.
courses.bio: Aprendé pastelería avanzada apta para: celíacos, diabéticos, alimentación biomédica, alimentación vegana y dieta keto.
objectives: Pastelería avanzada apta para patologías alimentarias: celíacos, diabéticos, alimentación biomédica.
Pastelería avanzada para dietas especiales: alimentación vegana, dieta cetogénica.
Identificación y utilización de ingredientes saludables y nutritivos.
Utilización de materias grasas saludables.
Reemplazo de azúcares por endulzantes naturales.
Reemplazo de harinas de cereales, por aquellas de frutos secos, legumbres o semillas.

Introducción. ¿Que tenemos que saber ant: ¡Bienvenida! Te cuento que temas principales trabajaremos en este curso.
Torta clásica de banana y crema de pistachos.
Alfajores helados de remolacha, piña y banana.
Torta mousse de chocolate blanco y mango.
Torta mousse de frutos rojos y chocolate.

¡Que alegría haberte acompañado en un curso más!

requirements: Utensilios necesarios para realizar este curso: balanza de precisión de cocina, procesadora, o mixer, o minipimer.
Debido a que este curso es de pastelería avanzada, se requiere experiencia previa en pastelería, con o sin gluten.
courses.description:
Este curso será una experiencia única para tus sentidos. Te invito a descubrir sabores y texturas que aún no conocías y a sorprenderte con los postres de calidad excepcional que vamos a lograr juntas.
Nos enfocamos en una pastelería de alta calidad e  inclusiva que podamos disfrutar todos juntos, nutriendo y cuidando nuestro cuerpo.


Las preparaciones nutritivas y aptas para todos que verás en este curso son:


Cheesecake de coco.
Tiramisú vegano.
Alfajores crocantes de nuez.
Torta clásica de pistachos.
Torta mousse de chocolate blanco y mango.
Brownie húmedo y chocolatoso de porotos negros.
Alfajores helados de remolacha, piña y banana.
Parfait de crema de limón y pudding de chocolate.
Mini budines de calabaza rellenos.
Torta mousse de chocolate y frutos rojos.


Trataremos temas importantes como:


El reemplazo de azúcares refinadas y grasas no saludables.
Cómo lograr una pastelería de alta calidad, cuidando la presentación.
Harinas especiales sin gluten y nutritivas, cómo alternativa a las tradicionales.


¡Sin mix comerciales! Hacemos nuestras propias premezclas y combinaciones de harinas. Los principales ingredientes que usamos para esto son:


Frutos secos: nueces, almendras, castañas de cajú, avellanas, maní.
Frutos desecados:  ciruelas, pasas de uva, higos.
Harinas de semillas: lino, chía, amaranto.
Harinas proteícas de legumbres o pseudocereales: garbanzos, lentejas, lupino, sarraceno, teff, quinoa.
Goma xántica, guar o psyllium.


(No te preocupes si no conseguís alguno de los ingredientes mencionados, podremos ver juntas que opciones locales tenés para reemplazarlo.)


¡Podés aprender a tu propio ritmo y en tus horarios disponibles! Tenes acceso de por vida a los videos, podrás verlos cuantas veces necesites, pausarlos, y volver a retomar desde los puntos que necesites, en los momentos que vos elijas.


Me interesa tanto como a vos que logres resultados óptimos, por lo cual podrás consultarme cuantas veces necesites si te surge alguna duda. ¡Estoy aquí para guiarte y ayudarte!
target_audience: Aficionados a la cocina o a la pastelería.
Cocineros o chefs que buscan expandir sus conocimientos y aprender sobre dietas especiales.
Emprendedores que buscan opciones aptas y de alta calidad para distintas patologías y dietas especiales.
Todos aquellos interesados en mejorar la calidad de su alimentación, volviéndola más nutritiva y sana.

courses.title: All About Eggs by APCA chef online
courses.bio: This program covers different form of eggs based dishes by APCA chef online
objectives: Learn all about Eggs
Learn to make egg based dishes
Learn about egg based recipes
Learn about egg based selection of dishes
requirements: This program does not need any prerequisite any kind
courses.description:
Eggs – A Culinary Foundation
Eggs are one of the most versatile foods in the kitchen. They can be prepared in countless ways, including boiling (soft, medium, or hard), frying (sunny-side up, over easy/medium/hard), scrambling, and poaching. Beyond that, eggs play a vital role as an ingredient in dishes like omelets, frittatas, quiches, pastries, and baked goods.
Program Highlight – Chef Ahmad, Executive Chef, APCA Malaysia
In this dedicated program, Chef Ahmad demonstrates different egg techniques, ensuring that the learning experience is smooth, clear, and easy for students to follow.
This Cooking of Eggs Compilation video showcases classic egg preparations that every chef should master.
Featured Egg Preparations
Egg Mimosa – Hard-boiled eggs with yolks removed, mixed with mayonnaise & chili powder, then piped back into the whites.
Egg Salad – Chopped boiled eggs, served on a bed of lettuce as a refreshing side option.
Egg Sandwich – Mashed boiled eggs combined with mayonnaise, dill, and mustard, served between slices of bread.
French Toast – Raisin bread coated in an egg mixture, pan-toasted, and served with cinnamon powder & icing sugar.
Orange Crêpe – Classic thin French pancake rolled or folded with spreads.
Orange Pancake – Light and fluffy buttermilk pancake, often served with maple syrup and fresh fruits.
Poached Egg Florentine – Toasted English muffin layered with spinach and turkey bacon, topped with a soft poached egg and finished with hollandaise sauce.
Scrambled Eggs – Whisked whole eggs with cream, cooked gently while stirring; served either moist or dry.
Spanish Egg Frittata – A hearty Spanish-style omelets filled with vegetables, slowly cooked until firm, and served as a whole round.
This program not only introduces students to the culinary science of eggs, but also helps them practice precision, timing, and technique—skills essential for professional kitchens.
target_audience: This program is for everyone who wish to learn about eggs

This is a course where you will learn several recipes making use of summer vegetables and the dishes are cooked using a microwave pressure cooker. The recipes in this course have a star ingredient - the bitter melon. This course was made during our stay in Okinawa Prefecture in Japan which has plenty of bitter melon. The place has inspired us to make this course and we are very happy to share the recipes to everyone.
This course has inspired me to eat more vegetables and appreciate the taste. The recipes are fun to make because there's so much colors involved. The resulting dishes are also tasty and delicious. If you're looking for ways how to serve more vegetables in the table, this course might just be a good start.
Everyone is invited to take this course. Cooking process are much faster for every dish because I've made use of a microwave pressure cooker. Just put everything inside the bowl, microwave and you're done. Hello to a stress-free and hassle-free meal cooking time. An added advantage is that there are no greasy pans to clean after dinner time.
Happy cooking!

courses.title: Learn how to make Arabic Eastern Sweets Kunafa /Konafa كنافة
courses.bio: Learn how to make the most famous Arabic Palestinian -Nabuls- Eastern/Oriental Sweets Kunafa/Konafa in simple way

Making best soft Konafa , Kunafa , كنافة: Promotional video of making Arabic Eastern Sweets Kunafa / Konafa
Make Kunafa with white sweet cheese
summary of making kunafa with white sweet cheese
Summary of Making Kunafa with cream
Make soft dough of Kunafa ,konafa ,كنافة: Summary of Making soft dough of Konafa

requirements: No ,It is a comprehensive course
courses.description:
people or students of this course will be able to make delicious Arabic middle east Palestinian Kunafa sweets -which considered as the most famous cultural Palestinian sweets- to their families and friends in professional way and by using available materials existing at every home in addition they will be able to make an soft Konafa Dough which not existing in every country.
The history of kunafa dates back to thousands of years, when it was cooked for the sultans and rulers in the Levant during the blessed month of Ramadan because of its distinctive taste in addition to being full of energy and in addition to its distinctive appearance that opens the appetite.
The recipe for kunafa was transmitted from one generation to another in the Middle East, the Levant in the past until it reached us as shown in the course that you will see in my videos, which will guarantee you the original and real taste of these very delicious sweets.
In the first section, we will explain how to make kunafa with cheese, which is the most common in the Middle East region because it is the best, in addition to a summary of how it works.
In the second section, it will be explained how to make kunafa with cream, and it is very tasty compared to the rest of the sweets, but it remains at a lower level than kunafa with cheese. In addition to that, there is a summary of how to make kunafa with cream.
In the third section, we will explain how to make the soft kunafa dough, which is not present in all countries of the world, in order to ensure your unique and complete experience.
target_audience: everyone interested in midle east arabic culture and food.
everyone visit to middle east or palestine and eat the famous sweets Nabulsi Kunafa.
everyone want to experiance middle east sweets

courses.title: Italian Fresh Pasta Making, Ravioli & Sauces Cooking Class
courses.bio: Create delicious homemade pasta from scratch and turn it into fettuccine, pappardelle, herb-infused pasta and ravioli. P
objectives: Preparing beautiful homemade pasta dough

Learning the correct technique of making Ravioli
Prepare two delicious Italian sauces to accompany your pasta creations
Learn to perfect your pasta cooking and serving skills, just like a true Italian

Making Fresh Pasta: Fettuccine & Pappardelle and Cooking the Pasta.

requirements: No previous experience required.
courses.description:
Ciao and welcome to the Fresh Pasta and Sauces Cooking Class.
Join us in this jam packed and fun masterclass where you’ll learn to make beautiful handmade pasta like fettuccine, pappardelle and a herb-infused variation. You’ll then take your pasta-making skills to the next level to create perfect ravioli.
In addition to mastering pasta, you'll learn to prepare two sensational sauces: a slow-cooked beef ragu, rich and hearty, and a creamy Boscaiola  sauce, that takes flavour to another level.  Both sauces are sure to become favourites in your recipe repertoire.
I’m Antonella, your Italian Chef and Food Coach and I’m here to guide you in discovering the true essence of Italian cooking through essential techniques and flavour-building secrets.
Whether you’re new to cooking or wanting to refine your skills, this masterclass covers everything you need to know about pasta, including the techniques of cooking pasta to the correct way to serve pasta.
Enjoy the flexibility of this prerecorded video to learn at your own pace on your schedule! Whether you prefer to watch it all first or cook along with me, the choice is yours. Feel free to stop, replay, and watch as many times as you need. Download the recipes, ingredient list, and equipment checklist to ensure you’re fully prepared before diving in.
With my Italian heritage, professional chef training, and 18 years of teaching experience, I’m eager to share everything I know. So, bring your passion for Italian cuisine and eagerness to learn, and I promise to help elevate your culinary skills. Students often say they receive more than expected, and I'm thrilled to share it with you.
This masterclass is one of a ‘six-module series’ taking you from antipasto to dolce. Each module is filled with tips and techniques to help you confidently recreate authentic dishes at home.
If you have any questions, I’m here to help guide you and make your experience a good one!
I’m so excited, let’s get started!
Chef Antonella x
target_audience: Suitable for beginners to confident cooks, this class is perfect for those looking to achieve authentic Italian flavours and learn to make beautiful fresh pasta that family and friends will love.

requirements: No prior skills or experience required. This course is designed for beginners and parents who want to introduce their kids to healthy cooking.
Students will need basic kitchen equipment including a freezer, a blender, and standard cooking utensils.
To create the dishes featured in this course, you will need a diverse assortment of fruits and vegetables at their disposal.
courses.description:
Welcome to the first module of a culinary adventure that not only nourishes your family but also ignites a passion for plant-based cooking in your child's heart! Dive into the enticing world of plant-based foods and uncover their powerful health benefits with our 'Tiny Green Chef' course.
Designed specifically for kids (aged roughly 4 to 13) and their families, our course ensures quick, easy, and delectable meals while continuously stoking your child's culinary curiosity. It's not just about teaching your little ones what to eat, but why they should choose wholesome, plant-based foods – building their appreciation for nutritious choices from the get-go.
Module 1 lays the groundwork for this enlightening journey. With engaging video lessons, interactive activities, and immersive cooking exercises, young chefs will explore the wonders of a plant-based diet and acquire vital kitchen skills. They'll go from learning about nutritious ingredients to whipping up their own simple, scrumptious plant-based recipes.
We don't just stop at cutting, peeling, and measuring. Your child will learn how to assemble an entire meal – from appetizers to desserts! And to add an element of fun, we've also included 5 engaging kitchen science experiments along with enlightening mini-health lessons and quirky food facts.
By the end of this module, your child will have the skills to create 5 easy yet incredibly flavorsome and healthy meals, and you'll have a budding chef adding a dash of joy to your kitchen routines. So, are you ready to empower your child with a lifetime of wholesome cooking habits and delightful kitchen adventures?

This course uses 100% whole plant-based foods and no processed foods. It's gluten-free, soy-free, and allergy-friendly. This is the first of four modules.
target_audience: Calling all food-loving families and young culinary explorers aged 4-13! This course is tailor-made for those eager to embark on a flavorful journey into the world of healthy, plant-based foods. If you're curious about making nutrition a joy-filled adventure, and excited to weave wholesome, plant-based ingredients into your family's meals, this course is your perfect companion. Let's get ready to turn mealtime into a fun-filled exploration of taste, health, and creativity!

お酢: 酢酸菌の種類、酢の歴史

requirements: 誰でも受講できます
courses.description:
こんにちは！


発酵・調味料教室 ‐Simple Brew Life‐　はやかわです。


普段は、発酵食のスペシャリストとして、発酵の知識や基本調味料の選び方をお伝えする講座や
発酵食を仕込むワークショップ、発酵を取り入れた離乳食（補完食）の講座などを開催しています。




そしてこのたび、
家にいながら発酵の知識が学べる【動画で学べる発酵食講座】の教材をリリースさせていただくことになりました！


＊こんな講座です＊




・発酵食のはじめ方からスペシャリストになるまでの深い知識が身につく動画講座です。


・基本的な発酵の知識から仕込み方法や活用方法まで、初心者の方にもわかりやすく説明します。


・マニアックな微生物の知識や、コアな発酵調味料の活用法まで学べるので、ある程度の知識はあるけど
もっと深く学びたいという方にもおすすめです。


・発酵のメカニズムを知ることによって、育てている発酵調味料のお手入れやトラブル対策に役立ちます。


・なぜ発酵食は体に良いのか？ どういった理由で良いのか？　どのように摂り入れていけば良いのか？
知れば納得、目からうろこの情報が盛りだくさんです。




＊こんな方におすすめの講座です＊




・発酵食をはじめてみたいけど、何から手を付けていいかわからない。


・発酵食ってなにがどういいの？健康効果や美容効果について知りたい。


・菌や発酵の過程について、詳しい知識を身に着けたい。


・発酵調味料をいろいろ仕込んで、家庭での料理に役立てたい。


・発酵食のワークショップなどを開いてみたい。


全くの初心者の方から、教室を開けるくらいの深い知識まで、基礎からしっかりと学んでいただけます。


● 全９項目のコンテンツを、すべて動画で分かりやすく解説。






＊カリキュラム＊




① 発酵基礎
② 甘酒
③ ぬか床
④ 納豆
⑤ 醤油
⑥ 味噌
⑦ 醤（ひしお）
⑧ 酢
⑨ 発酵補完食（離乳食）










● １項目につき、２～４本の動画で解説
（１項目トータル２時間程度の動画）








免疫力のアップには発酵食品！


今日から発酵食を取り入れて、健康的な食生活を楽しみましょう♪
target_audience: 発酵食に興味がある方

courses.title: Indian Cooking:Restaurant Style King Prawn Biryani Course
courses.bio: Authentic Techniques & Secrets to Crafting Perfect Prawn Biryani Every Time
objectives: Master Authentic Biryani Preparation: Learners will be able to cook traditional prawn biryani using expert techniques.
Enhance Spice and Ingredient Knowledge: Understand how to select, blend, and balance spices for a rich biryani masala while using fresh ingredients to elevate
Perfect Rice and Prawn Cooking Techniques: Gain skills to cook basmati rice to the perfect consistency and prawns to a tender, juicy texture without over cook.
Create Custom Biryani Variations: Learn to adapt recipes to suit different regional styles, spice levels, and dietary preferences for the perfect experience.

Introduction: 16.Essential Shopping Tips for King Prawn Biryani Ingredients

requirements: Ingredients Availability: Ability to source fresh prawns, basmati rice, spices, and other essential ingredients from local markets or online stores.
Basic Cooking Skills: Familiarity with simple kitchen tools and basic cooking techniques (e.g., chopping, sautéing) is helpful but not mandatory.
Kitchen Equipment: Access to essential kitchen equipment like a stove, cooking pots, knives, mixing bowls, and a rice strainer.
Enthusiasm to Learn: A passion for cooking and willingness to experiment with flavors will greatly enhance the learning experience.
No Advanced Culinary Skills Required: The course is designed for beginners and experienced cooks alike.
courses.description:
Master the Art of Prawn Biryani
Embark on a culinary journey to master one of South Asia's most iconic and flavorful dishes — the prawn biryani. Whether you're a home cook eager to delight your family, a food enthusiast passionate about authentic Indian cuisine, or a professional chef looking to perfect your technique, this course offers everything you need to create mouth-watering prawn biryani every time.
What You'll Learn:
Step-by-step instructions for preparing traditional prawn biryani.
Mastering the art of balancing spices for a perfectly aromatic masala.
Techniques to cook fluffy, non-sticky rice and tender, juicy prawns.
Tips for layering ingredients for maximum flavour and visual appeal.
Customizing recipes to create regional biryani variations.
Course Highlights:
Hands-on lessons with clear demonstrations and practical tips.
Insight into selecting the freshest ingredients and key kitchen tools.
Troubleshooting common mistakes and perfecting your biryani skills.
Expert advice on presentation and serving techniques.
By the end of this course, you'll have the confidence to create prawn biryani that rivals any restaurant dish and the skills to craft variations to suit your taste. Whether for a casual dinner or a festive celebration, you'll be prepared to impress with every plate.
No prior culinary experience is necessary — just a passion for cooking and a love for bold, delicious flavours!
target_audience: Home Cooks: Individuals looking to elevate their cooking skills and master the art of prawn biryani.
Food Enthusiasts: Anyone passionate about Indian cuisine and eager to explore authentic recipes and techniques.
Beginner & Intermediate Cooks: Learners at all skill levels, from those new to biryani to those seeking to perfect their method.
Professional Chefs & Caterers: Culinary professionals seeking to expand their menu offerings or refine their biryani-making techniques.
Seafood Lovers: Anyone who enjoys seafood and wants to incorporate prawns into a delicious, flavorful rice dish.
Global Cuisine Explorers: Food lovers from around the world interested in mastering an iconic South Asian dish.

courses.title: Introdução aos cafés especiais
courses.bio: Mini-curso para amantes de café, curiosos ou baristas iniciantes.
objectives: O que é um café especial
Quais são os atributos de qualidade em café
Como comprar um café de qualidade
Como preparar café de qualidade em casa

Café é Planta!: A Origem do Café: da África ao Brasil
O que é um café de qualidade: Tripé sensorial dos cafés de qualidade: Doçura, Acidez, Corpo
+ propriedades organolépticas: Aromas - positivos e negativos
Como preparar cafés de qualidade em casa: Variáveis: Tempo de extração x infusão

requirements: Ter curiosidade pelo mundo do café especial e pré-disposição para aprender sobre esse maravilhoso universo
Um adicional para aproveitar o curso é separar o seguinte material didático: 1 limão, sal, açúcar, 1 saquinho de chá de boldo, carqueja ou mate e um pouco de vinagre. =)
courses.description:
Sempre há tempo da gente fazer melhores escolhas e preparar o nosso café do dia a dia com mais técnica e conhecimento.


Nesse mini-curso online, em até 02 horas, você vai aprender:
* O que é um café de qualidade
* Quais são os atributos de qualidade em café
* Como escolher um café mais gostoso para tomar na sua casa
* Como fazer um café melhor: água, métodos, proporções, etc.


Quem ministra o curso?
Meu nome é Luiza Burleigh e sou especialista em cafés de qualidade, instrutora, curadora de conteúdo e de experiências com café, ministro treinamentos e oficinas para profissionais e amantes dessa bebida. Sou também bacharel em hotelaria pelo Senac-SP e barista formada pela Isabela Raposeiras desde 2004, tendo ministrado aulas pelo Coffee Lab (SP) por mais de seis anos, incluindo os cursos barista júnior, sênior e avançado, torra júnior, sênior e master, drinques com café, métodos de preparo avançado, dentre outros. Sou formada pelo Sindicafé (SP) no curso "Neurociência: Percepção Multissensorial de Sabor" ministrado pela doutora em neurociência Fabiana Carvalho e pela especialista em análise sensorial Camila Archanjo (2018) e no curso “Introdução aos Cafés Especiais” na Metodologia SCA (Garam Um, Um Coffee Co. SP). Sou estudante de alimentação e fui ouvinte nas disciplinas de História da Alimentação pela FFLCH - USP (2018), participando dos Simpósios sobre Pesquisa em Alimentação I (2018) e II (2019) e atualmente sou pós-graduanda em Gastronomia: História e Cultura pelo Senac-SP.
target_audience: Qualquer um que deseje preparar um café melhor em casa, amantes de café, curiosos e baristas iniciantes.

courses.description:
Welcome to another delicious sandwich making cooking class. In this course, you will be presented with several sandwich toast recipes where you and the whole family will enjoy. The recipes were made with so much fun. The recipes are perfect for breakfast or snacks because it is very quick and easy. The ingredients used are the ones usually on the fridge so you can do it on the go.
There are many creative ideas to level up your regular sandwich toasts and you can pick up some of it in this course. You will learn some innovative ways of cooking your french toasts as well as making the perfect grilled cheese sandwich toast. You will also learn some ways on how to make your sandwich less boring and much healthier by adding fruits.
The cooking videos are very clear and fun to watch. We've made sure that you will not be bored while you watch how to cook the sandwich toasts. I'm sure everyone will enjoy.
Happy cooking!
target_audience: If you are looking for sandwich maker recipes, which are delicious and easy to prepare then, this course is for you.
If you want to have new ideas for breakfast, lunch or snack then you might want to check out the recipes in this course.

courses.title: Vegan Thai Cooking Course 2
courses.bio: Vegan Thai cooking for home cooks & chefs taught by Chef Dao of Thai Chef School in Bangkok, fun teacher of Thai cooking
objectives: Learn about Thai ingredients
Master preparation of popular Thai dishes prepared in vegan manner
Learn basic Thai cooking skills
Learn how to work with a wok, steamer, granite mortar & pestle
Learn how to prepare from scratch vegan Thai pastes, dips, and sauces
requirements: Course is designed for all skill levels.  No matter your skill level, you will learn more.
Just bring your desire to learn how to prepare tasty vegan Thai dishes
courses.description:
HAVE FUN LEARNING TO "COOK LIKE A THAI VEGAN"
with Chef Dao & Thai Chef School
DO YOU WANT TO "COOK LIKE A THAI VEGAN"?
Join this fun culinary adventure with me in my second Thai vegan cooking course, and experience the fun and exotic world of authentic vegan Thai cooking. Master 9 popular vegan Thai dishes plus many Thai cooking skills, dips, sauces, and pastes. Experience the beauty of Thai dishes when properly cooked, plated, lighted, and recorded. I also have more Thai cooking courses in Udemy. Please check them out too.
HAVE FUN LEARNING
Enjoy my fun, relaxed teaching style which comes from years of experience teaching students in Bangkok. Relax, laugh, cook, and eat the best tasting Thai dishes--GUARANTEED!
MORE FOR YOUR MONEY
1. 4 hours 45 minutes of fun vegan learning (compare and see for yourself)
2. Learn how to make the 5 flavors of Thai cooking
3. Learn basic Thai cooking skills and techniques, including making tofu from scratch
4. Learn 9 popular Thai vegan dishes from scratch
ENHANCED QUALITY
Using HD quality video recording equipment, professional lighting, skilled photographers, and good English, we endeavor to present the very best viewing presentation possible. Compare for yourself.
IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU?
This course is taught by Chef Dao, a professional culinary instructor at Thai Chef School (an online culinary training school with Diploma) and Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy (in person training) in Bangkok for both beginners and professionals. Learn from a fun teacher used to teaching all skill levels the ins and outs of Thai cooking. Each dish is taught in 4 video segments (total about 20 minutes each):
1. Thai ingredients discussion with pictures
2. Preparation of all ingredients for cooking
3. Professional chef cooking demonstration
4. Food plating techniques
WHAT WILL YOU LEARN FROM THIS COURSE?
Familiarity with Thai ingredients
Mastery of selected popular vegan dishes, dips, sauces, pastes
Achievement of correct Thai flavors, aroma, and appearance
Proper use of Thai cookware--woks, granite mortar & pestle, steamers
AND lots of fun and laughter.
WHO IS CHEF DAO?
I am a native of northeast Thailand, where my love for cooking was nurtured by my grandmother in her kitchen. After receiving my degree in Accounting, I moved to Bangkok. There I soon realized my love was for cooking and eating beans and not in counting them! To expand my culinary skills, I enrolled in Le Cordon Bleu where I learned Western cooking and basic culinary skills. After graduation, I then enrolled in Dusit Thani Culinary College to further my Thai cooking knowledge.
For the past 6 years, I have been fortunate to work as a professional culinary instructor at Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy and Thai Chef School, leading Thai cooking schools in Bangkok. During this time, I taught Thai cooking to many tourists as well as professional culinary students (aspiring chefs, yacht chefs, executive chefs) from around the world in weeklong private training courses. Additionally, I am a master fruit carver and a team building specialist.
I love eating, cooking, and teaching Thai cooking (oh, and my son too). Please join me and let's have fun learning together.
BANGKOK THAI COOKING ACADEMY (in person training) & THAI CHEF SCHOOL (online training with diploma)
In affiliation with these cooking schools, this course relies on tried and proven recipes and teaching techniques developed over 10 years and taught to thousands of students in Bangkok. We teach Thai cooking to beginners and professionals alike. Please feel free to visit our websites.
OUR PROMISE TO YOU
My instruction is fun, clear, and easy to follow. Vegan recipes are designed to create authentic tasting dishes. Videos are filmed in HD and well-lighted. Sound is good and English is good. Beautiful presentation of dishes is emphasized. If you have any questions about the course content, please post a question or send a direct message to me. I will answer your message promptly.
CHEF DAO
JUST CLICK THE ENROLL BUTTON, AND I'LL SEE YOU IN LECTURE #1.
target_audience: Home cooks learn to master tasty vegan Thai dishes
Professional cooks and chefs improve your culinary skills and knowledge of vegan Thai cooking

courses.title: SIMPLE GUMPASTE ROSE EDIBLE FLOWER
courses.bio: Introduction to gum paste and tools, making the rose bud and bloom and lastly assembling the rose.
objectives: Understanding the properties of sugar gum paste: Students will learn about the unique properties of sugar gum paste, including its pliability and durability.
Techniques for shaping and molding: Students will learn various techniques for shaping and molding the sugar gum paste rose to create realistic-looking petals.
The importance of color: Students will learn how to color the sugar gum paste using edible food coloring to create a range of hues and shades of a rose flower.
Assembly and finishing: Students will learn how to assemble the sugar gum paste pieces into a realistic-looking rose flower.
Attention to detail: Students will learn the importance of paying attention to even the smallest details, such as the shape of the petals and stamen placement.
Creativity: Finally, students will have the opportunity to exercise their creativity and experiment with different colors, shapes, and sizes of sugar roses.

More Petals For the full bloom

requirements: Learning how to make sugar gum paste rose flowers requires time, patience and practice.
courses.description:
In this course, students will learn how to make realistic-looking sugar gum paste rose flowers. They will learn the basics of handling gum paste and will develop skills in molding, shaping, and assembling petals to create a lifelike rose bloom.
Throughout the course, students will learn a range of techniques, from rolling and cutting gum paste to adding details like dusting powders and glitter. Students will be encouraged to experiment with color, texture, and design to create unique and personalized sugar gum paste rose flowers.
The course will cover the following topics:
Introduction to gum paste and tools
Forming the rose bud
Making the rose bloom
Assembling the rose
Adding details like stem, leaves, and dusting powders
Course Objectives: By the end of the course, students will be able to:
Create a realistic-looking sugar gum paste rose flower from start to finish
Handle gum paste and use a range of tools to shape and mold petals
Experiment with color, texture, and design to create unique and personalized flowers.
Overall, this course is ideal for beginners who are interested in learning the art of sugar gum paste rose flower making, as well as for those who have some experience with cake decoration and want to expand their skill set.
target_audience: The sugar gum paste rose flower course can be learned by anyone who is interested in cake decorating, whether they are beginners or experienced decorators.

requirements: Temelden başlayan bir eğitim olup hiçbir gereksinime ihtiyaç yoktur.
Not alarak çalışmak isteyenler bir kağıt ve kalem kullanarak daha iyi öğrenebilirler
courses.description:
Bu kursta yemek yapımı bilgisi verilecek olup aynı zamanda mutfakta kullanılabilecek birçok püf noktaları verilecektir. Temelden başlayarak profesyonelliğe doğru eğitim ilerleyecek olup şef, aşçı, pastacı olmak isteyenlerin bir kaynağı olacaktır. Zamanla bu kursa gıda katkı maddeleri, özel gıdalar, servis teknikleri, menü planlama, dünya mutfakları, ekmek çeşitleri ve üretim teknikleri, temel pastacılık, yaş pasta yapımı, özel gün pastası yapımı, restoran işletmeciliği, içkiler gibi birçok eğitim eklenecek olup kurs bu sayede zengin bir eğitime sahip olacaktır. Kursa aynı zamanda sorular da eklenip anlatılanların pekişmesi için soru çözme özelliği de eklenecek olup yiyecek ve içecek sektöründe profesyonelliğe doğru hızlı ve etkili adımlar atılmış olacaktır. Kursa siz değerli eğitim alan arkadaşlarımızın isteklerine göre farklı eğitimler ve öğretme metodları, videolar hazırlanacak olup ülkemizde hızla popülerleşen ve geleceğin mesleği olan yiyecek içecek sektöründeki aşçılık ve gastronomi mesleklerinde çalışacak bilgili kişiler yetiştirilmesi sağlanmış olacaktır. Kursa aynı zamanda başka ülkelerde çalışma hedefi olan arkadaşlar için de kursa mesleki ingilizce dersleri de kursu alacak olan kişilerin isteğine bağlı olarak eklenecektir. requirements: Para la realización de este curso (Alimentos y Emociones) no ser requieren grandes conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0.

El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Alimentos y Emociones
Entiende el porqué de tus deseos y antojos alimenticios. Consigue una alimentación que ayude a equilibrar tus emociones.
Instructores: María Salguero y Álvaro García Actualizado:  Agosto del 2025 Estudiantes: +3.200 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:


Descubre cómo mejorar tu relación con la comida con “Alimentos y Emociones”: aprende a diferenciar hambre real vs. hambre emocional, identificar desencadenantes de antojos y crear hábitos conscientes que reduzcan el picoteo impulsivo. Con herramientas de mindful eating, planificación sencilla y estrategias de gestión del estrés, transformarás tus rutinas sin dietas estrictas ni culpa.
Este curso en Udemy, apto para todas las edades y niveles, te guía paso a paso para diseñar un plan de alimentación equilibrado que apoye tu bienestar emocional: menús prácticos, combinaciones que sacian, rituales de autocuidado y técnicas para regular antojos en momentos clave. Gana claridad, constancia y energía diaria con una alimentación más consciente y amable contigo.
En este curso descubrirás como tener una alimentación que ayude a equilibrar tus emociones, el porqué de tus deseos y antojos con respecto a un alimento, un sabor o una textura en particular. Con este curso conseguirás reconocer tus carencias nutricionales, energéticas, sensoriales y emocionales que te hacen tener distintos antojos sin poder controlarlo.
Aprenderás a compensar con una alimentación mucho más saludable y así poder controlar tus antojos a largo plazo sin sufrir. Los alimentos que comemos todos los días afectan a nuestro estado emocional. Conocer qué efectos tienen los diferentes alimentos en ti, te ayuda a saber cuándo y por qué debes evitar ciertos alimentos o incorporar otros, según lo que necesites en cada momento.
Este curso está pensado para ofrecerte herramientas de auto-conocimiento que faciliten la gestión de tus emociones a través de los alimentos que comes todos los días. “Lo que comemos afecta a nuestras emociones y nuestras emociones determinan en muchas ocasiones lo que comemos. Es una relación en doble dirección.”


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a Udemy y al Curso
Recursos para el Alumno del Curso
Alimentos y Emociones
Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Alimentos y Emociones"


Objetivos del curso
Comprenderás la diferencia entre hambre real y hambre emocional, identificarás disparadores de antojos, y aplicarás mindful eating para comer con calma. Diseñarás tu plan de alimentación equilibrado, con rutinas simples (planificación, batch cooking, entorno alimentario, autocuidado) y métricas para sostener hábitos.


Salidas profesionales
Lo aprendido potencia tu perfil en bienestar y educación alimentaria: creación de contenidos, talleres básicos, atención en hostelería saludable o apoyo en programas corporativos de hábitos. Ideal para complementar trabajos en fitness, coaching, pedagogía o community management de salud y estilo de vida.


Dirigido a
Personas que desean mejorar su relación con la comida, gestionar el estrés y los antojos y ganar constancia sin dietas rígidas; familias, estudiantes y profesionales con poco tiempo. También para quienes buscan alimentación consciente y herramientas prácticas para equilibrar emociones en el día a día.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Personas que deseen no solo mejorar su forma de alimentarse sino que quieran mejorar la relación emocional que tienen con el alimento así como entender sus antojos y deseos por ciertos alimentos.
No son necesarios conocimientos previos.

courses.title: Understanding Scotch Whisky
courses.bio: An introduction to Scotch Whisky from grain to glass.
objectives: Understanding how Scotch Whisky is made
How to evaluate Scotch Whisky
What makes one whisky different from another
Find your own palate and learn what you like

Evaluation and Appreciation: Tasting Session 1 and About Your Whisky Kit

requirements: No experience required, just passion.
courses.description:
Have you been curious but intimidated by Scotch Whisky? Do those words conjure up images of old geezers in stodgy private drawing rooms in Scottish castles? Is Scotch what your Grandpa drank but not your dad? Are you sure all Scotch is loaded with stinky peat smells? Well, Scotch is much more than this!
From the team at the Alcohol Education Alliance, join us in a lecture based discussion followed by a tasting of one of the world's favorite spirits, Scotch Whisky. We'll dive a little bit into the history of Scotch, also learn about fermentation and distillation methods, continue on to explore labeling requirements and relative style, and then we'll taste a number of styles together for those who have purchased the optional tasting kit.
By the end, you'll understand how the still shape, number of distillations, choice of raw materials, use of peat and choice of Bourbon or Sherry barrels all impact the final flavors in the bottle. Just by smelling a glass you'll be able to discern this and more. If you'd like a lovely certificate of completion, just do the quizzes at the end of the course. The course is comprised of 10 different videos and can be completed at your own pace. Understanding is the first step in enjoyment!
target_audience: Those curious about Scotch Whisky

Someone Else's coffee, when they have no fields of their own

WE GO around the world in chats, fact-finding, source-revealing,
and general heated search, for everything which can be dug up-
no puns here of course- on the ever-rising demand for the best-
quality, greatest-tasting, nirvana-invoking, earth-embracing, jolt-
awarding art and experience of the runaway

So come on in, the grind is poised and your cup is ready to catch

THIS ROASTING BEHEMOTH - having taken me unawares as i knew

courses.title: Course to become a master in Hand-Rolled Homemade Croissant
courses.bio: This course gives all secrets why someone can produce super good-looking croissant with limited equipment at home.
objectives: Learn how to choose the right ingredients in making Hand-Roll Croissant
Learn how to maintain the right condition of dough, butter, working force, and environment
Learn how to create multi-layers croissant dough that makes croissant crispy outside and moisture inside
Learn how to adjust the limited resource to the professional-way of making croissant
Learn how to assess and decide what to do and what to ignore during each steps of making croissant
Learn the most efficient way to make croissant to its best from the experienced pastry chef

How to become a master in Hand-Rolled Ho: Preview videos how to become a master in Hand-Rolled Homemade Croissant
Introducing Ingredients, kneading & doug: Introducing ingredients and kneading dough, and dough checking
Butter Block & Preparing Dough: Butter Block and preparing dough before the lamination
Lamination process, complete the first f: Lock-in Butter, Lamination process, Book Fold and Letter Fold
Roll out final dough and Shaping croissa: Roll out final dough, cut and shape the croissant
Guideline of this course: Conclusion and key elements in this course

requirements: No experienced needs, Just require the LOVE IN CROISSANT and want to make it by yourself at home
courses.description:
This course will offer you the most effective way to achieve the best croissant with limited equipment. Whether or not you have experiences in making this complicated pastry, you can still learn the easiest way, proper understanding, and the way to avoid making not-good-enough croissant by the way. The good starts is the key to everything, so lets make croissant in the right way from the beginning, so you won't end up with loads of crap croissant !!


With all my experience in professional made croissant and homemade croissant. There is some secret that guide you to success, and that is SECRET NUMBER. With these key numbers provided throughout this course, you can unlock the master skill in making good-looking croissant with beautiful layers as soon as possible.


This course teaches you;
How to prepare and choose the right ingredient from the start
How to maintain the condition of croissant dough
How to prepare the right butter block
How to lock-in and fold croissant dough in the easiest and most effective way
How to relax the dough to make sure everything is alright between each step
How to shape croissant, proof, and bake it for good
How to assess and test your baked croissant
You may have experience in making bad croissant, or you may not have any chance to try making it, but you should still have some chances to try and eat croissant, right? Perhaps you may have your favorite croissant brand, or pastry shop that you visit so often to grab this pastry day and night. So why don't try making it by yourself at home and find out that "Making" croissant may give you much more funs than "Eating" it nevertheless.
From my experience of making pastry for over 15 years, I have some difficult time in making "the right" croissant at the beginning, and that's the real challenges for me, and end up with myself keep practicing many times for many years to achieve "The right" croissant, sound crazy? The perfect croissant is like the top of the Mount Everest that you want to climb up in one day.
Finally I find the way, perfect croissant that can be made by only bare hand, with just a rolling pin, rulers, kitchen's knife, 50 litre oven, and also TIME & SWEAT. You don't need extra bulk machine to make good croissant, that's a joke!!
What you need is the proper understanding of what it is, what to avoid, and what is the science and secrets behind this pastry.


Yes, I tell you ALL OF THESE in my croissant course


Many people can make croissant, but only a few make perfect croissant, and few of them make it by hand-rolled method


Chance is yours, now.


ENJOY MAKING CROISSANT !!
target_audience: New beginners, or someone who has experienced making dull, flat, no-layers, not crispy & flaky, no honeycomb texture, anyones who want to develop their croissant product to its best

In the online course, you will learn:
Modern techniques in making desserts
Properties of basic baking ingredients
Basic ingredients – flavor combinations
Properties of sugar and correct dosing
Basics of cream and fruit inserts
Various methods for making sponge cakes
Basics for making various fillings
Cookies and basic techniques of working with chocolate

Any pâtissier needs to be well-versed in the basics, regardless of whether you are creating desserts only at home and for your loved ones, or you have already taken your home creations one step further. By sharing the basics of pâtisserie, Sandi will walk you through the online course ranging from the properties of the basic ingredients to the recipe for a delicious chocolate cake.
Who is Sandi Planinšek?
It is not said in vain that pâtisserie is an art. Sandi Planinšek is a chef by education and a passionate pastry chef by heart. Favorite desserts of this young and aspiring pastry chef are those in the shape of fruit, and he is currently creating his own style of desserts at a renowned restaurant. His dessert display case is reminiscent of a freshly picked autumn crop ranging from ripe pears to shiny hazelnuts. He is most proud of the hazelnut-shaped dessert, as he says it is technically the most demanding.
target_audience: Any pâtissier needs to be well-versed in the basics, regardless of whether you are creating desserts only at home and for your loved ones, or you have already taken your home creations one step further.

courses.title: Cook Like a Thai 3 Cooking Course
courses.bio: Thai cooking for homemakers & chefs taught by Chef Dao of Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy, fun teacher of Thai cooking
objectives: Learn about Thai ingredients
Master preparation of popular Thai dishes
Learn basic Thai cooking skills
Learn how to work with a wok, steamer, granite mortar & pestle
Learn how to prepare from scratch Thai pastes, dips, and sauces
Experience the awe of visiting a Thai fresh market
requirements: Course is designed for all skill levels.  No matter your skill level, you will learn more.
Just bring your desire to learn how to prepare tasty dishes from this popular cuisine
courses.description:
HAVE FUN LEARNING TO "COOK LIKE A THAI"
with Chef Dao & Thai Chef School
DO YOU WANT TO "COOK LIKE A THAI"?
Join this fun culinary adventure with me, and experience the fun and exotic world of authentic Thai cooking, one of the world's most popular cuisines.  Visit Bangkok's largest fresh market and learn all about Thai ingredients.  Master 8 popular Thai dishes plus many Thai cooking skills, dips, sauces, and pastes.  Experience the beauty of Thai dishes when properly cooked, plated, lighted, and recorded.  I also have more Thai cooking courses in Udemy.  Please check them out too.
HAVE FUN LEARNING
Enjoy my fun relaxed teaching style which comes from years of experience teaching students in Bangkok.  Relax, laugh, cook, and eat the best tasting Thai dishes--GUARANTEED!
MORE FOR YOUR MONEY
1.  4 hours 15 minutes of fun learning (compare and see for yourself)
2.  Take a fun tour of Bangkok's largest fresh market and be amazed
3.  Learn basic Thai cooking skills and techniques
4.  Learn 8 popular Thai dishes from scratch
ENHANCED QUALITY
Using HD quality video recording equipment, professional lighting, skilled photographers, and good English, we endeavor to present the very best viewing presentation possible.  Compare for yourself.
IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU?
This course is taught by Chef Dao, a professional culinary instructor at Thai Chef School (an online culinary training school) and Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy in Bangkok for both beginners and professionals.  Learn from a fun teacher used to teaching all skill levels the ins and outs of Thai cooking.  Each dish is taught in 4 video segments (total about 20 minutes each):
1.  Thai ingredients discussion with pictures
2.  Preparation of all ingredients for cooking
3.  Professional chef cooking demonstration
4.  Food plating techniques
WHAT WILL YOU LEARN FROM THIS COURSE?
Familiarity with Thai ingredients
Mastery of selected popular dishes, dips, sauces, pastes
Achievement of correct Thai flavors, aroma, and appearance
Proper use of Thai cookware--woks, granite mortar & pestle, steamers
AND lots of fun and laughter.
WHO IS CHEF DAO?
I am a native of northeast Thailand, where my love for cooking was nurtured by my grandmother in her kitchen.  After receiving my degree in Accounting, I moved to Bangkok.  There I soon realized my love was for cooking and eating beans and not in counting them!    To expand my culinary skills, I enrolled in Le Cordon Bleu where I learned Western cooking and basic culinary skills.  After graduation, I then enrolled in Dusit Thani Culinary College to further my Thai cooking knowledge.
For the past 6 years, I have been fortunate to work as a professional culinary instructor at Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy and Thai Chef School, leading Thai cooking schools in Bangkok.  During this time, I taught Thai cooking to many tourists as well as professional culinary students (aspiring chefs, yacht chefs, executive chefs) from around the world in weeklong private training courses.  Additionally, I am a master fruit carver and a team building specialist.
I love eating, cooking, and teaching Thai cooking (oh, and my son too).  Please join me and let's have fun learning together.
BANGKOK THAI COOKING ACADEMY & THAI CHEF SCHOOL
In affiliation with these cooking schools, this course relies on tried and proven recipes and teaching techniques developed over 10 years and taught to thousands of students in Bangkok.  We teach Thai cooking to beginners and professionals alike.  Please feel free to visit our websites.
OUR PROMISE TO YOU
Instruction is fun, clear, and easy to follow.  Recipes are authentic and accurate.  Videos are filmed in HD and well-lighted.  Sound is good and English is good.  Beautiful presentation of dishes is emphasized.  If you have any questions about the course content, please post a question or send a direct message to me.  I will answer your message promptly.
CHEF DAO

BEBIDAS DO MUNDO - Brasil e Grécia.

requirements: Idade acima de 18 anos.
courses.description: O mercado de trabalho do profissional de coquetelaria (mixologia) é amplo e pode ser na hotelaria como a gastronomia, ou ainda atuando em eventos sociais ou corporativos, ou em cruzeiros marítimos  ou ainda, em representação comercial de marcas e produtos.  O objetivo do curso é fornecer ao participante informação e conhecimento suficientes para que possa ingressar em uma nova carreira ou, para os que já atuam no segmento, possam se desenvolver mais em sua atuação profissional. O participante terá acesso a história das principais bebidas produzidas no mundo relacionando-as com a cultura dos países de origem. Além disso, conhecerá os tipos de bares, formas de atendimento e suas origens. Finalmente, terá acesso ao conhecimento de métodos de produção de bebidas alcoólicas. Faremos uma viagem juntos pelos países e assim conheceremos as bebidas que os representam. O profissional de coquetelaria (mixologia) é um conhecedor de ingredientes, sendo capaz de harmonizar com pratos preparados por chefs e assim, ressaltando os sabores, aromas e o visual de qualquer momento à mesa. Importante ressaltar o lado da conscientização no consumo de bebidas alcoólicas em geral, como a vodka, o whisky, a cerveja, o vinho, a tequila, a cachaça, o pisco, o rum, o sakê, o mastic, o uzo e tantas outras bebidas.
target_audience: Estudantes e profissionais de gastronomia, hotelaria e turismo.

Grain and Pasta is a very Important topic when we talk about any cuisine
This program is covering some old classic recipes mainly based on Italian Pasta and Grains. The recipes are from start to finish with different small tips and techniques shared by the chef. The beauty about Pasta is that you have numbers of different shape, sizes and style which make the dish very exciting and Unique. they are considered healthy and can be served in house, specility restaurant as well a huge production kitchens
Shapes of Pasta - Simple shaping of pasta which includes spaghetti, Fettucine, Farfalle and Pappadelle.
Fusili Salad - Boiled Fusilli pasta and lightly grilled vegetables, tossed together with a honey lemon dressing.
Pasta Dough Plain (Yellow) - A Fresh pasta dough, made with egg, egg yolk and flour. From start to finish.
Rice Pilaf - Classic middle eastern rice dish. Basmathi rice cooked in stock.
Risotto Parmigiana - Famous italian rice dish. Short grain rice cooked in stock for a longer period of time.
Spaghetti Aglio olio - Simple Spaghetti cooked with olive oil, crispy garlic chips and chili.
Spaghetti Tomato Sauce - Traditional tomato sauce served with spaghetti.
Spaghetti with Bolognaise Sauce - Spaghetti cooked together with a chicken bolognaise sauce.
Spaghetti with Mushroom Cream Sauce - Sweet and earthy mushroom cream sauce served with spaghetti.
Vegetable Lasagna - A layered pasta dish, consisting of fresh pasta sheets, tomato sauce, bechamel sauce and grilled vegetables. Topped with cheese and baked.

courses.title: Persian Delight - Vegan Cooking Class
courses.bio: Learn how to make delicious vegan Persian food at home
objectives: How to make wholesome vegan Persian food from scratch
Simple, delicious recipes that don’t need any special equipment
Helpful kitchen tips
Meet new ingredients and flavours
How to make mouthwatering dishes for your family and friends

Sweet & Sour Dolmas: Sweet & Sour Dolmas - video + written recipe
