requirements: No experience needed, you will learn everything you need to know to create your own delicious Persian food
No special equipment required
courses.description:
Have you ever had Persian food?


Persian food is unique and special, colourful, rich in flavours and textures, and truly just amazing!


Join me for a delicious Persian class with recipes from my grandma’s kitchen - this class is in her honour!


You will learn special dishes like my grandma's roasted eggplants, topped with cashew cream, caramelized spiced onions, pomegranate & mint.. every bite is a celebration in your mouth!


We will make simple, delicious recipes that don’t need any special equipment.


Enjoy an intimate experience at your own home, as we meet new ingredients and flavours, learn helpful kitchen tips, and prepare mouthwatering recipes from scratch, in a wonderful hands-on experience!


This class includes 7 dishes - appetizers, main, sides, and a drink too - each dish has its own step by step video, written recipe, ingredient and equipment list!


Persian food is actually very vegan friendly - I became vegetarian at a young age, and at family dinners there were always so many dishes I could eat without needing to modify them.


Some of the dishes in this class were not originally vegan, but were easy to make so, and some were vegan to begin with.


So join me and learn how to make your own delicious vegan Persian food!


Special Notes:
Equipment required: Blender (needed for 1 recipe: Grandma Miriam’s Special Eggplants)
All recipes in this class can be made gluten-free & nut-free
target_audience: People who want to learn how to make delicious vegan Persian food at home
Curious home cooks that want to develop new kitchen skills
People who enjoy exploring and playing with food
People who want to add more plant based food to their diet
People who are looking for new recipes inspiration
You can enjoy my classes whether you are a beginner – as I go through every step of each recipe – or if you have been cooking for a while and are looking for some new inspiration in the kitchen.

courses.description:
Have you ever dreamed of creating mouthwatering Italian dishes right in your own kitchen? Our online Italian Cooking Course is your gateway to mastering Italy's rich culinary heritage.


Whether you're a beginner or an experienced cook, our comprehensive course is tailored for food enthusiasts of all levels.


Learn from our expert instructors, Amalia, a Sicilian cook, and Annalisa, an Italian language and culture enthusiast. Together, they bring their passion, knowledge, and experience to teach you traditional Italian cooking techniques, tips, and tricks.


In this engaging course, you'll master 11 classic Italian recipes, including Parmigiana, Caponata, Zuppa di mare, and Tiramisu.


For each recipe, you'll enjoy two insightful videos: Annalisa provides the historical and cultural context, while Amalia demonstrates each dish step-by-step using authentic ingredients and methods.


Our online classes are designed for flexibility and convenience. Learn at your own pace, revisit lessons anytime, and elevate your culinary skills with ease.


Don't miss out on this opportunity to impress your friends and family with your newfound expertise in Italian cooking. Embark on a culinary journey to Italy without leaving your home, and continue to savor the flavors of Italy long after the course is over!


The course is taught in Italian with Italian and English subtitles.


Ready to start cooking like an Italian pro? Sign up now and let Amalia and Annalisa guide you through the rich world of traditional Italian cuisine that every Italian family loves to cook.


Sample Recipe 8: Pizza Margherita - Watch Below!


About the Instructors:


Annalisa, a Milan-born Italian language and culture lover, has been teaching Italian in Paris for several years. Through Learn Italian With Annalisa, she aims to share her passion and knowledge with students worldwide.


Amalia, a Sicilian-born mother of three, has been teaching Italian cooking classes in Siracusa for over a decade. In this course, she shares her expertise and time-tested tips, passed down from her mother and grandmother.


--------


Scopri i segreti della cucina italiana autentica: impara ricette tradizionali da casa!


Hai mai sognato di preparare piatti italiani deliziosi direttamente nella tua cucina? Il nostro corso di cucina italiana online è la tua porta d'accesso per padroneggiare la ricca eredità culinaria dell'Italia.


Sia che tu sia un principiante o un cuoco esperto, il nostro corso completo è pensato per gli appassionati di cibo di tutti i livelli.


Impara dai nostri esperti insegnanti, Amalia, cuoca siciliana, e Annalisa, appassionata di lingua e cultura italiana. Insieme, portano la loro passione, conoscenza ed esperienza per insegnarti tecniche, consigli e trucchi della cucina italiana tradizionale.


In questo coinvolgente corso, padroneggerai 11 ricette classiche italiane, tra cui Parmigiana, Caponata, Zuppa di mare e Tiramisù.


Per ogni ricetta, godrai di due video approfonditi: Annalisa fornisce il contesto storico e culturale, mentre Amalia dimostra ogni piatto passo dopo passo usando ingredienti e metodi autentici.


Le nostre lezioni online sono progettate per flessibilità e comodità. Impara al tuo ritmo, ripassa le lezioni in qualsiasi momento e migliora le tue abilità culinarie con facilità.


Non perdere l'opportunità di stupire amici e familiari con la tua nuova competenza nella cucina italiana. Imbarcati in un viaggio culinario in Italia senza lasciare casa tua e continua a assaporare i sapori dell'Italia molto tempo dopo la fine del corso.


Il corso è insegnato in italiano con sottotitoli in italiano e inglese.


Pronto a iniziare a cucinare come un vero professionista italiano? Iscriviti ora e lascia che Amalia e Annalisa ti guidino attraverso il ricco mondo della cucina italiana tradizionale che ogni famiglia italiana adora cucinare.


Anteprima Ricetta 8: Pizza Margherita - Guarda sotto!


Sugli istruttori:


Annalisa, nata a Milano e appassionata di lingua e cultura italiana, insegna italiano a Parigi da diversi anni. Attraverso Impara l'italiano con Annalisa, mira a condividere la sua passione e conoscenza con studenti di tutto il mondo.


Amalia, nata in Sicilia e madre di tre figli, insegna corsi di cucina italiana a Siracusa da oltre un decennio. In questo corso, condivide la sua competenza e i consigli collaudati nel tempo, tramandati da sua madre e sua nonna.
target_audience: Italian language enthusiasts of all levels seeking to enhance their skills while exploring Italian cuisine

courses.title: Etiqueta à Mesa
courses.bio: Comportamento à mesa
objectives: Regras básicas de etiqueta à mesa
Etiqueta em almoço e jantar de negócios
requirements: Acesso à internet
courses.description:
A Etiqueta é atemporal, ela se renova e se adapta à sociedade de cada época, auxiliando nas relações sociais. Sua importância se dá pelo respeito, harmonia e gentileza em que gera no ambiente onde ela é praticada, por auxiliar no desenvolvimento de relações sociais saudáveis,  de relações profissionais e colaborar com a construção de carreiras, melhorando a autoestima, segurança, marketing pessoal e traquejo social.
A etiqueta à mesa exerce um importante papel no desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional, pois muitos profissionais necessitam participar de almoços e jantares de negócios, ter contato com diferentes hierarquias empresariais e sociais, e quando este profissional possui conhecimento de etiqueta e comportamento à mesa, terá uma melhora na sua apresentação pessoal e imagem pessoal, irá transmitir uma boa imagem de si, e da empresa que representa.
Este curso tem por objetivo ensinar ao aluno algumas importantes regras de etiqueta à mesa, orientando sobre o comportamento mais adequado em diversas situações e o motivo de tais regras existirem, de modo que o mesmo possa aprender a se portar com mais segurança e elegância, aumentando sua autoestima e confiança.
O curso possui vídeos teóricos e alguns vídeos de aula prática, para que o aluno possa praticar em casa.
target_audience: Profissionais que procuram aperfeiçoar a imagem pessoal
Pessoas que precisam participar refeições formais
Pessoas que gostam de organizar recepções

courses.description:
ごはん作りのことを考えることが最大のストレス。。。


多くの方が持ってらっしゃる悩みです。
そしてなんとかそれを改善しようと、
レシピを調べたり、料理教室に通ったり.....
みなさんの努力たるや、計り知れません。


そんなに色々頑張ってるのに
毎日の憂鬱はなかなか消えてはくれない。。。
もしあなたがそのような状態ならば
このコースはあなたのお役に立てるかもしれません。


料理づくりの悩みと一言で言っても、実は原因も人それぞれです。
闇雲に料理教室に通ったりレシピを見ながら作っても
一向にお料理の悩みは消えない…
それはあなたの食事作りの悩みへのアプローチに問題があるのかもしれません。


このコースには、時短レシピをご紹介したり、お料理の作り方を教えたりする内容は一切ありません。実はそれはあなたが今モヤモヤと抱えている「今日何を作ろう？」という悩みの直接的な解決方法ではないからです。


このコースでは「作り方を学ぶ」では解決できなかった
食事作りのお悩みを解決するための方法をお伝えしています。
料理作り、献立作りの考え方をお伝えしながら
あなたの食事づくりの悩みの原因がどこにあるのか？を
見える化し、効果的なお悩み解決へ導きます。


このコースを受けることで毎日の食事作りへの気持ちが軽くなると思いますよ。


・レシピに頼らないバリエーションの増やし方がわかるようになります
・料理本や料理教室の活用の仕方が分かるようになります
・無駄のない買いもののコツが分かるようになります
・食費を抑えるコツがつかめます
・台所仕事、食事作りへの考え方がラクになります
・おうちにあるもので即興でお料理が作るコツがわかります
・メニューを考える憂鬱から解放されます
・台所仕事が楽しくなります！
・家族（パートナーなど）の笑顔が増えます♪




また食事づくりの習慣を振り返ることは
ご自身の思いこみや価値観などの気づきも得られますよ！


さぁ、一緒に家事ラクの第一歩を踏み出しましょう♪
target_audience: 家事や仕事や育児との両立で忙しい方
毎日何を作っていいか思い浮かばず夕方になるにつれ憂鬱な方
ある材料からパパッとお料理を作るのが苦手な方

courses.title: Food Styling Essentials Making Your Dishes Look Delicious:
courses.bio: Combining Food Styling and Photography A Comprehensive Guide
requirements: No requirements needed
courses.description:
Unlock the secrets to creating visually stunning dishes with our comprehensive course on food plating. Whether you’re a culinary enthusiast or a professional chef, this course will guide you through the fundamentals of food plating, from understanding color theory to mastering advanced garnishing techniques. Learn how to choose the right plates, balance textures and flavors, and create memorable dining experiences. Elevate your culinary presentations and impress your guests with beautifully plated dishes.


Dive into the world of food styling with this essential course designed to make your dishes look as good as they taste. Explore the tools and props that make a difference, learn techniques to enhance visual appeal, and discover how to style different types of cuisine. From selecting the perfect backdrop to overcoming common styling challenges, this course will equip you with the skills needed to create mouth-watering presentations that captivate your audience.


Step into the world of food photography and learn how to capture stunning images of your culinary creations. This beginner-friendly course covers everything from basic camera settings to lighting techniques, composition, and framing. Discover how to edit and enhance your photos to bring out the best in your dishes. By the end of the course, you’ll have the skills to create a beautiful food photography portfolio and share your passion for food through captivating images.

courses.title: Uncomplicated Kitchen
courses.bio: Stop Throwing Away Uncooked Groceries at the End of Every Week!

Step 1: Meal Planning and Prep: Dealing With Different Diets at Dinnertime
Step 2: Mastering One-Pot and One-Pan Re: Instant Pot 101: Common Issues and Troubleshooting
Step 3: Set “Backups” with Freezer and P: How to Prep for a Batch Cooking Session

requirements: All you need is a hungry family and a willingness to cook!
courses.description:
Too tired to cook at the end of the day?
Weeknights as a working parent shouldn't be overwhelming.


You can feel on top of your meal planning...
on top of your weeknights at home...
in charge of your routines...
without feeling like you're constantly juggling 50 balls in the air at once.


You can feel present with your kids in the evenings, instead of moving from one thing to the next, just surviving til bedtime.


You don't have to feel like the only thing you've got time for when it comes to dinner is to throw some chicken nuggets on a sheet pan and call it good.


Join Uncomplicated Kitchen, the members-only course for working parents who are tired of riding the struggle bus every weeknight, brought to you by Ruthy at Percolate Kitchen!


You can pin recipes, save chore sheets, ask your friends...
but feel as though you can't put the pieces together in the right way that WORKS.
Instead, access all of this:
-hundreds of simple one-pot and one-pan recipes
-done-for-you meal plans
-kitchen and meal planning video tutorials
-freezer meal cook-a-longs
-step-by-step proven method to getting your kitchen life in order.


Because here's the other truth: it doesn't have to be this hard.
Uncomplicated Kitchen gives you a proven 3-step formula to releasing you from weeknight dinnertime stress.
STEP ONE:
Meal Planning and Prep
First, let's organize your current recipes and get a simple system moving so that you can meal plan quickly and effectively. This first step is the "special sauce" of the entire resource.
STEP TWO:
One Pot and One Pan Recipes
Then, we'll begin nailing the easy, quick recipes you should have in your repertoire. We'll cover everything Instant Pot, sheet pan, and more. So once your meals are planned quickly, you can make them quickly, too!
STEP THREE:
Backup Meals
Then, we'll lay out a backup plan for your backup plans; ie, what happens when the sh*t has hit the fan and you need to get dinner on the table, pronto. Here's where we cover quick and easy freezer meals and pantry meals you can toss together at a moment's notice.

Here's what you'll get after accessing this resource:
-Access to video and audio trainings, tutorials
-An easy meal planning system that works WITH your family's schedule and your personal strengths
-Seamless, streamlined meal prep you'll be able to crank out in record time
-A stash of truly simple, trusted recipes to have in your back pocket at all times.
-A freezer packed with ready-to-go meals
-TOOLKIT that includes resources like done-for-you meal plans and hundreds of simple recipes


What are you waiting for? Let's figure out your weeknight routine, once and for all.
target_audience: This course is for busy parents who are interested creating a meal plan they'll actually cook from on a regular basis.

courses.title: O Segredo das Massas Perfeitas - O Fim dos bolos solados

objectives: O segredo das massas perfeitas
Como variar o sabor do seus bolos mudando apenas 1 ingrediente
Conhecer vários tipos de recheios para usar
Fazer a montagem profissional das massas e muito mais

Segredos das Massas: Melhores Recheios para cada tipo de Massas
Como evitar que o bolo fique solado
Mão na Massa: Massa saborizada com pasta de avelã
Brigadeiro de Morango com Pó Saborizante
Massa amanteigada de chocolate com creme de Avelã
Massa de Pão de Ló Saborizado com Limão Siciliano

requirements: Noção básica de confeitaria
courses.description:
Receber um encomenda de bolo é muito bom não é verdade? Mais logo vem aquela insegurança...
Será que vou conseguir deixar esse bolo em pé até o final da festa? Será o que chantilly não irá derreter? E o recheio? Será por quanto tempo devo cozinhar para que ele não saia pelas bordas? E várias outras questões...
E se você está passando por isso, é porque ainda não conhece as técnicas corretas que te darão segurança para entregar um bolo perfeito ao seu cliente.
Bem meu nome é Aline Silva, sou confeiteira profissional a mais de 7 anos e preciso te dizer que é na massa e no recheio que está o segredo do sucesso dos melhores confeiteiros!
E para resolver de vez por todas esse problema, criei o curso O Segredo das Massas Perfeitas, um treinamento prático onde vou te ensinar a dominar massas e recheios para você criar bolos profissionais.
Como você sabe, na internet existem quilos de informações sobre confeitaria que mais parece um labirinto sem fim e você pode estar perdido nele, assim como eu há alguns anos atrás e realmente você não precisa passar por isso…
Neste curso você irá aprender:
O segredos das massas perfeitas
Como variar o sabor do seus bolos mudando apenas 1 ingrediente
Conhecer vários tipos de recheios para usar
Conhecer os tipos de massas mais utilizados na confeitaria
Fazer a montagem profissional das massas
Conhecer o ponto correto dos recheios para que não vase pelas bordas
Truques para conseguir massas macias e fofinhas
E muito mais!
E o melhor, ao final desse curso você poderá descansar, sabendo que seu cliente adquiriu um bolo que ficará em pé até o final da festa, após os parabens, eles irão saborear um bolo de dar agua na boca!
target_audience: Pessoas que desejam aprender a produzir massas para bolos profissionais, usando técnicas simples e eficazes
Pessoas que desejam se profissionalizar na confeitaria

courses.title: Baking Basics Masterclass for Beginners
courses.bio: Learn Under Valued Baking Techniques along with the recipe of Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
objectives: Learn How to make delicious Chocolate Chip Cookies, a perfect recipe to begin your Baking Journey
Easy Variations suitable for Multiple Dietary Preferences - Dairy-Free, Vegan, Gluten-Free
Making Brown Butter like Professional Bakeries
How to Perfectly Line Baking Tins with Parchment Paper
How to Check if Yeast is Alive
How to Line Shortcrust Pastry in a Tart Tin
How to Fill Piping Bags without Making a Mess
How to Perfectly Measure Dry Ingredients
How to Line a Pie Case

Leaning how to Make Chocolate Chip Cooki: Understanding the Ingredients Used in Chocolate Chip Cookies
Making the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
Portioning and Aging the Cookie Dough
Baking the Cookie and Taking them out of the Oven
Essential Baking Techniques that are Tak: How to Line A Baking Tin with Parchment Paper
How to Check if the Yeast is Alive
How to Perfectly Line a Tart Tin with Shortcrust Dough
How to Fill a Piping Bag without Making a Mess
How to Accurately Measure Dry Ingredients
How to Line a Pie Case with Minimum Effort

requirements: No prior experience required. Just willingness to learn
courses.description:
Hello you beautiful bakers!
In this class, I will walk you through the process of making the world’s best Chocolate Chip Cookies at home, and that too with no baking equipment. Along with that, I will walk you through 6 baking techniques that are extremely crucial to the success of your recipe but are always taken for granted. Every time we learn a recipe or dish, these steps are usually not taught to us explicitly. It is assumed that we know how to do them and that is not true.
This course will teach you:
A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Chocolate Chip Cookies just like the ones we have in bakeries
The process of making a yummy brown butter
Multiple variations that may suit various dietary preferences (vegan, dairy-free, gluten-free)
Recipe ideas to modify the basic chocolate chip cookies
Tips and tricks for various steps of making cookies
A detailed understanding of the ingredients being used
How to Line a Baking Tin with Parchment Paper (circular and rounded rectangle)
How to Check if the Yeast is Alive (fit for Use and Not Dead)
How to Perfectly Line Your Tart Tin with Shortcrust Dough (Two Techniques)
How to Fill a Piping Bag (Without Making a Mess)
How to Accurately Measure Dry Ingredients
How to Line a Pie Case with Minimum Effort
CLASS HIGHLIGHTS:
The whole course has been simplified to accommodate all skill levels: from novice to professional
All ingredients used are simple, common, and easy to procure (and easily customizable)
This course is vegetarian (egg-free) and has a detailed explanation of other dietary preferences (vegan, dairy-free, gluten-free)
Other unique flavor combinations have also been covered
Upon completion of the course, you end up learning a universal and beloved classic recipe of Chocolate Chip Cookies and dynamic ideas to modify the recipe to something for everyone
All these techniques are commonly used and required while baking an array of products
No extra or fancy tools are required
by the end, you will be an expert at handling and managing these basic baking techniques that are not taught to us and are usually taken for granted


Happy Baking!
- Savini
target_audience: Any novice with the willingness and eagerness to learn and begin their baking journey!

courses.title: Bolo Rei e Bolo Rainha - Receitas de Natal Portuguesas
courses.bio: Comemore o Natal ao estilo Português com a receita do Melhor Bolo Rei de Lisboa!
objectives: A minha receita premiada de autêntico Bolo Rei Português - galardoado como O Melhor Bolo Rei de Lisboa!
Adaptações da receita traditional para fazer Bolo Rainha (sem frutas cristalizadas)
Como fazer frutas cristalizadas em casa
Truques e segredos para fazer Bolo Rei como os pasteleiros profissionais em Portugal
Dicas gerais para pastelaria em casa com resultados incríveis
História e curiosidades sobre a pastelaria tradicional Portuguesa

Bem-vindo/a!: Perspectiva geral dos conteúdos do curso
Breve História do Bolo Rei: Bolo Rei Tradicional e Bolo Rainha Contemporâneo
Preparar a Massa: Prepare a massa para Bolo Rei À MÃO
Prepare a massa para Bolo Rainha com AMASSADEIRA ELÉTRICA
Moldar a Massa: Como Dar Forma de Coroa aos Bolos
Decoração e Acabamentos: Como decorar Bolo Rei e Bolo Rainha
Faça as suas próprias frutas cristalizadas em casa
Levar ao Forno: Dicas levar Bolo Rei e Bolo Rainha ao forno
Calda de Açúcar: Calda de açúcar e toques finais
Desfrute dos seus Bolos Rei e Rainha: Dicas para a degustação e conservação de Bolo Rei e Rainha
BÓNUS: Mais receitas de Natal portuguesas!

requirements: Este curso está aberto a TODOS os níveis - não precisa de experiência anterior na cozinha!
courses.description:
O Bolo Rei é o doce de Natal mais famoso de Portugal. Este bolo fofo com massa tipo brioche é enriquecido com uvas passas, frutos secos e frutas cristalizadas.
Esta é a versão portuguesa do Gâteau des Rois francês, semelhante ao Roscón de Reyes de Espanha e à Rosca de Reyes da América Latina. O Bolo Rei também tem semelhanças com o King Cake de Nova Orleans, associado às celebrações do Mardi Gras / Carnaval na Louisiana, Estados Unidos. Também se assemelha ao Panettone Italiano, por ser um bolo comido tipicamente na época do Natal, de massa fofa com frutas secas e cristalizadas.
Seguindo este curso, poderá fazer em casa o genuíno Bolo Rei, assim como a variação sem frutas cristalizadas: Bolo Rainha. A receita aqui partilhada é a receita premiada da minha pastelaria familiar, a Pastelaria Batalha, que ganhou o prémio de MELHOR BOLO REI DE LISBOA.
Faremos tudo de uma forma fácil de acompanhar, mas ainda assim conseguiremos resultados profissionais, como se tivesse comprado o Bolo Rei numa padaria portuguesa... ou ainda melhor!
Não se preocupe se não conseguir encontrar ingredientes específicos como as frutas cristalizadas, pois também veremos como fazer essas frutas coloridas em casa de uma forma simples e acessível para cozinheiros com todos os níveis de experiência.
Este curso irá ajudá-lo/a a celebrar o Natal ao estilo português! Quer seja Português(a), de ascendência portuguesa e resida no estrangeiro, ou um foodie com curiosidade em expandir o seus sabores e receitas caseiras para além fronteiras, estamos ansiosos por partilhar consigo estas autênticas receitas Portuguesas.
Obrigado!
target_audience: Entusiastas da pastelaria
Pasteleiros e padeiros profissionais
Amantes da gastronomia Portuguesa
Gente que pretende manter ligação com as suas raízes portuguesas

objectives: تحضير عجينة مخمّرة مسبقاً

أنواع العجائن المخمّرة مسبقاً وتأثيرها على العجين والخُبز
معايير جودة الخبز الحرفي
كيفية تخزين الخبز الحرفي؟

تطبيق وصفة خبز الريف بالعجينة المخمرة: انتهاء الرغيف الأول، وإعادة إحماء الفرن مع القدر وغطائه

requirements: هذه الدورة للمبتدئين
الخبرة المسبقة في مجال تحضير عجين الخُبز ، ليست مطلوبة
courses.description:
وصف مواد الدورة التأسيسية
الدورة التأسيسية للخُبز الاحترافي ، هو من أولى الدورات المحضرة باللغة العربية ، وتناسب المبتدئين في مجال تحضير العجين والخُبز الاحترافي الأوروبي بالطرق التقليدية
:الدورة تشمل التفاصيل التالية
١- التعرف إلى مفردات حرفة صناعة الخُبز الاحترافي، بداية من الخلط ومروراً بالعجن والتخمير، وأخيراً الخَبز
٢-  مفاهيم التخمر الطويل للعجين، باستخدام القليل من الخميرة الفورية
٣-  شرح عن طبيعة العجائن المخمرة، وفوائدها في تحسين جودة الخُبز
٤ - تحضير العجائن المخمّرة بالقليل جداً من الخميرة الفورية
٥- شرح للمواد الأولية والأدوات الأساسية ، والتي يفضل تواجدها لتطبيق وصفات الدورة
(٦ - شرح مبسّط لكيفية حساب مقادير العجين بالنسب (نِسب الخبازين
(٧ - عرض لوصفتي خُبز  ريفي باستخدام العجائن المخمّرة (خبز الريف ، وخُبز الحبوب المتعددة
٨ -  ننهي الدورة بشرح لمعايير جودة الخُبز الريفي الاحترافي، وكيفية تقييمه
الدورة غنية بالمعلومات القيمة من نصوص وفيديوات لتثري محتوى هذه الدورة

courses.title: Thai Desserts Cooking Course 1
courses.bio: Thai desserts for homemakers, caterers, restaurants taught by Chef Dao of Thai Chef School, fun teacher of Thai cooking
objectives: Learn about Thai dessert ingredients
Master preparation of popular Thai desserts
Learn how to prepare coconut milk and pandan juice
Learn how to work with a wok & steamer
requirements: Course is designed for all skill levels.  No matter your skill level, you will learn more.
courses.description:
HAVE FUN LEARNING TO PREPARE THAI DESSERTS
with Chef Dao & Thai Chef School
DO YOU WANT TO PREPARE DELICIOUS DESSERTS?
Join this fun culinary adventure with me, and experience the fun and exotic world of authentic Thai desserts.  Learn how to work with coconut milk, pandan juice, taro, ... and steamers and woks. Master 8 popular and tasty Thai desserts.  Experience the beauty of Thai desserts when properly cooked and plated.  And if you wish to learn lots of Thai cooking, please check out my 5 "Cook Like a Thai" courses on Udemy.
HAVE FUN LEARNING
Enjoy my fun, relaxed teaching style which comes from years of experience teaching students in Bangkok. Relax, laugh, cook, and eat the best tasting Thai desserts--GUARANTEED!
MORE FOR YOUR MONEY
1. 3 hours of fun learning
2. Learn Thai herbal drinks
3. Learn how to prepare coconut milk and pandan juice
4. Learn 8 popular Thai desserts from scratch
ENHANCED QUALITY
Using HD quality video recording equipment, professional lighting, skilled photographers, and good English, we endeavor to present the very best viewing presentation possible. Compare for yourself.
IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU?
This course is taught by Chef Dao, a professional culinary instructor at Thai Chef School (an online culinary training school) and Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy (in person training) in Bangkok for both beginners and professionals. Learn from a fun teacher used to teaching all skill levels the ins and outs of Thai cooking.
WHAT WILL YOU LEARN FROM THIS COURSE?
Familiarity with Thai desserts ingredients
Mastery of selected popular desserts
Achievement of correct Thai flavors, aroma, and appearance
Proper use of Thai cookware--woks & steamers
AND lots of fun and laughter.
WHO IS CHEF DAO?
I am a native of northeast Thailand, where my love for cooking was nurtured by my grandmother in her kitchen. After receiving my degree in Accounting, I moved to Bangkok. There I soon realized my love was for cooking and eating beans and not in counting them! To expand my culinary skills, I enrolled in Le Cordon Bleu where I learned Western cooking and basic culinary skills. After graduation, I then enrolled in Dusit Thani Culinary College to further my Thai cooking knowledge.
For the past 6 years, I have been fortunate to work as a professional culinary instructor at Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy and Thai Chef School, leading Thai cooking schools in Bangkok. During this time, I taught Thai cooking to many tourists as well as professional culinary students (aspiring chefs, yacht chefs, executive chefs) from around the world in weeklong private training courses. Additionally, I am a master fruit carver and a team building specialist.
I love eating, cooking, and teaching Thai cooking (oh, and my son too). Please join me and let's have fun learning together.
BANGKOK THAI COOKING ACADEMY & THAI CHEF SCHOOL
In affiliation with these cooking schools, this course relies on tried and proven recipes and teaching techniques developed over 10 years and taught to thousands of students in Bangkok. We teach Thai cooking to beginners and professionals alike. Please feel free to visit our websites.
OUR PROMISE TO YOU
My instruction is fun, clear, and easy to follow. Recipes are authentic and accurate. Videos are filmed in HD and well-lighted. Sound is good, and English is good. Beautiful presentation of dishes is emphasized. If you have any questions about the course content, please post a question or send a direct message to me. I will answer your message promptly.
Thanks,
CHEF DAO
JUST CLICK THE ENROLL BUTTON, AND I'LL SEE YOU IN LECTURE #1.
target_audience: Home cooks learn to master tasty Thai desserts
Perfect for caterers looking for unique desserts
Professional cooks and chefs improve your culinary skills and knowledge

courses.title: The Art of Mixology and Cocktail Presentation
courses.bio: Master the art of cocktail creation—from crafting your own syrups to perfecting and styling your cocktail presentation
objectives: Master essential mixology techniques to craft professional-level cocktails.
Learn how to create syrups, purees, and juices from scratch to enhance flavour profiles.
Develop the skills to style and garnish cocktails for stunning presentation.
Understand the principles of balancing flavours to design signature drinks.

Introduction to Mixology & Cocktail Styl: What Makes a Cocktail Visually Appealing
Introduction to Mixology & Cocktail Styling Quiz
Crafting Syrups, Purees, & Juices: Crafting Your Syrups, Purees, and Juices
Aesthetic Presentation & Garnishing: Ice Carving and Specialty Ice Cubes

requirements: No prior bartending or mixology experience is required. You will learn everything you need to know
Willingness to experiment with flavours and techniques.
Some ingredients and spirits may be required for hands-on practice.
courses.description:
Cocktails aren’t just about mixing drinks—they’re an experience. In this comprehensive course, you’ll dive into the art and science behind creating exceptional cocktails. You’ll begin with mastering essential and advanced mixology techniques, where you’ll learn the principles that form the foundation of every great drink. Whether it’s shaking, stirring, or muddling, you’ll get in-depth knowledge that will elevate your mixology skills.
But it’s not just about the basics; you’ll also learn how to create syrups, purees, and juices from scratch, allowing you to craft bespoke cocktails with layers of flavour. You’ll understand the importance of balancing flavours, knowing when to sweeten, sour, or add complexity through infusion, and how to store and preserve these ingredients for future use.
A cocktail’s visual appeal is just as important as its taste. This course will teach you the fine art of cocktail styling and garnishing, ensuring your drinks not only taste amazing but look visually stunning. You’ll explore various garnishing techniques, from simple twists to elaborate presentations, adding that extra touch of sophistication to every glass.
Whether you're an aspiring bartender, home mixologist, or hospitality professional, this course will equip you with the skills to design, balance, and present cocktails with the precision of a seasoned pro.
By the End of This Course, You Will:
Master the essential and advanced techniques for crafting balanced, flavourful cocktails.
Learn how to make syrups, purees, and juices to elevate your drinks.
Perfect the art of cocktail styling and garnishing for exceptional presentation.
Develop signature cocktails, blending creativity with precision to craft unique drinks.
target_audience: Aspiring and professional bartenders looking to refine their craft.
Home mixologists who want to elevate their cocktail-making skills.
Hospitality professionals interested in creating visually appealing and well-balanced drinks.
Anyone passionate about mixology, cocktail presentation, and experimenting with flavours.

courses.title: La pizza Tonda Romana con Cristian Marcellini
courses.bio: Tutti i segreti per realizzare una pizza tonda romana d’eccellenza a casa e in pizzeria
objectives: Conoscere nel dettaglio il processo che ti porterà a realizzare una Tonda Romana perfetta
Imparerai a scegliere la farina più giusta per la realizzazione della biga e dell’impasto per Pizza Romana
Imparerai come realizzare una biga alternativa pensata appositamente per la Tonda Romana;
Imparerai il metodo di Cristian Marcellini, adatto sia per un casalingo che per il professionista che vuole applicare il processo in pizzeria;
Imparerai a “pezzare” le palline in 4 modi differenti, dal livello principiante a esperto;
Apprenderai come cuocere perfettamente una pizza tonda romana in forno domestico o Effeuno

Ricetta completa e file scaricabili: Prima di iniziare: scopriamo la Pizza Tonda Romana e il processo per realizzarla
Cottura in forno domestico e Effeuno: La cottura in forno domestico di una baciata
La Margherita cotta in forno Effeuno

requirements: Esperienza necessaria: MINIMA
Attrezzatura minima: IMPASTATRICE o PLANETARIA
Procedimento adatto a: CASALINGO AMATORIALE e PROFESSIONISTA
courses.description:
In questo corso il pizzaiolo Romano Cristian Marcellini ed io vi guideremo passo passo nella realizzazione della perfetta tonda romana, direttamente nelle mura di casa vostra o nel vostro laboratorio, rispettando in tutto e per tutto le caratteristiche fondamentali di prodotto che fa parte della cultura gastronomica Romana, ormai conosciute in tutto il mondo!
Questo corso infatti è pensato non solo per il casalingo o l’amatore ma anche per il professionista!


Questo prodotto non può assolutamente mancare tra le conoscenze di un amante panificatore.
La Pizza Tonda Romana ha delle caratteristiche fondamentali che non devono assolutamente mancare quando la si realizza; Sono delle vere e proprie lienee guida che vanno rispettate:
- Impasto sottile, croccante e friabile;
- Spessore omogeneo e uniforme;
- Leggerezza e Digeribilità elevata, necessario l’uso di prefermenti;


Tutti questi punti, uniti insieme, ci donano una Pizza Romana Perfetta, Cristian ci mostrerà come realizzare un impasto che ci porti al raggiungimento di ogni singolo punto.
Nel corso non troverete soltanto una ricetta, ma parleremo dei perché e delle scelte di questo processo che risulterà essenziale per avere un risultato eccezionale.


Cuoceremo sia in forno casalingo che in forno Effeuno per mostrarvi che è possibile ottenere una pizza romana perfetta in entrambi in forni.
Strumenti essenziali per il corso:
-Impastatrice o planetaria
target_audience: Apprendere il corretto processo per la realizzazione di una pizza tonda romana d’eccellenza.

courses.title: Pasta Sauces from Scratch
courses.bio: A Journey Through Italian Flavours
objectives: How to make pasta sauces from scratch
tips and tricks about a healthy sauce
different types of pasta
how to pair sauces and pasta

Pasta Sauces From Scratch: "Roasted Pumkin, Pan fried Tomatoes Pesto Linguine"

requirements: no requirements
courses.description:
Cooking has always been my passion, and if you're anything like me, you know that the right sauce can turn a simple bowl of pasta into something extraordinary. Whether you’re a pasta enthusiast or just love experimenting in the kitchen, I’m excited to guide you through the world of delicious, homemade pasta sauces.
In this course, we’ll cover everything from traditional Italian classics to more modern, creative sauces. I’ll share my personal tips, tricks, and stories from my own kitchen. I want you to feel like you’re cooking alongside me, learning the art of sauce-making in a relaxed and fun way!
I designed this course because pasta sauces are, to me, the heart and soul of Italian cooking. Over the years, I’ve realized that while pasta itself is beloved around the world, it’s the sauce that can make or break a dish. I wanted to create a course that empowers anyone — whether a seasoned cook or a complete beginner — to master the art of pasta sauces from scratch.
For me, cooking is deeply personal. It’s not just about following recipes, but about understanding the ingredients, techniques, and traditions that bring those recipes to life. I designed this course because I believe making a good sauce doesn’t have to be complicated or intimidating. Once you grasp the basics, the possibilities are endless, and you can begin to experiment and make these sauces your own.
This course is designed to be hands-on, approachable, and filled with my personal stories, tips, and insights. My hope is that by the end of it, you’ll not only have mastered a variety of sauces but also gained a deeper love and appreciation for cooking as a whole. Cooking, for me, is about joy, connection, and creativity — and I want to share that experience with you!
target_audience: This course is designed for anyone who loves pasta and wants to take their cooking skills to the next level! Whether you’re a total beginner or an experienced home cook, there's something here for you. Here’s who this course is perfect for:  Beginners: If you’ve never made pasta sauce from scratch before, don’t worry! I’ll walk you through the basics, step by step, with easy-to-follow instructions and plenty of tips to help you feel confident in the kitchen.  Home Cooks: If you already enjoy cooking but want to expand your repertoire or perfect your techniques, this course will introduce you to a variety of sauces, from classic Italian to more modern, creative flavors.  Busy Professionals: Do you love great food but find yourself pressed for time? Many of the sauces in this course are quick and simple, perfect for weeknight meals, but still delicious enough to impress family and friends.  Food Lovers and Enthusiasts: If you're passionate about food, Italian cuisine, or just want to experiment with new flavors, this course will inspire you to explore and enjoy the wonderful world of pasta sauces.  Those Who Want to Impress: Planning a dinner party or just want to wow your guests? I’ll show you how to make sauces that look and taste like they came from a restaurant, without all the fuss.  No matter your experience level, this course is for anyone who wants to bring a little more flavor, creativity, and joy into their cooking!

courses.title: WSET Level 2 Award in Wine - 5 Mock Exams = 250 Questions
courses.bio: Practice Questions Designed by Certified WSET Educator - boost your wine confidence, reinforce your knowledge
courses.description:
Wine and Spirits Education Trust (WSET) is globally recognised for Wine Education Courses and Certifications - respected by sommeliers, wine buyers, importers, and employers worldwide.


WSET is available to everyone - from wine lovers to professionals!


Boost your knowledge, and confidence using our Practice Questions for WSET Level 2 Award in Wine. They are the perfect companion to your wine studies and wine appreciation. These questions are based on the WSET Level 2 Specification and have been created to be similar to the "real exam".


Each exam is timed at 60 mins.
Pass mark - 55%
Merit - 70%
Distinction - 85%


This resource is designed by WSET Certified Educators to help you if you are;
starting your WSET wine education journey, or
brushing up before the Level 2 Exam, or
just curious and want to get a benchmark of how much you already know.
You’ll gain access to a bank of realistic, exam-style multiple-choice questions that are similar to the official WSET format. Each question is written to reinforce key topics including wine labeling terms, different grape characteristics, how they translate into your glass, factors influencing the style and quality of wine, how to make wine, food and wine pairing, wine storage and service - helping you recall essential facts quickly and accurately.


Practice at your own pace, get instant feedback, and identify any knowledge gaps. These questions not only boost your memory they build your confidence.


Don’t just study - study smarter.
Give yourself the best chance of passing the WSET Level 2 exam with flying colours.


Realistic, exam-style multiple-choice questions
Covers key topics: Wine labeling terms, different grape characteristics, factors influencing the style and quality of wine, how to make, food and wine pairing, wine storage and service
Instant feedback to help identify knowledge gaps
Study at your own pace, anywhere, anytime
Designed to support the WSET Level 2 Award in Wine
Ideal for wine lovers, beginners & hospitality professionals
Boosts confidence and reinforces what you've learned
Perfect companion to your WSET study materials
target_audience: WSET Level 2 Students - if you are studying Level 2 and want to practice some exams papers this is a great place to start
WSET Level 1 Students wondering what the step up is to Level 2 - try some questions, over 250, across 5 mock exams
Wine Lovers - curious to know what WSET is all about, what you might learn, what the exam would be like

courses.title: Baking cakes with honey
courses.bio: How to bake with pure natural honey plus 10 delicious honey cake and cookie recipes for you to try at home
objectives: You will learn about the types and grades of honey
You will learn about the properties of honey in cooking
You will learn how to substitute sugar with honey in any recipe
You will learn how to make 10 delicious cakes using honey
requirements: Basic baking equipment - cooker, measuring jug, scales for weighing etc
Some baking experience is helpful but not essential
Access to cake ingredients including honey, flour etc as specified by each recipie
courses.description:
In section one of the course we look at honey. Honey is an amazing natural product produced by honeybees.
We look at how honey is produced and the different types/grades of honey.
Consuming pure natural honey supports the livelihoods of beekeepers and the spread of beekeeping by creating a high demand for honey.  We all benefit from a healthier environment if we have more bees around.  Scientists tell us that pollinators, most often honey bees, are responsible for one in every three bites of food we take.
In the course we also look at the properties honey has a sweetener in baking and how to substitute sugar for honey in any recipe.
We will then go on to look at the equipment you will need to bake the 10 recipes in this course.
In section two we demonstrate 10 specially selected honey cakes and cookie recipes for you to try at home.
We begin by looking at your basic honey cake. Did you know that people compete in honey shows to make the best honey cake?  We then demonstrate a whole variety of other honey cake recipes including such delicious cakes as blueberry honey cake and bee sweet banana bread.
In section three we give you links to sources of further recipes so that you can make even more delicious honey cakes and biscuits.
target_audience: Beginners who want to learn how to make some delicious cakes using honey
Those who want to use honey as a substitute for sugar in their baking
Those who want some delicious honey cakes they can make easily at honey

objectives: En este curso aprenderás todo lo hace falta saber sobre la elaboración de las pizzas

La importancia de desharinar la masa de pizza

El horneado: Temperaturas de Cocción, tiempos de Cocción y Grosor de la Masa
Cómo saber el punto en que la pizza está hecha
Cómo lograr pizzas de masa gorda
El problema de que la pizza se pegue a la pala
Horneado de Pizzas: Pizza Hawaiana y comentarios sobre el Horneado
Importante, tocar lo menos posible el borde de la pizza
Cómo hacemos la salsa de tomate

requirements: No es necesario tener conocimientos previos de cocina, todo está explicado desde lo más básico y sencillo.
Para construir el horno es necesario tener un terreno, jardín o finca donde poder construirlo
courses.description:
La pizza es ese plato exquisito que se ha hecho popular por todo el mundo, en este curso te enseñaré todos los pasos de la elaboración de la pizza, desde la fermentación, la masa, el amasado, hasta el horneado.
La elaboración de la pizza es un arte sutil, necesitamos que la masa esté llena de sabor, necesitamos que la base esté crujiente y bien horneado pero el interior tierno, cremoso, jugoso, necesitamos que se hornee a la vez la masa y los ingredientes, necesitamos que la masa esté esponjosa, y tenemos que lograr todas estas condiciones al mismo tiempo, de la elaboración precisa de los pasos para lograr todo esto es el arte de hacer pizzas.
Es crucial entender las claves detrás de cada paso, entender su sentido, entender su por qué, porque así podremos gestionar el proceso de elaboración poniendo la justa medida de acción que requieren las distintas partes del proceso, por eso es tan importante entender el por qué y el sentido de cada una de las fases y pasos que damos en la elaboración de la pizza.
Con este curso aprenderás a crear los más altos estándares de pizzas y verás cómo tú puedes hacer las mismas pizzas, igual de ricas, increíbles, deliciosas, tremendas, cuando veas los resultados vas a estallar de encanto, emoción y alegría. Y lo mejor de todo es super fácil y super barato, no te va a costar casi nada, los ingredientes para hacer pizzas son muy baratos, los quesos son lo más caro, lo único que sí es esencial para hacer pizzas es un horno, necesitamos un horno que alcance una alta temperatura, y yo te voy a enseñar cómo puedes fabricar tu propio horno con un diseño muy fácil y con materiales sencillos que están al alcance de todos, sin ninguna complicación, sin usar cemento, sin nada, solo con piedras.

courses.title: American Cuisine by APCA chef online by Gabriel Bonin
courses.bio: This program covers different recipes of American Cuisine
objectives: Learn American burgers
Learn more about American Cusine
Learn to make hot dogs and Pie
Learn to make American dises
requirements: There is no requirement or Prerequisites for taking this course
courses.description:
American cuisine reflects the country’s history, diversity, and cultural influences. It blends Native American traditions with ingredients and techniques brought by immigrants from Europe, Africa, Asia, and Latin America. The result is a rich and varied food culture that ranges from regional specialties to iconic national dishes enjoyed around the world.
Program by Chef Gabriel Bonin, our Inhouse Executive Chef with a great experience working in different part of world including Michelin star restaurants in spain
This program, led by Chef Gabriel, introduces you to some of the most beloved American classics. Students will learn not just recipes, but also the techniques and cultural stories behind each dish. From casual comfort foods to festive specialties, this course covers the soul of American dining.
Featured Dishes
Cuban Sandwich – layers of ham, roasted pork, cheese, pickles, and mustard pressed in crusty bread.
Pulled Beef Burger – slow-cooked, tender beef piled into a juicy burger.
Shrimp & Pineapple Hotdog – a tropical twist on the American street food classic.
Crisp Fried Onion Rings – golden, crunchy, and irresistible.
Chili Hotdog – topped with rich beef chili and cheese.
Corn Soup with Curry – sweet corn blended with warming spices.
Clam Chowder – a New England classic, creamy and comforting.
Mac and Cheese – baked pasta with a creamy cheese sauce.
Honey BBQ Chicken Wings – sticky, smoky, and finger-licking good.
Texas Pecan Rice – a nutty, flavorful Southern side dish.
Bean & Beef Slow-Cooked Chili – hearty and spiced, a true American staple.
Honey Glazed Turkey – festive centerpiece with a sweet-savory glaze.
Beef & Mashed Potato Pie – comfort food at its finest.
California Lemon Pound Cake – moist, tangy, and perfect with tea or coffee.
Why Join This Program?
Through step-by-step demonstrations, you will:
Learn classic American cooking techniques.
Understand the role of chicken, beef, seafood, and vegetables in American menus.
Master regional and festive dishes.
Gain confidence in preparing both savory meals and sweet bakes.
APCA Chef Online
APCA Chef Online is a platform that digitalizes all of our professional Pastry & Culinary programs, giving you the opportunity to learn recipes by APCA’s renowned chefs in a structured, easy-to-follow way.
Conducted by our in-house pastry & culinary chefs, World Pastry Champions, Asia Pastry Champions, and Master Chefs, this platform brings together some of the best culinary expertise from around the globe—all in one place.
target_audience: This program is suitable for all which wish to learn more about Amrican classic dishes

courses.description:
Learn how to make your favorite breakfast foods AND stick to your low sodium diet! If you thought you'd never eat bacon, sausage, chorizo, pancakes, and biscuits again... this course is for you!!
Have you or a loved one been diagnosed with a condition that requires lowering sodium levels? Have you struggled to cook delicious low sodium breakfast meals? Have you tried to lower your sodium levels only to see small changes instead of the big drops you had hoped for? Do you feel like there is too much information on the internet about sodium, but not the information you need to create a good meal plan? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you are in the right place!
In this course, I'll provide the basics you'll need to create delicious low sodium breakfasts and a few recipes to get you started. This course will provide the information you need to start your journey to becoming a low sodium chef!  Judy, The Sodium Attacker, is always looking for ways to reduce sodium and keep the flavor!. You will become the sodium attacker for your family.
Upon completion of this course, you will learn:
Recipes and tips to create delicious low sodium breakfast meals
Why it is critical to read food labels, and what you can learn
Items that should be banished from your kitchen
Where to purchase low sodium replacements (5-page list included!)
Low sodium cooking DOES NOT have to be bland
You can enjoy no sodium or low sodium syrups for your pancakes and French toast
Recipes for breakfast:
Recipe for low sodium Bacon at 155 mg per POUND - lowest at my store has 1440 mg per pound
Recipe for low sodium Biscuits at 7.5 mg per biscuit
Recipe for low sodium Chicken Fried Steak - less than 77 mg for 4 ounces
Recipe for low sodium Chorizo (spicy & mild) - 65 mg to 70 mg sodium per 4 ounces
Recipe for low sodium Chili Powder (homemade) - less than 5 mg per Tablespoon - store bought has 240 mg
Recipe for low sodium Pancakes - Less than 15 mg sodium per pancake
Recipe for low sodium Pork Sausage has 65 mg sodium per 4 ounces
Recipe for low sodium Quiche - 85 to 114 mg per serving, depending on how hungry you are.
Can add bacon, sausage, or chorizo
Zero sodium Pie Crust recipe for Quiche
Zero sodium per serving Granola Bars - Soft or Crunchy - Better tasting than store bought!
Recipe for Eggs In A Nest - 70 mg for the egg plus what is in your bread choice
Recipe for Low Sodium Steak and Eggs


Join me to learn how to manage your sodium, and create low sodium breakfasts your family will love!

requirements: Pelatihan ini dapat diikuti oleh siapapun terutama untuk ibu rumah tangga, pembuat kue, penjual makanan, pekerja kantoran dan para korban PHK. Tingkat kesulitan pelatihan ini adalah tingkat dasar/pemula.
courses.description:
Halo Sobat Ilmu! Ayam menjadi salah satu bahan makanan yang dapat diolah menjadi berbagai macam menu, salah satu yang umum adalah olahan dengan bumbu Teriyaki. Ayam bumbu teriyaki mentai ditambah dengan nasi Gurih serta ditemani minuman Thai tea tentunya akan menjadi perpaduan menu makanan yang dapat menggugah selera.
Di pelatihan ini kamu dapat mempelajari bagaimana mengkreasikan perpaduan makanan tersebut untuk dapat kamu jual. Setiap peserta akan diajarkan cara pembuatan Ayam Teriyaki Mentai Bersama Nasi Gurih dan Minuman Thai Iced Tea, beserta alat dan bahan yang digunakan.
Thai tea adalah teh olahan khas Thailand yang sajiannya sekilas mirip dengan teh tarik tetapi memiliki rasa yang berbeda. Sama dengan teh tarik, teh ini pun sangat terkenal di negaranya dan juga mancanegara karena rasanya yang cocok dengan lidah kebanyakan orang. Berbeda dengan teh tarik, Thai tea adalah campuran teh hitam dengan bunga lawang, gula dan juga susu evaporasi. Teh ini memeiliki rasa pahit yang tak pekat dan cenderung manis. Selain diajarkan cara pembuatan, peserta akan diajarkan cara berbisnis online dalam penjualan makanan dan minuman.
Melalui pelatihan ini, peserta diharapkan dapat mengaplikasikan ilmu yang di dapat dalam kelas ini agar bisa menjadi peluang bisnis yang menghasilkan pendapatan, baik menggunakan penjualan online ataupun offline.
Dikelas ini kamu akan langsung diajarkan oleh seorang Chef Legenda lintas generasi yang sangat terkenal di dunia kuliner Indonesia yaitu Chef Bara Pattiradjawane. Tunggu apalagi, Ayo daftarkan dirimu dikelas Cariilmu sekarang juga!
target_audience: Pelatihan ini cocok untuk pekerja yang ingin memulai usaha atau pelaku usaha dibidang kuliner/makanan, Cocok juga untuk yang ingin bekerja di restoran sebagai juru masak.

requirements: No prior cooking experience is necessary, just a passion for learning and trying new recipes.
courses.description:
Discover the rich and diverse flavors of Pakistani cuisine with this comprehensive cooking course. Whether you're a beginner in the kitchen or an experienced home cook, this course will guide you step-by-step through the preparation of iconic Pakistani dishes, helping you create delicious, authentic meals with ease.
You’ll start by mastering the art of making perfect parathas—flaky, crispy flatbreads that are a staple in every Pakistani household. From there, we’ll dive into the world of biryani, where you’ll learn how to balance spices and textures to achieve the classic layered rice and meat dish that is loved worldwide. The course also covers a variety of curry dishes with rich, fragrant gravies, along with comforting lentils paired with rice, a true Pakistani comfort food.
Elevate your cooking with Chicken Malai Handi—a restaurant-style creamy chicken dish—and Beef Yakhni Pulao, a flavorful rice and meat dish perfect for special occasions. No Pakistani meal is complete without cooling accompaniments, so we’ll teach you how to prepare a refreshing raita to complement these rich dishes.
For those who enjoy quick bites, we’ll explore savory snacks like the ever-popular paratha roll, as well as a selection of traditional desserts that will satisfy your sweet tooth.
By the end of the course, you’ll have the confidence to recreate a full Pakistani feast at home, impressing family and friends with your newfound skills. Join me on this culinary journey, and bring the taste of Pakistan into your kitchen!
target_audience: Home cooks who want to explore authentic Pakistani cuisine and bring traditional flavors into their kitchen.
Beginners interested in learning essential Pakistani recipes and cooking techniques step-by-step.
Food enthusiasts looking to expand their knowledge of South Asian dishes and master classic recipes like biryani and parathas.
Anyone eager to recreate restaurant-style Pakistani dishes and discover delicious snacks and desserts.

courses.title: Whisky! Alles was du wissen solltest.
courses.bio: From Grain to bottle, also vom Getreide bis zur Flasche. In diesem Kurs erfährst du (fast) alles über Whisky
objectives: Die Herkunft des Whiskys
Die Geschichte des Whiskys
Die Herstellung von Whisky
Die verschiedenen Whisky - Arten
requirements: Du solltest dich für Whisky interessieren.
courses.description:
Whisky ist eine der komplexesten Spirituosen der Welt. Aber nicht nur sein vielschichtiges Aroma sondern auch seine besondere und spannende Geschichte macht Whisky so interessant.
In diesem Kurs werde ich sehr umfassend Whisky-Grundlagen vermitteln. Nach einem kurzen Abriß der Whisky-Geschichte, wo ich die Whisky-Nationen Irland, Japan und die USA darstelle, tauchen wir ein in die vielfältige Welt der aromatischen Spirituose.
Selbstverständlich steht Schottland im Fokus dieses Kurses. In einem großen Kapitel zum Thema Whisky in Schottland beschäftigen wir uns mit der spannenden Geschichte Schottlands, in der der Whisky stets eine große Rolle gespielt hat.
Eine detaillierte Erläuterung der unterschiedlichsten Arten von Whisky und wie man Whisky verkosten sollte, geben dem Kursteilnehmer Sicherheit im Umgang mit dem feinen Brand.
Als Absolvent der Springbank Whisky School in Campbeltown in Schottland habe ich sehr fundierte Kenntnisse über die Herstellung von Whisky und möchte diese mit allen Whisky-Freunden teilen. Ich habe unzählige Whisky-Tasting, teilweise mit bis zu 100 Teilnehmern, moderiert und freue mich, wenn meine Whisky-Leidenschaft anklang findet.
In dem Kapitel Herstellung wird die komplette Prozess-Kette der Whiskyherstellung, vom Mälzen des Getreides über die Destillation bis hin zur Abfüllung in die Flasche, sehr umfassend behandelt.
Anhand von diversen von mir erstellten Visualisierungen, Simulationen und Diagrammen lernst du die verschiedenen Apparate und Abläufe kennen und verstehst deren Funktionsweise.
Zahllose Präsentationen stehen als PDF zum Download bereit und zwischen den Kapiteln kannst du das erlernte in Quiz-Abschnitten auf die Probe stellen.
target_audience: Jeder, der mehr über Whisky wissen möchte.
Mitarbeiter in der Spirituosen-Industrie die ihr Whiskywissen vertiefen möchten
Mitarbeiter in der Gastronomie

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa en cocina ni en panadería. Este curso es básico e inicial, y en él se detallan todos los procesos desde 0 y con su paso a paso.
courses.description:
¡Aprendé a hacer tu masa madre desde 0, y con ella exquisitos panes! Adquirí este curso pre-grabado y hacelo a tus tiempos y a tu ritmo.
Este curso se enmarca dentro de una serie llamada "La cocina de la presencia", porque considero que el hecho de cocinar casero y de hacer tu comida con tus propias manos, implica un acto de presencia y de atención sobre aquello que preparas. Y creo que toda la presencia, el amor y el tiempo que le dedicamos a preparar nuestro alimento, hace que sea mucho más nutritivo.
Por ello, este curso es más que un curso de cocina: porque además de aprender a hacer un fermento natural y descubrir la magia de la Masa Madre, y todo el proceso que conlleva hacer un pan con este fermento, aprenderás a conectar con la consciencia, la atención plena y la presencia.
Más en concreto, en este curso de 50 minutos de duración aprenderás:
Qué es la masa madre.
Usos de la masa madre.
Beneficios del pan de masa madre.
Cómo hacer tu masa madre desde cero.
Tips para cuidar tu masa madre.
Utensilios para hacer tu pan.
Ingredientes del pan de masa madre.
Porcentaje panadero.
Pre-formado y formado del pan.
Horneado.
¡Adquirilo y empezá hoy mismo a preparar tus panes!
target_audience: Aficionados a la cocina y a la panadería

objectives: Understand the history, cultural significance, and regional variations of paan & beeda in India and beyond.

requirements: No prior experience in making paan or beeda is required—this course is beginner-friendly.

courses.description:
Paan and beeda are more than just after-meal delicacies—they are a centuries-old tradition that weaves together flavor, artistry, and cultural heritage. From festive celebrations to everyday indulgence, paan has been a symbol of hospitality, community, and craftsmanship across India and beyond. The Art of Paan & Beeda is your complete guide to mastering this unique culinary art, whether for personal enjoyment, cultural preservation, or business growth.
In this course, you will embark on a flavorful journey starting with the fascinating history and regional variations of paan & beeda. You will learn how different communities have added their own twist to ingredients, flavors, and presentation styles, creating a delightful diversity of recipes.
We begin by understanding the core of every paan—the betel leaf. You will learn how to identify, select, and prepare the finest leaves for perfect taste and texture. From there, we explore the wide variety of traditional and modern fillings—meetha paan, sada paan, zarda paan, chocolate paan, and even fusion recipes that bring a creative flair to this timeless treat.
The course will guide you through step-by-step demonstrations of folding, wrapping, and garnishing techniques. Whether it’s the classic triangular fold, the rose-style wrap, or innovative presentations for special occasions, you will develop the skills to make your paan as visually appealing as it is delicious.
Hygiene and quality are essential in food preparation, and you will learn best practices for safe storage, ingredient handling, and workspace cleanliness. For those with entrepreneurial ambitions, we will cover practical tips on pricing, sourcing ingredients, serving customers, and creating a memorable brand.
By the end of this course, you will:
Understand the cultural significance of paan & beeda.
Identify and select high-quality betel leaves.
Master traditional and modern paan recipes.
Perfect folding, wrapping, and presentation techniques.
Maintain hygiene and quality standards.
Gain insights into running a successful paan & beeda business.
Whether you’re a food enthusiast eager to expand your culinary skills, a hospitality professional looking to offer something unique, or an aspiring entrepreneur dreaming of a profitable paan shop, this course is designed for you.
Join me, and together we’ll preserve tradition, explore creativity, and celebrate flavor—one leaf at a time.
target_audience: Aspiring entrepreneurs who want to start their own paan or beeda shop.
Food enthusiasts eager to explore the cultural heritage and flavors of traditional Indian delicacies.
Hospitality and catering professionals looking to add unique offerings to their menus.
Event planners who want to create memorable food experiences for weddings, parties, and festivals.
Home cooks interested in mastering both classic and modern paan recipes.
Cultural enthusiasts who wish to preserve and promote traditional culinary arts.
Anyone curious to learn a new skill that combines artistry, flavor, and tradition.

requirements: No experience necessary - All levels welcome - Beginners, Intermediate, & Advanced
courses.description:
If you want to learn how to decorate birthday cupcakes, then get "How To Decorate Birthday Cupcakes" by someone who has real life experience in decorating cupcakes for birthdays.
Are you a busy mom or simply a thoughtful friend who wants to give something practical but special to people who are celebrating their birthdays? Do you gaze in wonder at the pretty cupcakes displayed at the bakeshop window and wonder how those were made? Do you want to be able to make those on your own but think that you have very little baking ability or that you’re not that artistic? Fret no more! This guide can definitely help you bake and decorate cupcakes that you can serve to your guests during your five-year-old’s birthday party or give as a gift at your best friend’s 30th birthday celebration.
- Learn some basic cupcake recipes (if you don’t have one of your own)
- Learn how to use ordinary stickers or decorative paper in adorning cupcakes
- Learn how to make buttercream frosting and use them together with sprinkles or edible confetti in decorating cupcakes
- Learn how to make fondant and assemble fondant characters to sit on top of your delicious cupcakes
- Learn how to come up with a specially home-baked present for family and friends that will bring sheer delight to the recipient and his guests
- Use what you’ve learned to start your own home-based cupcake business!
What else are you waiting for? Grab this guide now and start making cupcakes for your family and friends during their birthdays or start your own cupcake business!


About the Expert
Khyria Cepe used to think that baking was hard, but upon the prodding of one of her close friends who later became her business partner in their cupcake business, she tried to learn how to bake. She bought cookbooks and tried to follow them and was dismayed at her initial failures. However, the number of flopped recipes did not decrease her drive but instead fueled her determination to learn the art of baking. After several soggy cupcakes, with the inspiration of the popular TV shows Ace of Cakes and DC Cupcakes, she began to increase her baking skills until she eventually had the courage to start her cupcake store Sugar and Spice (and everything nice) in her hometown in the Philippines.
She enjoys baking because it is a practical craft to learn, and it allows her to exercise her creativity and stretch the limits of her imagination.
target_audience: Cupcake Enthusiasts

requirements: Ser capaz de cocinar
courses.description:
Curso Teórico y Práctico para aprender y profundizar en la cocinar a baja temperatura, ya sea en tu casa o en tu restaurante.


++++++ MÁS DE 7 HORAS DE CONTENIDO ACTUALIZADO 2021 +++++++


¿Quieres convertirte en un experto de la cocina a baja temperatura?
¿Has oído a hablar de la baja temperatura y te gustaría poder aplicarla en tu cocina?
¿Quizá ya has practicado esta técnica pero te gustaría profundizar más?


¡Con este curso vas a convertirte en un experto de la cocina a baja temperatura! Profundizarás en la cocina a baja temperatura, una técnica de cocciones suaves con precisión para alcanzar la máxima calidad del producto. Entrarás en detalle en los factores más importantes que permiten controlar las cocciones y así obtener resultados mucho más óptimos en tu cocina. Analizarás las ventajas que tiene esta técnica y verás los dos tipos principales de cocciones con las que dividimos la cocina a baja temperatura (directas e indirectas). Estudiarás los beneficios de la baja temperatura en cuanto a salud y nutrición, sostenibilidad y racionalidad. Contaremos con la ayuda de dos profesionales de la materia: Pere Castells, científico gastronómico, y por el otro, Prabhu Sukh (Alex Pirla), chef especializado en cocina de vegetales. Además, aprenderás a cocinar recetas fáciles (te las podrás descargar) para que puedas practicar este tipo de cocina, ya sea en tu casa o en tu restaurante  y con las herramientas y maquinaria adecuados.


Lo que aprenderás:
- Conocerás con detalle la filosofía del concepto "baja temperatura", su relación con la ciencia y la nutrición.
- Entrarás en el mundo de la baja temperatura. Profundizarás en los aspectos más importantes que deberás tener en cuenta a partir de este momento para poner en práctica la cocina a baja temperatura.
- Dominarás los 2 grandes grupos de cocción a baja temperatura. Entenderás las diferencias entre cocciones directas e indirectas, que serán fundamentales en el desarrollo de esta técnica, y aprenderás cómo usarlas con diferentes grupos de ingredientes (carnes, pescados, verduras).
- Verás diferentes técnicas de cocción a baja temperatura para que puedas cocinar con diferentes caminos (al vacío, al horno, en kamado, etc.).
- Distinguirás los elementos básicos a tener en cuenta en la conservación de los alimentos, haciendo especial incidencia en cuestiones de seguridad alimentaria.
- Aprenderás otras técnicas relacionadas con la cocina a baja temperatura, como la sobrecocción o la cocción con líquidos de gobierno.
- Descubrirás complementos aplicables a la cocina a baja temperatura y que podrás llevar a cabo con tus propios equipos.


Este curso lo he estructurado de una manera muy sencilla en 7 principales módulos:
- Módulo 1: Cocina a baja temperatura
- Módulo 2: La baja temperatura: conceptos iniciales
- Módulo 3: Los dos grandes grupos de cocciones: directas e indirectas
- Módulo 4: Técnicas para la cocina a baja temperatura
- Módulo 5: La conservación en la cocina a baja temperatura
- Módulo 6: Complementos de la cocción a baja temperatura
- Módulo 7: Finalización del curso


¿Hay requisitos para realizar el curso?
Nociones básicas de cocinar


¿Para quién es este curso?
Aficionados a la cocina
Profesionales de la cocina


Si quieres ser un experto de la cocina a baja temperatura, ¡dale a COMPRAR ESTE CURSO! ¡Te espero!


Salvador Brugués
Cocinero especializado en cocina a baja temperatura y al vacío.
target_audience: Aficionados a la cocina
Profesionales de la cocina
Chefs

courses.title: A Beginner's Guide to Canning Salsa at Home
courses.bio: Tips, tools, methods: everything you need to safely can salsa at home
objectives: Understand best practices for safe home canning
Identify and follow a tested canning recipe
Stock a kitchen for canning
Prepare ingredients for home canned salsa
Cook through a safe canned salsa recipe
Process and store canned salsa
Use home canned salsa in the kitchen

Making Salsa: Making Salsa (That is Safe for Canning)

requirements: Basic cooking skills and equipment are required. A small number of speciality canning tools will be required, but are covered at length in the course. No previous canning experience is required—in fact, this course is designed to make first-time canners feel confident.
courses.description:
If you've ever felt interested in learning how to can food at home but felt too intimidated to get started, this course is perfect for you. I'm a home canning expert with decades of experience, and I will cover all the information you need to safely can salsa at home using fresh, wholesome ingredients. You'll be amazed at just how simple canning actually is!


Can Salsa Confidentially Using Our Fool-Proof Tested Canning Method
Learn what tools and supplies you need to stock your kitchen
Master all the techniques you need to can food safely
Overcome any fear you have about canning
Cook along with a canning expert with over 25 years of home canning experience
Stock your pantry with your home-canned salsa!
You will come out of the course with six jars of homemade salsa and a heap of confidence to take into your next canning project.


The number one comment I get when teaching canning is folks are scared to try it because they fear they'll poison their family—no worries, in this course, I will teach you how to can confidently while we work through an easy, delicious salsa recipe. You'll learn the ONE MISTAKE people make when canning that makes their food unsafe—and how easy it is to avoid it.


We'll also cover all the detailed information about tools, jars, lids, and other equipment you need to get started (hint: it isn't nearly as much as you may think). Plus, we do a full cook-through of the entire salsa recipe—start to finish. You'll be stocking your pantry with beautiful jars of home-canned salsa by the end of this course.


This course is designed for folks who have never canned before or who are still new to the art of canning. I'll cover everything you need to know in 10 short videos that are a mix of presentation lectures and cook-along videos with voiceover. I also provide a simple printable recipe that you can keep on hand for future reference, plus numerous links to outside resources that can help you feel confident with your canning.
target_audience: Home cooks who are interested in learning how to can homemade salsa, but might feel intimidated by the process

courses.description:
In every society traditional dishes have their own special stories to tell , it is the creamy, oven-baked dishes of Arabian Perennial Rice that take pride of place on the table.
Arabian Perennial Rice combination of rice, fresh cream, milk and a dab of ghee make this dish one of the Egyptian favorite specialties.
It is a luxurious evolution of regular cooked rice, which in its turn is a staple of Egyptian culinary culture. Arabian Perennial Rice was always a traditional treat. The ingredients needed for its preparation are readily available in all  houses,
Perennial Rice with Chicken Bram and Arab Potatos bram are the  most delicious meal you will eat in your life  and you will not be need to waste your money again in the fast food or to went to a restaurant to eat what you want . it is the easiest way to do it in home & cannot take much time in the kitchen.
Baked rice in clay pots, loaded with butter, milk, and cream, can be savory . incredible texture and heavenly taste.
Perennial rice in one of the authentic, traditional Egyptian rice recipes, this rice is loaded with full cream, ghee and full-fat milk.
the slow cooking of rice in the oven gives it a lot of time to soak up all these flavors, to come up unique, fluffy, and tastes heavenly good. This rice can be made meatless, with red meat, minced meat or chicken so you choose, I prefer to make it with chicken for a one-dish meal, put it in the oven and forget about it for 30 minutes until done.

Pensamos nesse curso com muito carinho! Depois de assistir todas as aulas e colocar a mão na massa, você vai se sentir confiante para fazer bolos mais elaborados, entrar no mercado de confeitaria para casamentos e debutantes e e ganhar novos clientes!


E não é só isso! Você ainda receberá apostila e certificado:

courses.title: The best way of making moroccan pancakes msemen
courses.bio: How to make moroccan pancakes msemen in different recipies
objectives: Learn more about moroccan kitchen
How to make in different ways moroccan pancakes msemen
Step by step to make moroccan pancakes msemen
Learn about moroccan dishes

Introduction: The secret of the crunch and fluffy msemen
Dough preparation: Part 2 of circulation of the dough

requirements: No requirements needed
courses.description:
Have you ever heard about moroccan food?
Do you want to discover and try moroccan recipies at home?
You are in the right place !
With me you will be able to make different recipies step by step and you will love to cook and discover new moroccan flavors as well as the famous pastry.
In this course i will share with you different recipies of making moroccan pancakes msemen
Moroccan msemen is a traditional north African flatbread often described as a square-shaped , flaky , and buttry pancakes.its made from a dough of flour , semolina , water and salt , which is stretched thin,folded multiple times with oil or butter , and then pan Fried until golden and crispy on the outside but soft inside. Msemen is commonly enjoyed for breakfast or as a snack , serves with honey and butter , or alongside mint tea . It's also used as a base for savory fillings , such as spiced meat or végétales. It's distinctive layers and crisp edges makes it a beloved part of moroccan cuisine
you’ve never made msemen before, I encourage you to try the recipe as is.
Don’t be alarmed by the quantity of oil and butter used in the process of shaping the msemen. All that oil won’t be absorbed into the dough. Done properly, msemen shouldn’t feel greasy or be any more indulgent than other rich treats such as croissants or donuts.


You’ll need ample work space to shape the dough into squares. A well-cleaned, clutter-free granite counter top, a large flat plastic or metal tray, or a large Moroccan gsaa will all do. Once, cooked, the msemen store beautifully in the freezer and are easy to reheat on short notice, so plan to make them ahead of time.
Once you master msemen, be sure to try making meloui, another type of Moroccan laminated crepe or pancake
target_audience: For beginners

Se você é iniciante na confeitaria, quer aprender fazer seus primeiros bolos profissionais ou até mesmo começar seu negócio da cozinha da sua casa, saiba que esse é curso é a melhor opção para você.

Como você sabe, na internet existem quilos de informações sobre esse assunto que mais parece um labirinto sem fim e você pode estar perdido nele, assim como eu há alguns anos atrás, e realmente você não precisa passar por isso…
Eu reuni nesse Curso a cereja do bolo, tudo que você precisa para iniciar na confeitaria da forma certa. Após concluir o curso você estará preparado(a) para produzir seus primeiros bolos profissionais e dar seus primeiros passos na construção de um negócio lucrativo na confeitaria.

Aguardo você do outro lado!

courses.title: Cocina salada sin gluten. Masas y pastas gluten free.

objectives: Aprenderemos a realizar distintos tipos de masas saladas y pastas sin gluten de una forma fácil y rápida.
Distintos tipos de pastas. Masas saladas para empanadas, tartas y tacos. Masas leudadas saladas: pizza, focaccia, calzone.
Masa de hojaldre con mi método fácil para hojaldrar.
¿Que es la contaminación cruzada con gluten y cómo evitarla?
Diferenciar celiaquía, intolerancia y sensibilidad.
Todos los cuidados que tenemos que tener para realizar preparaciones para celíacos.

Teoría. Primeros pasos para realizar mas: Bienvenido a este curso de masas saladas y pastas libres de gluten.
Tips importantes antes de comenzar a cocinar sin gluten.
Práctica. Masas saladas para estirar. Ho: Masa hojaldrada sin gluten. Tarta de cebolla y queso.
Masa criolla sin gluten. Empanadas de carne.

courses.description:
Aprenderás a producir una amplia variedad de preparaciones para almuerzos y cenas libres de gluten. Nos centraremos sobre todo en las masas y pastas. Lograrás masas de empanadas, tartas, tacos y pastas súper elásticas y fáciles de manejar y de formar. Y masas saladas leudadas como pizzas, focaccia y calzone súper esponjosas y crocantes.
Con este curso estarás altamente calificado, una vez concluido, para realizar tus preparaciones 100% libres de gluten y aptos para celíacos. Ya sea que lo hagas para tu hogar, o para aplicar a un emprendimiento o empresa, estas recetas te resultarán súper practicas y fáciles de lograr.
Me interesa tanto como a vos que logres resultados óptimos, por lo cual podrás consultarme cuantas veces necesites si te surge alguna duda. ¡Estoy para guiarte y ayudarte!
Las recetas sin gluten que verás en este curso son:
Masa básica de pastas.
Tallarines salteados con verduras.
Raviolones de calabaza con salsa de queso azul y verdeo.
Ñoquis con salsa boloñesa.
Canelones.
Pizza.
Focaccia.
Calzone.
Tarta con masa hojaldrada.
Empanadas con salsa criolla.
Tortillas para tacos.
¡Sin mix comerciales! Hacemos nuestras propias premezclas y combinaciones de harinas. Los principales ingredientes que usamos para esto son:
Almidón de maíz.
Harina de arroz.
Fécula de mandioca.
Leche en polvo ( te enseño como reemplazarla es caso de intolerancia).
Goma xántica o guar.
Trataremos temas importantes como:
La contaminación cruzada.
La limpieza necesaria para eliminar el gluten.
Qué hornos utilizar.
Utensilios aptos para la producción.
Celiaquía, intolerancia, sensibilidad y dieta sin gluten.
¡Podés aprender a tu propio ritmo y en tus horarios disponibles! Tenes acceso de por vida a los videos, podrás verlos cuantas veces necesites, pausarlos, y volver a retomar desde los puntos que necesites, en los momentos que vos elijas.
No es necesario que tengas ninguna experiencia previa, ¡con muchas ganas de aprender es suficiente!
