courses.description:
Non e un corso di cucina ma un corso dedicato alla conoscenza della pizza con altre varianti di cottura
In questo corso conosceremo una pizza fantastica in chiave calabrese che prende spunto dalla pizza al padellino.
Parleremo del lievito ed del suo livello di idratazione
Ricordate che più una farina e forte e più regge l’idratazione ecco una tabella che vi spiega come scegliere la farina in base al tipo di impasto che volete realizzare.


Tabella idratazione
· Farina debole con W compreso tra 150 e 200 massimo il 50/55 % di idratazione
· Farina poco rinforzate con W compreso tra 200 e 250 massimo il 60/65 % di idratazione
· Farine rinforzate con W compreso tra 250 e 300 massimo il 70/75 % di idratazione
· Farine forti con W compreso tra 300 e 400 massimo il 80/90 % di idratazione
Una cosa molto importante da sapere e che per ottenere un impasto ben incordato l’acqua oltre a non essere inserita tutta in una volta deve essere anche fredda da frigorifero, ma ne parleremo meglio durante la preparazione dell’impasto.


Scopriremo insieme come
Scegliere la farina
La maturazione dell'impasto
La lievitazione
Come utilizzare la mozzarella fior di latte
Come trattare il pomodoro
L'olio d'oliva come sceglierlo ed utilizzarlo
Le varie ricette
La stesura
La Cottura
I vari condimenti
Le varie preparazione
Le ricette gourmet
E tanto altro


Una tipologia di pizza fantastica tutta da provare

courses.title: The Mixed & Batched Guide to Whiskey
courses.bio: A crash course on tasting whiskey, making cocktails, and learning your way around a bar.
objectives: Name traits associated with different styles of whiskey
Make four cocktails at home
Troubleshoot unbalanced drinks
Discern facts from marketing on a bottle's label
requirements: No prior knowledge needed. You will learn everything you need to know.
courses.description:
Whether you’re getting into whiskey or sling it professionally, one of the most frustrating (and most beautiful) parts of loving the spirit is that there’s always more to discover. But when you first start going to tastings, it can feel like everyone is making up the flavors that they’re tasting–and you’re right.
Join our host, Clair McLafferty, as she takes you through a guided tour of the basics. Learn how to harness your memories to write tasting notes and pick your way through the fact and fiction swirling around John Barleycorn. Wherever you are in your journey with whiskey, this class will help you dig a little deeper.
But even if you’re still trying to find that first bottle you love and prefer cocktails, The Mixed & Batched Guide to Whiskey covers the basics of what bar tools to buy, some classic cocktail recipes, and how to harness your knowledge for a party.
In this easy and fast video series, learn how to shop for whiskey, the differences are between its types, and the origins of the category. Learn how to talk about what you taste--and to mix a few classic cocktails--and never worry about participating in the conversation ever again.
target_audience: New whisk(e)y drinkers who want to better express what whisk(e)ys they like and why
Seasoned whisk(e)y drinkers who want to expand their knowledge of the spirit

courses.title: Scotch Savvy: The Essential Course for Future Whisky Experts
courses.bio: Discover everything you need to know to be a scotch whisky expert, from history and production, to flavour and tasting.
objectives: Discover the rich history of Scotch whisky – from monks to global fame
Learn how Scotch whisky is made, from malting to maturation
Understand the different whisky regions
Navigate the key styles of Scotch whisky (single malt, blended, grain, etc.)
Learn how to nose, taste, and appreciate whisky like an expert
Discover the role of barrels in ageing and how they affect flavour
Understand common whisky tasting terms and how to describe aromas

Introduction: The Fascinating History of Scotch Whisky
How is Scotch Malt Whisky Made?
How Grain Scotch Whisky is Made
The Different Types of Scotch Whisky
An Introduction to Scotch Whisky Flavours
How to Select the Perfect Tasting Glass

requirements: No previous whisky knowledge is required. The course starts at ground zero and guides you through each area of scotch whisky knowledge.
courses.description:
Gain Expert Level Scotch Whisky Knowledge in Just One Convenient Course!
Have you ever stood in front of a whisky shelf, feeling overwhelmed by the vast selection? Wondered what separates a single malt from a blended whisky? Or simply wanted to appreciate Scotch like a connoisseur? If so, this course is for you!
In Scotch Whisky 101, we take you on a journey through the remarkable world of whisky, covering everything from its origins to modern-day distillation and tasting techniques. Whether you're a complete beginner or an enthusiast looking to refine your knowledge, this course provides everything you need to understand and enjoy scotch whisky with confidence.
You will learn about the different types of scotch whisky, the different regions, and gain in-depth knowledge of how it is made, including both malt whisky and grain whisky production. You will also be guided through whisky flavour and the tasting process by an experienced sensory panel leader with over 15 years' experience of assessing whisky casks for some of the industry's leading bottlers.

This course contains everything you need to go from zero whisky knowledge up to an expert level. It also includes a 37 page A4 downloadable guide to help you follow along and gain additional insights.
Enjoy, and prepare to be immersed in the world of scotch whisky.
target_audience: Whisky newcomers and enthusiasts who want to gain a comprehensive understanding of all aspects of scotch whisky.
Drinks industry professionals seeking to gain foundations in scotch whisky distillation and sensory appreciation..
Whisky tasting hosts who wish to add professional insights to their events.

courses.title: Learn to Cook Thai Food with Ann
courses.bio: A simple step-by-step Thai Cooking Class. Learn Thai food recipes and prepare them at the comfort of your own home!
objectives: Be able to prepare the dishes that we have taught you.
Whip out dishes that your family, friends and yourself love!
Have a better understanding of how Thai food is prepared.
Realize that cooking Thai food is not as complicated as it seems.

Introduction: Phad Ka Phaow Moo Saap; a local favourite
Nor Mai Farang Phad Goong; healthy and tasty.
Yum Kai Tom; perfect for breakfast.
Khaow Phad Goong; deliciously Thai styled.
Laap Moo; classic Esaan style dish.
Goong Ka Buang; crispy and savoury shrimp pancake.
Cabbage with Fish Sauce; simple yet well-liked by many.
Tom Yum Goong; national dish of Thailand
Bonus Video: How to cook Thai style Omelette; fluffy and crispy

requirements: You should have basic cooking equipments.
Little/no knowledge about cooking (e.g cooking an egg).
Have access to supermarkets that sell Asian food ingredients.
A pestle & mortar to be used for crushing garlic and chilli.
courses.description:
Ever missed the food you had during your visit to Thailand and wished to have it again? Then you have come to the right place! At CookYourOwnThai, we will be showing and teaching you how to make those popular dishes you had in Thailand, which means that you can now have delicious authentic Thai food without having to leave your country.

Most people have a misconception that Thai food has lots of ingredients and are a hassle to prepare, but we will change your mindset. Every recipe taught in this course will take no more than 20 minutes to cook. In addition, all recipes have a downloadable ingredient list which you can print and bring along with you to the supermarket to get the required items.
This course is suitable for anyone who loves Thai food
Recipes taught in this course are popular and easy to prepare
You do not need any special equipments for cooking our recipes
We will be guiding you through every step, including cutting of ingredients like onions
Be sure to check out our course and if you have any questions, feel free to ask us through email or in the comments section. We hope that all of you will enjoy our teachings and find them useful!
target_audience: Anyone who loves Thai food.
Anyone who has no idea how to prepare them.
Anyone who is interested in learning how to prepare and cook Thai food.
Anyone who just wants to have fun while learning how to prepare food from a different cuisine.

courses.description:
お菓子作りがもっと上手になりたい！そんな願いを叶える講座「パーフェクトケーキシリーズ」のパートシュクレ（クッキー・タルト生地）編です。


「レシピ通りに作ってもうまくいかない」「いつもと同じに作っているのに仕上がりが違うことがある」そんな経験は誰にでもありませんか？それには明確な理由があります。

パーフェクトケーキシリーズは、基本の製菓技術を身につけ、安定した仕上がりのお菓子が作れるようになるのと同時に、きれいに作るためにはどうしたらよいかがわかる新しい製菓講座です。


★混ぜ方をしっかり見せます。
お菓子作りは温度管理がとても重要です。といっても、難しいお話ではありません。動画と補足の説明（PDF）を見れば「なるほど」とすぐにわかることばかりです。理由を知って自分らしくお菓子作りを楽しんでください。混ぜるは簡単なようでいて奥が深いのです。動画でイメージトレーニングをすることで、同じように作れるようになりますので、早送りせず何度も見てください。
★きれいに作るコツ、道具の使い方がわかります。
どのくらいのサイズの道具を使うのがよいのか。きれいに作るためにするべきこと、動きがわかります。実際のミサリングファクトリーのレッスンと同じことをお伝えしています。

Merhaba! Bu eğitimin öncelikli hedefi, ev mutfaklarımızda temel boyutta sushi yapmayı öğrenmektir. Dolayısıyla bu kurs, sushi yapmayı daha keyifli ve kolay hale getirecek bir metot niteliğinde olup; sushi pirinci hazırlamakla ilgili incelikler, dikkat edilmesi gereken kritik anlar gibi birçok noktayı özenle, en temel anlatım dili ve yöntemlerini kullanarak adım adım sunmuştur.  Ayrıca kendi tecrübelerimden yola çıkarak yapım aşamasında karşınıza çıkabilecek zorluk veya aksiliklere karşı da her türlü detay noktaya ders içeriğinde yer verdim, dolayısıyla sushi konusunda bilgi sahibi olan kişiler için de fayda sağlayacak nitelikte bir içerik mevcut. Derslerdeki püf noktaları ve yardımcı yazılı kaynaklar, kurtarıcınız olacaktır. Aklınıza takılan ve sormak istediğiniz her soru için de mesaj kutumu sık sık kontrol edeceğim.


Hello! The primary goal of this training is to learn how to make basic-sized sushi in our home kitchens. Therefore, this course is a method that will make making sushi more enjoyable and easy; He carefully presented many points, such as the details of preparing sushi rice, critical moments that need attention, step by step, using the most basic language and methods. In addition, based on my own experience, I have included all kinds of detail points in the course content against the difficulties or setbacks that you may encounter during the construction phase, so there is a content that will benefit people who have knowledge about sushi. Tutorials and helpful written resources will be your savior. I will also check my message box frequently for any questions you have in mind and want to ask.

Barlarda kullanılan malzemeler öğretilecek
Barlarda kullanılan bardaklar öğretilecek
Miksoloji, barmenlik gibi meslekler için bilgilendirici bir eğitim olacak

Mayalandırılarak Üretilen Alkollü İçecek: Şarap Ve Yemek, Şarabın Satın Alınması, Şarabın Saklanması, Şarap Üretimi

requirements: Temelden başlayan bir eğitim olduğu için bir gereksinime ihtiyaç yoktur
courses.description: Bu eğitimde alkollü ve alkolsüz içecekler hakkında bilgi verilmekte olup miksoloji ve barmenlik mesleğini benimsemek isteyen kişiler için bilgilendirici bir kaynak özelliği taşır. Eğitim içeriğinde alkolsüz içecekler olarak ıhlamur adaçayı, su, meşrubatlar, kahve, siyah çay, meyve suyu gibi içecekler ile alkollü içecekler olarak şarap, şampanya, bira, likör, kokteyller, brendi konyak, cin, rom, tekila ve çok daha içki üzerinde durulup hepsi hakkında yeterli bilgi ve görsel sağlanmaya çalışılmıştır. Günümüzde popüler olan barmenlik ve miksoloji meslekleri ile ilgili bilgilenmek ve bu meslekleri yapmak, aynı zamanda popülerleşen alkollü içkiler hakkında bilgilenmek isteyen kişiler için uygun bir eğitimdir. Her alkollü ve alkolsüz içecek hakkında detaylı bilgiler sunulup uygun ve yeterli görsellerle akılda soru kalmaması ve hafızada daha çok kalması için görsel zenginliğe aynı zamanda detaylara ve püf noktalara önem verilmiştir. Ağırlıklı olarak alkollü içecekler hakkında bilgi verilmiş olup aynı zamanda alkolsüz içecekler de yeterli düzeyde eğitimde yer bulmuştur. Vücudumuzda bolca ihtiyaç duyulan ve sıkça tüketilen içecekler önemi anlatılmak istenmiş olup çok çeşitli içeceklerin varlığı ve doğru teknikle üretimi ve önemi üzerinde sıkça durulmuştur. Bu eğitim sonrası hem gastronomi ve aşçılık mesleğine ilgi duyan hem de miksoloji ve barmenliğe ilgi duyanlar için önemli bir kaynaktır zira alkollü ürünler de yemek yapımında kullanılmaktadır. Geleceğin meslekleri olarak görülen bu meslekleri düşünen ve yeterli kaynak eksikliği olanlar için dolu dolu bilgiler verilemeye çalışılmıştır.
target_audience: Miksoloji ve barmenliği merak eden ve bu mesleği yapmak isteyen kişiler için aynı zamanda alkollü içkiler ve alkolsüz içecekler hakkında bilgilenmek isteyen kişiler için de uygundur

courses.title: Learn how to make Moroccan vegetable harira
courses.bio: Moroccan Vegetable Harira
courses.description:
Moroccan Vegetable Harira
2 correct answers for each question
Exercise 1: 1 questions
Exercise 2: 1 questions
Exercise 3: 1 questions
Exercise 4: 1 questions
Exercise 5: 1 questions
secret of Harira : 1 questions +  The Secret to Perfect Harira
Ingredients:
2 tbsp olive oil
1 large onion, finely chopped
2 celery stalks, diced
3 garlic cloves, minced
2 medium carrots, diced
1 cup canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 cup lentils, rinsed
4 large tomatoes, blended (or 2 cups canned tomato puree)
1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
1 tsp ground turmeric
1 tsp ground cinnamon
1 tsp ground ginger
1/2 tsp paprika
1/2 tsp black pepper
Salt to taste
6 cups vegetable broth
1/4 cup vermicelli or small pasta (optional)
Instructions:
Sauté the aromatics:
Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, celery, garlic, and carrots. Sauté until softened, about 5–7 minutes.
Add the spices:
Stir in turmeric, cinnamon, ginger, paprika, and black pepper. Let the spices bloom for 1–2 minutes to release their aroma.
Combine the base ingredients:
Add the tomatoes, chickpeas, lentils, parsley, and cilantro. Stir well to combine.
Pour in the broth:
Add the vegetable broth and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and let it simmer for 30–40 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Optional: Add pasta
If you’d like, stir in the vermicelli or small pasta during the last 10 minutes of cooking.
Adjust seasoning:
Taste the harira and adjust the salt or spices as needed.
Serve and enjoy:
Ladle the soup into bowls, garnish with extra cilantro, and serve with crusty bread or traditional Moroccan flatbread.
Harira is traditionally enjoyed during Ramadan, but its comforting flavors make it a favorite year-round!
target_audience: Home cooks and food enthusiasts who want to explore authentic Moroccan cuisine and expand their cooking skills.
Beginners looking for step-by-step guidance to prepare flavorful and healthy Moroccan dishes.

Do you love Mediterranean food? So many colours, textures, and flavours!


Always wanted to learn how to make your own amazing hummus? make pitas from scratch? or an amazing flavourful salad?


Join me for a delicious Mediterranean class, learning to make mouthwatering dishes all from scratch, in the comfort of your own kitchen, and at your own pace.

Enjoy an intimate experience at your own home, as we meet new ingredients and flavors, learn helpful kitchen tips, and prepare yummy recipes from scratch, in a wonderful hands-on experience!


This class includes 10 dishes - appetizers, mains, condiments, salads, bread, sides, a drink, and dessert too! - each dish has its own step by step video, written recipe, ingredient and equipment list!


Mediterranean food is very vegan friendly and in this class we are going to make some of my favorite dishes!

courses.description:
WSET is available to everyone - from wine lovers to professionals!
Wine and Spirits Education Trust (WSET) is globally recognised for Wine Education Courses and Certifications - respected by sommeliers, wine buyers, importers, and employers worldwide.


Your First Confident Step Into the World of Wine
Feel overwhelmed by wine lists? Unsure how to describe what you’re tasting? Struggle to choose a bottle in the shop or pair wine with dinner?
You’re not alone - and this course was made exactly for you.
The WSET Level 1 Award in Wines is your globally recognized gateway to wine confidence. Designed for total beginners, this course breaks down the world of wine into simple, enjoyable steps - no jargon, no snobbery, just real knowledge.
Whether you’re a wine enthusiast, a curious foodie, or considering a future in the wine industry, looking to start a sommelier career, this course will help you build a rock-solid foundation in wine - with zero prior experience needed.


You’ll Quickly Learn
How to taste wine like a pro using the WSET Systematic Approach
Key stages of grape growing and winemaking
Main wine styles and what makes them different
The 8 Principal Grape Varieties and their characteristics
Popular wines like Chianti, and what sets them apart
How to properly store and serve wine
Basic principles of food and wine pairing
Wine terms explained - without the fluff or pretentiousness
Mock Exam to prepare you for success


What You'll Walk Away With
A clear understanding of wine - from vineyard to glass
The confidence to order, talk about, and enjoy wine in any setting
The ability to taste and describe wine accurately
Preparation for the Certified WSET Level 1 Online Exam (optional, extra cost)
An internationally respected wine qualification you can add to your CV


How It Works
Book your course – start learning right away from the comfort of home.
Work through bite-sized modules – each with a quick quiz to lock in your learning.
Take the full-length Mock Exam at the end to prepare for certification.
Ready to certify? Contact us to schedule your WSET Online Exam with live remote invigilation (approx. £110 extra).
If you pass the exam, you'll receive your official certificate and lapel pin from WSET - the world’s leading wine education body.


Ready to Start Your Wine Journey?
This is more than a course - it’s your personal invitation into the world of wine.
Whether you're sipping at home, dining out, or dreaming of a wine career, this is your first, confident step.
Let’s get started.

Book your course today, lets get started!

courses.title: How to make guilt-free LCHF desserts?
courses.bio: How to make guilt-free LCHF desserts?
objectives: Various flavor and texture combinations

requirements: A kitchen with a working oven.
Mixer.
Products for baking, like chocolate.

courses.description:
What does LCHF stand for? Low Carb, High Fat. Less carbs, very, very little sugar and more fat. LCHF desserts are sugar-free, but there are other ingredients you can use to make them taste just as good. They are suitable for those who follow a LCHF diet and for all dessert lovers that want to indulge their sweet tooth without the guilt. In the online course, you will be introduced to the basics and the ingredients that are in line with the LCHF diet, the correct way of using and measuring the ingredients, as well as how to prepare chocolate cakes, energy bars and brownies. All of this will be taught to you by Gorazd, a professional pâtissier, who loves to share his knowledge with the world. In the course of the online course he will share with you a few tips and tricks which will make the preparation of your LCHF desserts as simple as can be.


"For all the dessert lovers that want to indulge their sweet tooth guilt-free."
Gorazd Potočnik, professional pâtissier


Who is Gorazd Potočnik?


The professional pâtissier spent the early years of his career abroad. At the time, Slovenia did not have much to offer in terms of opportunities for education and growth in the field of pâtisserie. So he started studying foreign literature and gradually joined the ranks of world-renowned pâtissiers. He acquired a lot of knowledge, as he created more and more incredible and unusual desserts that would soon shape the very top of the pâtisserie world. Apart from being skillful with the whisk and great at making desserts, he is now also actively involved in educating people on the topics of desserts and pâtisserie. One could say he is nothing short of a pâtisserie trailblazer.
target_audience: For all of those who wants to know how to make guilt-free LCHF desserts!

courses.description:
APCA chef online present you a new program on North African Cuisine. Chef Gabriel Bonin is in house Chef of apca Malaysia and have a long working experience in different countries.
North African cuisine is heavily influenced by regions around the Mediterranean Sea. It has a long history of culture as it is linked to ancient trade routes to Europe and India, and the region is predominantly Muslim. It's a cuisine that is rich in flavor and spices as it is home to many large spice markets.
North African meals range from simple, subtle and non-spicy to complex, spicy and hot. Communal eating is common, with several varieties of dishes served on the table. All North African regions have slow-simmered stews, charcoal-grilled meats, savory legume dishes and rich, sweet pastries
The menu of the Program -
Baba Ganoush
Chackchouka
Vegetarian Tagine With Roasted Cauliflower, Apricots And Chickpeas
Cous Cous Salad
Harira
Chorba Bayda
Ahs-E Reshteh

Moroccan Style Chicken With Cous Cous And Yogurt
Tunisian Spiced Lamb Shank
Chicken B’Stilla

Fish With Vegetable Stew

Mango Mahalabia
We hope that you will have a great learning from this program. You can easily replicate this program in your kitchen and home. Explanation about the program is very clear. In case students  have any doubt or question , they are welcome to ask question and we would be delighted to reply and help them

courses.title: All about Potatoes by APCA chef online
courses.bio: This course will cover the Potatoes dishes which can be used as side dishes to main course
objectives: Learn Basic Potatoes side dishes

requirements: No pre required skills are needed for this program
courses.description:
This program covers the basic level of Potatoes dishes which can be used as side dishes to the main course veg or meat
Freshly Made Mashed Potatoes - Rich, creamy hotel style mashed potatoes. Using starchy potatoes, mixed with a cream, milk and butter mixture to give a smooth creamy texture.
Anna Potatoes - Traditional french dish 'pommes anna'. Thinly sliced waxy potatoes arrange around a pan before being cooked with clarified butter, and flipped to give a nice browning on both sides.
Duchesse Potatoes - Classic buffet style serving of mashed potatoes, piped using a nozzle to give a nice shape, before being brushed with eggwash and browned inside the oven.
Golden Fried Potato Cake ( Roesti) - Common swiss style potato dish using waxy potatoes, first boiled before being grated. Arranged in a ring mould to give a shape, before final pan frying.
Gratin Dauphinoise - Classic potato cake, layers of thinly sliced waxy potatoes filled in with a thyme-cream sauce, topped with cheese and gratinated.
Lyonnaise Potatoes with Thyme - Scalloped waxy potatoes which are deep-fried, before being tossed in a pan with onion and W sauce to give a nice firm flavour.
Potato & Cheese Croquette - Simple hand-shaped croquette filled with potato, mushrooms and cheese before being bread crumbed and deep-fried for that crispy outer.
target_audience: This program is suitable for Home cooks , Students and Enthusiasts

courses.description:
Descubre el fascinante mundo de los vinos, destilados y cervezas con este curso completo y actualizado.
Este curso está diseñado para que te sumerjas de lleno en tres grandes universos: el vino, los destilados y la cerveza. A lo largo de cada módulo explorarás desde su origen e historia, hasta los distintos tipos, procesos de elaboración, servicio y maridaje. Ya seas un profesional en el mundo de la hospitalidad, un estudiante, o simplemente un amante de estas bebidas, aquí encontrarás una base sólida de conocimientos que te permitirá apreciar y comunicar con mayor profundidad todo lo que estos productos tienen para ofrecer.
Aprenderás a identificar los perfiles de sabor, reconocer calidades, sugerir combinaciones ideales y, sobre todo, a hablar con confianza frente a tus clientes o amigos. Porque cuando entiendes lo que estás sirviendo o bebiendo, la experiencia se transforma por completo.
Este curso evoluciona contigo. Nos comprometemos a actualizarlo constantemente para que siempre tengas acceso a lo último en tendencias, técnicas y descubrimientos dentro del mundo del vino, los destilados y la cerveza artesanal. Las diferencias en el estilo visual de algunos videos responden precisamente a estas nuevas lecciones que hemos ido integrando, manteniendo el contenido fresco y relevante.
Déjate llevar por esta aventura sensorial y cultural que no solo te instruirá, sino que despertará aún más tu pasión por estas bebidas.
Inscríbete hoy y comienza tu viaje hacia una apreciación más profunda y profesional. No te vas a arrepentir.

courses.description:
Welcome to "Oven-Free Baking: Nankhatai and Banana Bread Recipes" – the perfect course for home bakers who want to create delicious treats without the need for an oven!


In this course, you will learn the art of baking two classic favorites: banana bread and Nankhatai biscuits, all without using an oven. Whether you have limited access to an oven or simply want to explore alternative baking methods, this course will guide you through each step with ease.


What You'll Learn:

The secrets to baking traditional Nankhatai biscuits, known for their rich, buttery flavor and melt-in-your-mouth texture.
Techniques for achieving perfect results using stovetop or alternative methods instead of an oven.
Tips and tricks to customize your recipes to suit your taste and dietary preferences.
How to confidently bake at home, even with limited kitchen equipment.


Why This Course?
No Oven Required: Discover how to bake delicious treats without needing an oven, perfect for those with small kitchens or limited resources.
Step-by-Step Instructions: Easy-to-follow lessons that make baking accessible to everyone, from beginners to seasoned bakers.
Versatile Recipes: Learn how to adapt these recipes to create a variety of flavors and textures, making them your own.
Practical and Fun: Gain practical baking skills while having fun in the kitchen, impressing your family and friends with your newfound talents.


By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence to bake like a pro, creating delightful banana bread and biscuits that everyone will love – all without the use of an oven!


Join me on this exciting baking journey and bring the warmth and aroma of freshly baked goods into your home, no matter your kitchen setup.

objectives: Learn to cook Turkish traditional mezes and dishes in a very simple way

OTTOMAN DISHES WITH MEAT: HEALTHY KEBAB IN PAPER, KAĞIT KEBABI

requirements: Passion for cooking and engaging new cultures. Everybody from all aspects are welcome to this class.
courses.description:
Ottoman - Turkish Cuisine: A Celebration of Culture, History, and Flavor
Turkish cuisine is widely recognized as one of the world’s most diverse and delicious culinary traditions. Rooted in centuries of history, it reflects the rich cultural tapestry of the region, shaped by the legacy of the Ottoman Empire and influenced by Central Asian, Middle Eastern, and Balkan cuisines. The result is a remarkable blend of flavors, techniques, and ingredients that create a truly unique gastronomic experience.
What makes Turkish cuisine so vibrant is not just its variety, but also the natural abundance of the land. Situated in Anatolia—a region blessed with a diverse climate—Turkey is one of the few countries in the world that can sustain itself by producing nearly all of its own food. From lush vegetables and fragrant herbs to grains, dairy, and meats, the ingredients are fresh, seasonal, and locally sourced.
Spices are used thoughtfully. While most traditional dishes are not spicy, the southeastern region—especially cities like Gaziantep and Şanlıurfa—embraces bold flavors with influences from Arabic cuisine. Today, you can find spicy dishes across Turkey, satisfying every palate.
Vegetables hold a special place in Turkish cuisine. One charming detail is how vegetable dishes are categorized: some are prepared with meat, while others are purely vegetarian. Both versions are equally flavorful, often slow-cooked in olive oil or simmered with tomatoes, onions, and fragrant spices.
Whether you’re savoring a rich stew, a refreshing meze, or a sweet pastry, Turkish cuisine offers something for everyone—an invitation to explore culture through taste.
target_audience: Who likes enjoying cooking, food and culture

Transform Your Cooking Experience: 3 game changers to improve your cooking experience pt. 1

3 fundamental steps of the cook at home journey
The push you need to get started

requirements: There are no specific skills or prior experience required to take this course. This course is designed to be accessible to beginners and those with minimal cooking experience.
courses.description:
Discover why cooking is turning into a nightmare for you, burning your time and energy, and leaving you high and dry.
Do you find yourself in the situation where:
you always cook the same things,
you never amaze with your dishes,
and above all, you never feel satisfied with what you bring to the table?
Well, I could tell you that it's normal but I would be LYING.
I understand, you feel overwhelmed. You would only like to free yourself from the dough stuck to your hands and from the frustration that pervades you. It's your only free afternoon, but it doesn't feel like a moment of rest at all, and you realize how many other things you could have done that would have made you feel better.
You know well what that feeling of anxiety means, that fear of not being able to do it.
But I have a different picture for you. Imagine walking into the kitchen, with your favorite Coldplay playlist as the soundtrack. Imagine spending the afternoon among the stoves, completely immersed in your hobby, but without the slightest worry.
Do you dream of turning this image into reality?
Join me, Mattia, a professional Italian chef, in this transformative mini-course designed for home chefs like you. Master cooking with confidence and ease is here to guide you through the process of feeling good in the kitchen, teaching you the essential skills and techniques you need to enjoy cooking and create amazing dishes.
This course is entirely free because it forms the basis for every other course I have published on Udemy, including:
Syntony: The Basic Side of Cooking
Harmony: About Vegetables and Ingredients
By taking this free course, you'll gain the foundational knowledge needed to excel in these more advanced courses, which are available on my Udemy page.
What You'll Learn:
the 3 game changers to improve your cooking experience
the 3 fundamental steps of the cook at home journey
the push you need to get started
About the Instructor:
My name is Mattia, and I am a professional Italian chef from the beautiful south of Italy, now residing in Australia. With years of experience in both professional kitchens and home cooking, I am passionate about sharing my knowledge and helping others discover the joy of cooking.
By the end of this course, you'll be able to turn your kitchen into a place of joy and creativity, impressing your loved ones with your newfound culinary skills. Don't let the stress of cooking hold you back any longer—take the first step towards a more satisfying cooking experience today! Explore my other courses on Udemy to continue your culinary journey and unlock your full potential in the kitchen. Happy cooking!

requirements: Não é necessária experiência prévia na fabricação de cerveja.

courses.description:
Este curso apresenta aos cervejeiros iniciantes os principais equipamentos utilizados na fabricação de cervejas artesanais. Não requer experiência prévia. Aqui, é apresentado um passo a passo de todo o processo da fabricação da cerveja caseira, de forma didática e resumida. Ao final do curso, o aluno estará apto a identificar os equipamentos básicos para a produção de sua cerveja caseira, com o mínimo de investimento possível.
Uma grande preocupação do cervejeiro iniciante – além do custo para a aquisição do equipamento inicial – é o espaço que ele precisará disponibilizar para o armazenamento de todos os utensílios necessários para fazer a cerveja. Pois bem; este curso resolve estes dois problemas de uma só vez! Você verá que é possível adquirir os equipamentos básicos para uma brasagem investindo pouquíssimo dinheiro. E – muito importante – você precisará apenas de um espaço mínimo para o armazenamento, já que o método ensinado no curso é o BIAB (Brew In A Bag), um processo simples onde a cerveja é feita dentro de um saco, e requer apenas uma única panela. Isso facilita (e muito) a vida do cervejeiro iniciante que, muitas vezes, mora numa casa pequena ou até mesmo num apartamento com pouco espaço disponível. Dessa vez, você não tem mais desculpas para fazer a sua própria cerveja...

courses.title: WineMasters: The Complete Cinematic Old World Wine Course
courses.bio: The Ultimate Cinematic Journey Through the Old World of Wine
objectives: Discover with your own eyes all famous wine countries and regions in Europe
Learn from masters of wine: the highest renowned experts within wine
All other wine courses are theoretical: this is the real thing
Meet legendary and pioneering wine producers shaping the world of wine today

courses.description:
WineMasters: The Ultimate Cinematic Journey Through the Old World of Wine
27 Episodes That Make Up The Highly Acclaimed Documentary Series - Featuring Europe’s Greatest Wine Regions and Their Legendary Winemakers
Welcome to a wine course unlike anything else on Udemy.

WineMasters: The Complete Cinematic Wine Course is not a lecture series. It’s not a slideshow. It’s a cinematic, documentary-style exploration of Europe’s most revered wine regions—crafted for those who want to experience wine knowledge rather than just study it.
This exclusive course features 27 visually stunning, in-depth episodes that transport you to the heart of the Old World of wine: from the storied vineyards of Bordeaux and Burgundy to the sun-soaked hills of Tuscany, the ancient terraces of the Mosel, and the family-run estates of Rioja and Wachau. Told through the eyes of legendary winemakers, passionate growers, and respected wine experts, WineMasters: The Complete Cinematic Wine Course offers a rare, authentic perspective on centuries of wine tradition.


WineMasters is renowned for producing high-quality wine content, best known for its acclaimed documentaries featured on global platforms like Amazon Prime and Apple TV. As an Udemy instructor, WineMasters has earned praise for its premium wine courses, including WineMasters: Class
WineMasters: Class is an engaging, studio-recorded course designed to build a solid foundation in wine knowledge—taking students beyond the level of WSET-3. The course is led by some of the most respected names in the wine world, making it both educational and entertaining.
This course is the ideal complement to WineMasters: Class, bringing you even closer to the heart of winemaking. Through captivating documentaries, you’ll meet legendary winemakers and renowned wine experts from around the globe.


Why Take This Course
Most online wine courses rely on PowerPoint slides or classroom-style lectures. WineMasters breaks the mold. This is wine education at its highest visual and intellectual level—an immersive documentary experience that blends factual depth with cinematic beauty.
Each episode takes you inside the vineyard, the cellar, and the minds of those who carry forward Europe’s oldest wine legacies. You’ll learn not from a script, but from real stories, real people, and real places.
What You’ll Learn:
Old World Wine Mastery – Explore the classic European wine regions in depth: France (Bordeaux, Burgundy, Rhône, Alsace, Loire, more), Italy (Tuscany, Piedmont, Veneto, Sicily, Campania), Spain (Rioja, Priorat, Jerez, Penedès, Rías Baixas), Germany and Austria (Mosel, Baden, Burgenland, Wachau), Portugal (Vinho Verde, Alentejo), and more.
Effortless Education – Absorb the foundations of viticulture, terroir, winemaking, and regional styles through compelling storytelling—not dry lectures.
Unmatched Quality – Every episode is professionally filmed with the quality of a high-end documentary series, complete with stunning vineyard cinematography and expert narration.
Authentic Insights – Hear directly from world-class winemakers, estate owners, and wine experts as they share knowledge passed down through generations.
Deeper Understanding – Grasp how climate, soil, tradition, and human passion shape the Old World’s finest wines—and what makes them so enduring and distinct.
Who This Course Is For
Wine lovers who want to go beyond tasting notes and delve into the historical and regional context of European wine
Students of courses by the WSET or other institutes. This course is the perfect addition to a theoretical approach
Hospitality and wine professionals seeking high-quality, visually engaging content to deepen their regional expertise
Travelers and culture enthusiasts drawn to the landscapes, architecture, and heritage of Europe's wine-growing heartlands
Friends of WineMasters who have already experienced the quality of the other courses: WineMasters: Class and WineMasters: Cooking For Wine. This new course allows you to dig even deeper.
Anyone who wants to relax, press play, and learn about wine in a way that’s as enriching as it is beautiful
Remarkable value
Each of these episodes is available individually on major international streaming platforms, typically priced well over $10 per episode. With 27 episodes included in this course, that amounts to around $270 worth of premium content.
By enrolling here on Udemy, you gain lifetime access to the entire collection—for a fraction of the price. It's an exceptional opportunity to own a full master-level documentary series at an unbeatable value: this complete package is available nowhere else.

Why the Old World?
Because this is where everything that matters in wine began—and continues to unfold.
The Old World is the heart of the wine universe. It's where the most influential styles, regions, and traditions were born and where the standards for great wine are still set today. Names like Bordeaux, Barolo, and Burgundy aren’t just famous—they define what wine can be. This course takes you deep into the regions that have shaped the global wine landscape for centuries and remain its guiding force.

WineMasters: The Complete Cinematic Wine Course is a lot more than just a course.
Sit back. Soak it in. And come away with a deeper appreciation for the history, craft, and passion behind every Old World vintage.
target_audience: Wine lovers of all levels, who want to deepen their understanding through rich storytelling and expert insights

courses.title: Spruce Gum Masterclass

Hands On: Cleaning and Processing Pitch into Gum

requirements: No foraging or nature experience needed
courses.description:
This course teaches the lost art of making natural gum from a very common North Anerican tree. The Christmas tree has many uses, but the coolest and most interesting may be that it is where we originally got our chewing gum. We replaced many natural items with synthetic plastic based products in the last 100 or so years. Don't chew on plastic. Learn spruce gum facts and even how to easily make it yourself in this highly detailed visual course. This process is a unique one have adapted to simplify this project. I'll walk you through this little known foraging experience.
I teach you how to identify spruce trees and distinguish them from its lookalikes, teach you what sap creates gum and which resin creates a sticky mess. I teach you the benefits of spruce gum including dental health, and fighting coughs and sore throats. I will teach you the interesting history of gum. I teach you how to harvest this gum, and how to clean or process it. I have done 100s of hours of research and experimenting with this mayeroal to come up with the most simple recipe that works every time. Show off to your nature loving friends and family by giving the gift of spruce gum this Christmas. What is more festive than making products from the Christmas tree itself.
target_audience: All foragers, nature enthusiasts and people interested in DIY, health, learning about history and consuming wildcrafted products

ДОМАШНИЙ КОНДИТЕР - Для тех, кто хочет удивлять своих близких кондитерскими изделиями собственного приготовления.

ДЛЯ тех кто хочет делать на заказ.


В наших уроках Вы увидите полный процесс приготовления от начала и до конца следующих кондитерских изделий:
КАПКЕЙКИ
Капкейки фисташковые
Капкейки ванильные
Капкейки шоколадные
ТОРТЫ
Кремовый торт "Апельсиновый раф"
Кремовый торт "Фисташка-клубника"
Кремовый торт "Сникерс"

ДРУГИЕ ДЕСЕРТЫ
Королевский творожный пирог
Зефир
Кейк-попс
Чизкейк без выпечки
Пирожное Macarons (малина, фисташка)
Что вдохновляет творить любого кондитера?
Ответ простой – это желание создавать роскошные кондитерские изделия, которые приносили бы не только удовлетворение вкусом, но и визуальные, чтобы их хотелось «поедать глазами»! В этих уроках Вы научитесь готовить БЕЗЕ, ЛЕДЕНЦЫ из изомальта, ШОКОЛАДНУЮ мастику, ТЕМПЕРИРОВАНИЕ шоколада.
Простые декоры, правила декорирования
Первый важный навык кондитера, конечно же после кондитерского мастерства, умение правильно фотографировать свои кондитерские шедевры.
Именно в этом уроке вы научитесь «подавать» ваш десерт или торт на фото. Потому что каждое достижение и результат мастерства отправляется на просторы интернета и социальных сетей в виде ФОТОГРАФИИ.
Food-фото
К каждому уроку Вы получите технологические карты (Рецепты) разработанные Анастасией и Екатериной. Список не обходимого инструмента, а также список ингредиентов. Все видео уроки остаются у Вас на всегда.

courses.title: Let's Wine about Wine!
courses.bio: A short course about Wine
objectives: Learn what's wine

requirements: Not at all
courses.description:
Through this course will just scratch the surface of what the vast world of wine is all about.
We’re covering the basics, over which each of you can build solid wine knowledge. That if you’re up for the task.
Learning about wine is quite a journey, and no matter how many bottles you pop open, how many maps you study, or how many books you read, you can never know everything about this fantastic drink.
Now, if you’re thinking about digging deeper into wine, then you’re in luck because fewer topics are as tasty to study.
Wine is awesome. Yes, it’s boozy, and we love it for that, but there’s much more behind our favorite fermented drink.
Wine is history, culture, science, gastronomy, and etiquette. Wine is the single most sophisticated agricultural product on the planet.
With over 4,000 different grape varieties and over 70 wine-producing countries, no wine is the same. Every bottle, every glass and every drop is a new experience.
Enjoying wine is like traveling without leaving the comfort of your home, that if you know how to listen. Yes, because wine speaks to us through its flavors, textures and aroma.
In today’s course, we’re covering seven topics about wine: its history, grapes and viticulture, the art of making wine, the most popular wine regions, systematic wine tasting and a tasty introduction to wine and food pairings.
target_audience: Beginner wine enthusiasts curious about details

お茶を楽しみながら、その効能（ダイエット効果、ストレス緩和、美容効果）を知ることができる。
日常に使える知っておくとお得な紅茶の美味しい淹れ方。 （ゴールデンルールからティバッグの淹れ方まで）
紅茶の応用（ブレンドティ、アレンジティ、テイスティング）
おもてなしの心（テーブルコーディネート)
押さえておくべき紅茶の選び方（世界三大紅茶、茶葉のグレード、茶園）

tea lady jazz singer 中井サチコがお届けする、今だからこその: はじめに。アナタの人生を変える、そんな紅茶の魅力。
紅茶の美味しい淹れ方。
目から鱗のティバッグの美味しい淹れ方。
紅茶を選ぶ時、これでもう迷わない押さえておくべきポイント。
紅茶はどの様に造られているの？
茶葉のグレードのお話。
アレンジティを楽しもう（アイスティの美味しい淹れ方）
ブレンドを楽しもう（種類の違うお茶をブレンドすると、アラ不思議）
テイスティングを楽しもう（自分なりに味を表現してみよう）
興味深い紅茶の効能（健康効果からダイエットまで）
このコースを振り返ってのまとめと、今後のコースの展望。

requirements: お湯を沸かすための道具、紅茶を淹れるためのポット、お気に入りのカップなどがあればより楽しめます。
courses.description:
このコースは、とにかく受講される方に、紅茶の良さを知って頂いて、より豊かな人生を送っていただきたいという趣旨で始めさせていただきました。


実は私は元々は、紅茶よりはコーヒーが好きでした。では何故紅茶の世界に心魅かれたのたのでしょうか？それは、紅茶の世界が持っている優雅な雰囲気、そしてそれにまつわる歴史、テーブルコーディネートから茶器の美しさに至るまで全てが物語を描けるほどにドラマチックな魅力にとりつかれたからなのです。


今回のこのコースでは、紅茶初心者の方のために、紅茶を知るうえで一番大切なことをお伝え出来るように、考えました。紅茶の美味しい淹れ方から、お手軽簡単なティバッグの淹れ方、アレンジティの楽しみ方、知ってお得な茶葉のお話、紅茶の持つ驚くべき効能まで、見逃せない内容です。楽しんで学んでいただけると幸いです。
target_audience: 紅茶が好きな方はもちろんのこと、そうでない方も。
健康になりたい方。
人生を豊かにしたい方。

courses.title: Trésor Kombucha Homebrew Masterclass
courses.bio: Become a kombucha expert in your own kitchen.
objectives: Brew your own kombucha
Choose the right ingredients for your brew
Create a sugar-free kombucha
Maintain a healthy kombucha culture
Get the right amount of carbonation

Common Q & As: How to care for my SCOBY?
How to increase the carbonation of my brew?
How to prevent fruit flies from contaminating my brew?

requirements: Other than an eagerness to learn and desire to make your own kombucha creation, there are no requirements for this course!
No experience necessary - we provide step-by-step instructions.
You will need kombucha starter, tea, sugar, a 1 gallon glass jar, and basic kitchen supplies.
courses.description:
The Trésor Kombucha Homebrew Masterclass teaches you everything you need to know to brew your own kombucha and maintain a healthy kombucha culture right at home!
After working with some of the leading kombucha consultants in the world, course instructor and Founder of Trésor House, Jessica West, shares everything she knows with you to empower you to brew your own functional beverage from home with ease and confidence.
She believes that one of the best things about home-brewing kombucha is the creative expression it offers. You can brew your best tasting kombucha according to your unique standards, tastebuds, and needs! Jessica will guide you to choosing the right ingredients to ensure a healthy and thriving kombucha culture, and once that is established, you can unleash your creativity by experimenting with different teas, sugars, flavouring agents, and other ingredients.


Upon enrolment you will receive:
· Brewing Instructions
· Brewing Tips
· Sample Recipes
· Videos to walk you through the fermentation process and answer common kombucha brewing related questions.


This is an active class that is continuously being updated. Therefore, should you have any kombucha brewing questions that haven’t already been answered, you are invited to ask them via the course platform and Jessica will create a new course lecture to answer it for you!


Looking forward to having you join us!
target_audience: If you would like to become a kombucha expert in your own kitchen, this course is for you.
If you would like to brew consistent batches time and time again, this course is for you.
If you would like to tips & tricks on tweaking your brew to get lesser sugar and/or higher carbonation, this course is for you.

courses.title: Alkaline Plant-based Basics
courses.bio: An Introductory Overview of Transitioning to an Alkaline Raw Vegan (Plant-based) Diet & Holistic Life
objectives: An introductory course for transitioning into an alkaline raw vegan (plant-based) diet and holistic lifestyle.
Raw Vegan Basics
Simple Everyday Plant-based Basics
A Brief Overview of a Raw Vegan, Alkaline (Plant-based) Diet

Introduction: General Overview of Raw Vegan (Plant-based) Foods and Lifestyle Practices
Easy to Make Raw Vegan Applesauce with Toppings.
A Note of Gratitude and More...
Bonus Features, Food Pics, and Course Materials

requirements: No Requirements
courses.description:
Gain insight to the fundamental food choices, simplicity, and benefits of a raw vegan (plant-based) diet and learn easy, simple 'how-to' recipes to get started and/or continue your powerful dietary and lifestyle transformation, in a way that is do-able for everyone.
This first introductory course, Eat! Easy Everyday Raw Vegan Recipes is not only the namesake of the companion book* for the course, it is also sweetly dedicated to supporting my Mother, Kathryn Hill Strayhorn, transition into a healthier diet and lifestyle.  Here, in this course, are a few easy recipes lovingly shared with and for her, and now available for all...
Through her life experiences, Keirra is now able to the best of her ability offer support with the transition away from a SAD diet (Standard American Diet) while also improving upon and/or avoiding unhealthy vegan (plant-based) choices as well.  True health, without compromise, is the mission.
Venture into this nurturing course with an open mind, a sense of enthusiasm, and enjoy hearing Keirra share from her years of experience, intense study, and wisdom of those that have also impacted her own success in making a healthy, raw vegan (plant-based) lifestyle fun and fulfilling for life!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kathryn Hill Strayhorn, Keirra’s Mom, has successfully completed the New York City Marathon 11 times.  She also has six children, five biological children, and a 'bonus child,' her grandson Shakir.  Kathryn is currently living in Harlem, New York City enjoying a peaceful, healthy, happy life.
We celebrate this wonderful Woman!
target_audience: All are invited to enjoy this course and become familiar with a vegan and raw vegan (plant-based) dietary practices and lifestyle.
Expand Your Knowledge of a Raw Vegan, Alkaline, Plant-based Diet

courses.title: Curso de Coctelería para Principiantes
courses.bio: Royal Bartending, el curso perfecto para iniciarte como Bartender
objectives: Comprender acerca de las bases y los términos usados en la rama de la Mixología.
Comprender de qué está compuesto el Bar y cómo se debe Organizar.
Conocer los Instrumentos y Cristalería usados por el Bartender.
Aprender a Preparar Cocteles Collins y Cocteles Highball.
requirements: No se precisa de conocimientos previos. Solamente de lápiz y papel para tomar apuntes.
Una vez se conozca la teoría, es preciso llevarla a la práctica tanto como sea posible.
courses.description:
De la manera más concreta, éste curso va desde lo más básico hasta los más práctico de la mixología para principiantes. La teoría hace parte primordial del curso, pero al mismo tiempo sin la práctica esta materia no tendría ningún sentido, por lo que tenemos que encontrar el perfecto balance para sacar el mayor provecho del mismo.
Pensado para aquellas personas que aspiran a laborar dentro del mundo del Bartending y al mismo tiempo para aquellos que quieren aprender básicamente sobre el tema para lucirse preparando cócteles extraordinarios ya sea para familia o amigos en eventos sociales.


EL CURSO SE ENFOCA EN:


Bases y terminología.
Equipo del Bartender.
Cristalería.
Cuándo Agitar y cuándo remover.
Cócteles tipo Collins.
Cócteles tipo Highball.
Cócteles tipo Tall Sour.


COCKTAILS A VER EN EL SIGUIENTE CURSO:


- Tequila Sunrise
- Sex On The Beach
- Mojito
- Jolly Rancher
- Tom Collins
- Cuba Libre
- Malibu Bay Breeze
- Long Island Ice Tea
- Long Beach
- ENTRE OTROS.


BENEFICIOS QUE TE APORTA ESTA HABILIDAD

GANAS DINERO
El Bartending como Profesión es altamente rentable y demandado. Obviamente, esto dependerá tanto del País y Ciudad donde se esté ejerciendo como del Bar donde se vaya a trabajar. En la mayoría de Bares la remuneración dependerá de las propinas, lo cual es bueno ya que mientras mejor sea tu servio al cliente, mejor serán tus ganancias.


MEJORA TU NETWORKING
El Bar es el sitio para socializar por excelencia. Y trabajar como Bartender te permite conocer a muchas personas de todo tipo las cuales pueden significar nuevas oportunidades para tu vida. Es algo muy provechoso, ya que en mi caso personal he conocido muy buenos amigos en mis trabajos los cuales a su vez ha aportado muchas cosas positivas en mi vida. Uno nunca sabe, por qué no intentarlo.


TE HACE MAS INTERESANTE
No me tomes a mal, de la manera más humilde te puedo decir con certeza que el saber preparar Cocktails te hace resaltar en tu grupo de amistades o familia, debido a que a la mayoría de nosotros nos encanta degustar de un buen Cocktail y si tus amigos sabe que tu los haces muy bien, ten por seguro que comprarán todo lo que necesites para que se los prepares.




GRACIAS.
target_audience: Perfecto para aquellos que desean trabajar como Bartender.
Perfecto para abrir tu propio bar y complacer a tus clientes.
Perfecto para deleitar a Familia y Amigos con los cocteles aprendidos.

courses.title: Learn How To Make Pizza From Scratch
courses.bio: Master the art of homemade pizza
objectives: Make pizza dough from scratch
Make Pizza sauce at home
Tips and tricks to knead a proper pizza dough
How to properly measure and bake a pizza

Introduction: The essential tools required for pizza making
The art of making pizza dough: How to measure dough for pizza base

requirements: No prior baking or cooking skills needed. You will learn all necessary skills in this course
courses.description:
Join our Vegetarian Homemade Pizza Course and master the art of crafting mouthwatering pizzas from scratch! This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know to become a pizza pro.
First, we will introduce you to the essential tools required for making and baking pizza, ensuring you are well-equipped to start your culinary journey. Next, you will learn how to create a variety of delicious pizza sauces and dips, adding unique flavors to your pizzas. The heart of any great pizza is its dough, and we will teach you the secrets of making perfect dough, including techniques for fermenting to achieve the best texture and taste. You will gain hands-on experience in crafting fresh pizza bases, ensuring your pizzas have the ideal foundation. We will also share expert tips for assembling and baking the perfect pizza, from selecting toppings to achieving the perfect crust. Our course is designed for pizza enthusiasts of all levels, whether you are a beginner or looking to refine your skills. Come join us and transform your kitchen into a pizzeria. Cook, learn, and enjoy as you make and bake delicious pizzas together.
Sign up today and let’s start creating unforgettable pizza experiences with Chef Anjali Dharamsi.
target_audience: Homemakers who wish to bake homemade fresh pizza

courses.title: Tea and Chocolate Pairing with Dandelion Chocolates
courses.bio: Virtual Tea and Chocolate Pairing
requirements: No previous knowledge needed.
courses.description:
Tea and chocolate pairing is a delightful combination that brings together two beloved indulgences. The complex flavors and aromas of tea complement the rich and decadent taste of chocolate, creating a harmonious pairing that is sure to please the senses. Whether enjoyed separately or together, tea and chocolate offer a unique and enjoyable experience.
When it comes to pairing tea with chocolate, it is important to consider the characteristics of both beverages. The flavors and intensity of the tea should be balanced with the sweetness and richness of the chocolate.
Please read these articles before taking the course or embark on our Brewing Course for brewing instructions!
Brewing with a Mug or Teapot
Brewing Gong Fu Style
You will want to prepare your teas and chocolates in the pairing order they appear in:
Wu Liang Shan, White Tea / 70% Gola Rainforest, Sierra Leone
Pu Er Shou Cha, Black Tea / 70% Tuamco, Colombia
Lu An Gua Pian, Green Tea / 70% Costa Esmereldas
Qi Men Hong Cha (Keemun), Red Tea / 70% Kokoa Kamili, Tanzania
Ban Po Lao Zhai, Pu Er Sheng Cha / 70% Anamali, India
Please note teas and chocolates may differ as inventory changes with seasonality and vintages. Tea and chocolate are both seasonal harvests, and once a crop is sold out, there is no exact recreation.
target_audience: For people who are curious about pairing tea with food

courses.title: HowExpert Guide to Tea
courses.bio: 101 Tips to Learn about, Make, Drink, and Enjoy Tea for Everyday Tea Drinkers
objectives: Tea

HowExpert Guide to Tea: Chapter 2: Bags, Sachets, and Loose Leaf
Chapter 6: A Brief Look At Tea Etiquette

requirements: None
courses.description:
HowExpert Guide to Tea explores the best practices you can find worldwide when it comes to making teas of all kinds. Tea is the second-most consumed beverage globally, and this book seeks to explore all the ways people enjoy it and how you can make yourself the very best cup of tea. Learn the difference between the different types of tea and what makes their flavors distinct and delicious. Learn how to blend your own tea and how to brew it once you’re ready. Examine the process of adding different flavors to your tea once it has been brewed, and even go through the process of making tea yourself.
The driving philosophy behind this book is that you should drink the tea you enjoy, whether that is a tea that is brewed over the course of an hour’s preparation and consideration or a bag tossed into a bucket of hot water. You will learn from this book the many methods of making tea so you can replicate, customize, and totally ignore them in favor of processes that produce something more to your liking.


About the Expert
Jessica Kanzler lives in the United States with her wife and cats. She has been drinking tea ever since coffee betrayed her in college, and she has never once looked back. Jessica’s love for tea has driven her to obsess about the stuff to the point that passion has become a full-time infatuation. Jessica’s favorite tea is Earl Grey, followed closely by Jasmine. She prefers her tea hot, her cups deep, and her company generally silent and about 40 feet away. Beyond her obsession with tea, Jessica also writes freelance with a specialty in technology and pop culture, and she is also a director for a literacy-focused nonprofit.
target_audience: Tea Drinkers

courses.title: Moroccan Juices & Smoothies: Refreshing Recipes - Part 2
courses.bio: Discover delicious fresh juices with a Moroccan twist!
objectives: How to replicate authentic Moroccan juices and smoothies
Explore Moroccan cuisine
Discover unique Moroccan recipes
Develop your cooking skills

Learn how to make Moroccan pomegranate j: Pomegranate juice with English voice over and subtitles
Pomegranate juice with original (Arabic) audio and subtitles
Learn how to make Moroccan carrot and or: Carrot and orange juice with English voice over and subtitles
Carrot and orange juice with original (Arabic) audio and subtitles
Learn how to make Moroccan strawberry ju: Strawberry juice with English voice over and subtitles
Strawberry juice with original (Arabic) audio and subtitles
Learn how to make Moroccan almond smooth: Almond smoothie with English voice over and subtitles
Almond smoothie with original (Arabic) audio and subtitles

requirements: No previous knowledge needed
courses.description:
Explore the vibrant flavors of Morocco with our unique juice and smoothie recipes. Perfect for beginners seeking refreshing, healthy options!
Join this class and learn how to make 3 classic Moroccan juices and smoothies with the Flavors of Morocco chefs!


Follow the course taught by the Dadas (Chefs) in this course, and learn all the tricks to recreating the most famous Moroccan dishes.


The chefs teaching the course are Dadas, who are traditional Moroccan chefs with decades of experience in the field of cooking traditional Moroccan recipes. Many of the Dadas learned the art of Moroccan cooking at a young age from their mothers and grandmothers. Today, these women are head chefs at large catering businesses and famous Moroccan restaurants.
Watch the Dadas cook the dishes in these courses and learn all their secrets for perfecting the recipes at home.


The course includes step by step video tutorials and recipe cards to help you replicate the recipes at home. All videos include English subtitles, with English voice over or original audio (in Moroccan Arabic). All recipe cards are in English, and include measurements in both metric and imperial measurements.


In this class, you will learn how to make the following dishes:
- Pomegranate juice
- Strawberry juice
- Lemon and ginger juice
- Almond smoothie


Watch the dadas cook these famous dishes, then replicate their techniques to create these delicious and unique dishes at home.
target_audience: Beginner to advanced cooks who are interested in exploring Moroccan cuisine

courses.title: Cake Making, Frosting & Decorating
courses.bio: Learn to make cakes, fill, frost, work with chocolate (White & Dark), Fondants , Decoration & Troubleshooting

Introduction: White Chocolate Ganache Drip Cake With Alligator Fondant Topping
Fondant: Honeybee Cake with Buttercream Bee Hive And Fondant Bees

requirements: Beginners
courses.description:
This is my second course on Baking, Frosting & Decorating cakes.
Learn to make cakes which are so special. These special cakes are an attraction for any occasion that makes you proud with compliments. This course consists of simple loaf cake to decadent chocolate cakes. Here are the list of cakes that you will learn in this course.
1. Wheat loaf cake with cashews and chocolate chips
2. Chocolate Bundt Cake with chocolate ganache drips
3. Honeybee bee hive cake with fondant Honeybees and Buttercream Bee Hive
4. Chocolate Truffle Cake
5. White chocolate ganache drip cake (Learn to work with white chocolate)
6. Origami cake (White chocolate melting and mounding tips and tricks)
7. Making Fondant shapes
8. Rainbow Cake Topper and Frosting
9. Pralines
10. Caramel Sauce for Dripping and Filling
11. Butterscotch Cake
12. Chocolate decoration with melted chocolate
These cakes are so scrumptious and eye catching. You will enjoy the course so much. I have made this course as simple and easy to follow for everyone so that each one of you will learn how to bake and make these cakes effortlessly.
I have also made all tips available to you that will make your journey through this course easy and you will enjoy every bit of it to make these beautiful special cakes.
If you wish to learn basics of cake making, I would suggest you also take up my basic cake making course "Learn Baking Cakes, Cookies and Bread" which is also available on udemy at a steal deal price.
This will be very useful for beginners especially and I also have many cake recipes and basics of Frosting cakes and easy cake decoration tips on the course. So both course clubbed together you will become a successful baker right from the comfort of your home.
Enjoy baking!
target_audience: Beginners interested in cake making

courses.title: Authentic Italian Cuisine: Spaghetti and bread balls edition
courses.bio: Italian cooking

Homemade spaghetti - Pasta fresca fatta: Homemade spaghetti - Pasta fresca fatta in casa
The tomato sauce - Il sugo di pomodoro
The bread balls - Le polpette di pane

requirements: no
courses.description:
(Spoken in Italian with English subtitles)
The roots of Italian cuisine are tied to the earth, to the sun and also to the heart.
This is the Italian cooking magic simplicity: Wheat, tomato, two simple ingredients that can be easily transformed into a work of art.
In this short free course I will teach you the two recipes that have become a symbol of Italy in the world. Pasta with tomato sauce and bread balls, which we can consider a symbol of Italian cuisine (this recipe is also suitable for vegetarians).
I would love to be able to entertain and delight you with these two recipes that, in their simplicity and delicacy have a great balance of flavors.
The ingredients used are simple (the main ingredients you will use are flour - water - tomato - eggs) and inexpensive and are also available to everyone.
No specific knowledge is required for the preparation of these two dishes, at the end of the course you will be able to prepare these recipes as if you were born in Italy and you will be able to amaze your guests with an all-Italian taste.
You will be guided step by step in the preparation, I will teach you the little secrets that my grandmother and my mother taught me.
target_audience: The course is aimed at both those who are just starting to cook and experts who want to experiment in Italian cuisine with cheap but genuine and high quality ingredients. Il corso è adatto a tutti quelli che hanno la passione per la cucina italiana. Non sono necessarie particolari abilità.

courses.bio: לימדו טכניקות מקצועיות להכנת מקרונים שמצליחות בכל פעם, ואת כל הסודות ליצירת קינוחי מקרונים ומיצגים אכילים מרהיבים

לימדו את סודות הכנת בלילת המקרונים, שיבטיחו את הצלחת המתכון פעם אחר פעם
לימדו טכניקות אפייה מדוייקות וכיצד להתאימה לתנור שלכם
גלו כיצד להשתמש במקרונים ליצירת מיצגים אכילים לאירועים אלגנטיים, כמו מגדלי מקרונים מרהיבים
צרו סוגים רבים של מנות אחרונות המבוססות על מקרונים, וגלו דרכים מקוריות לקשט ולעצב אותן בשימוש בטכניקות מודרניות
לימדו מתכונים רבים ומגוונים למילוי המקרונים: 4 סוגי גנאש, מוס שוקולד עשיר, וקרם וניל טעים ואורירי

לפני שמתחילים - נא לצפות: מדריך קצר לצפיה בקורס באופן הטוב ביותר
כיצד להכין עוגיות מקרונים מושלמות ולהצלי: סיכום: עוגיות מקרון מושלמות - כל הכללים החשובים
מילוי המקרונים והרכבתם: מילוי והרכבה של עוגיות מקרונים רגילות
מילוי והרכבה של סוכריות מקרונים על מקל
יצירת מנות אישיות אלגנטיות וייחודיות המב: הכנת פרחי בצק סוכר עבור קינוחי המקרון
חמרים דיגיטליים להורדה: מקבץ מתכונים, תבניות זילוף, תרשימים, ומחשבוני עלויות להורדה

requirements: אין צורך בניסיון קודם באפייה ובקישוט עוגות
מספר כלי אפייה סטנדרטיים, כגון שקיות זילוף, וצנטרים
כדי להכין חלק מהקישוטים תזדקקו לחותכנים ומשטח סיליקון
ניתן לרכוש את הכלים הנדרשים בחנות האינטרנטית של הקורס
לקורס מצורף גם מסמך עם קישורים לחנויות ישראליות שניתן לקנות בהן את הציוד אונליין
courses.description:
אם אי פעם ניסיתם להכין מקרונים בעצמכם, בוודאי גיליתם שלהכין מקרונים מושלמים ולהצליח בכל פעם זה עסק בכלל לא פשוט. זאת בדיוק הסיבה שהמשימה שלנו בקורס הזה היא לעזור לכם להתגבר על הבעיות והמורכבויות הכרוכות בהכנת המקרונים. הקורס מציע מגוון רחב של טכניקות מוכחות, שתאפשרנה לכם להכין את העוגיות המדהימות האלו בביטחון ובהצלחה. זהו בדיוק הקורס עבורכם אם אתם רוצים להכין מקרונים כמו הקונדיטורים הצרפתיים הגדולים: בבית, לחברים, במאפייה או בקונדיטוריה שלכם
עיקבו אחרי ההכוונה המפורטת והמדוייקת של השף-קונדיטורית הנודעת אירית ישי, ולימדו את כל הסודות המקצועיים שקשה מאד להצליח בלעדיהם. גלו עולם שלם של טכניקות ליצירת מקרונים, שפותחו במשך שנים רבות של עבודה מעשית במאפיות עילית בארצות-הברית, ובמסעדות נודעות בארץ ובעולם
לימדו שיטות בדוקות להכנת בלילת מקרונים מושלמת שמצליחה בכל פעם
גלו את סודות הזילוף, האפייה, המילוי וההרכבה של עוגיות מקרון טעימות ומרהיבות
הכינו עוגיות מקרונים בכל טעם, צבע וגודל שתרצו
לימדו כיצד ליצור ארבעה עיצובים ייחודיים של מנות אחרונות המבוססות על מקרונים
בנו מיגדלי מקרונים מהודרים ואלגנטיים המתאימים לחתונות וארועים יוקרתיים
גלו כיצד ליצור מיצגים אכילים ממקרונים, וכיצד לארוז אותם כמתנות אישיות ומתוקות
הרשמו לקורס, ומהר מאד תגלו שהמקרון הוא הרבה יותר מסתם עוגייה, אלא קלאסיקה צרפתית המובילה למגוון עצום של אפשרויות. בואו ללמוד איתנו, ופיתחו לעצמכם עולמות חדשים של מתכונים, טכניקות ויצירתיות קולינרית
target_audience: אופים וקונדיטורים בכל הרמות הרוצים ללמוד כיצד להכין מקרונים מושלמים ולהצליח בכל פעם
בעלי מאפיות וקונדיטוריות הרוצים להכין מקרונים באופן אופטימלי ומקצועי, כדי למכור אותם
שף-קונדיטורים במסעדה הרוצים להגיש קינוחי מקרונים יחודיים ומרשימים בתפריט
קונדיטורים המעוניינים ללמוד כיצד להכין מיצגי מקרונים מרהיבים לחתונות ואירועים אלגנטיים
כל מי שמעונין בקריירה בתחום האפייה וקישוט עוגות
כל מי שאוהב מקרונים, ורוצה ללמוד איך להכין אותם בצורה מקצועית ובהצלחה

courses.title: La VRAIE pâte à Pizza - comment la réaliser chez vous -
courses.bio: Les bases pour réussir une véritable pâte à pizza. Cette formation vous dévoilera tous les secrets et astuces de PRO.
objectives: Réaliser une pâte à pizza comme un professionnel
Le matériel nécessaire
Les ingrédients
Le pétrissage
Rabat et repos
Temps de maturation
Étalage à la main
Cuisson
Dressage

Matériel, Ingrédients, réalisation de la: Présentation et objectif de ce cours

requirements: Aucune expérience requise. Vous apprendrez à faire une pizza
courses.description:
Bonjour à tous,
je m’appelle Emma, je suis pizzaiola, passionnée par mon métier et la compétition depuis maintenant plus de 6 ans.
J’ai d’ailleurs été récompensée à plusieurs reprises au niveau national et international.
Aujourd’hui j’ai décidé de transmettre mon savoir faire et toutes mes techniques acquises.
Je vais vous apprendre et vous expliquer comment réaliser chez vous une pizza comme un professionnel du début à la fin.
Je vous expliquerai comment réaliser une pâte dans un robot pâtissier, comment bouler un pâton mais aussi comment l’étaler à la main.
Je finirai  par vous montrer 3 types cuissons dans 3 fours différents : 1 four ménager classique, 1 petit four à bois et enfin dans un four professionnel électrique.
J’aborderai  avec vous le matériel et les ingrédients nécessaires, je vous expliquerai aussi l’importance du choix de la farine et le temps de repos dont votre pâte à pizza aura besoin.
Vous trouverez dans les fiches techniques tous les détails et tous les renseignements nécessaires en plus des vidéos.
N’hésitez par la suite à me poser toutes vos questions, je me ferais une joie de vous répondre.
Avec toutes mes astuces et mes conseils, la pizza n’aura plus de secrets pour vous !
Aux Fourneaux maintenant.
target_audience: À tous les pizzaiolos, amateurs de cuisine et de pâtisserie

courses.title: Building Healthy Food Systems
courses.bio: Creating Health and Abundance in a Changing World
objectives: How the environment, agriculture, nutrition, and freedom interact to achieve healthy food systems and sustainable development.
Two levers you can use to drive your food system towards better health.
Identify the areas of your personal food system that are most in need of development or repair.
Develop a food system restoration plan you can implement to build a sustainable, self-regenerating system.

Introduction: Assignment 1 - Identifying your food system needs.
Identifying the Four Cornerstones of Secure Food System
Writing Your Food System Restoration Plan
Writing Your Food System Restoration Plan
Achieving Sustainable Development: Can Sustainable Development Be Achieved By 2030?

requirements: No prior experience needed.
Interest in better access to healthy, nutritious food.
Interest in sustainable, independent living.
courses.description:
A life of abundance and sustainable living need not be contradictory terms.
When you build abundance from the ground up, when you build your food system first, you leap from sustainable to regenerative living.  And the beauty of a regenerative system is that it gives back more than it receives.
The food on your table can do a lot more than taste good, smell good, and restore your energy.  Food has  powerful effects. We need food over and over again.   This makes food is a powerful driver of our entire economy.
Good food can restore bad health.  Bad food can damage our physical and mental health so badly that we lose our ability to work or to care for our families. And anyone paying for healthcare knows that sickness is expensive.
Globally, food is often at the center of civil unrest.  The way we produce our food can either destroy or restore our environment.
This course is designed to help you gain a deeper understanding of how our choices about food and where we get it from can address big problems, ranging from our personal health and prosperity to global issues of food security, economics, climate change, even immigration.
In this class, you will explore interactions between the four cornerstones (environmental, agriculture, nutrition, and freedom) that form the foundation for sustainable, prosperous living.
Learn how two levers we all have within our reach can be used to drive large or small food systems to more sustainable or regenerative states.  Build a plan for using these levers to make your own personal food system more sustainable.
target_audience: People who want more naturally grown, pesticide free whole foods.
People who want a deeper understanding of how the environment influences our food, our economy, and our health.
People who what to live sustainably in a clean environment.
Leaders and developers interested in creating healthy and prosperous communities.
Community gardeners, extension agents, permaculture enthusiasts, agritourism and classroom educators who want new insights into power of functional local food systems..

courses.bio: Comprehensive Guide from Ancient Traditions to Home Cooking
objectives: Discover the History and Culture of Japanese Fermentation
Understand the Science Behind Fermentation: Biological and chemical principles of fermentation
Learn about various fermented foods in Japan: Common ingredients, techniques, and applications
Hands-on Cooking Class: Crafting "Ichiju Sansai" (one soup, three sides) Meal
Learn 10 recipes using fermented seasonings and various cooking technique
3 Assignment: Miso tasting, Pickling base, Ichiju sansai meal set

Introduction: Example Cooking Lesson : Furofuki Daikon Rradish
Module1: The Culinary Canvas of Japan: F: 1-1 The Symphony of Yin/Yang and The Five Elements in Japanese Gastronomy
1-2 The Geographic Influence on Japanese Cuisine and Fermentation
1-3 The Evolution of Fermented Foods in Japanese History
1-4 The Role of Buddhism and Shintoism in Shaping Japanese Fermentation
Module 2: Basics of Fermentation Science: 2-2 Exploring the Benefits of Fermented Foods
2-3 &2-4 The Microbial World & Chemical Changes Behind Fermentation
2-5 Traditional knowledge on Plant-Microbe Interactions in Asian Ferment
Module 4: Crafting “Ichiju Sansai” with: Module 4: Crafting “Ichiju Sansai” with Fermented Seasonings
Hands-on cooking lesson 1 : Spring to Summer menu
Hands-on cooking lesson 2 : Fall to Winter menu

requirements: Interest in Japanese Cuisine
courses.description:
Overview
Welcome to "Course 1: The Essence of Japanese Fermentation: Comprehensive Guide from Ancient Traditions to Home Cooking." Led by Chisato Maeda, a fermenter and ethno-botanist. From the traditional culture of koji, miso, and soy sauce to the symbiotic relationship between microorganisms and plants, this course will provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the traditions of Japanese cuisine. Explore the culture of fermentation used in traditional Japanese cuisine and see it incorporated into your daily cooking.


Objective
The goal of this course is to provide a comprehensive understanding of Japanese fermentation's historical context, scientific principles, cultural significance, and culinary applications. By offering a blend of cultural insights, scientific knowledge, hands-on activities, and gastronomical exploration, students will gain foundational knowledge, appreciate the art and science behind Japanese fermentation.


Why Take This Course?
Cultural Insight: Discover the rich history and traditions of Japanese food culture.
Scientific Exploration: Understand the chemistry and biology behind the fascinating process of fermentation.
Hands-On Experience: Engage in interactive activities, tastings, and home experiments to apply your learning.


Curriculum


Module 1: The Culinary Canvas of Japanese food and Fermentation
Trace the historic paths of Japanese fermentation. Learn the cultural beliefs and practices that have shaped this culinary cornerstone.


Module 2: Basics of Fermentation Science
Unveil the mysteries of fermentation by learning about the crucial role of microorganisms and the chemical processes that turn basic ingredients into complex and flavorful foods.


Module 3: Introduction to Japanese Fermented Products
Explore the ingredients that form the basis of Japanese fermented foods. Grains, legumes, and vegetables will be discussed, as well as pickling beds, sauces, and seasonings.


Module 4: Crafting “Ichiju Sansai” with Fermented Seasonings
Delve into the culinary art of Japanese cooking with a focus on incorporating fermented seasonings. By understanding the concept of "Ichiju Sansai", you'll craft traditional meals, exploring miso soup, main dishes, side dishes and tsukemono.


What you will gain from this course
Benefit 1: Comprehensive Textbook
You will receive a 100-page PDF textbook filled with in-depth knowledge, tips and secrets about Japanese fermentation at the end of the course.


Benefit 2: Seasonal one-soup-three-course recipes
You will receive 10 seasonal one-soup-three-course recipes (5 for spring/summer and 5 for fall/winter).


Assignment 1: Miso Tasting Challenge
Develop your sense of taste through miso tasting. Understand the characteristics of various types of miso and practice incorporating them into your daily diet.


Assignment 2: Making pickling beds
Students will practice making pickling beds and pickle familiar foods. Pickle beds such as miso pickles, yogurt miso, traditional 358 pickles, and amasu-zuke pickles.


Assignment3: Crafting Ichiju Sansai
Apply your knowledge from the course to design a seasonal "Ichiju Sansai" menu that captures the essence of the selected season through a harmonious blend of flavors, textures, and nutrition.




Q&A
Q: What are some of the key ingredients used in the cooking lessons for this course?
A: Key ingredients include various types of fermented seasonings miso, soy sauce, vinegar, sake and mirin. Also Japanese foods such as tofu, seaweed, radish, konjac, etc.


Q: What should I do, if these ingredients are not available in my county?
A: Alternative ingredients are suggested instead of using specific ingredients which are unique to Japan.


Q: What is "Ichiju Sansai," and how is it relevant to the course content?
A: "Ichiju Sansai" refers to the traditional Japanese meal structure of one soup and three side dishes. The course teaches how to create meals using this structure, highlighting the use of fermented seasonings.
target_audience: Culinary Enthusiasts: For those passionate about cooking, flavors, and food culture.
Lovers of Japanese Cuisine: Individuals interested in Japanese food, culture, and culinary traditions.
Wellness Advocates: Those curious about the health benefits of fermented foods.
