¿Has oído a hablar de la baja temperatura y te gustaría poder aplicarla en tu cocina?
¿Quizá ya has practicado esta técnica pero te gustaría profundizar más?


¡Con este curso vas a convertirte en un experto de la cocina a baja temperatura!  Complementarás los conocimientos adquiridos en el curso de iniciación. Profundizarás en la cocina a baja temperatura, una técnica de cocciones suaves con precisión para alcanzar la máxima calidad del producto. Entrarás en detalle en los factores más importantes que permiten controlar las cocciones y así obtener resultados mucho más óptimos en tu cocina. Analizarás las ventajas que tiene esta técnica y verás los dos tipos principales de cocciones con las que dividimos la cocina a baja temperatura (directas e indirectas). Estudiarás los beneficios de la baja temperatura en cuanto a salud y nutrición, sostenibilidad y racionalidad. Contaremos con la ayuda de dos profesionales de la materia: Pere Castells, científico gastronómico, y por el otro, Prabhu Sukh (Alex Pirla), chef especializado en cocina de vegetales. Además, aprenderás a cocinar recetas fáciles (te las podrás descargar) para que puedas practicar este tipo de cocina, ya sea en tu casa o en tu restaurante  y con las herramientas y maquinaria adecuados.


Lo que aprenderás:


- Conocerás con detalle la filosofía del concepto "baja temperatura", su relación con la ciencia y la nutrición.
- Entrarás en el mundo de la baja temperatura. Profundizarás en los aspectos más importantes que deberás tener en cuenta a partir de este momento para poner en práctica la cocina a baja temperatura.
- Dominarás los 2 grandes grupos de cocción a baja temperatura. Entenderás las diferencias entre cocciones directas e indirectas, que serán fundamentales en el desarrollo de esta técnica, y aprenderás cómo usarlas con diferentes grupos de ingredientes (carnes, pescados, verduras).
- Verás diferentes técnicas de cocción a baja temperatura para que puedas cocinar con diferentes caminos (al vacío, al horno, en kamado, etc.).
- Distinguirás los elementos básicos a tener en cuenta en la conservación de los alimentos, haciendo especial incidencia en cuestiones de seguridad alimentaria.
- Aprenderás otras técnicas relacionadas con la cocina a baja temperatura, como la sobrecocción o la cocción con líquidos de gobierno.
- Descubrirás complementos aplicables a la cocina a baja temperatura y que podrás llevar a cabo con tus propios equipos.


Este curso sigue la estructura del de iniciación, con 7 principales módulos que contienen los vídeos de ampliación:
- Módulo 1: Cocina a baja temperatura
- Módulo 2: La baja temperatura: conceptos iniciales
- Módulo 3: Los dos grandes grupos de cocciones: directas e indirectas
- Módulo 4: Técnicas para la cocina a baja temperatura
- Módulo 5: La conservación en la cocina a baja temperatura
- Módulo 6: Complementos de la cocción a baja temperatura
- Módulo 7: Finalización del curso


¿Hay requisitos para realizar el curso?
Haber hecho el curso de iniciación previamente
Nociones básicas de cocinar


¿Para quién es este curso?
Aficionados a la cocina
Profesionales de la cocina


Si quieres convertirte en un experto de la cocina a baja temperatura, ¡dale a COMPRAR ESTE CURSO! ¡Te espero!


Salvador Brugués
Cocinero especializado en cocina a baja temperatura y al vacío.
target_audience: Aficionados a la cocina
Profesionales de la cocina
Chefs

Learn about Ceasor salad

courses.description:
This topic cover some Vegetable based dishes featuring 8 dishes -
Cauliflower Au Gratin - Boiled Cauliflower dish, covered with a thick bechamel sauce. Topped with breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese before being gratinated lightly in the oven
Ceasar Salad - Traditional italian salad, consists of a base of romaine lettuce, a boiled egg, a rich mayonnaise based dressing. Finished with croutons and freshly shaved parmesan cheese
Pesto Pasta Salad - Fusilli Pasta tossed with a selection of vegetables both raw and cooked, and coated in a smooth flavourful pesto oil dressing.
Taboulleh - A Cous-cous dish from the middle east, a simple boiled cous-cous with lightly sautéed vegetables mixed inside, followed by a subtle lemon dressing.
Creamed Spinach - A Simple side dish of sauteed spinach, garlic and shallots mixed with cooking cream and reduced to give a nice balanced taste and texture.
Blazed Carrot - Jardinare carrots gently cooked in water before adding sugar and butter to create a light glaze, which gives the carrots a nice shine and sweeetness.
Grilled Vegetables - Simple selection of vegetables lightly seared on a pan to give a nice colour and flavour.
Ratatuille - Classic french dish with a modern twist, a seasonal selection of fresh vegetables cooked together with a tomato concasse and fresh herbs.

courses.title: HowExpert Guide to Craft Beer
courses.bio: 101 Lessons to Learn the Facts, History, and Joy of Craft Beers from A to Z
objectives: Craft Beer

HowExpert Guide to Craft Beer: Part 1: Approaching the Unruly World of Craft Beer
Part 2: What You Should Know About the History of Beer
Part 3: Understanding Beer Styles and Traditions
Part 4: The Modern American Craft Beer Movement
Part 5: How to Approach a Taproom
Part 8: Navigating the Craft Beer Hype Train
Part 9: Top 10 Popular Craft Beers for Beginners

requirements: None
courses.description:
If you want to learn everything about and enjoy craft beers, then check out “HowExpert Guide to Craft Beer” now.
Are you ready to explore the weird, wild, wonderful world of American craft beer?
With thousands of beers and scores of beer styles out there, getting started can be daunting. This book will take you through beer and brewing basics and guide newcomers to the craft scene. This book covers:
• A brief history of beer, from Mesopotamia to Prohibition and beyond
• A primer on how beer is made
• An extensive rundown of styles and trends
• Tips for the craft beer taproom
• Tips for where to find good beer
• Insider discussions about the future of craft beer
• A guide to the contemporary online community of beer fans
• Recommendations for fun craft beer-related activities
• Spotlights of important modern American brewers
• Over 100 specific beer recommendations
If you have ever wondered about the difference between a Stout and a Porter, this is the book for you. You will learn why those super-popular, hoppy beers are called India Pale Ales. You’ll learn why so many beers are aged in Bourbon barrels today. Once you’re finished, you will be a bonafide craft beer aficionado!
The days of tepid, boring beer are long gone. Now, you can enjoy some world-class brews that will satisfy your curiosity and challenge your tastes. So, get ready for a crazy, inspiring journey into all things sudsy. Warning: this guide will make you extremely thirsty!
Check out “HowExpert Guide to Craft Beer” now!


About the Expert
Paul Deines is a beer and culture journalist from New York. His work has appeared in SR-Mag, Brew Studs, and Hop Culture. He has traveled the country, exploring the influence of the craft beer industry in America. This has put him in close contact with brewers, scientists, lobbyists, economists, advocates, and aficionados.
Paul also ghostwrites novels, crafts marketing copy, and writes video game dialogue. He is a produced playwright and director whose work has been performed on stages in New York, Boston, Florida, West Virginia, Indiana, and Kentucky.
target_audience: Craft Beer Enthusiasts
Beer Enthusiasts

courses.title: The Flavorful Journey: Mastering Sauces, Dips, and Spreads
courses.bio: All about dips, spreads and sauces
objectives: Introduction to Flavor Foundations
Crafting Classic Dips
Spreadable Delights
Sauce Savvy
requirements: Anyone who is interested in cooking or culinary , no experience needed
courses.description:
Embark on a culinary adventure with our pre-recorded workshop, “The Flavorful Journey: Mastering Sauces, Dips, and Spreads!” Whether you’re a novice looking to elevate your cooking skills or an experienced home chef eager to explore new flavor profiles, this comprehensive course will guide you through the art and science of creating delectable sauces, dips, and spreads that will impress your family and friends.
In this hands-on project, students will explore the art and science of making sauces, dips, and spreads. They will research, create, and present their original recipes, focusing on flavor development and presentation. This project promotes creativity, collaboration, and culinary skills while providing a delicious end result!
Project Objectives:
Research: Understand different types of sauces, dips, and spreads from various cultures and cuisines.
Recipe Development: Create original recipes, incorporating personal tastes and innovative flavor combinations.
Cooking Skills: Learn techniques for preparing and cooking sauces, dips, and spreads.
Presentation: Develop skills in plating and presenting culinary creations attractively.
Teamwork/Communication: Promote collaboration among group members and effective communication of ideas.
Materials Needed:
Basic kitchen equipment (blender, food processor, mixing bowls, measuring cups/spoons, etc.)
Ingredients for various sauces, dips, and spreads (vegetables, herbs, spices, dairy, oils, etc.)
Recipe development templates for notes and documentation
Presentation materials (plates, garnishes, labeling supplies)
Project Steps:
Group Formation:
Students will form small groups of 3-5 members.
Research Phase:
Each group will research a variety of sauces, dips, and spreads from different cuisines (e.g., hummus, salsa, pesto, béchamel, aioli).
Students will identify key characteristics of each type, such as ingredients, preparation methods, and serving suggestions.
Brainstorming Session:
Groups will discuss and brainstorm unique flavor combinations or twists on traditional recipes.
Consider using local ingredients or focusing on a specific theme (e.g., vegan, spicy, global flavors).
Recipe Development:
Each group will create at least two original recipes for sauces, dips, or spreads.
Groups will document their recipes, including ingredient lists, preparation steps, and any modifications made during experimentation.
Cooking Phase:
Groups will prepare their selected recipes using the classroom kitchen or a designated cooking area.
Students will practice proper food safety and hygiene during the cooking process.
Presentation Preparation:
After cooking, groups will focus on plating and presenting their dishes attractively.
They will create a label or sign to explain their dish, including its name, key ingredients, and any interesting facts.
Tasting Event:
Groups will host a tasting event where they present their sauces, dips, and spreads to the class.
Each group will share their culinary journey, including what inspired their recipes and any challenges faced.
Reflection and Feedback:
After the tasting, students will provide feedback to each group regarding the flavors, presentation, and creativity of their dishes.
Groups will reflect on their learning experiences, discussing what worked well and what they would do differently next time.
Evaluation Criteria:
Students will be assessed on the following aspects:
Research Quality: Depth of understanding and exploration of sauces, dips, and spreads.
Creativity: Originality and innovation in recipe development and flavor combinations.
Execution: Skillfulness in preparation and cooking techniques.
Presentation: Visual appeal and professionalism in plating and serving.
Participation: Collaboration and communication among group members during the project.
Expected Outcomes:
Upon completion of this project, students will:
Gain hands-on experience in cooking and flavor pairing.
Enhance their confidence and skills in the kitchen.
Develop teamwork and communication skills through collaboration on the project.
Foster a greater appreciation for culinary arts and cultural cuisines.
Conclusion:
The "Creative Culinary Condiments: Craft Your Own Sauces, Dips, and Spreads" project is a fun and engaging way for students to explore flavors and develop practical cooking skills. By working together and experimenting in the kitchen, students will create delicious results while learning important culinary concepts.
target_audience: Cafe owners, home cook, passionate cook, cloud kitchen owners

courses.description:
Veel bierliefhebbers hebben een behoefte om zich te verdiepen in de wereld van het bier, om hier kennis over op te doen en deze te leren toepassen in de praktijk.
Uiteraard bestaan hier traditionele opleidingstrajecten voor, maar deze meestal prijzig en tijdsgebonden, je kan niet zelf bepalen wanneer je hier tijd voor wil vrijmaken, en je kan ook niet zelf het tempo van lesgeven bepalen. Daarnaast duren ze vaak ook enkele jaren.
Deze opleidingen hebben dikwijls als doel om officieel zytholoog te worden, terwijl dit niet per definitie het doel hoeft te zijn van iemand met meer dan een gezonde interesse voor bier.
Een online cursus leent zich natuurlijk heel goed om op eigen tempo kennis op te doen. Onze cursus bevat naast de nodige theorie ook een schat aan praktische informatie en praktische opdrachten.
Wij wensen je veel plezier en leergenot!

Iedereen die meer wil weten over bier in het algemeen

courses.title: EXPERTO EN VINO EN 7 CLASES!

objectives: Llegan de la mano de la experta internacional y la conocida presentadora del TV programa SIN CORCHO las "Barritas mágicas" que te abrirán la puerta grande del MUNDO DE VINO.
Pensado para que entres con seguridad, a gusto y sin miedo en el mundo de expertos de vino para DISFRUTAR.

Al terminar el curso sabrás catar vinos como un experto. Sabrás escoger, parear, oler, probar, juzgar sin complejos un vino como lo hacen los profesionales. Trasmitirás a otros tu opinión sobre el vino con seguridad y gracia. También aprenderás a parear vino y comida, guardar y abrir una botella de vino correctamente, utilizar los accesorios de vino!
Compartiré mis "tips" de experto personales sobre las temperaturas ideales del servicio y almacenaje de vino. También hablaremos de su creación.

En cada clase te espera un secreto o un atajo profesional, un "bonus" y un ejercicio. Al final del curso... MIS REGALOS VIRTUALES para que no te falte nada a la hora de organizar tu propia CATA PROFESIONAL de vino.
El ÚNICO curso sobre el vino elaborado hasta el último detalle para que TE DIVIERTAS mientras vayas aprendiendo todas las bases de un experto de vino SOLO en 7 clases.

Después de solo 7 CLASES te sentirás totalmente seguro en el mundo de vino y expresarás tus opiniones al respecto con seguridad y gracia. Descubrirás la parte divertida del vino y la sabrás comunicar en cualquier ambiente social.
Aprenderás LA TERMINOLOGÍA profesional del sector incluidos los nombres de variedades de uva principales y estilos de vino que proporcionan.

ESCOGER, GUARDAR, SERVIR EL VINO Y OTRAS: COMO SE HACE EL VINO. VIEJO MUNDO y NUEVO MUNDO

Compartiré mis "tips" de experto personales sobre las temperaturas ideales del servicio y almacenaje de vino. También hablaremos de su producción, de países productores de vino y de variedades de uva principales.

BIENVENIDO(A) AL PRIMER CURSO DE "SIN CORCHO"!

courses.title: Ciencia de las Técnicas Culinarias
courses.bio: Curso de Cocina Molecular / Técnicas de Vanguardia. Con fundamentos de la Ciencia y el respaldo de SCWC
objectives: Aprender técnicas básicas y avanzadas de cocina de vanguardia
Comprender la ciencia detras de cada técnica culinaria
Desarrollar conocimiento teórico y practico en la cocina
Profesionalizar tu conocimiento teorico y practico en la cocina gracias a la Ciencia
Aprendizaje de técnicas para lograr texturas adaptables a todo tipo de cocina

Introducción y Básicos: Consejos para sacar provecho al Curso
Hidrocoloides y Texturizantes. Definición y fundamentos
Seguridad, salud y nutrición de Hidrocoloides
Kappa: Gel para Napar o Cubrir / Almíbar
Conserva en Gel de su Jugo

requirements: Conocimiento básico de Cocina Salada e Internacional
Conocimiento básico de Pasteleria
Conocimiento de lenguaje y vocabulario técnico gastronómico
Experiencia culinaria (laboral profesional o aficionada)
Pasión y gusto por la Gastronomía en general
courses.description:
La Cocina tiene por base sus técnicas. Estas han evolucionado con el pasar de los años y cada vez nos sorprenden por sus resultados. Hoy en dia, el enfoque del cocinero es poder entregar lo mejor de su experiencia realizando platos que sorprendan al comensal y logren resultados aptos para todo tipo de personas, comprendiendo alergias alimentarias, estilos de alimentación, cocina saludable y la búsqueda de ingredientes alternativos que nos permitan excelentes resultados.  El uso de aditivos y texturizantes lo debemos ver como un excelente apoyo, y el conocimiento científico detrás de cada uno nos dará confianza y seguridad en la cocina.
Sabemos que existe la Cocina Molecular que deriva a Cocina de Vanguardia. Esta es atractiva para muchos cocineros, pero el material o cursos disponibles se enfocan en las recetas y suelen quedar dudas sobretodo en el uso y compatibilidad de los ingredientes y texturizantes. Mi intención es poder explicarte todo y mas con ejemplos, recetas, experimentos y fundamentos para que puedas dominar este tipo de técnicas.
Mi nombre es Heinz Wuth, Cocinero y apasionado por las Ciencias Gastronómicas, llevo mas de 18 años trabajando, aplicando y educando a cocineros con el apoyo de la Ciencia, y quiero invitarte a este curso teórico y practico.
Utilizaremos las técnicas esenciales dentro de la vanguardia culinaria, veremos los ingredientes, su compatibilidad, análisis y fundamentos científicos. Todo acompañado con un completo Dossier Teórico con información esencial y recetas probadas en cada caso. El contenido del curso se irá actualizando constantemente para los estudiantes con nuevo material, técnicas y recetas.
Este es un curso muy recomendado para todo profesional y estudiante gastronómico, aficionados a la cocina y profesionales de area de salud y nutrición para conocer las diversas técnicas adaptables a alimentación de pacientes.
Además, el curso tiene el respaldo y certificado de Science&Cooking World Congress, una organización que une a Científicos y Cocineros con el fin de divulgar las ciencias en beneficio de la Gastronomía. ¡Es un curso único!
¡Espero que te motives y Enhorabuena por tus deseos de aprender!
target_audience: Profesionales de Cocina: Chefs, Maestros, Cocineros y ayudantes
Estudiantes de Gastronomía y carreras afines
Profesionales del area de Salud y Nutrición
Aficionados a la Cocina con experiencia y gusto por el estudio
Mixólogos, Baristas y Barman

courses.title: Wine Selection: How to Choose Like a Pro
courses.bio: Discover the Secrets to Confident Wine Choosing
objectives: To skillfully select wine based on key classifications: region, climate, grape variety, production traditions, and organoleptic characteristics.
To navigate wine types—including still, sparkling, light-bodied, and full-bodied—and understand their characteristics and examples.
To analyze wineries and wine estates, using ratings and reviews to make informed choices.
To conduct basic wine tasting using a tasting chart and step-by-step analysis.
To select wine by price, know the best places to buy it, and explore how wine culture is portrayed in books and films.

Module 1: Fundamentals of Wine Culture: Historical Background: Milestones and Dates in the Evolution of Catena Zapata
Module 2: Fundamentals of Wine Selection: Wine selection based on key classifications and characteristics: regions, climat
Wine selection based on organoleptic characteristics: color, aroma, and taste
Module 3: Types of Wine and Their Distin: Light- and Full-Bodied Wines with Examples
Module 4: Winemaking and Aging: Aging period of wines. Barrels — sizes and types.
Wine production methods: white, red, rosé, still, and sparkling wines.
Module 5: Specialty Wines and Wineries: Wine selection by winery: The Case of Catena Zapata — Ratings and Reviews
Wine selection by grape varieties: white and red wines
Production methods of Sherry, Port, and Grappa
Module 6: Practical Tips for Selecting a: Wine Selection Chart: Criteria for Choosing Wine
Wine Selection by Price: Criteria and Common Myths
Module 7: Tasting and Wine Culture: Wine Tasting Chart: Steps of the Tasting Process
Wine Culture in Books and Films

requirements: The course is suitable both for beginners and for those who already have an interest in wine culture.  Recommended:  An interest in wine and a desire to understand its varieties.  Willingness to engage with information about geography, history, and culture.  The option to taste wine during practical tasting exercises (optional).  Everything else you will gain during the course — just come with an open mind and curiosity.
courses.description:
Wine Selection: How to Choose Like a Pro  offers a deep and captivating journey into the world of wine culture, designed for anyone who wants to learn how to understand and select wine with confidence and enjoyment. We’ll spare you complicated jargon and dull lectures—instead, you’ll receive lively, clear material that reveals the connections between a wine’s taste, its region, climate, and production traditions.
You will explore key wine classifications and learn to identify organoleptic characteristics—color, aroma, flavor, and finish—as well as understand the differences between still and sparkling wines, and between light- and full-bodied varieties. Special attention is given to crucial topics such as wine aging, the influence of barrel types and sizes, and an analysis of renowned wineries illustrated by the legendary Catena Zapata.
The course features exclusive author-created wine selection and tasting charts to help you organize your knowledge and apply it practically. You’ll also discover production methods for various wine styles—white, red, rosé, and fortified wines like Sherry, Port, and Grappa — and receive tips on where and how to purchase quality wine smartly.
Beyond technical expertise, the course immerses you in wine culture through examples from literature and film, broadening your horizons and making the learning process both informative and inspiring.
This course is perfect for beginners just starting their journey into the world of wine, as well as for those who wish to systematize and deepen their knowledge, refine their palate, and make informed choices in any wine-related situation.
target_audience: The course “Secrets of Choosing Wine” is designed for:  Beginners who want to confidently select wine in stores, restaurants, or tastings.  Wine enthusiasts seeking to organize their knowledge and deepen their understanding of wine culture.  Travelers and gourmets wishing to become knowledgeable about wines from different countries and regions.  Professionals in the restaurant and wine industry who need to competently recommend wines to clients.  This course will help you develop your palate, learn to read labels, understand wine styles, and confidently navigate the world of wine.

courses.title: The Art of Baking with Yuppiechef
courses.bio: Learn with our online cooking classes and get easy baking recipes, bread making, pastry classes and cake decorating

Introduction to the Art of Baking: Introduction to The Art of Baking

requirements: You will need a kitchen with basic tools, but we provide a detailed list of ingredients and what is needed for each lesson.
courses.description:
Baking has been called many things. Grandmother’s best kept secret, a science and even an art. At Yuppiechef, we believe that armed with the right knowledge, anyone can become a proficient baker in no time at all.
In this online course hosted by renowned author and food blogger Sarah Graham, we'll share with you the foundational knowledge and know-how you'll need to master key baking subjects such as cake, home-made bread and pastries.
Sarah started her food blog in May 2010, and later that year was the first South African food blogger to be awarded a book contract. Since then, Sarah has gone on to author her cookbooks, ‘Bitten’ and ‘Smitten,’ and her own TV shows.

Complete the course at your own pace, in the comfort of your own home and on the device of your choice. Once completed, you can revisit all the course material as many times as you like. Ready to show baking who's boss?
target_audience: Baking is for everyone! We cover the basics, and introduce more advanced baking techniques, so this course is applicable for all levels.

courses.title: Come fare la Pizza Napoletana Verace in 6 semplici passi
courses.bio: Finalmente un metodo universale per ottenere risultati da pizzeria anche con il normalissimo forno di casa!
objectives: Come fare la pizza come in pizzeria in appena 41 minuti!
Come ottenere un impasto super soffice, grazie a 2 tecniche di lavorazione che favoriscono l’alveolatura.
Quali sono i tempi di lievitazione ottimali, testati in base alla temperatura ambiente della tua cucina.
Come formare i panetti in modo da favorire successivamente la stesura senza strappi
Come stendere le pizze facilmente, grazie a 2 tecniche tradizionali, finalmente illustrate a RALLENTATORE!
Come cuocere le pizze in un semplice forno casalingo, simulando quel che avviene in un forno a legna!

INIZIA DA QUI!: Come usare il lievito di birra disidratato
I SEGRETI DELL'IMPASTO: Fase 2 - I due metodi di lavorazione della pasta
LE FASI DELLA LIEVITAZIONE: Lo Staglio - Come formare i panetti
LA STESURA: Come stendere la pasta - Metodo A
Come stendere la pasta - Metodo B

requirements: Avrai bisogno di una semplice cucina casalinga (munita di forno, a gas o elettrico, con grill)
Una spatola triangolare per tagliare la pasta (facilmente reperibile online o in ferramenta)
Suggerisco inoltre di munirti di un termometro a infrarossi. Si tratta di uno strumento molto utile (ed economico) reperibile facilmente nei negozi online.
courses.description:
Ti piacerebbe fare a casa un'autentica pizza napoletana?
Sto parlando della pizza che potresti mangiare in pizzeria: sottile e morbida al centro, con un cornicione gonfio, spugnoso e maculato, che ricorda l'aroma del pane appena sfornato.
Bene, con questo corso, sarai in grado di farla ogni volta che vuoi, senza dover acquistare attrezzatura specifica, talvolta ingombrante e anche molto costosa, come un fornetto per pizza, o una pietra refrattaria con pala.


Con questo corso sarai in grado di:
Riconoscere la farina giusta per fare la pizza napoletana.
Ottenere un soffice impasto napoletano, utilizzando del semplice lievito fresco o disidratato.
Sfruttare un metodo di lievitazione senza precedenti, preciso e collaudato, che prevede 5 tempistiche diverse (per la puntata, lo staglio e l’appretto) a seconda della temperatura ambiente. Seguirlo sarà di importanza fondamentale perché ti permetterà di fare la stessa ottima pizza in tutte le stagioni dell’anno!
Formare i panetti con una tecnica che facilita la stesura senza strappi.
Selezionare i giusti ingredienti per condire un'autentica pizza Margherita o Marinara. (Queste sono le uniche vere pizze napoletane, ma ovviamente potrai personalizzarle secondo i tuoi gusti).
Stendere le pizze finalmente in modo facile! Ti illustrerò 2 tecniche tradizionali a rallentatore!
Come cuocere le pizze nel tuo forno con un metodo che SIMULA la cottura in forno a legna!
Tutto questo ti sarà illustrato in 6 sezioni. In ciascuna di esse troverai sia video che una breve guida scritta a supporto.
Inoltre, per ringraziarti per aver scelto il mio corso, sono lieta di mettere a tua a disposizione anche una settima sezione speciale contenente:
"I 5 Consigli di Claudia": Un modulo extra, dedicato al perfezionamento del processo.Quando si fa la pizza, esistono infatti 5 inconvenienti tipici che potrebbero verificarsi per errori di distrazione. Se ti dovessi imbattere in una di queste difficoltà, in questo modulo troverai rapidamente la soluzione che fa al caso tuo.
La Scheda dello Sperimentatore: Ti fornirò una scheda attraverso la quale sarai in grado di appuntare e monitorare ogni fase del processo. Si tratta di uno strumento che si rivelerà particolarmente utile sopratutto nel caso desiderassi mettere a punto una tua personale versione del metodo
L’idea di poter fare a casa la pizza napoletana ti entusiasma?

ALLORA APPROFITTANE!
Acquista il corso, e presto anche tu ASSAPORERAI la soddisfazione di riuscire a fare a casa un’autentica pizza napoletana!!
target_audience: Il corso è adatto a chiunque desideri fare a casa una pizza napoletana, che si piega a portafoglio, maculata, con cornicione gonfio e ben cotto.
Il processo è illustrato a piccoli passi. Pertanto questo corso è adatto anche a chi ha poca esperienza in cucina.

courses.title: Aprende cocina sin gluten. Panadería fácil gluten free.
courses.bio: Aprendé panadería sin gluten, dulce, salada y hojaldres. Apta para celíacos, rica para todos, fácil y práctica.
objectives: Aprenderemos a realizar distintos tipos de panificados sin gluten de una forma fácil y rápida.
Panadería dulce y salada sin TACC
¿Que es la contaminación cruzada con gluten y cómo evitarla?
Método fácil para panificados sin gluten.
Hojaldre fácil o rápido.
Diferenciar celiaquía, intolerancia y sensibilidad.
Todos los cuidados que tenemos que tener para realizar preparaciones para celíacos.

Teoría. Primeros pasos para cocinar sin: Bienvenido a mi taller de cocina sin gluten.
Celiaquía, intolerancia al gluten, sensibilidad y alergias.
Utensilios aptos para la producción de panes sin gluten.
Hornos y otros medios de cocción, y sus cuidados para cocina sin gluten.
Limpieza en 3 etapas para eliminar el gluten.
Tips importantes antes de comenzar a cocinar sin gluten.
Pan lactal o de molde sin gluten.
Pan de miga para sandwiches sin gluten.
Pan para hamburguesas y panchos sin gluten.
Práctica. Mediatarde sin gluten. Especia: Tortitas de hoja o criollitos sin gluten.
¡Gracias por acompañarme! Te espero en mis otros cursos sin gluten.
¡REGALO! ¡Receta extra!: ¡REGALO! Receta de mi curso de Masas Saladas y Pastas sin gluten.

requirements: Contar con una cocina donde poder ir practicando las recetas, luego de las clases.
Utilizamos balanza de precisión de cocina para pesar los ingredientes.
courses.description:
Con este curso súper completo estarás altamente calificado, una vez concluído, para realizar una gran variedad de panificados 100% libres de gluten y aptos para celíacos. Ya que incluye: 6 clases teóricas y 10 recetas.
Aprenderás a manipular las harinas sin gluten, a realizar tus propias premezclas, técnicas de panificación gluten free y a producir preparaciones de panadería dulce y salada de gran calidad, con el agregado de mi técnica de hojaldre fácil: panes esponjosos, medialunas húmedas y tortitas crocantes. ¡Olvidate de los panes duros y sin sabor!
Me interesa tanto como a vos que logres resultados óptimos, por lo cual podrás consultarme cuantas veces necesites si te surge alguna duda. ¡Estoy para guiarte y ayudarte!
Trataremos temas importantes como:
La contaminación cruzada.
La limpieza necesaria para eliminar el gluten.
Como realizar las compras.
El modo de almacenar las materias primas y los alimentos.
Qué hornos utilizar.
Utensilios aptos para la producción.
Celiaquía, intolerancia, sensibilidad y dieta sin gluten.
Las recetas sin gluten que verás en este curso son:
Pan caserito.
Pan lactal o de molde.
Pan de hamburguesas y panchos.
Pan de miga.
Facturas hojaldradas.
Donas.
Tortitas de hoja o criollitos.
Tortitas pinchadas.
Tortitas raspadas.
Chipá.
¡Sin mix comerciales! Hacemos nuestras propias premezclas y combinaciones de harinas. Los principales ingredientes que usamos para esto son:
Almidón de maíz.
Harina de arroz.
Fécula de mandioca.
Leche en polvo ( te enseño como reemplazarla es caso de intolerancia).
Goma xántica o guar.
¡Podés aprender a tu propio ritmo y en tus horarios disponibles! Tenes acceso de por vida a los videos, podrás verlos cuantas veces necesites, pausarlos, y volver a retomar desde los puntos que necesites, en los momentos que vos elijas.
No es necesario que tengas ninguna experiencia previa, ¡con muchas ganas de aprender es suficiente!
target_audience: Personas con intolerancia o sensibilidad al gluten o alergias.
Dueños de establecimientos gastronómicos.
Empleados en establecimientos gastronómicos.
Emprendedores que deseen comenzar un negocio de venta de productos sin gluten.
Personas interesadas en eliminar el gluten de su dieta.
Celíacos, e intolerantes a la lactosa.
Aficionados a la cocina.
Chefs interesados en ampliar sus conocimientos.

Il Corso di Cucina si pone l’obiettivo di far avvicinare alla cucina di alto livello chiunque, anche i principianti dei fornelli.
Il corso è strutturato in 12 Lezioni, ognuna composta da:

courses.title: Romantic Moroccan Dinner for Two
courses.bio: Add a Moroccan twist to your romantic nights!
objectives: How to replicate authentic Moroccan-inspired dinner for two!
Learn Moroccan cuisine secrets and tricks
Discover unique Moroccan recipes
Develop your cooking skills

Learn how to make beef and prune tagine: Beef and prune tagine with English voice over and subtitltes
Learn how to make caramelized tomatoes s: Caramelized tomatoes salad with English voice over and subtitles
Learn how to make peanut ghriba: Peanut ghriba with English voice over and subtitles
Learn how to make orange and lettuce sal: Orange and lettuce salad with English voice over and subtitles
Learn how to make beetroot juice: Beetroot juice with English voice over and subtitles

requirements: Kitchen equipment
No devices or softwars needed
Basic cooking level and skills
Interest in Moroccan culture and cuisine
courses.description:
Spice up your romantic evenings with a special Moroccan dinner. Perfect for couples looking to explore unique flavors together. Intermediate level.
Experience a memorable date night with your beloved with this Moroccan-inspired menu for two, that is incredibly flavorful and will wow both of you!
Follow the course taught by the Dadas (Chefs) in this course, and learn all the tricks to recreating these Moroccan delicious dishes.


The chefs teaching the course are Dadas, who are traditional Moroccan chefs with decades of experience in the field of cooking traditional Moroccan recipes. Many of the Dadas learned the art of Moroccan cooking at a young age from their mothers and grandmothers. Today, these women are head chefs at large catering businesses and famous Moroccan restaurants.
Watch the Dadas cook the dishes in these courses and learn all their secrets for perfecting the recipes at home.


The course includes step by step video tutorials and recipe cards to help you replicate the recipes at home. All videos include English subtitles, with English voice over or original audio (in Moroccan Arabic). All recipe cards are in English, and include measurements in both metric and imperial measurements.


In this class, you will learn how to make the following dishes:
- Moroccan Beef and Prune Tagine
- Moroccan Caramelized Tomatoes Salad
- Moroccan Peanut Ghriba
- Moroccan Orange and Lettuce Salad
- Moroccan Beetroot Juice


Watch the dadas cook these famous dishes, then replicate their techniques to create these delicious and unique dishes at home.
target_audience: Beginner to advanced cooks who are interested in exploring Moroccan cuisine

courses.title: How to Make Plants Delicious: A Course on Vegan FLAVOR!
courses.bio: The fundamentals of flavor every plant-based cook should know!

Section 1: Seasoning: How to Glow Up a Veggie Burger
Make the Perfect Pico de Gallo
How to Fix a Boring Salad

requirements: Basic kitchen tools: Pots and pans, stovetop/oven, measuring cups+ spoons, cooking utensils, cutting board
A high speed blender is recommended
courses.description:
Hello and welcome! This is a MINI-COURSE for creating delicious flavor with NO animal products.
It's a fast, simple class for anyone struggling to make plant-based food taste as good as meat and dairy. Because with the right techniques, vegan food can taste better than animal cuisine.
My name is Janay and I was lucky to work in several top vegan restaurants in Miami, where I learned incredible tips and tricks for making mind-blowing vegan food. Now, I want to share what I've learned to empower you to create amazing plant-based flavor. Because vegan food should never be boring!
*NOTE: This course is focused on traditional meat/cheese flavors and makes use of storebought meat and dairy alternatives. If you are seeking more vegetable-focused cooking, Udemy offers many classes that are specifically designed for whole-food ingredients.*
______________
Right away, you'll learn the 4 Essentials of Plant-Based Flavor, including:
- Seasoning in Layers
- How to Add Umami
- The 3 B's: Butter, Broth and Bouillon
- Adding Creaminess
We'll practice each of these techniques with simple recipes and make delicious tacos, burgers, milkshakes and the best ever vegan Mac 'N Cheese.
- This course is suitable for cooks at any skill level. No fancy knife skills required. I do recommend a high-speed blender for some recipes, but it's optional.
- By the end, you should have a much better idea of how to flavor any plant-based dish, and a lot more confidence in the kitchen.
- If you practice all the techniques and recipes, it should provide a solid foundation of new cooking skills.
target_audience: Cooks who need help flavoring plant-based food
Anyone who wants to enhance their understanding of flavor.

courses.title: Gluten Free Mastery: From Insight to Gourmet Delight
courses.bio: Dive Deep into Gluten Free Living: Master the Art, Science, and Culinary Wonders of a Gluten Free Diet (Paleo, Keto)
objectives: How to build a gluten-free safe haven to prevent gluten cross-contamination in your kitchen and pantry helping you obtain 100% gluten-free living
Ways to empower yourself in social situations, while dining out and traveling, and with cravings and emotional eating to stay healthy on your journey
The biological processes of gluten intolerance and how gluten effects the body even with small amounts of consumption
The differentiation between gluten sensitvity and celiac disease; understanding symptoms, diagnosis and treatment options of both
Your essential macronutrients and micronutrients and how to achieve a balanced diet from gluten-free sources
Simple prep and cooking basics like produce shopping, knife skills, veggie cooking tricks, and others needed for plant-based foods
Personalized meal plans for gluten-free, vegetarian, vegan, low FODMAP and other dietary needs using the FREE Spoonacular App
To preserve nutrients, ferment and repurpose ingredients for multiple meals reducing food waste and saving money on your grocery bill
How to enhance flavors with fresh herbs, spices and restaurant industry techniques for less dining out and more of homecooking's healing energy
About embracing international gourmet flavors that will keep you feeling satisfied and give you inspriation to re-create your own cultural favorites

The Science of Gluten Intolerance: Understanding How Gluten Affects the Body
Gluten-Free Nutrition: Balancing Macronutrients in a Gluten-Free Diet
Building Your Gluten-Free Safe Haven: Customizing Meal Plans for Specific Needs
Meal Planning and Meal Prepping: Using the Free Spoonacular App for Easy Planning & Shopping
Cooking Vegetables: Water Saute Bok Choy, Mushroom, Carrot
Mastering Resturant Quality Meals: Turkey Meatballs with Pesto Sauce Spagetti Squash

requirements: No experience needed. (Only a desire to cook)
Basic cooking tools, equipment, and utensils are necessary.
courses.description:
The Gluten Free Mastery: From Insight to Gourmet Delight course is your time, money and energy saver for delicious gluten-free cooking.
When adding plant-based foods to your diet like fresh fruits and vegetables, this increases the number of prepping and cooking techniques that you can use to:
make simple dishes with little effort;
preserve fresh ingredients;
get the most nutritional value out of your foods;
and, enhance the pleasures for your taste-buds.
If you are struggling to make healthy meals each day, this course can build your skills to reach your health goals.
Weather you're cooking keto, paleo, vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, dairy-free, inflammatory-free or just more fruits and vegetables, this course teaches you all the necessary basics, including meal planning.
How can the Gluten-Free Mastery: From Insight to Gourmet Delight Course save you time, money and energy?
This course will help you at every step to stay on your healthy eating journey. Your steps to creating plant-based meals:
Plan
Shop
Prep
Cook
Store
"If you fail to plan, you are planning to fail."  ~  Benjamin Franklin
This course will help you:
Get organized with kitchen tools and equipment to make cooking safer, easier and enjoyable using The Gluten-free Kitchen Guide
Create your own meal plans using the FREE Spoonacular App to search and organize recipes and generate shopping lists.
Customize your meal plans to fit vegetarian, vegan, and low FODMAP diets.
Shop inflammatory-free substitutes using money-saving produce shopping tips.
Prepare meals with ease using professional chef cutting skills.
Learn a variety of vegetable cooking methods.
Use restaurant-quality techniques to enhance the flavors of your meals.
Store your meals with proper produce storage tips and healthier storage-ware.
The Gluten Free Mastery: From Insight to Gourmet Delight course includes easy to follow, step-by-step cooking instructions. Also, a downloadable and printable Meal Planner and other tools and resources are included.
A Comprehensive Guide to Building a Gluten-free Kitchen
Just starting your gluten-free journey? Module 3, Building Your Gluten-free Safe Haven, is the ideal starting point.
Dive into Lesson 5 and the Gluten Free Kitchen Guide, where you'll discover an easy-to-follow checklist. This guide will not only help you reorganize your kitchen and pantry but also pave the way for healthier eating habits. By eliminating gluten and embracing healthier alternatives, you can optimize your kitchen environment for your dietary needs.
Invest your time, money, and energy into doing what you love with whom you cherish. That includes relishing in the joy of cooking!
Understanding Gluten: More than Just a Protein
At the core of Gluten Free Mastery: From Insight to Gourmet Delight is a deep dive into gluten. Gluten isn't just a buzzword; it's a protein predominantly found in wheat, barley, and rye. Even in minute quantities, it can pose significant health challenges, especially for those sensitive or intolerant.
Equip yourself with the knowledge to detect hidden gluten sources lurking in everyday items. As you progress through the course, you'll refine your skills, becoming a savvy food detective, ever-ready to make informed choices to safeguard your health.
Why was this course created?
Your instructor, Keish Mitchell, created this course for you because she spent an awful lot of time, money and energy making gluten-free (and eventually inflammatory-free) meals. She had poor gut health and suffered from severe fatigue, brain fog and inflammation. She was using food as medicine.
Surprisingly, cooking gluten-free was a lot harder than she expected, despite cooking since age 4 and her science background.
After two short weeks on a gluten-free diet, most of her symptoms disappeared. She had less brain fog, more concentration, increased focus and less body pain. She was happier and healthier than she had been in several years, in just two weeks!
With great empathy and compassion, she realized how others struggled and she set a goal to help foodies like you follow a gluten-free diet and create healthier and happier lives for yourself and your loved ones.
Keish has been practicing holistic medicine for over 20 years and been gluten-free for 8 years. She has a science degree in chemistry and is a certified health coach in integrative nutrition.
target_audience: Gluten-sensitive and gluten-intolerant foodies
Celiac, Colitis, IBS, and Crohn's disease warriors
Keto, paleo, inflammatory-free and elimination dieters
Foodies ready to eat healthier and more delicious plant-based meals

courses.title: Plant based Vegetarian Cuisine menu by Master chef Gabriel
courses.bio: This program covers different form of Plant based dishes in the form of a set menu
objectives: Learn plant based cuisine

courses.description:
I love Spanish and I am a foodie. What could be a better mix of two my passions?:)

What my friends and I have done is not actually a course, but a way to have fun learning Spanish. Are you excited to try amazing new dishes? We invite you to join us. Speak it, eat it!


Júntame y a mis amigos en nuestro viaje por la cultura y cocina latinoamericana. Aprende, participe, come, disfruta!

Wiki:
Latin American cuisine is the typical foods, beverages, and cooking styles common to many of the countries and cultures in Latin America. Latin America is a highly diverse area of land whose nations have varying cuisines. Some items typical of Latin American cuisine include maize-based dishes arepas, pupusas, tacos, tamales, tortillas and various salsas and other condiments (guacamole, pico de gallo, mole, chimichurri, chili, aji, pebre). Sofrito, a culinary term that originally referred to a specific combination of sautéed or braised aromatics, exists in Latin American cuisine. It refers to a sauce of tomatoes, roasted bell peppers, garlic, onions and herbs. Rice and beans are also staples in Latin American cuisine.
Latin American beverages are just as distinct as their foods. Some of the beverages can even date back to the times of the Native Americans. Some popular beverages include coffee, mate, hibiscus tea, horchata, chicha, atole, cacao and aguas frescas.
Desserts in Latin America are generally very sweet in taste. They include dulce de leche, alfajor, rice pudding, tres leches cake, teja and flan.
target_audience: Food lovers
Language lovers
Life lovers

courses.title: Master of Sourdough
courses.bio: Artisan Loaf Course
objectives: I’ve been there—flat loaves and hours of confusing online content.
Use my incredibly easy to follow, proven process to bake beautiful loaves every week.
I’ll show you the essential tools you actually need to successfully start your sourdough journey.
I teach you not to be afraid of "killing" your starter, it really can live safely in your refrigerator for several weeks!
Dial in your own perfect method to work in your kitchen and environment.

Welcome To Master Of Sourdough!: Gathering Supplies & Getting Setup For Your Course
Shaping, Cold Fermenting, Scoring, and B: Loaf Shaping + Cold Fermenting Your Loaves

requirements: No experience necessary. I'll take you from starter to beautiful loaves of delicious sourdough bread.
You will need to source a sourdough starter, and a few essential tools I recommend having before starting your journey.
courses.description:
I started baking sourdough a few years ago, and I kid you not—every single time a friend or family member walked into my house and caught a whiff of that warm, freshly baked bread… they’d ask what is that wonderful smell?! Then they’d see the loaf, take a bite, and immediately say, Okay, I need you to teach me how to make this! It happened over and over again until I finally realized—I’ve got to put this into a system and share it with more people. So, here we are, friend. I’m going to teach you how to bake amazing, artisan sourdough bread right from your own kitchen.


I’ve created a step-by-step course that’s beginner-friendly, stress-free, and actually fun. It’s all the info you need without the science-overload or sourdough snobbery. Since launching the course, students are now baking bakery-level (or let’s be real, better than bakery) artisan loaves from home—and their friends and family are loving it too.


If you’ve been sourdough-curious or tried before and gave up, I’ve got you. This course is for real people, with real lives, and a serious love for good bread.


Let’s bake. Let’s rock. Enroll now and let the magic begin!


Rock On!
-Shelly
target_audience: This course is for beginners who want to learn how to bake artisan sourdough bread at home—without any complicated steps.
Perfect for busy home bakers who want a simple, repeatable method to create delicious, bakery-worthy loaves on their own schedule.
Ideal for anyone who’s ever said, “I wish I could make sourdough like that,” and wants a step-by-step guide to finally make it happen—with confidence and fun.

courses.title: Cocktail Mastery: Mojito, Margarita, Martini Recipe & More
courses.bio: Master the world's 3 most popular cocktails with these comprehensive over-the-shoulder cocktail creation videos
requirements: No previous experience or knowledge required
You'll need basic bar tools such as a jigger, shaker tin, muddler and bar spoon
courses.description:
Our goal with this course was to cover every aspect of each of the three cocktails - the margarita, martini and mojito - from the origin of the cocktails to mastering the creation of each cocktail.  We’ve included “talking points” videos as well as the over-the-shoulder cocktail creation videos so that you can learn interesting tidbits of information about each of these popular cocktails.
We chose over-the-shoulder type videos as we wanted you to be able to learn and see the creation of the cocktails from the bartender’s perspective.  Each of the drink videos also contains a narrative where we go into further detail about each step of the drink making process, the choice of alcohol, presentation, garnishes etc.
If you’ve ordered the same cocktail in more than a few bars, you’re likely aware that different bars / bartenders make the same cocktail differently.  Depending on which bar you go to and which bartender serves you, the ingredients of a cocktail can actually vary quite a bit.  Some cocktails, like the margarita, for example, can have two completely different recipes depending on whether you use fresh ingredients or not.  This is the reason that this course contains two videos for the Margarita - one traditional and one quick and dirty version.
In addition to the cocktail creation and talking points videos, we have also included two videos walking you through the various styles of pouring.  Mastering pouring and cutting will ensure that you look like a pro while you’re creating these cocktail classics.
Don’t let the price tag of this course fool you!  You will find real value in these videos and whether you’re just starting out bartending, have tons of experience or are just looking to learn how to make some cool cocktails, you won’t find a more well-rounded cocktail course.
target_audience: Home bar enthusiasts who want to raise their game
Party / event hosts who want to create an enhanced experience through better cocktails
New bartenders or bartenders with little cocktail experience looking to up their cocktail game

Experienced or professional bartenders who want to consolidate what they already know, get another perspective on these drinks, and learn about other styles and techniques of how these drinks can be made and served

requirements: Nessun requisito
courses.description:
Hai sempre voluto realizzare delle focacce super invitanti e saporite con le tue mani, per stupire i tuoi ospiti alle cene o anche solo per mettere in tavola un contorno sfizioso, diverso dal solito pane,  fatto con pochi e semplici ingredienti?
In questo corso ti mostrerò come realizzare una ricetta per focaccia partendo da zero, utilizzando soltanto gli strumenti che hai in casa!
Vedremo insieme come calcolare quanto impasto ti servirà in base alla teglia che hai a disposizione; Che sia in ferro, alluminio o anche in pyrex non importa, potrai usare quello che vuoi per cuocerla!
Vi serviranno soltanto 4 ingredienti che sicuramente avrete già nella vostra dispensa:
Farina 0 o 00
Lievito di birra fresco o anche secco (potete anche usare il lievito madre/licoli se volete)
Sale
Olio
Il 5° ingrediente è completamente gratis ed è l'acqua del rubinetto!
Creeremo l'impasto completamente a mano e lo lasceremo maturare, così che la focaccia che realizzerete non sarà soltanto bella e buona, ma anche profumata e ad alta digeribilità, perché quando si tratta di lievitati non vogliamo che quello che mangiamo ci rimanga nello stomaco.
Inoltre vedremo insieme come far lievitare correttamente la focaccia in teglia e come realizzare i tipici buchi che la caratterizzano.
Non solo, perché prepareremo insieme anche la mia iconica focaccia con le cipolle Borettane e le olive Taggiasche e vi svelerò tutti i miei trucchi per rendere l'aspetto delle vostre focacce super invitanti!
Cosa aspetti?
Ti aspetto

courses.title: Viver de Café - Curso Básico de Barista
courses.bio: O Mestre Barista Emílio Rodrigues ensina toda a teoria para entrar no mundo delicioso do Café
objectives: Toda a teoria para quem quer dar os primeiros passos na profissão de Barista.

Introdução: Aula 1 - História do Café - África e Arábia
Aula 2 - História do Café - Europa e Américas
Ciência do Café: Aula 7 - Processo produtivo - BOTÂNICA (O Café antes do Café)
Aula 9 - Processo produtivo - CLASSIFICAÇÃO POR PENEIRA
Aula 10 - Processo produtivo - CLASSIFICAÇÃO POR TIPO

Aula 36 - Café filtrado: Hario, Kalita e Melita

requirements: Não necessita pré-requisitos
courses.description:
Emílio Rodrigues é Mestre Barista desde 2002 e instrutor da Casa do Barista, escola especializada na formação de mão de obra especializada para cafeterias e realização de eventos. O curso Viver de Café começa com a História do Café, falando sobre a planta na África e Arábia, depois na Europa e nas Américas, finalmente abordando a chegada do café ao Brasil. Em seguida, Emílo aborda o tema "Sabores e percepções", ao despertar no aluno, a atenção ao paladar, ao corpo e ao aroma do café. No módulo seguinte, o curso aborda a ciência do café em seu processo produtivo, onde Emílio fala sobre a botânica, o beneficiamento, a classificação por peneiras, tipos e torras. Em seguida trata de todas as variáveis para a extração de um café espresso perfeito. Aborda um módulo inteiro sobre abrir ou trabalhar em uma cafeteria, desde a busca pelo ponto ideal até a montagem do cardápio. O curso dedica um mósulo sobre os diferentes métodos de preparo e ainda, como bônus, um módulo sobre Arte Latte e Drinks com café.
Emílio acredita que apenas a prática é capaz de formar um bom barista, mas esse curso é a porta de entrada para quem quer conhecer o delicioso mundo da segunda bebida mais consumida no mundo.
target_audience: Interessados na profissão de Barista ou apreciadores de café

Foi isso que descobri há alguns anos atras e que mudou completamente minha vida.
Após esse curso você estará preparada para iniciar seu negócio da cozinha da sua casa e lucrar muito com bolos no pote. Aprenda estratégias que aprendi e apliquei em anos de experiência na confeitaria para deixar de depender do meu marido e conquistar minha independência financeira.
Não é só Bolo no Pote! Você aprenderá receitas campeãs de vendas e um caminho para conseguir transformar a confeitaria em um negócio lucrativo e poder viver disso!
Neste curso você irá aprender:

courses.description:
Vous aimeriez vous initier à la mixologie : l'art du cocktail ? Maîtriser les gestes techniques de la mixologie et assimiler les notions d'équilibre et d'harmonie des saveurs d'un cocktail ? Débutant ou déjà initié en mixologie, vous trouverez dans ce cours de mixologie en ligne de précieux conseils qui feront de vous le roi ou la reine des cocktails !
Ce cours de mixologie en ligne est dédié aux débutants (et amateur averti) qui souhaitent en savoir plus sur les cocktails et spiritueux. Ce cours constitue une excellente entrée en matière à l'art des cocktails. Comme toute discipline, le cocktail nécessite d'assimiler les bases de la mixologie et surtout de déconstruire les légendes urbaines qui y sont associées. Vous découvrirez les ingrédients des cocktails et pourquoi et comment ils s'associeront avec harmonie. À l'issue de ce cours de mixologie en ligne, vous maîtriserez les recettes historiques originelles de vos cocktails préférés et serez aptes à improviser des recettes de cocktail grâce aux notions d'équilibre et d'harmonie des saveurs que vous aurez acquises ! Au-delà des vidéos explicatives de ce cours de mixologie en ligne, vous disposerez d'un guide récapitulatif ainsi que de 25 recettes de cocktails.


Alors, à vous de jouer et réalisez vos propres cocktails ainsi que les cocktails classiques ou plus contemporains !

courses.description:
In this course you will be learning how to make cute, cartoon style sugar craft animals using modelling paste / fondant / gum paste. These are really popular for anyone with an interest in cake decorating, sugarcraft, or similar crafts, such as polymer clay sculptors.
The course includes 3 and a half hours of video footage, which is packed with information and top tips. Also included are PDF downloads to accompany each model, with a useful guide to how much paste is used for each part of the models, to make sure your models are in proportion - no more guessing how big each bit needs to be! They also include full colour step by step photos and written instruction, to use as a guide alongside the videos.
You will begin by learning which materials and equipment you will need to create the animal models, before moving on to learn how to create each model, one by one. You will start with the simplest, hippo model, then build on these skills with new techniques in the following panda, elephant and lion figures.
This course is perfect for all cake decorators; from those who want to learn a new skill or for those seeking to improve their existing ones.. If you would like to learn how to make sugar craft animals, whilst improving your skills and confidence, then this course is just for you.

requirements: No prior gardening experience needed! This course is designed for complete beginners as well as enthusiasts.
You’ll need simple tools like a drill, a saw, and common building materials. A full list is provided in the course.
Whether it’s a corner of your backyard or just a sunny balcony, you can adapt the system to fit.
Willingness to learn and get your hands a little dirty!
courses.description:
Are you ready to take control of your food supply, reduce your grocery bills, and enjoy truly fresh, organic produce straight from your balcony, backyard, or even a sunny window? This course will teach you how to build and use a self-watering garden system that dramatically cuts water consumption, minimizes maintenance, and maximizes nutrient-rich harvests.
You'll start by exploring the reasons why traditional agriculture often fails to prioritize nutrition and sustainability. Then you'll discover the concept behind our innovative self-watering system, designed to work virtually anywhere, regardless of space or climate. We’ll guide you step by step through selecting materials, assembling your system, and preparing the perfect growing medium.
You'll also learn essential techniques for planning your garden, sowing and transplanting, naturally boosting soil fertility, and even adding a small vermicompost unit to create a closed-loop system. Whether you want to grow aromatic herbs, gourmet vegetables, or nutrient-dense leafy greens, you’ll finish this course ready to harvest your own healthy, pesticide-free food.
This course is perfect for beginners, city dwellers with limited space, or anyone seeking greater food independence and well-being. Join us and transform your living space into a regenerative oasis that nurtures your body, mind, and the planet.
target_audience: Beginners who’ve never planted a seed before
Busy people looking for an easy, low-maintenance way to grow food
Families who want to eat better and teach kids where real food comes from
Urban dwellers with only a balcony or small garden
Anyone who cares about sustainability, reducing costs, and being less dependent on supermarkets

courses.title: Basic Plated Dessert by Master Chef
courses.bio: Basic Plated dessert by APCA Malaysia- An International Pastry & Culinary School
objectives: Learn the Basic Plated dessert by Master Chef

Learn about apple strudel and Crepe suzette

requirements: No pre requisite as you will learn from basic level
courses.description:
Basic Plated Dessert by Master Chef
This program will cover 8 world class basic recipes based on different skills and techniques about plated dessert and can be easily replicated in the kitchen
Apple Strudel - A classic Austrian dessert and consists of dough pulled paper thin and filled with an apples, cinnamon, raisins and sugar before rolling and baking until crisp
Apple Tart Tatin - Named after the tatin sister and after the hotel is was first made in, consists of beautiful layers of caramelised apples baked with flaky golden puff pastry
Berry Parfait - A sweet and tangy glace with the flavours of raspberry, strawberry and blackberry topped with fresh berries
Chocolate Fondue - A moist dark chocolate cake with a molten flowing centre, served hot next to cold vanilla ice cream
Crepe Suzette - Thin delicate crepes flambeed with sugar, fresh oranges and Cointreau
Crème Brule - A soft and creamy custard set over a dark caramel and baked before inverting to create a delicious vanilla pudding topped with caramel
Naugat Glacier - A semi frozen parfait of cream and nuts and combined with a crisp salty sable base
Panacotta - An Italian dessert meaning cooked cream, that’s set with gelatine, usually served with jelly or fresh fruit. The rich taste of the cream is perfectly balanced with the freshness and acidity from the fruit
This program will be a perfect to be used in a small restaurant or Café. This also act as a good starting for advance level plated desserts in Fine Dining
We hope this program will help you immensely to replicate these recipes in your home kitchen or professional production
target_audience: This course is suitable for home Bakers, students and Enthusiasts

requirements: Conocimiento básico de Cocina salada e internacional
Conocimiento básico de Pasteleria
Conocimiento de Lenguaje y Vocabulario técnico gastronómico
Experiencia laboral en cocina o Mucha práctica cocinando (en casa)
Pasión y gusto por la Gastronomía en general
courses.description:
Actualización Noviembre 2020
Ahora el curso posee el respaldo y certificado de Science&Cooking World Congress. Una organización que une a Científicos y Cocineros, con el fin de divulgar las ciencias en beneficio de la Gastronomía. Es un gran hito y honor para este curso poseer el respaldo de tan importante Congreso!
***
La Gastronomía es un mundo increíble lleno de sabores y texturas.
Como Cocineros, nuestro deber es la preparación de platos sabrosos y seguros para nuestros comensales o clientes. Existen múltiples formas de aprender a cocinar; y las escuelas, institutos o universidades se enfocan en crear profesionales de amplio paladar, con un gran enfoque en lo práctico.
Pero al ir descubriendo que la Gastronomía es mas allá que las recetas, los profesionales o aficionados a la cocina buscan diferenciarse, saber y estudiar más. Y cuando descubren que la Ciencia tiene respuestas para explicar por que hacemos las cosas y como podemos mejorarlas aplicando conocimiento científico, se nos abre un nuevo mundo y empezamos a encontrar respuestas y fundamentos a nuestra cocina de todos los días. Además que las escuelas y universidades no se enfocan en enseñar física y química de los alimentos.
¿Por qué el huevo al batirlo genera una espuma consistente? ¿Cómo el trabajo del cocinero puede mejorar aplicando método científico? ¿Por qué al mezclar varios sabores y texturas en un plato nos gusta mas?
¡Todo eso y mucho más quiero enseñarte!
Soy Heinz Wuth, Cocinero y apasionado por las Ciencias Gastronómicas, llevo más de 18 años trabajando y aplicando conocimiento que nos entrega la ciencia y divulgando cultura y conocimiento gastronómico.
Y quiero invitarte a ti, que eres una persona curiosa a que descubras este curso que te servirá a comprender y entender mejor la cocina, con el fin de aumentar tu conocimiento y enseñarte como funcionan los alimentos dentro de las sartenes.
Este no es un curso de cocina, es un curso que te enseñará por qué cocinamos y cómo podemos mejorarlo gracias a la ciencia.
El curso es 100% online, y también puedes aprovechar las herramientas de interacción para ir viendo avances y resolver tus dudas.
¡Espero que te motives y Enhorabuena por tus deseos de aprender!
target_audience: Profesionales de Cocina: Chefs, Maestros, ayudantes
Estudiantes o Alumnos de Gastronomía
Aficionados a la Cocina con experiencia y gusto por el estudio
Otros Profesionales curiosos por la Gastronomía

courses.bio: 使うスパイスは５つだけ、食材も身近に手に入り、キッチンにある道具で作れます。季節の野菜がたっぷりのヴィーガンカレー。また普段の買い物をちょっと意識することで、SDGｓへ貢献のヒントも学べます。

第１章 ようこそ！: この講座を受けるとどんなよいことがある？
第２章 カレーってそもそも何からできているの？: 日本と海外のカレーってこんなに違うの？

requirements: 経験は問いません。作りたい！食べたい！という情熱があればOKです！
courses.description:
お店で出している野菜カレー
召し上がったお客様に
おうちでこのカレーを作ってみたいです！というお声をよくいただき
ときどきカレー教室をやっていました。


参加されるみなさんのお悩みのほとんどが
「カレールーで作るカレーがどうも体に合わない、食べていると段々胃が重く感じる」
「子どもに添加物を与えたくない」
そして
「ヴィーガンでおいしいカレーを作りたい」
「スパイスを使えるようになりたい」
という方もいらっしゃいました。


ということで、このコースではいつもお店で出しているカレーを
ご自宅で作っていただけるよう動画にしました。


大人も子どもも大好きなカレー、国民食ともいわれますね。
スパイスは薬膳でも使われ
カレーの国インドでは伝統医学アーユルヴェーダの智恵であり
スパイスを家庭の薬として扱っていたり
スパイスを使ったカレー、本来はとても健康的な食べ物なんですよね。
ぜひおうちの定番カレーにしていただきたいと思っています。


そして、このカレーを作るときに
地球の未来をちょっと意識してみましょう
わたしたちの健康は地球の環境にも左右されます
「オーガニック」「地産地消」「フェアトレード」「ＳＤＧｓ」を
できる限り分かりやすいレクチャーにしました。


2030年までに世界規模で目標達成に取り組むSDGｓですが
わたしたち一人ひとりが身近な食を通してアクションを起こすことができます。
そのヒントもぜひこの講座から学んでいきましょう。

Para todos aquellos que son amantes de los dulces o postres de toda la vida. Sin necesidad de conocimientos previos. Sorprende a tu abuela haciendo las rosquillas como las ha hecho ella toda la vida!

courses.title: Want to start in pizza business? Commercial cooking A to Z
courses.bio: Commercial pizza ABC, making pizza, streching pizza, cooking pizza
objectives: Pizza flour and gluten
Elastic pizza dough recipe (with automated cost calculator) for commercial (or home) use
Streching pizza dough with hands and making pizza
Cooking pizza in commercial oven

Pizza dough ingredients: Correct way to weight and add ingridients
Dough mixing: Dough mixing, when to add salt and oil
Making pizza dough balls and comparing f: Comparing just made fresh pizza dough to fermented
Making pizza: Adding tomato sauce and cheese on pizza base

requirements: For pizza dough you will need pizza flour, sugar, salt, dry yeast, sunflower oil (or olive oil) and warm water
For streching pizza you will need corn flower
For mixing you will need dough mixer
For pizza you will need tomato sauce and cheese
For pizza base to put on you will need metal pizza screen
For cooking you will need electric, wooden or gas oven
In course you will learn how to prepare and mix pizza dough, strech and cook pizza
courses.description:
This course begins with me introducing my self. I am thirty one years old man Povilas Vadeika from Lithuania, Europe. I have ten years of experience as pizza chef and eight years of experience as pizza chefs teacher. Also I am pizzeria chain (MIAMI Pizza) owner for eight years.
In first episode i explain what flour with what glutent percentaged and number of ashes we will use. Later i describe how to properly read pizza dough recipe and in which order and at what time to add will add all ingridients. I explain how good pizza dough should look like and what mistakes to avoid.
I start pizza dough mixing process and during it add rest of the ingridients.
After mixing pizza dough i transfer it to table and cover it in plastic wrap. I let it stay on the table and relax for twenty minutes. Later I cut it in peaces by weight and form beautifull pizza dough balls. Which I place in special pizza dough boxes. Then I transfer these boxes to the frigde and let them ferment and rise in the fridge over night.
Next day I strech fermented dough balls to pizza baces on which I add tomato sauce, cheese and then cook in electric oven heated to 415C temperature until pizza is nice and brown on the sides and bottom.
target_audience: People who want to learn or improve their pizza making skills

Hi Guys !
Welcome to the Course - Baking Indian Cookie : Nankhatai.
In this course you will get to learn about the Basics of Baking, introduction to Indian ingredients for baking and a step by step guide on how to prepare this delicious Indian Cookie called Nankhatai at your home.
Through this course I intend to share a detailed recipe of this delicious Indian Cookie called Nankhatai so that you get perfect results every time you prepare. I will introduce you to the different Indian ingredients used in baking cookies. I will also walk you through the basics of baking, give you an overview of the different tools required for baking. I will also show you how to operate OTG (Oven Toaster Griller) for baking.
You need to have some baking tools in order to take this course which are measuring cups, baking tools and OTG. Please refer to the Section 2 of this course for details.
The recipe for Nankhatai has the following steps:
1. Dough preparation
2. Shape the cookies
3. Prepare the baking tray
4. Place cookies on the tray
5. Pre heat the oven
6. Bake the cookies
7. Take the cookies out and keep it aside to cool
8. Make sure the colour and texture of the cookies are perfect
9. Serve them
10. Store the cookies properly to keep them fresh for a long time
I will also share the secrets of perfect cookie baking and some tips and tricks which will help you to get the perfect results every time you bake.
Thank You ! See you in the course.

Through this course, we will learn more about the ingredients of this meal, and we will also learn two other meals, which are fried chicken breasts and bechamel pasta with sausage in the Egyptian way.
Although it is known that ( kushary ) is an Egyptian food, its origin is due to the Indians, as the Egyptians knew this food from the Indians after the First World War, but they changed some of the ingredients in it and its name became the Egyptian Koshary.
The recipe for pasta with bechamel, you will like it a lot because it is rich in different cheeses and it tastes really wonderful and different three recipes of Egyptian food.
Fried chicken is a very simple and beautiful meal and you will love its taste. The good thing is that it can be eaten alongside different foods or alongside salads, as it is a light and easy meal and has a distinctive taste.
Koshary is the favorite meal of the famous Egyptian footballer, Mohamed Salah, I think some of us are eager and curious to try the foods that famous people love especially football players, So I was very interested in mentioning this in this course, and you will also see a nice clip from a conversation with the Egyptian player Mohamed Salah who mentioned his love for Koshary.

courses.title: Vegan/Vejetaryen çikolata Eğitimi( Naturel, Sıfır Şeker )
courses.bio: DOĞAL VEGAN/VEJETARYEN ÇİKOLATA EĞİTİMİ
objectives: Merhaba ben Şef Berat SANCAK gastronomi bilim uzmanıyım. callebaut academy den çikolata eğitimleri aldım. Bu eğitimleri ve bilgileri sizin ile paylaşarak hem sağlıklı bir çikolata nasıl üretilir hem de kakao çekirdeğinden çikolataya yapım aşamalarını öğretmek istiyorum. Antioksidan yönünden zengin zayıflamaya yardımcı, şeker hastalarına özel( rafine şeker tatlandırıcı vs kullanmadan ama tatlı) doğal tatlandırıcılar ile birlikte sıfırdan çikolata yapabileceğiniz harika bir eğitimdir. Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata yapımını tüm aşamaları ile birlikte kakao yağını tanıma ve 3 farklı temperleme şekli, yaptığımız çikolatayı tatlandırma ve kalıplama teknikleri, satış için reçetelendirme ve bütçelemeyi bu eğitimde öğreneceksiniz.
Vegan vejetaryen çikolata eğitimi ve sıfırdan çikolata yapımı ile 5 farklı vegan çikolata reçetesi öğreneceksiniz.
Bölüm 1: Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata yapımı için kullanılacak malzemeler
Bölüm 2: Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata hakkında ayrıntılı bilgiler, kakao yağını tanıma, kakao çekirdeğini tanıma, vegan ve vejetaryen çikolatanın özellikleri ile polikarbon kalıpları hazırlama

3.Bölüm: Vegan/vejetaryen çikolata hazırlama , 5(beş) farklı bitter ve sütlü vegan çikolata reçeteleri, temperleme teknikleri, bitkisel süt hazırlama reçeteleri, Satış için bütçeleme ve kar marjı hesaplama.

Giriş: Ders 1 Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata yapımı için kullanılacak malzemeler
Ders 2:: Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata yapımı için kullanılacak malzemeler
Ders:3 : Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata yapımı için kullanılacak malzemeler
BÖLÜM 2: Ders 4:Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata hakkında ayrıntılı bilgiler
Ders 5:Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata hakkında ayrıntılı bilgiler, kakao yağı
3.Bölüm: 6.Ders: Vegan/vejetaryen çikolata hazırlama , 5(beş) farklı bitter ve sütlü ve
7.Ders: Vegan/vejetaryen çikolata hazırlama , 5(beş) farklı bitter ve sütlü ve
8.Ders: Vegan/vejetaryen çikolata hazırlama , 5(beş) farklı bitter ve sütlü ve

requirements: Çikolatayı sevmesi gerekiyor.
Vegan ve vejetaryen yemek kültürü hakkında bilgi sahibi olması gerekiyor.
Vegan çikolata üretimi için gerekli malzemelere sahip olması gerekiyor.
courses.description:
İnsan sağlığının çok önemli olduğu bu dönemlerde sizler ile birlikte Kakao çekirdeğinden çikolataya uzanan harika bir yolculuk ile sizde kendi doğal ve sağlıklı çikolatanızı kendiniz yapabilirsiniz. Çikolata herkes tarafından sevilen ve tüketilen bir yiyecektir. Bu eğitimi alırken; Kakao yağının, kakao çekirdeğinin özelliklerini ve besin değeri açısından ne kadar önemli olduğunu güzel ve eşsiz videolu anlatım ve içerikler ile birlikte öğreneceksiniz.  Kakaonun eşsiz ve keskin kokusunu bütün sevdikleriniz ile birlikte paylaşabilirsiniz.
Vegan çikolata eğitimini eşsiz ve özel tarifler ile birlikte öğrenecek ve kendi çikolatalarınızı kendiniz de yaparak gerçek çikolatanın tadını alacaksınız. Ve bu eşsiz güzelliği üreterek kendi portföyünüzü oluşturarak satabileceksiniz. Eğitimin içeriğinde paketleme ve satış kar marjı hesaplama gibi birçok içerik sizleri beklemektedir. Hadi hep birlikte başlayalım...
Vegan/Vejetaryen Çikolata: Vegan çikolata, içeriğinde hiçbir hayvansal ürün bulunmayan çikolatadır. İçeriğinde doğal kakao yağı, kakao çekirdeği, Hindistan cevizi sütü gibi bitkisel malzemelerden oluşan bir çikolatadır. Sağlık açısından bakıldığında;
Aynı zamanda iştah kesen yiyecekler arasında da yer alır. Tatlı krizlerini fazla kalori almadan çözmek için bir kare vegan çikolata yemek yeterlidir. vegan çikolatanın kalori değerleri şu şekildedir:
1 küçük parça (5 gr) vegan çikolata 25 kcal
1 küçük paket (40 gr) vegan çikolata 192 kcal
1 paket (100 gr) vegan çikolata 479 kcal
Antioksidanlar bakımından zengin olan vegan çikolatanın besin değerleri ise şu şekildedir:
Karbonhidrat: 57,5 gr.
Protein: 5 gr.
Yağ: 35 gr.
Vegan çikolatanın kakao miktarı çok daha fazladır. Bu nedenle içeriğinde süt gibi hayvansal ürünler bulunmaz. Ayrıca doğal tatlandırıcılar kullanıldığı için diyabet hastaları da tüketebilir.
Vegan/Vejetaryen Çikolatanın Faydaları
Vegan çikolata, güçlü antioksidanlar içerir. Bu özellikleriyle sağlık açısından son derece faydalıdır. Antioksidanlar, vücut direncini arttırarak serbest radikallerin vücuda hasar vermesini önler. Yapılan çalışmalara göre bitter çikolata süper meyve kategorisindedir.
Vegan çikolata tansiyonu dengelediği için inme, kalp krizi gibi birçok hastalığı da önler. Her gün biraz bitter çikolata tüketmek kan basıncını dengeler ve kan akışını iyileştirir.
Vegan çikolatanın faydaları arasında kolesterolü düşürmesi de bulunmaktadır.
Yapılan araştırmalara göre her gün vegan çikolata tüketen kişilerde kalp hastalığı görülme olasılığı oldukça düşüktür.
Vegan çikolata, antioksidanlar bakımından zengin olduğu için cildi de güzelleştirir. Cildin çok daha parlak ve canlı görünmesine yardımcı olur.
Kan dolaşımını arttırdığı için beyindeki kan akışını da iyileştirir. Bu sayede zihin fonksiyonlarının çok daha iyi işlemesine yardımcı olur.


EĞİTİM İÇERİKLERİ


Bölüm 1: Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata yapımı için kullanılacak malzemeler


Bölüm 2: Vegan ve vejetaryen çikolata hakkında ayrıntılı bilgiler, kakao yağını tanıma, kakao çekirdeğini tanıma, vegan ve vejetaryen çikolatanın özellikleri ile polikarbon kalıpları hazırlama


Bölüm 3: Vegan/vejetaryen çikolata hazırlama , 5(beş) farklı bitter ve sütlü vegan çikolata reçeteleri, temperleme teknikleri, bitkisel süt hazırlama reçeteleri, Satış için bütçeleme ve kar marjı hesaplama.

courses.description:
Yes, you can have your chocolate and eat it too!

Chef Teton makes out of this world decadent chocolate recipes that are super quick and easy to make and actually healthy for you!

Raw cocoa or chocolate has become the rave as health practitioners and culinary artists discover how good it is for you and how good it can taste.
Traditionally candy made with chocolate and/or cacao has been known to be fattening or unhealthy, but now we now otherwise. In the past it was not the cacao or chocolate that made it a less than excellent food. Historically it was some of the other ingredients used to make it taste good. These would include ingredients like high-fructose corn syrup, hydrogenated fats, high sodium levels and artificial ingredients.
But it is a new day. Raw cacao or roasted cacao can be included with many great ingredients to produce not only healthy foods, but foods delicious beyond your dreams.
New healthy and luscious ingredients include coconut oil, coconut cream concentrate (sun-dried coconut meat ground into a cream), honey, pure maple syrup, avocados and herbs and spices to name a few.
In this course you will learn how to work with unsweetened cocoa (raw or roasted) and the ingredients mentioned above to make truffles, mousse, smoothies, and hot drinks.
The recipes are simple and do not involve cooking. The visual training is highly professional with the use of two cameras. It also includes recipes.
This course will give you the foundation to work with raw desserts.
target_audience: Anyone who loves chocolate.
