courses.title: How the Chinese Drink Tea
courses.bio: From Antiquity to Today
objectives: In-depth knowledge of tea history
Evaluate the different styles of tea throughout history
Have an understanding how modern tea came to be
Understand the differences between different styles of tea drinking throughout the ages

Tang and Song Dynasties: Q & A for Tang and Song Dynasties
Ming and Qing Dynasties: Q & A for Ming and Qing Dynasties
Modern and Contemporary Times: Q & A for Modern and Contemporary Times

requirements: No previous knowledge needed.
courses.description:
Tea has been an integral part of Chinese culture for centuries, with a rich history that spans from antiquity to the present day. Chinese tea drinking practices have evolved over time, influenced by various factors such as social customs, regional differences, and the development of tea cultivation and preparation techniques. This document aims to explore the journey of tea drinking in China, from its early origins to the modern era.
The origins of tea drinking in China can be traced back to ancient times, around 5,000 years ago. Legend has it that the Emperor Shen Nong, known as the "Divine Farmer," discovered tea when a tea leaf accidentally fell into his boiling water. Intrigued by the aroma and taste of the resulting infusion, he began to explore the properties and benefits of tea. This marked the beginning of tea drinking in China.
During the Tang Dynasty (618-907 AD), tea drinking became more popularized and widespread. In the Song Dynasty (960-1279 AD), tea drinking evolved further and as the Ming Dynasty (1368-1644 AD) arrived, loose-leaf tea became the preferred form of tea preparation. In the modern era, tea drinking in China has undergone further transformations. Today, tea remains deeply rooted in Chinese culture, symbolizing harmony, refreshment, and hospitality.
target_audience: Anyone interested in the history of tea.

Have you ever tried a Moroccan recipe?
Are you wondering how Moroccan food tastes like?
My course is dedicated to everybody around the world, who are willing to try new different amazing dishes to break the routine and to create a great family atmosphere, full of joy and happiness.
This course will help you to step by step learn how to make one of the most beloved traditional bread in Morocco without any previous experience. The course contains short sections provided with filmed lectures that simplify the recipe's process.
This traditional bread is an everyday essential dish not only in Morocco but also in Algeria and Tunisia, I think it is your turn to be your everyday essential bread.
In the Moroccan culture, we have got a different kinds of bread, each one of them got a different name, baking strategies but mainly the same ingredients. why? simply because, I guess, Moroccans are number one bread consumers. We really got so many different Dishes that require bread.
Moroccan Mesemmen typically looks like the Indian bread that is called " PARATHA", they really look the same.
Msemmen is easily bought at bakeries, because it becomes a craft for so many jobless women; however, many Moroccans prefer to make it at home.
Don't be worried about the quantity of butter and oil used in the process of shaping the Msemmen. All that oil won' be absorbed into the dough.
Let's do it!
Please make sure to follow me on YouTube I really need your support.
Thank you
target_audience: Students who have got a desire to discover Moroccan recipes.
Food lovers.
I target mothers everywhere, who are looking for something new to try for their kids.

courses.description:
Embark on a culinary adventure and explore the rich flavors of Algeria with "Flavors of Algeria: Master Traditional North African Dishes"! This course takes you on a journey through the heart of Algerian cuisine, showcasing iconic dishes, traditional techniques, and the vibrant cultural stories that make this cuisine unique.
Learn to prepare timeless classics like Royal Tagine with Chicken and Mushrooms, Lamb Tagine, and Creamy Chicken Meatball Rice. Dive into comforting recipes such as Algerian Kebab Tagine and M’thouem, or impress your guests with the elegant Algerian Marbled Roulade. From crispy Bourek rolls to refreshing Banana and Date Milkshake, this course covers everything you need to recreate an authentic Algerian dining experience.
With easy-to-follow video demonstrations, you’ll master blending aromatic spices, handling authentic ingredients, and perfecting time-honored cooking methods. Each lecture is designed to equip you with the skills and confidence to bring these dishes to life in your own kitchen, whether for family meals, dinner parties, or special occasions.
No prior cooking experience is required! Whether you're a beginner or an experienced home cook, this course is tailored to inspire your passion for Algerian cuisine. By the end, you’ll have a repertoire of flavorful recipes to share with loved ones and a deeper appreciation for Algeria’s culinary heritage. Let's get cooking!

courses.title: 時短・美味しい・健康を叶える薬膳つくりおき【ほっとく煮】+アレンジ５品解説！レシピ８品・テキスト付）毎日の料理疲れを解消
courses.bio: 料理時間と手間、手抜きへの罪悪感から解放！薬膳と重ね煮の理論から生まれた「薬膳つくりおき」の活用であなたの定番料理を時短絶品に。切って、重ねて、弱火にかけて、ほっとくだけ！【ほっとく煮】があなたの毎日の料理をラクに楽しく美味しくします！
objectives: 料理時間と手間の解消、手抜きの罪悪感から解放される薬膳つくりおきを学ぶ
時短、美味しく、健康になれる薬膳つくりおきの作り方
薬膳つくりおきを活用したアレンジ５品レシピと作り方
野菜を美味しく、無理なく、たっぷり食べる方法

第1章 はじめに: 1−1【ほっとく煮】を作るメリット
1−2薬膳つくりおき【ほっとく煮】美味しく健康の秘密
第4章 〈まとめ〉ほっとく煮の活用術と料理法に込められた思い: 4−1【ほっとく煮】をフル活用術と料理がラクになる考え方

requirements: 料理初心者から可能
courses.description:
〈あなたはこんなお悩みありませんか？〉
・毎日料理をするのが負担。
・忙しくても美味しくて健康な食事を作りたい。
・手抜きやテイクアウトに罪悪感がある。
・レパートリーを増やしたい。
・料理教室に通いたくても通う時間がない。
→そんなあなたにオススメのコースです！


〈この講座ではこんなことが学べます〉
・たった３つの材料を使い、時短で美味しく、健康的な料理にできる「薬膳つくりおき」が作れます。
・薬膳、重ね煮の理論を解説しますので、「薬膳つくりおき」でからだのバランスが整う理由がわかります。
・アレンジ５品を実演します。（レシピ付）
・事前に用意した「薬膳つくりおき」をアレンジすることを学び、１回の料理時間を短縮できるようになります。


〈このコースの特徴〉
料理教室の流れで学べるので、理論がわかり、実践も経て、しっかり身につきます。
特典としてPDF資料（テキスト、レシピ８品、５日間「薬膳つくりおき」活用イメージ一覧）付き。
復習や献立作成に役立ちます。


〈カリキュラムの概要〉
１章 　時短で美味しい健康を実現するほっとく煮のメリット紹介
２章 　ほっとく煮を作るレクチャー
３章　定番料理が時短絶品になるアレンジレシピ解説（レシピPDF付）
親子丼
青菜と海藻の和え物
くるま麩の煮物
キッシュ風
ケチャップ炒め
４章　「薬膳作り置き」まとめ


〈オンラインレッスン参加者の声〉
・「ほっとく煮」は基本の重ね煮をベースに一週間分のアレンジレシピも出来ちゃうすんごい料理法でした！
最近見よう見真似で重ね煮を作っていましたが、やっぱりこういうのは早めにプロに習うのが一番！と実感（笑）
野菜の切り方のコツから、塩の振り方、火にかける時間、完成の判断基準等、
ネットには書いていないことがたくさん学べました！
出来上がったほっとく煮は、野菜の甘ーい香りがして、食べるとすごく甘い！
ちょろっとお醤油をかけたら、そのままいくらでも食べられる美味しさでした♡　（S・T様30代）


・私の中の作り置きは大量に作りそれを数日にわたり食べて行くこと。
ほっとく煮はアレンジ展開が万能で、どちらかというと展開の元を作る事で毎日の料理に展開してゆく、
という自分の予想とは逆のもので、発展系のお料理なんだ！と分かりました。（A・O様50代）


〈こんな方にはオススメしません〉
・薬膳、重ね煮をしっかりと勉強したい方
・正確なレシピ、分量、時間にこだわりたい方
・料理時間を全く割けない方。
（薬膳つくりおきを作る時間は30分〜1時間かかります。
事前に用意した作り置きをアレンジすることで、
一回の料理時間を短縮することを目指しています。）
target_audience: 美味しくて健康的な料理を簡単に作りたい方
料理をする機会が多く、負担を減らしたい方
献立を考えるのが面倒な方
技術がなくても美味しく作れるようになりたい方
離乳食や介護食も作る必要がある方
野菜を美味しく無理なくたっぷり食べたい方

courses.description:
When it comes to Matcha, you may imagine the traditional matcha ceremony of Japan as well as associating it with a superfood with health/beauty benefits such as antioxidant.
Nowadays, Matcha becomes very popular in the world and it’s widely used for smoothie and latte for drinking.
If you are a Matcha lover, would you like to take authentic way of drinking matcha into your daily life? Yes, it’s possible even though you don’t know the difficult manners and don’t have traditional tools for ceremony.
In this course, we’ll tell you how to enjoy authentic matcha tea at home casually including tools, important tips to make matcha tea, portable matcha kit called “Nodate” as well as the general information such as process, nutrition and when to drink.
In the later lecture, you’ll learn our original healthy & vegan, gluten-free recipes using Matcha; Matcha pudding (gluten-free), Matcha ice cream (gluten-free), Matcha brownie and Matcha waffle. After you go through this cooking lecture, let’s make an ultimate Matcha parfait!
Section 1. Introduction of this Matcha course
Section 2. Matcha spirit to your daily life (Explaining about core tools to make Matcha tea and how to prepare for authentic Matcha tea at home)
Section 3. Macha desserts (pudding, ice cream, brownie, and waffle) and create matcha parfait!

courses.title: Learn Traditional Thai Cuisine by Master Chef
courses.bio: This course will cover the thai cuisine covering different recipes and techniques
objectives: Learn Traditional Thai Cuisine by Master Chef
Learn how to make som tom, Raw papaya salad
Learn how to make Phad Thai
Learn how to make thai fritters

Introduction: Stir Fry Prawn with Thai Basil

requirements: No pre requirement for this program
courses.description:
Thai cuisine is the national cuisine of Thailand. Our Master chef in this Program try to select the most famous dishes and present you from start to Finish
Thai cooking places emphasis on lightly prepared dishes with strong aromatic components and a spicy edge. Thai cooking is about the juggling of disparate elements to create a harmonious finish. Like a complex musical chord it's got to have a smooth surface but it doesn't matter what's happening underneath. Simplicity isn't the dictum here, at all.
Traditional Thai cuisine loosely falls into four categories: tom (boiled dishes), yam (spicy salads), tam (pounded foods), and gaeng (curries). Deep-fries, stir-fries, and steamed dishes derive from Chinese cooking.
Thai Papaya Salad - Green papaya salad is a spicy salad made from shredded unripe papaya. Originating from ethnic Lao people, it is also eaten throughout Southeast Asia. Locally known in Thailand as som tam
Phad Thai Noodles - Pad thai is made with rehydrated dried rice noodles with some tapioca flour mixed in, which are stir fried with eggs and chopped firm tofu, flavored with tamarind pulp, fish sauce, dried shrimp, garlic or shallots, red chili pepper and palm sugar, and served with lime wedges and often chopped roasted peanuts.
Panang Beef Curry- This Southern Thai curry is one of my favorite dishes. It is thicker and more concentrated than most curries. It is not overly spicy, and should have a slightly sweet taste. While a chicken or beef version of this dish is most common, it can also be made as a vegetarian entrée by leaving out the meat and adding tofu
Steam Fish Thai Style - Thai steamed fish dish, and being sour, spicy, garlicky, and well balanced in taste, it's a Thai dish that really portrays the contrast and excitement of flavors in Thai food.
Stir Fry Chicken Lemongrass - Chicken breast marinated in soy sauce, garlic, ginger and lemongrass then stir-fried with vegetables, basil and fish sauce.
Stir fry Prawn & Sweet Basil - This basil shrimp is simple to make and will please anyone who is partial to Thai flavors.The stir-frying method keeps both the juiciness of the shrimp as well as the sweetness of the peppers in the dish, not to mention all of those wonderful nutrients
Thai Seafood Fritters - Savory fritter batter which is used to deep fry different varieties of sea food
target_audience: This program is suitable for home cooks and enthusiasts

courses.description:
Merhaba
Online sushi eğitimi kursumuza hoş geldiniz. Bu kurs, profesyonel olarak sushi yapmanın inceliklerini öğrenmek isteyen herkes için tasarlandı.
Bu kurs, Japon mutfağının önemli bir parçası olan sushi yapımında gerekli malzemeleri ve teknikleri öğrenmenize yardımcı olacak. Sizlere temel sushi tarifleri ve sushinin tarihçesi hakkında bilgi vereceğiz. Ayrıca, sushi yapımında kullanılan ana malzemelerin nasıl seçileceği ve hazırlanacağı konusunda da bilgi sahibi olacaksınız.
Kurs boyunca, sushi yapımının yanı sıra, sushinin sunumu ve servisi hakkında da bilgi edineceksiniz. Sizlere, Japon yemek kültüründe sushi sunumunun nasıl yapılması gerektiğine dair ipuçları vereceğiz.
Online sushi eğitimi kursumuzda öğrenecekleriniz:
Sushi yapımında kullanılan malzemeler ve ekipmanlar
Temel sushi tarifleri
Sushi pirinci hazırlama teknikleri
Sushi nasıl yapılır?
Nigiri sushi nasıl hazırlanır?
Sushi sunumu ve servisi
Bu kurs, hiçbir önceden tecrübeniz olmadan bile kolayca takip edebileceğiniz şekilde tasarlandı. Kurs boyunca size rehberlik edecek profesyonel bir sushi şefi ile çalışacaksınız.
Online sushi eğitimi kursumuz,  sushi yapımını öğrenmek isteyen herkes için mükemmel bir fırsat sunuyor. Sushi, son yıllarda dünya genelinde popüler hale gelmiş Japon mutfağının en bilinen yemeklerinden biridir. Ancak, sushi yapımı, birçok kişi için korkutucu bir deneyim gibi görünebilir. Online sushi eğitimi kursu, sizi sushi yapmanın incelikleriyle tanıştırarak, size özgüven kazandıracak ve sushi yapımını zevkle öğrenmenizi sağlayacaktır.
Kursumuz, sadece temel sushi tarifleri öğretmekle kalmayacak, aynı zamanda sushi yapımında kullanılan malzemelerin nasıl seçileceği, hazırlanacağı ve saklanacağı hakkında da bilgi verecektir. Ayrıca, sushi yapımı sırasında kullanılan özel araçları tanıtacak ve doğru şekilde kullanımını öğreteceğiz.
Kursumuzun diğer bir avantajı, öğrendiklerinizi pratik yapma fırsatı sunmasıdır. Sizlere, kendinizin sushi yapabilmesi için gerekli olan malzemelerin bir listesini vereceğiz ve her bir sushi tarifini adım adım takip ederek, kendi evinizde sushi yapabileceksiniz. Ayrıca, profesyonel bir sushi şefi ile birlikte çalışacağınız için, yaptığınız her adımı doğru bir şekilde yapacağınızdan emin olabilirsiniz.
Sonuç olarak, online sushi eğitimi kursu, size sushi yapımının püf noktalarını öğretecek, size özgüven kazandıracak ve sushi yapmayı zevkli hale getirecek. Kursumuza katılarak, evinizdeki mutfakta sushi yapmanın keyfini çıkarabilirsiniz. Haydi, siz de bu harika deneyimi yaşamak için kaydolun!
target_audience: Sushi severler
Gastronomi ve Aşçılık öğrencileri
Profesyonel Aşçılar
Dünya Mutfağı merakı olanlar
Farklı lezzet arayanlar
Asya mutfağı merakı olanlar

courses.title: Homemade Whole Wheat Cookies
courses.bio: Mastering whole wheat cookies for a healthier home baking
objectives: Learners will understand the role of whole wheat flour and other ingredients in whole wheat cookie recipes, including their impact on taste and texture
Learners will have fun making cookies!
Learners will impress friends and family with a healthy tasteful recipe
Learners will develop the skills to create and adapt recipes using whole wheat flour
Learners will acquire essential baking techniques specific to working with whole wheat flour

Mixing together the ingredients: Start by mixing butter and sugar in a bowl
Add whole wheat flour and baking powder
Does the dough need to rest?
Give a shape to our Whole Wheat Cookies: Prepare the baking tray and a flat surface like a cutting board
Baking the cookies in the oven: Take the cookies out of the oven.

requirements: No Prerequisites Required: Beginners can learn baking techniques and whole wheat cookie making from scratch. Clear, step-by-step instructions can guide learners through each stage of the process. Emphasis on simplicity and accessibility can make the course suitable for learners of all levels.
courses.description:
I would like to teach you how to make whole wheat cookies at home.
It's a delicious recipe that my dad makes.
He's really skilled in cooking and baking, and in my family (I'm Italian, living in Italy), cooking has always held a special place.


Anyone can make cookies. ...right?
You might assume that making cookies is easy.
After all, who can't make cookies?
But trust me, it's easier said than done.
The real challenge lies in achieving the perfect level —not too burnt, not too undercooked.
It's all about striking that delicate balance, where the flavors fill your kitchen and make your neighbors envious.
You know what it takes to reach that level?
Practice.


Why whole wheat flour
Whole wheat flour adds a touch of health and taste to recipes.
In fact, we have chosen to primarily use whole wheat flour at home for its numerous benefits:
Higher fiber content compared to refined flour
Rich in vitamins and minerals
Lower glycemic index, promoting better blood sugar control
Helps in weight management and digestion due to increased satiety and improved bowel regularity
Contains antioxidants that contribute to overall health and well-being.


Simple list of ingredients, no special equipment
Believe me, perfection may not come on the first try.
But with practice, you'll soon improve and create delicious, healthy cookies.


More than just "baking"
When you make cookies at home, it's a moment of joy and connection.
You get closer to family and friends.
It can be fun, and a lot relaxing!


This course is truly designed for baking enthusiasts of all levels.
target_audience: This course is designed for anyone interested in baking wholesome and delicious whole wheat cookies at home. It caters to individuals who seek to enhance their baking skills, explore healthier alternatives to traditional cookies, and experience the joy of creating homemade treats.

Specifically, this course is ideal for: Those who are new to baking or have limited experience in the kitchen, Individuals who prioritize health and nutrition and are seeking to incorporate whole grains into their diet, Home cooks and food enthusiasts who enjoy experimenting with recipes and exploring new culinary techniques, Parents looking for wholesome and nutritious snack options for their families, Baking enthusiasts who are curious about working with whole wheat flour and want to expand their repertoire of recipes.

courses.title: Breads - Vegan Cooking Class
courses.bio: Learn how to make your own amazing breads at home
objectives: How to make amazing breads at home from scratch
Helpful kitchen tips
Meet new ingredients and flavours
Demystify the idea that making bread at home is hard
Simple, delicious recipes that don’t need any special equipment

Whole Wheat Pitas & Za’atar Pitas: Whole Wheat Pitas & Za’atar Pitas - video + written recipe
Spelt Challah Bread: Spelt Challah Bread - video + written recipe
Cinnamon Raisin Challah: Cinnamon Raisin Challah - video + written recipe
Seeded Sourdough Bread: Seeded Sourdough Bread - video + written recipe

requirements: No experience needed, you will learn everything you need to know to create your own amazing breads
No special equipment required
courses.description:
Always wanted to learn how to make your own bread?


Do you feel intimated by this thought and think that making bread at home is too complicated?


Let me demystify this idea! :)


Join me for a delicious bread making class, using simple recipes & easy to find ingredients (with some ideas for upgrades too)!


I’ve always loved making bread. That amazing smell that spreads through your house while baking fresh bread is unlike anything else.


I usually prefer using whole grain flours - in this class I use whole spelt flour, light spelt flour, and whole wheat flour, but you can use other flours as well.


You will learn great recipes that you will make again and again - we are going to learn how to make different breads using nutrient dense, wholesome recipes.


Each recipe has its own step by step video, written recipe, ingredient and equipment list!


Enjoy an intimate experience at your own home, as we meet new ingredients and flavours, learn helpful kitchen tips, and prepare yummy recipes, in a wonderful hands-on experience!


So join me and learn how to make your own bread!


Special Notes:
Equipment Required:
Blender (needed for 1 recipe – Buckwheat Wraps)
3 recipes in this class can be made gluten-free: Buckwheat Wraps, Aloo Paratha, and Sourdough Starter
All recipes in this class can be made nut-free
target_audience: People who want to learn how to make delicious bread at home
Curious home cooks that want to develop new kitchen skills
People who enjoy exploring and playing with food
People who are looking for new recipes inspiration
You can enjoy my classes whether you are a beginner – as I go through every step of each recipe – or if you have been cooking for a while and are looking for some new inspiration in the kitchen.

requirements: No previous experience or special equipment required.
You will need a kitchen with basic cooking equipment.
courses.description:
On this course you will learn how to make three nutritious and delicious gourmet salads. Two of the recipes are vegan and the third is vegetarian but easily adapted. All are wheat and gluten free, and contain healthy ingredients, rich in essential vitamins. You will learn more about nutrition and how certain foods can benefit you.
The course is taught in a visually exciting, engaging way, with multi-angle footage, including close-ups to get you right in the thick of the action.
Once you have completed this course you will be able to create gourmet salads, packed with super food ingredients, which will give your body what it needs for a healthier and happier you.
target_audience: This course is for anyone keen to learn more about healthy, delicious food.
All levels are welcome!
Suitable for beginners due to clear, easy-to-follow steps at every stage.
Suitable for experienced students due to clever course breakdown which allows you to skip pre-skills.
Ideal for vegetarian and vegans.

courses.title: The Classic Macarons Method with Adriano Zumbo- Zumbarons
courses.bio: You will learn all my tips and tricks to making fool-proof macarons and a variety heavenly fillings!
objectives: Learn from the Zumbarons and Sugar Rush master himself Adriano Zumbo. Adriano himself will teach you the secrets to making the perfect Macarons from scratch.
A step by step method to make the TPT mixture for macarons shells and achieve the delicious balance of crunchy and chewy every time.
Start off with one of the most popular and loved macarons and then progress your skills to take on other fillings and ganaches methods and flavors
For the first time Zumbo is passing on his tricks, tips and recipes in this video course. Enjoy!

TPT- Macaron Shell essential ingredient: Tant Pour Tant (TPT)- First step of making French Macarons
Raspberry Zumbarons- Pink Macarons with: (Final) Step 3- Piping and Building. Lets Put it Together
Salted Caramel Zumbaron- A very popular: Step 2- Macaron Shells for the Salted Caramel
(Final) Step 3- Piping and Building the Caramel Salted Zumbarons

requirements: This course is suitable for anyone who loves macarons.
You will need a  saucepan, bowls, flat baking tray, piping bag 10mm or straight tip, spatula, baking paper, whisk attachment, digital or sugar thermometer and a stick blender.
courses.description:
Learn To Make Zumbarons
Calling all lovers of MACARONS, we’ve got exciting news for you! Adriano Zumbo, one of Australia’s most celebrated pâtissier, is sharing his years of experience, tips, tricks and secrets on how to make his delectable and iconic Classic Zumbarons in a series of full-length instructional tutorials
I fell in love with macarons whilst in France, Paris. A macaron simply lends itself to create small and indulgent treat that has the versatility to combine many many different flavors. After literally making hundreds of thousands of macarons I mastered a fool proof technique. If you follow each step of this course you too will be enjoying these colorful morsels or dreamy taste heaven  as I guide you though this easy to follow course
I am stepping into the classroom and is  so excited to share some classic macarons making technique and some sensational recipes with you through this Zumbaron course! You will learn all my tips and tricks to making fool-proof shells and a variety methods to create their heavenly fillings. I cannot wait for you to take on this challenge and become master the macaron making methods, you will surely impress your friends and family with your new skills. Good luck AZ
target_audience: This course is for a complete beginner or an advanced chef looking for the real deal Zumabarons.

courses.title: Os Segredos dos Chás: Potencializando sua Saúde!
courses.bio: Vamos descobrir um pouco do que podemos aprender com nossos antepassados sobre chás...
objectives: Neste curso serão abordados os principais chás para potencializar a saúde de uma pessoa no dia a dia em função das qualidades naturais dos chás segundo a experiência popular criada nos últimos séculos ou milênios.

Uma Grande Introdução: Qual é a idéia por trás dos chás?
Adoçando o seu Chá: Quando não devemos adoçar o Chá?
A Importância das Misturas de Chás (Blen: Chás que não precisam de Misturas
Mistura para Chás Frios de Verão
Conteúdo Extra (Chás Exóticos): Um pequeno comentário sobre Chás Exóticos

requirements: Neste curso não é solicitado pré-requisitos. Embora trata-se de um curso de preservação da experiência popular, o mesmo é baseado em referências de livros de prestigio da área de chás e ervas medicinais, e foi desenvolvido para a população em geral.
courses.description: O curso oferece uma visão geral sobre o potencial dos chás, e ajuda a criar uma rotina para o uso frequente de chás, tanto na redução do stress de cada dia, como para o benefício potencial para a saúde humana. Trata-se de um curso básico que abre um mundo de perguntas e questionamentos sobre a importância dessa bebida milenar que já salvou milhares de vidas pelo simples fato de ser feita com água fervida, muitas vezes livrando pessoas de doenças de águas potencialmente contaminadas por bactérias ou vermes.
target_audience: Todas as pessoas com interesse em adquirir conhecimento antigo alinhado com referências modernas da ciência, e que tenham interesse em alimentação natural.

courses.title: French Entremet Master class with APCA chef online
courses.bio: This course will cover various cakes covering different recipes & techniques
objectives: Learn Master class level French Cakes
Learn Advance Entremet
Learn modern french cakes
Learn cakes from the Master chef
requirements: No pre requisite as you will learn from basic level
courses.description:
This Program is Curated by Chef Kean Chuan
Chef Kean Chuan is young dynamic chef who is executive Pastry Chef with APCA Malaysia. He won 2nd Place in Mondial Des Arts Sucres 2018, world Pastry cup in Paris France. He is also Silver Medallist in Asia Pastry Cup 2016 representing team Malaysia laysia Team and there after in the World Pastry Cup 2017 in France.
This topic is a specialised Entremet or cake, based on French pastries concept. There are 7 world class cake. Each cake have 3-5 different sub recipe or which are compiled together to construct a cake. You will learn different selections of Sponges base, crunchy praline base , cream filling with different flavours, Jam and Jellies filling. Some of these cakes are sprayed where as some of them are glazed. These cakes can be easily replicated by chef as the entire process are tought step by step.
You will be covering different basic to advance French pastries techniques and they really help you understand them better as well also suggest you how to use these. The different dessert are based on fruits , Chocolates and nuts. These recipes also include making the garnishes and final presentation of the cake
Menu of the Program -
Barista
Calamondin
Cassic Vanilla
L’Orange
Mille fuille Caramel
S.I.N
Fruit Rouge de Roule

requirements: Pelatihan ini dapat diikuti oleh siapapun terutama untuk ibu rumah tangga, penjual makanan, pekerja kantoran dan para korban PHK. Tingkat kesulitan pelatihan ini adalah tingkat dasar/pemula.
courses.description:
Hai Sobat Ilmu! Masakan Nusantara merupakan jenis masakan yang sangat dekat dan menjadi ciri khas bagi masyarakat Indonesia. Rempahnya yang khas serta bumbu pelengkap lainnya membuat masakan nusantara memiliki ciri khas tersendiri.
Pada kelas ini, kalian akan mendapatkan pengetahuan bagaimana membuat masakan nusantara khususnya, untuk membuat bumbu-bumbu masakan dari daerah Sumatra Barat, yaitu masakan rendang lengkap dengan berbagai olahannya. Selain itu, akan diajarkan juga menu masakan padang lainnya dendeng balado dan menu olahan ikan yang akan dibuat menjadi asam padeh ikan tongkol.
Rasa identik yang dihasilkan dari masakan nusantara membuat jenis masakan ini cocok untuk digunakan sebagai salah satu ide bisnis rumahan. Menggunakan teknik yang mudah serta bahan yang mudah ditemui, membuat kelas ini menjadi peluang yang tepat bagi kalian yang akan memulai bisnis dengan mengangkat menu khas nusantara yang cocok untuk masyarakat Indonesia.
Selain itu, cara belajar yang interaktif dan juga menarik membuat kalian akan lebih mudah memahani tahapan memasak yang diajarkan. Hal yang lebih penting lagi, kalian akan diberikan tips dan trik bagaimana mempromosikan masakan kalian. Inilah yang membuat kelas ini sangatlah cocok untuk semua kalangan dan menjadi peluang bagi siapapun yang ingin meningkatkan ide bisnisnya Yuk jangan lupa untuk ikuti kelasnya dan selamat mencari ilmu ya Sobat!
target_audience: Pelatihan ini cocok untuk pekerja yang ingin memulai usaha atau pelaku usaha dibidang kuliner/makanan, Cocok juga untuk yang ingin bekerja di restoran sebagai juru masak.

courses.title: Vegan Tuscan Cooking Class
courses.bio: Vegan cooking lessons for Italian food lovers. Build your simple, traditional, vegan Italian menu
objectives: Cook many simple, traditional, hearty Italian and Tuscan recipes, which are naturally vegan
How to serve an Italian vegan meal from appetiser to dessert
How to make fresh pasta from scratch
How to use basic ingredients in the pantry to make wholesome delicious recipes
How to create a vegan Tuscan cooking repertoire

Pappa al pomodoro: Ingredients and tools for pappa al pomodoro
When the bread meets the tomatoes
Panzanella: How to prepare the bread for panzanella
It's time to assemble the salad
Pici: How to prepare the pici dough
Stewed green beans: Ingredients and tools for fagiolini in umido
How to cook the green beans
Grilled vegetables: Ingredients and tools for grilled vegetables

requirements: No previous cooking experience needed
You will need basic cooking equipment such as pots with lids, pans, baking dishes, baking sheets and bowls
You might need for certain recipes a rolling pin to make pasta
You will need access to a stove and an oven
You will need to shop for the ingredients listed in the recipes
courses.description:
I am a Tuscan born and bred food writer and cookbook author. I've been teaching cooking classes in my house in the countryside between Siena and Florence for about 10 years. In this course, I'm sharing my family recipes, the menus for everyday meals and festive occasions, the tips and tricks learned teaching recipes to beginners from all over the world.
With this course, you will join me in my kitchen, attending step-by-step cooking demonstrations to show you exactly how to prepare each recipe. These are simple, traditional recipes that are naturally vegan. We're going to use simple, affordable ingredients. Stock up your pantry and be ready to start cooking like an Italian and Tuscan home cook. Try each recipe soon after you have watched the lesson and enjoy the food with your family.
You'll learn recipes to make antipasti (appetizers, like panzanella, chickpea cake, and grilled vegetables), primi (fresh pasta from scratch like pici and gnocchi, and all the dressings for your pasta), traditional main courses (soups as pappa al pomodoro, and ribollita), contorni (seasonal side dishes from grilled eggplants to stewed green beans) and dolci (as the traditional castagnaccio, a chestnut and olive oil cake).
You will learn:
How to cook many simple, traditional, hearty Italian and Tuscan recipes, which are naturally vegan
How to serve an Italian vegan meal from appetizer to dessert
How to make fresh pasta from scratch
How to use basic ingredients in the pantry to make wholesome, delicious recipes
How to create a vegan Tuscan cooking repertoire
target_audience: Beginner cooks who want to add vegan Tuscan and Italian recipes to their cooking repertoire
Those who have an interest in Tuscan cooking and want to start with basic vegan and traditional recipes
Italian food lovers who want to cook at home traditional Tuscan food
Those who want to have access to simple, traditional vegan Italian recipes with simple ingredients

courses.title: Blender Recipes: 19 Amazing Recipes for Your Blender
courses.bio: Get the most out of your blender by making healthy snacks, smoothies, desserts, and soups. Easy, delicious recipes.
requirements: You'll need a blender. We use a Vitamix TNC 5200.
courses.description:
Zac from the Raw Cave YouTube channel is here to present 19 amazing recipes for people who have recently bought a blender and are keen to get the most out of it. These recipes are:
Simple.
Delicious.
Healthy.
And, honestly, what more could you want? These are recipes your friends will love and recipes that you'll want to continue making over the coming months.
Also feel free to make suggestions for recipes once you're a student and we might just get around to it one of these days. This course should definitely be considered an evolving course. It doesn't stop with what you see today.
Click the "Start Learning Now" button to begin the blending journey.
target_audience: Anyone looking to make easy food.
Anyone looking to make delicious food.
Anyone who's just bought a blender.

courses.title: Weight Loss 101: No BS Guide!
courses.bio: The No BS approach to losing weight quickly and safely!
objectives: How to lose weight in a safe and effective manner
requirements: None
courses.description:
Do you want to make losing weight and feeling better a lifestyle and not just a diet fad? Then join me as we learn together how to lose weight without all the fluff and BS of modern fad diets! We will discuss current diet trends, foods to avoid, and foods that you should be eating all of the time. We will also share online resources that will help you on your weight loss journey.  Your weight loss journey begins here with a simple easy to follow roadmap that you can take as long as you like to complete. About 70% of your weight loss is connected to diet choices and lifestyle adjustments. The other 30% percent of exercise of your choice is easy to maintain with the proper course tailor made to your body needs.


You can walk, bike, or even healthier eat your way to a better lifestyle no matter what your age or current physical condition. You just have to use the right tools in this course everyday and you will be well on your way to showing other what no BS weight loss really looks like in the real world. Don't take a chance on your health, health is wealth! Get started today and see active results within weeks!
target_audience: Beginner weight loss students and those looking for a lifestyle change

courses.title: Moroccan Mint Tea Masterclass: Brew,Herbs & Traditions
courses.bio: Learn to brew authentic Moroccan tea, explore herbs, tools, regions & discover cultural traditions and rituals
objectives: Learn how to prepare authentic Moroccan mint tea step by step
Discover the history, culture, and regional variations of Moroccan tea
Understand the tools, ingredients, and herbs used in traditional tea preparation
Gain insight into tea-serving rituals and etiquette in Moroccan society
Learn tips for perfecting flavor and avoiding common mistakes

Introduction to Moroccan Mint Tea: Welcome to the Moroccan Mint Tea Masterclass
History and Culture Of Moroccan Mint Tea: The Origins and Cultural Significance Of Moroccan Mint Tea
Regional Variations Of Moroccan Tea: Regional Variations Of Moroccan Tea A Journey Across Morocco
Social Rituals and Traditions Of Morocca: Traditional Tea Ceremonies and Social Customs in Morocco
Moroccan Tea in The Modern World: The Evolution Of Moroccan Tea in Today's Lifestyle
Ingredients and Tools: Essential Ingredients and Utensils for Moroccan Mint Tea
How to prepare Moroccan Mint Tea: Step-by Step Guide to preparing Moroccan Mint Tea
Mixing The Tea: How to mix Moroccan Tea the Traditional Way
Types of Mint: Different Types of Mint Used in Moroccan Tea
Adding Herbs: Herbs That Add Flavor to Moroccan Tea

requirements: No prior experience required
Just bring your interest in Moroccan culture and tea
Having access to basic kitchen tools (tea pot, glass cups) is a plus
courses.description:
Discover the Art of Moroccan Mint Tea | Master Authentic Moroccan Tea Brewing & Culture
What You’ll Learn:
Step-by-step process to brew authentic Moroccan mint tea using traditional berrad (Moroccan teapot)
How to select and prepare high-quality green tea, fresh mint leaves, aromatic herbs, and sugar for perfect flavor
Explore regional Moroccan tea styles and secret recipes from the Sahara, Rif, Atlas Mountains, and Northern Morocco
Understand Moroccan tea culture, hospitality rituals, and the social significance of tea ceremonies
Expert tips to avoid common mistakes and consistently make delicious Moroccan mint tea at home
Why Enroll in This Course?
Filmed in real Moroccan homes capturing genuine tea traditions and atmosphere
Clear, beginner-friendly video tutorials suitable for tea lovers, culinary enthusiasts, and travelers
Learn how to serve tea like a traditional Moroccan host and impress your family and guests
Gain deep cultural insights into Morocco’s tea rituals, daily life, and festive occasions
Perfect for anyone passionate about Moroccan cuisine, tea culture, or expanding their cooking skills
This comprehensive course is designed for those who want to master not only how to make Moroccan mint tea but also to appreciate its rich cultural heritage. Moroccan tea is a symbol of hospitality, friendship, and tradition deeply woven into everyday life and celebrations. Through practical lessons and authentic demonstrations, you will gain the confidence and skills to brew perfect Moroccan mint tea and share this unique experience with loved ones.
Join now to unlock the secrets of Moroccan mint tea and bring the warmth, flavor, and timeless traditions of Morocco’s most beloved drink into your home!
target_audience: Anyone interested in Moroccan culture and culinary traditions
Tea lovers who want to explore international tea practices
Beginners who want to learn how to make Moroccan mint tea at home

courses.title: Cortes de Carne na Prática Para Iniciantes

courses.title: Bake Liqueur Butter Cakes in a Convection Microwave oven
courses.bio: Bake delicious elegant butter cakes with liqueur for your loved ones for their birthdays, anniversaries or Christmas
objectives: My students will learn how to bake really good butter cakes with infusion of liqueur into it. They will learn the
different types and name of liqueur and how to pair it with the flavor of the cake. They will learn how to bake small cakes using either
a counter top electric oven or a Microwave Convection oven. They will learn to make buttercream, frosting and glazes
to compliment the cake. They will learn how to bake small cakes using 6", 7" and 8" round, oval or square cake pan.
They will learn how to bake home baked cakes as give away gifts for the Christmas holiday season to their loved ones or it
can be a gift for birthdays or festive celebration

How to make rum ginger glaze

Bake a Amarreto Carrot Almond Cake: How to toast semolina with a microwave oven
How to toast ground almond with a microwave oven
How to toast nuts with a microwave oven
How to grate the carrot for the cake
Bake a Grand Manier Upside Down Pineappl: Grand Manier Upside Down Pineapple Cake
How to prepare the cake pan
Creme De Menthe Poppy Seed Cake: Creme De Menthe Poppy Seed Cake

requirements: A basic knowledge of butter cake making would be ideal, however it is not necessary as the step by step procedure will help
them to achieve the desired results. They need to have a table top electric oven or a microwave convection oven to bake
the cake. The necessary mixing bowls , spatulas.       6", 7" and 8" round, oval or square cake pans. A stand cake mixer
if available. Otherwise a hand mixer is sufficient. A dose of love to go into the cakes
courses.description:
The cakes in this course are old fashioned elegant butter cakes with an infusion of liqueur, which you can bake for your loved ones. Loved ones can be your spouse, girl or boyfriend, mum, dad or grandma or grandpa. An adult brother or a sister. Uncles and Aunties. Or it can be an elderly folk who is staying at a nursing home whom you have grown fond of. Or maybe a visit to a long lost good friend. Perhaps you would like to celebrate a good friend’s birthday and bake a cake as a gift.
The recipes here are for small cakes. It is baked in 6”,7"or 8” round, oval or square pans.Small but elegant and baked with butter and liqueur with a touch of buttercream, glaze or frosting. As the cakes are small in size, it can be baked in a counter top electric oven or a Microwave convection oven. The size of the baking pans is also crucial as this will determine the baking time and temperature. However, take note that every oven is different so make adjustments according to the oven being used. Some of the cakes bakes better in a funnel or tube pan.
There are many ways to make butter cakes. It depends on whether a soft fluffy cake is preferred or a heavy dense one. Basically butter is the main ingredient so a good butter is preferable. The rest of it are flour, sugar and eggs. Other ingredients will depend on the flavor of the cake. The flavors of the cakes are paired with the respective liqueur to give a distinct taste for the ultimate in butter cakes. Normally liqueurs are drunk as cocktails or aperitif but in this course it is added to make the ultimate butter cakes for your pleasure
I learnt to make these cakes from a reputable teacher in my country and he has since passed on. He was very meticulous in the  preparation of this cakes. So much so that timing to cream the cakes is crucial to avoid over creaming. This is to ensure that the structure and texture of the cake will not be compromised. Over creaming will result in a more dense and chewy texture as the gluten in the flour has been overworked. It is best to try and follow the timing to achieve the desired results
The liqueurs used are Tia Maria, Cointreau, Kirsch, Kahlua, Amarreto, Grand Manier and Crème De Menthe. Liqueurs are distilled spirits with various flavors of herbs or spices, oils, extracts, cream, fruit , flowers or nuts and some are sweetened with corn syrup or sugar.
Tia Maria is a dark liqueur made using coffee beans with the addition of rum, sugar and vanilla.
Kahlua Is a coffee flavored liqueur and also contains rum, sugar and vanilla and arabica coffee.
Cointreau is an orange flavored liqueur mix of sweet and bitter orange peels and sugar. It is colourless.
Grand Manier is a mix of cognac, distilled bitter orange essence and sugar.
Kirsch is a colourless clear brandy made from morello cherries. It is a fruit brandy with a clean cherry fragrance and bitter almond taste. It can be used in cooking and flavoring as well.
Amarreto is a almond flavored liqueur.
Crème de menthe is a sweet, mint flavored liqueur, either colourless or green.
Cherry brandy is a full flavored cherry flavor with a slight almond taste
Rum is not a liqueur but a distilled alcohol made from sugarcane byproducts
Brandy is also not a liqueur but a distilled alcohol made from fermented fruits
This is a brief description of the liqueurs that will be used in the cakes. There will be minimal icings as the focus is on the flavor and taste of the cakes. Too much icing on the cake will tend to distract the taste of the actual cakes. You can choose to enjoy the cakes plain as well. The cakes will taste better after a few days once the flavor is mellowed in.
If you prefer not to use liqueur in the cakes, it can be substituted with milk or other liquid. For the flavor, extracts or essences can be
used.  Just ensure that the cakes and flavor matches. The cakes are best served at room temperature for the ultimate taste.
target_audience: This course is for anyone who has a passion for good ole fashion butter cakes. Students who loves
to bake and to learn new flavors.  It is suitable for all levels of matured adult students. Newly married couples, Young working
adults, mummies and daddies, retirees, cake enthusiasts.

courses.title: A Romantic Vegan French Dinner
courses.bio: Mushroom Bourguignon, Walnut Salad, and Chocolate Fondants

How to Have a Beautiful French Meal: How to Have a Beautiful French Meal

requirements: No cooking experience is required.
You will need access to a kitchen and basic cooking equipment.
courses.description:
I am a plantbased blogger and cookbook author living in France. I wrote 'Vegan French Favorites', a cookbook of classic French recipes made vegan- which has been featured on the Vegan website, a French newspaper, and various blogs and podcasts. My passion is sharing French culture and plantbased cooking!


In this class you will learn how to make three classic French dishes- the vegan way.


Chocolate Fondants- rich molten chocolate cakes
Mushroom Bourguignon- a vegan version of one of the most famous French dishes, Beef Bourguignon, a hearty beef and wine stew
Walnut Salad- a classic French salad, with an easy vegan cheese
After this class you will have the following culinary skills:
Know the French culinary concept of 'mise en place'
Know how to make an easy vegan cheese
Know to make a chocolate cake without eggs, cream, or butter
Know how to create a 'meaty' flavor in vegan dishes
Know how to make a basic vinaigrette
The course is paced so that you can cook along with me but feel free to pause, rewind, or fast forward as you need to. A printable grocery shopping list is included in the introduction with all the ingredients you will need for these recipes. Printable recipes have been included for each section as well. There is no music in the background of the cooking videos to keep them distraction-free and so that you can play your own favorite cooking music.
target_audience: Beginner to advanced  cooks interested in vegan French cuisine.
Beginner to advanced cooks interested in healthy and alternative cooking.

courses.bio: Everything about Georgian Qvevri wine
objectives: World's oldest - Georgian wine's history

Introduction: Georgian viticulture-winemaking through time and space; investment situation
Qvevri (history, origin, Qvevri and amphora, Qvevri milieu)
Qvevri (eco-friendly vessel, ideal for wine fermentation)
Qvevri (External factors that have developed in the course of centuries)
Qvevri (Can Qvevri breathe or not? Is oxygen responsible for wine maturing? )
Qvevri (How to buy a quality Qvevri)
Georgian Qvevri wine – the elixir of life ( its phenolic structure)
Georgian wines with protected designation of origin

requirements: No experience needed
courses.description: Course is for wide range of readers. It contains more or less complete information for academic level and amateurs. In this course information about Qvevri wine from ancient times to today. Sampling premium Georgian wines and familiarizing themselves with the traditional winemaking technologies, alongside the unique, eclectic and diverse landscapes, is the priority of all tourists arriving in Georgia. Such an increasing interest is due to the recent scientific evidence saying that Georgia is homeland of wine as the world’s oldest wine dating to 8000 BC is found in Georgia. Moreover, the ancient Georgian traditional Qvevri wine-making method is now recognized by UNESCO as a significant intangible cultural heritage. However, there is a lack of information and awareness-raising videos on the Internet that would offer tourists and any other interested person illuminating insights into the gustatory and therapeutic merits of Georgian wine. There is no reliable source specifying which grape variety and which type of technology is involved in the wine, which they should taste on arrival in Georgia, to ensure that they make a right choice and are not misled about our country and its products. We’d also like to make this information useful for potential investors, who are interested in cellar wine production and to show them the real prospects in this area.
target_audience: For Professionals, Students, Amateurs, Buisnessmen, Tourists

objectives: Como preparar cócteles con la técnica correcta en un nivel profesional

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa. Es un curso básico que lo único que requiere es ganas de aprender y practicar.
courses.description:
Este curso básico es una recopilación de más de 20 años de experiencia en el rubro, trabajando en diferentes países, aprendiendo técnicas, recetas y manejo de barras.
Lo creamos para brindarte todos los conocimientos esenciales que necesitas para aprender de este universo, ya sea para preparar cócteles en tu casa, para viajar trabajando como bartender, o simplemente para vivir una experiencia diferente y aprender algo nuevo.


Este curso es para vos si:
- Querés aprender a preparar cócteles de la manera correcta
- Te gustaría aprender una nueva habilidad
- Querés sumar una nueva salida laboral a tu curriculum
- Te gusta capacitarte a tu ritmo y a tu tiempo, desde tu hogar
- Querés ser un anfitrión de lujo


Mati es bartender y mixólogo hace 20 años. Trabajó en Italia, Inglaterra, Suiza y Argentina. Tiene experiencia en coctelería clásica y de autor, armado de cartas, formación de staff, y como barmanager. Su experiencia laboral lo llevó a lugares increíbles como la barra del restaurante de Giancarlo Morelli, chef de estrella Michelin, en Milán. También a crear la carta de cócteles de Nyeat en Wimbledon, premiada con una nota en el diario The Guardian como el mejor cóctel bar de Wimbledon. Además, en sus comienzos, guiado por su pasión por el Flair, compitió en torneos en ciudades como Rotterdam, Londres, Milán y Viena. Algunas marcas en su portfolio laboral: Coca Cola, Red Bull, Absolut Elyx, Bombay Sapphire, Casamigos.
target_audience: Personas que deseen aprender el mundo de la coctelería, ya sea para trabajar como bartender por el mundo, o para preparar cócteles en su casa y ser un anfitrión de lujo

While no advanced skills are required, students should be comfortable with fundamental baking concepts such as measuring ingredients, mixing dough, and using common kitchen appliances.
courses.description:
Discover the joy of creating delectable, bakery-quality donuts in your own kitchen with "From Measure to Munch: Crafting Perfect Donuts." This comprehensive course is designed for bakers of all levels, from beginners to seasoned enthusiasts, who want to master the art of donut making.
In this course, you will
Master the Basics of Donut Making: Dive into the fundamentals, learning about essential ingredients, equipment, and techniques for crafting both yeast-raised and cake donuts.
Perfect Dough Preparation and Proofing: Understand the intricacies of mixing, kneading, and proofing dough to achieve the ideal texture and flavor.
Expert Frying and Baking Techniques: Learn how to fry donuts to a perfect golden brown and explore healthier baked alternatives without compromising taste or texture.
Customize with Glazes, Fillings, and Toppings: Unleash your creativity with a variety of delicious glazes, fillings, and toppings to make unique and irresistible donuts tailored to your preferences.
This course includes step-by-step video tutorials, printable recipes, and interactive assignments, ensuring you gain hands-on experience and confidence in your donut-making skills. You’ll also join a supportive community of fellow donut enthusiasts to share your creations, ask questions, and receive feedback.
Requirements for the course are simple: basic kitchen equipment (measuring cups and spoons, mixing bowls, a rolling pin, a donut cutter, and a deep fryer or large pot) and a basic understanding of baking concepts such as measuring and mixing ingredients.
Enroll today and transform simple ingredients into mouthwatering donuts that will impress your family and friends. From precise measurements to the final delightful munch, this course will equip you with everything you need to become a donut-making expert.
target_audience: Home bakers looking to expand their baking repertoire and impress friends and family with delicious donuts.
Aspiring pastry chefs seeking to add professional quality donut making to their skill set.
Anyone who loves donuts and wants to learn how to make them from scratch.

courses.title: All about Indonesian Cuisine by Master Chef
courses.bio: This course will cover the basic understanding of Indonesian cuisine with classic dishes and presentation
objectives: Learn the Traditional Indonesian Cuisine step by step
Learn the regional recipe of Indonesia
Learn the dishes from Sumatra, Jawa, Bali and sundanese
Learn a selection of soup , starters, main course and rice dishes
requirements: There is not pre requisite for this program
courses.description:
Indonesian cuisine is a collection of various regional culinary traditions that formed the archipelagic nation of Indonesia. There are a wide variety of recipes and cuisines in part because Indonesia is composed of approximately 6,000 populated islands of the total 17,508 in the world's largest archipelago, with more than 1,300 ethnic groups. Many regional cuisines exist, often based upon indigenous culture with some foreign influences. Indonesia has thousands of traditional recipes,changing from region to region. Indonesia's cuisine may include rice, noodle and soup dishes in modest local eateries to street-side snacks and top-dollar plates.
Ravon - Rawon is an Indonesian beef soup. Originating from Surabaya, East Java, rawon utilizes the black keluak nut as the main seasoning, which gives a dark color and nutty flavor to the soup
Dendeng Balado - Deep fried dry beef with Balado Spices (Hot & Sweet Spice)
Ayam Kalio - Indonesian fried chicken with green chilli sambal.
Pecak Lele - Deep fried catfish with Sundanese sambal
Tauhu Gadon - Fried tofu with blanched beans sprout, cabbage, cucumber, served with peanut sauce
Ikan Bumbu Bali - Fresh, healthy fish dish is typically – Indonesian. It is cooked in a bumbu bali. The spicy tomato sauce gives lots of energy and the fish is tender and full of flavor.
Pelas Udang - Prawn with grated coconut, steamed in banana leaves
Gule kambing - Gulai kambing is a traditional Indonesian dish of mutton or goat meat cooked in a spicy, rich, yellowish, curry-like sauce called gulai. It is originally from West Sumatra.
Sale Lilit - Sate lilit is a popular dish from the Island of Bali. The word “lilit” roughly means “wrap around”. The meat is usually wrapped around the skewers. Traditionally, lemongrass stalks are used as skewers instead of bamboo skewers.
Sop Buntut - Oxtail soup is made with beef tails. The use of the word "ox" in this context is a legacy of nomenclature; no specialized stock of beef animals are used and tails may come from bovines other than oxen
target_audience: This program is suitable for home cooks and Enthusiasts all

requirements: Course is designed for all skill levels.  No matter your skill level, you will learn more.
courses.description:
HAVE FUN LEARNING TO "COOK LIKE A THAI VEGAN"
with Chef Dao & Thai Chef School
DO YOU WANT TO "COOK LIKE A THAI VEGAN"?
Join this fun culinary adventure with me, and experience the fun and exotic world of authentic vegan Thai cooking in my 3rd vegan cooking course. Master 9 popular vegan Thai dishes plus many Thai cooking skills, dips, sauces, and pastes. Experience the beauty of Thai dishes when properly cooked, plated, lighted, and recorded. I also have more Thai cooking courses in Udemy. Please check them out too.
HAVE FUN LEARNING
Enjoy my fun, relaxed teaching style which comes from years of experience teaching students in Bangkok. Relax, laugh, cook, and eat the best tasting Thai dishes--GUARANTEED!
MORE FOR YOUR MONEY
1. 4 hours 45 minutes of fun vegan learning (compare and see for yourself)
2. Learn how to make the 5 flavors of Thai cooking
3. Learn basic Thai cooking skills and techniques, including making tofu from scratch
4. Learn 9 popular Thai vegan dishes from scratch
ENHANCED QUALITY
Using HD quality video recording equipment, professional lighting, skilled photographers, and good English, we endeavor to present the very best viewing presentation possible. Compare for yourself.
IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU?
This course is taught by Chef Dao, a professional culinary instructor at Thai Chef School (an online culinary training school) and Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy (in person training) in Bangkok for both beginners and professionals. Learn from a fun teacher used to teaching all skill levels the ins and outs of Thai cooking. Each dish is taught in 4 video segments (total about 20 minutes each):
1. Thai ingredients discussion with pictures
2. Preparation of all ingredients for cooking
3. Professional chef cooking demonstration
4. Food plating techniques
WHAT WILL YOU LEARN FROM THIS COURSE?
Familiarity with Thai ingredients
Mastery of selected popular vegan dishes, dips, sauces, pastes
Achievement of correct Thai flavors, aroma, and appearance
Proper use of Thai cookware--woks, granite and clay mortar & pestle, steamers
AND lots of fun and laughter.
WHO IS CHEF DAO?
I am a native of northeast Thailand, where my love for cooking was nurtured by my grandmother in her kitchen. After receiving my degree in Accounting, I moved to Bangkok. There I soon realized my love was for cooking and eating beans and not in counting them! To expand my culinary skills, I enrolled in Le Cordon Bleu where I learned Western cooking and basic culinary skills. After graduation, I then enrolled in Dusit Thani Culinary College to further my Thai cooking knowledge.
For the past 6 years, I have been fortunate to work as a professional culinary instructor at Bangkok Thai Cooking Academy and Thai Chef School, leading Thai cooking schools in Bangkok. During this time, I taught Thai cooking to many tourists as well as professional culinary students (aspiring chefs, yacht chefs, executive chefs) from around the world in weeklong private training courses. Additionally, I am a master fruit carver and a team building specialist.
I love eating, cooking, and teaching Thai cooking (oh, and my son too). Please join me and let's have fun learning together.
BANGKOK THAI COOKING ACADEMY (in person training) & THAI CHEF SCHOOL (online training with diploma)
In affiliation with these cooking schools, this course relies on tried and proven recipes and teaching techniques developed over 10 years and taught to thousands of students in Bangkok. We teach Thai cooking to beginners and professionals alike. Please feel free to visit our websites.
OUR PROMISE TO YOU
My instruction is fun, clear, and easy to follow. Vegan recipes are designed to create authentic tasting dishes. Videos are filmed in HD and well-lighted. Sound is good and English is good. Beautiful presentation of dishes is emphasized. If you have any questions about the course content, please post a question or send a direct message to me. I will answer your message promptly.
CHEF DAO
JUST CLICK THE ENROLL BUTTON, AND I'LL SEE YOU IN LECTURE #1.

Lo exquisito cuando se combina la pasta y la carne molida con salsa de tomate natural, sin aditivos, recien recogida del huerto o fresca del mercado.
Nuestros platos son nutritivos y están hechos con ingredientes de calidad como pasta de sémola, carnes magras, quesos mozzarella, pecorino y parmesano, tomates
Al finalizar este curso seguramente pondrán en práctica cada actividad y detalles para lograr unos platos al gusto, propio del sur de Italia.

courses.description:
Se tratara en esta oportunidad sobre la preparación de algunos platos de pasta combinada con vegetales, carne y/o salsa propia del sur de Italia, en una modalidad típica, casera, mejor dicho como hecho en casa, con ingredientes naturales, ricos en proteínas, antioxidantes y exquisitos platos, con sabor de campo y de la buena cocina meridional. El arte italiano de la mano a su hogar.
A esta primera parte del curso, seguirán otros muy interesantes como por ejemplo la preparación de Berenjenas o zucchinos a la parmigiana, Berenjenas en aceite (sotto olio), pizzas, entre otros.
Nos hemos propuesto enseñar sobre este tema por la sencilla razon de compartir nuestros conocimientos del resultado de toda una vida, con recetas que han transcendido el tiempo, desde nuestros ancestros hasta hoy, luego dar a conocer lo facil que es preparar estos deliciosos y tipicos platos de pasta.
Estamos seguras, que va a haber un gran entusiasmo en especial entre los jovenes (mujeres y hombres) que han tenido de cualquier forma contacto con familias de origen italiano o que son descendientes de ellas, seguramente habran escuchado en casa sobre los platos en cuestion y tendran deseo de practicar y mejorar las cualidades culinarias al respecto.

objectives: Aprenderemos a realizar distintos tipos de panificados con harinas integrales sin gluten de una forma fácil y rápida.

requirements: Contar con una cocina donde poder ir practicando las recetas, luego de las clases.

courses.description:
En este taller vas a descubrir la gran variedad de harinas integrales sin gluten que existen. Aprenderás cómo combinar nuevos sabores en preparaciones de  panadería para darle siempre los mejores alimentos a tu cuerpo.
Juntos derribaremos el mito de que la alimentación sana no puede ser rica.
Me interesa tanto como a vos que logres resultados óptimos, por lo cual podrás consultarme cuantas veces necesites si te surge alguna duda. ¡Estoy para guiarte y ayudarte!
Las recetas integrales y sin gluten que verás en este curso son:
Pan de molde de sorgo y sarraceno.
Baguette de sorgo.
Pan árabe integral de chía, quinoa y arroz integral.
Tortitas de garbanzos.
Grisines de lino y amaranto.
Facturas integrales.
Donas integrales.
Pancitos de azahar y amaranto.
Pancitos de quinoa.
Brioche de maíz
Trataremos temas importantes como:
La contaminación cruzada.
La limpieza necesaria para eliminar el gluten.
Qué hornos utilizar.
Utensilios aptos para la producción.
Celiaquía, intolerancia, sensibilidad y dieta sin gluten.
¡Sin mix comerciales! Hacemos nuestras propias premezclas y combinaciones de harinas. Los principales ingredientes que usamos para esto son:
Harina de sarraceno.
Harina de sorgo.
Harina de arroz integral.
Harina de lino.
Harina de garbanzos.
Harina de chía.
Harina de amaranto.
Harina de quinoa.
Harina de maíz.
Fécula de mandioca.
Harina de arroz.
Almidón de maíz.
Leche en polvo ( te enseño como reemplazarla es caso de intolerancia).
Goma xántica o guar.


¡Podés aprender a tu propio ritmo y en tus horarios disponibles! Tenes acceso de por vida a los videos, podrás verlos cuantas veces necesites, pausarlos, y volver a retomar desde los puntos que necesites, en los momentos que vos elijas.
No es necesario que tengas ninguna experiencia previa, ¡con muchas ganas de aprender es suficiente!
target_audience: Celíacos. Personas con intolerancia o sensibilidad al gluten o alergias.
Personas interesadas en eliminar el gluten de su dieta, y comenzar a tener una alimentación más saludable y nutritiva incorporando productos integrales.
Ideal para diabéticos por el alto contenido en fibra y bajo indice glucémico de las preparaciones contenidas.

requirements: This is an Intermediate to Advanced level course on Isomalt.

courses.description:
In this training course, Beata Khoo will demonstrate her unique and special skills and show students how to design, create, model, sculpt and decorate a conceptual Isomalt swan, complete with its base and support stand and other intricate decorations and ornaments.
Also, how to securely attach the swan to its base and support stand. In particular to the stand, they will learn a special technique on how to mould it into a circle. Students will learn how to make intricate features of the swan and also other effects and decorations from Isomalt, such as corals and water effect/splash. In the process, you will learn how to cook, colour, pull and shape Isomalt.
All in all, students will learn very useful tips and tricks and more from Isomalt specialist, Beata Khoo of My Sweet Passion Cakes, who is based in Brighton, East Sussex in the United Kingdom.
So, don't miss this opportunity to gain new knowledge and skills in a unique skill not many cake decorators possess. With this knowledge and skill in Isomalt designing, modelling and decorating; students can wow their clients, customers, family and friends if lovingly applied and complemented to their cake designs.
Please note that this is an Intermediate to Advanced level course in Isomalt modelling/decorating. Do remember to complete the Basic/Intermediate course in Isomalt before you attend this particular course.
target_audience: This is for students with Basic to Intermediate knowledge/skills in Isomalt decorating, modelling and sculpting.

Students should be curious and interested in Isomalt design and at the same time, have Basic to Intermediate knowledge and skills in Isomalt design. o gain this basic/intermediate knowledge, please complete My Sweet Passion Cake's other basic Isomalt courses prior to attending this course.
Students will gain Intermediate to Advanced knowledge level in Isomalt decoration.
At the end of this course, you will be equipped with the necessary knowledge in advanced Isomalt decorating skills.

courses.title: Algerian Sweets: Learn to Make Baklava, Makrout, and Ghribiy
courses.bio: Learn Traditional Algerian Desserts: Baklava, Makrout, and Ghribiya
objectives: Learn how to prepare three iconic Algerian desserts: Baklava, Makrout, and Ghribiya, using traditional techniques and authentic ingredients.
Gain the skills to work with phyllo dough, semolina, and dates to create desserts with perfect texture and flavor.
Learn how to prepare the perfect syrups and fillings, including how to make date paste and sweeteners that enhance the flavor of your desserts.
Master the presentation of these desserts, from shaping and cutting Baklava to garnishing Makrout and dusting Ghribiya with powdered sugar, ensuring each treat
requirements: This course is suitable for beginners and anyone interested in learning how to make traditional Algerian desserts.
A basic understanding of common cooking techniques such as mixing, rolling dough, and frying will be helpful.
courses.description:
Discover the secrets of Algeria’s most iconic desserts in this hands-on course. Whether you’re a baking enthusiast or a curious foodie, this course will guide you through the step-by-step process of creating three traditional Algerian sweets: Baklava, Makrout, and Ghribiya.
Each dessert brings its own unique charm—crispy, nut-filled Baklava, the golden, date-stuffed Makrout, and the buttery, melt-in-your-mouth Ghribiya. You’ll learn essential techniques, from working with phyllo dough to perfecting semolina-based pastries and achieving the signature texture of Algerian cookies.
No prior baking experience is required, as this course is designed for beginners and experienced bakers alike. You’ll also get tips on ingredient preparation, shaping and baking techniques, and the best way to serve these desserts for any occasion.
By the end of the course, you’ll have the confidence to recreate these authentic desserts at home, whether for celebrations, holidays, or simply to enjoy with loved ones. This is more than just a baking course—it’s a journey into Algeria’s rich culinary traditions. Learn the stories behind these sweets, their cultural significance, and bring their delightful flavors to your table, impressing everyone who tastes them.
Join us and learn how to make these incredible Algerian desserts with ease and joy today!
abderhmane
target_audience: This course is perfect for anyone who loves exploring new cultures through food, especially those interested in traditional Algerian desserts. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced cook, you'll find value in learning the techniques behind three iconic Algerian sweets: Baklava, Makrout, and Ghribiya.

This course is ideal for:  Home bakers and cooking enthusiasts who want to add unique, flavorful desserts to their repertoire. Anyone interested in Algerian cuisine and discovering the rich history and flavors of Algerian sweets. People looking to impress family and friends with homemade desserts for special occasions like holidays, gatherings, or celebrations. Culinary students or professionals seeking to expand their knowledge of international desserts and broaden their cooking skills.

En este curso de coctelería aprenderás la matemática de los cócteles para no depender nunca más de recetas. Una vez que aprendas el Método DX, tendrás toda la libertad para crear cócteles con los ingredientes que tengas en frente.

Este curso te va transformar en una maquina para hacer drinks. Prepárete para llenar la agenda, tu presencia tendrá una gran demanda en todas las fiestas y reuniones. Han sido 6 años creando y enseñando las mejores recetas alcohólicas en internet, más de 2,000 recetas creadas, grabadas y aprobadas por más de 6 millones de personas que nos siguen en las redes sociales. Ha llegado el momento de transmitir todo lo aprendido a lo largo de este tiempo para que puedas convertirte en un experto, ya sea por si quieres desarrollarte en el mundo de la coctelería o por pasatiempo.
Tanto si quieres emprender una carrera emocionante, ganar dinero mientras estudias o viajas, o simplemente si quieres disfrutar de una experiencia única en la vida, nuestro Curso DX te ayudará a conseguirlo – y mientras lo haces lo pasarás increíble. Es el curso de drinks más popular de América Latina, ofrecido por el canal de drinks más grande de Latinoamérica.


QUÍEN ES BRUNO ABREU?
Fundador de el mayor canal de recetas de drinks en vídeo de América Latina.
Un fanático de los drinks que es su hobby, trabaja con audio visual y tiene pasión por lo que hace. Reunió sus dos pasiones y creo el curso de drinks más divertido de internet.
Opera en el mercado digital desde sus 15 años, y ya creo más de 7 proyectos diferentes en el mundo digital. En coctelería, son 5 años de carrera; 7 cursos: 3 en Europa, 1 en Estados Unidos y 3 en Brasil.

courses.title: French Pastry - Guide for the creation of Croissants
courses.bio: Simple and complete guide to making perfect Croissants at home, completely by hand, without a mixer
objectives: Create a Croissant dough
Create the butter for the flaking
Learn the lamination technique
How to cut and form Croissants
How to make Croissants rise perfectly
How to cook Croissants
Creation of the glaze to polish the Croissants

Introduzione: Before cutting and forming the croissants

requirements: No experience is required
courses.description:
This course is for all those people who want to learn how to make fairly simple but very delicious leavened desserts.


In this course you will find all the aspects and the phases of rolling and cooking a croissant, explained in a simple and concise way, in order to facilitate the learning of these techniques.


We will make a croissant dough from scratch without using kneading machines or machinery and we will follow together the simple step-by-step instructions of the whole process.


I will explain you how to choose ingredients and I will show you how to use them correctly.


I will guide you step by step in the realization of  a perfectly hand-rolled dough, only using a rolling pin, and we will see how to cut, form the croissants and how to make them rise correctly. I will also guide you in finding the right setting for your oven to obtain an optimal cooking level of the croissants.


Inside the course, you will also find the recipe for making egg-wash (a compound obtained by mixing together egg yolk and milk), which will be used to give a more burnished color to our croissant and allow a correct  leavening in the oven. Not only that, you will also find the icing recipe, made up of water and sugar, which will be used to polish and give a sweeter touch to the finished product.


By taking this course you will learn:


How to prepare the dough without machinery
How to make a block of butter for rolling
Hand lamination technique
How to roll out the dough to the right size
How to cut croissants from dough
How to shape the croissant
The stages of leavening
How to cook properly the croissant
How to make egg wash
How to make icing
ATTENTION: the text is in English, the videos are in the original language with English subtitles
target_audience: Homemade bakers, chefs, amateur pastry

courses.title: Learn the Sensory Science of Professional Whisky Tasting
courses.bio: Learn cutting-edge insights and knowledge from the world of science that will revolutionise how you taste Scotch Whisky.
objectives: Master the Sensory Building Blocks of Flavour: Learn how taste, smell, mouthfeel, and cognitive perception combine to create the unique whisky experience.
Decode Flavour Like a Pro: Discover how the brain interprets sensory inputs to form the illusion of flavour.
Build Your Confidence: Develop the vocabulary and skills to assess and describe whisky with precision and creativity.
Taste with Purpose: Explore cultural, environmental, and psychological influences on whisky perception.
Gain Professional Skills: Learn insider tips from a seasoned scotch whisky professional with over 25 years experience.
Discover the Science: Understand how adding water to whisky changes its flavour
Understand Your Senses: Grasp the intricacies of how smell, taste, and mouthfeel create sensory perception.

Introduction: Professional Whisky Tasting vs Sensory Analysis
Bonus Section - The Illusion of Flavour
Why We Each Smell Things Differently
Bonus Section - The Challenge of Measuring Odours
Understanding the Language of Whisky Aromas
Gustation: Everything You Need to Know About Taste
Mouthfeel: The Underrated Hero of Whisky
The Science of Adding Water to Whisky
6 Whisky Tasting Tips Used by Professionals

requirements: No experience required, just bring a notepad and an open mind. This is an in-depth course but all topics are explained clearly, slowly, and in the simplest way.
courses.description:
Have you ever wondered what truly makes a whisky taste smoky, fruity, or spicy? This in-depth course goes beyond the surface to uncover the fascinating interplay of sensory science and flavour perception. Designed for whisky enthusiasts and professionals alike, this course is led by an experienced professional whose career spans over 25 years in scotch whisky, and nearly two decades as a sensory panel leader, dedicated to assessing whisky casks for some of the industry’s most respected Scotch whisky brands.
Go beyond the basics of how to nose and taste by discovering why flavour is a system, and how the brain creates the illusion of flavour from sensory inputs. This course reveals the secrets of sensory science to take whisky appreciation to a new level of expertise.
Each part of the flavour system is broken down and explained - from the two different ways in which we smell, to the intricacies of taste, and the underrated complexities of mouthfeel. You will not only develop a professional level of knowledge of how we perceive whisky flavour, but you will also gain practical tips for tasting whisky like an expert, plus how to create tastings for your guests that go beyond traditional expectations.
Step out of the past and into the future with the most advanced publicly available course on tasting whisky. This course contains the detailed teaching of complex subjects, however, each topic is explained clearly, methodically, and with the support of a comprehensive digital workbook and guides.
Please note, this is an in-depth course on the sensory appreciation of whisky rather than the production and chemistry of whisky. These subjects require a dedicated course in their own right and will be covered within a forthcoming course.
If you are ready to take your whisky appreciation to an expert level, this course is for you.
target_audience: Whisky enthusiasts and whisky industry professionals, ambassadors, and visitor centre managers.

courses.title: Chinese Dining Etiquette & Healthy Asian Cuisine Cooking
courses.bio: Understand Chinese dining customs & learn to cook healthy Asian cuisine.

Introduction and Welcome: Introduction & Welcome - Chinese Dining Etiquette & Cook Healthy Asian Cuisine
Section A - Chinese Dining Etiquette: Eating with a Lazy Susan (Round Turntable)
Section B - Cook Healthy Asian Cuisine (: Peanut Lotus Root Soup with Goji Berries - Preparation (Mise En Place)
Peanut Lotus Root Soup with Goji Berries - Making the Soup

requirements: While there are no specific requirements to take this course the ability to keep an open mind along with a healthy dose of curiosity to learn something new for example the Chinese dining culture and etiquette always helps.
Students do not need to have any prior experience in cooking.
Students can make use of their existing cooking equipment and utensil to learn and practice how to cook Asian food.
courses.description:
I am passionate about cooking and eating healthy plant-based food. I created this fun mini-course with 2 sections, A & B. In Section A, you’ll learn about Chinese dining etiquette. In section B, you’ll gain hands-on experience in making delicious healthy Asian food.


In Chinese custom, table manners play an important part in making a favourable impression. At the end of this course, you will gain crucial knowledge on Chinese dining etiquette which could help you to develop relationships and cement new business deals with your Chinese counterpart. Also, you will be able to make tasty Asian meals as good as takeaway food in your kitchen.


In section A, you will learn about the formal dinner seating arrangement, eating with a "Lazy Susan" (round turntable), followed by chopsticks etiquette, Chinese tea and alcohol drinking customs. In section B, the course will teach you how to make an easy one-pot soup and a refreshing salad that are high in fiber, antioxidants, vitamins and minerals. Then you will learn how to make quick stir-fry vegetable dishes that are a great addition to weight-loss and heart-healthy diets. It doesn’t stop there, to satisfy your sweet tooth, you are going to make a remarkably tasty simple three ingredients dessert.
target_audience: This course is suitable for anyone who simply loves to learn about Chinese Dining Etiquette.
This course is important for businessman or company who need to secure business deals over a Chinese business banquet.

Family member and kids always try either their tradition home recipes or take recipe from friends and try these traditional cookies. The are for the family as well as for the give Away

Home bakers can try out these recipes at home and with proper Packaging and boxes, can start their own online business. The Chinese cookies is around the year affair and can be enjoyed for any family functions
