courses.title: Postres para consentir a tu familia (Pasteleria/Repostería)
courses.bio: Gran variedad de postres con diferentes técnicas de pastelería y repostería clásica
objectives: Aprenderás una gran variedad de postres con diferentes métodos y técnicas: de elaboración, montaje y decoración.
Secretos y tips de la Pastelería y repostería, que podrás aplicar a otras recetas.
Aprenderás a determinar los costos y precio de venta de los postres.
Podrás crear combinaciones con las recetas que te enseñamos para crear otras versiones o nuevos postres.
requirements: Conocimientos básicos de pastelería, contar con horno, batidora y herramientas básicas.
courses.description:
Módulo 1 : Introducción


Módulo 2: Alfajores de Maicena - Aprenderás a elaborar y saborizar la masa para darle ese toque cítrico; conocerás una técnica para cortar la masa y que te queden del mismo grosor. Conocerás los tips para hornear y decorar con coco rallado; y también aprenderás a elaborar el delicioso dulce de leche, característico de los alfajores.


Módulo 3: Alfajores Marplatenses - Originarios de Mar de Plata, hechos a base de una galleta de chocolate con un toque de mandarina, rellenos de dulce de leche y cubiertos de chocolate. Aprenderás a elaborar y saborizar la masa; tips para hornear, aprenderás a cubrir con chocolate y la técnica de "rayar" para la decoración.


Módulo 4: Cheesecake - Aprenderás a elaborar una base de almendras, la cual podrás utilizar para elaborar cualquier pay. Conocerás una técnica para hornear cheesecakes, cómo hacer el caramelo, así como el montaje y la decoración.


Módulo 5: Pavlova - En este módulo aprenderás la técnica para preparar merengues. Descubrirás cómo elaborar una ganache y una crema de chocolate blanco para rellenar; así como una técnica para que no se humedezcan los merengues y se conserven en esa textura más tiempo.


Módulo 6: Macarons - Continuando con la elaboración de merengues, conocerás una técnica infalible para preparar paso a paso los macarons; desde preparar el merengue, formar, saborizar, hornear, rellenar y decorar. Se elaboran 3 diferentes sabores, los cuales te servirán para rellenar otro tipo de preparaciones como galletas o pasteles.


Módulo 7: Brownies - Aprenderás a elaborar unos deliciosos brownies de chocolate, con su consistencia y sabor ideal; y con varias opciones para decorar.


Módulo 8: Mousse de Chocolate - Aprenderás una versión de mousse de chocolate con un sabor exquisito, su textura suave de espuma; y con la ventaja de que no se elabora con huevo crudo. Te encantará también aprender como hacer decoraciones muy lindas con chocolate.


Módulo 9: Tiramisú - Un clásico de la pastelería italiana, elaborado con soletas y una combinación perfecta de café y queso mascarpone. Aprenderás paso a paso su elaboración; así como tis para decorar y conservar .


Módulo 10: Eclairs - Conocerás la técnica doble cocción que se requiere para elaborar los deliciosos eclairs y profiteroles. Aprenderás a elaborar la clásica Crema pastelera y Crema Chantilly, y con ello diferentes formas de montaje y decoración.


Módulo 11: Pastel Ópera - Y por último, el consentido de muchas personas, un clásico de la pastelería francesa; a base de varias capas combinando diferentes texturas y sabores. Aprenderás a elaborar el bizcocho de almendras, un buttercream de café, ganache de chocolate, cobertura de chocolate; así como decorar y escribir sobre el pastel.


Módulo 12: Recetario Galletas y Macarons


Módulo 13: Arroz con leche


Módulo 14: Helado de Mango - Una excelente opción de helado de mango cremoso, con o sin azúcar.


Módulo 15: Método para calcular costos y precio de venta de tus recetas.
target_audience: Personas que deseen aprender nuevas técnicas y nuevas recetas de pastelería
Personas que tienen un negocio o desean emprender un negocio de pastelería y repostería fina.
Mamás que deseen consentir a sus familia y amigos preparando deliciosos postres desde casa.

courses.title: Beautiful Vegan Ramen Course Taught By Japanese Ramen Master
courses.bio: Learn unique ramen recipes with plenty of vegetables from Japanese professionals in one day.
objectives: Prepare Japanese ramen noodles from scratch
How to cook a vegan ramen like a pro
Serve delicious meals for your loved ones
Get deeper knowledge about authentic Japanese ramen cooking methods and techniques
Know the basic spices and condiments and their use in Japanese ramen cooking.
Enhance cooking creativity by learning vegan alternatives for ingredients
requirements: No specific skill is required - All you need is passion to create a best bowl of ramen
In able to cook the recipes taught in this course, students will need basic kitchen tools such as pan, knife, chopping board, kitchen spoons, and kitchen stove
Some of the ingredients used in recipes may not be readily available at grocery stores outside Japan, you might need to visit Japanese or Asian supermarkets to get the necessary ingredients
courses.description:
Welcome to the course provided by Shojin Now, a culinary platform to teach Japanese authentic vegan cuisine online.


COURSE OVERVIEW
Learn the unique recipe with clear soup broth and glistening veggie-jang*.
You might say making ramen seems complicated, particularly an authentic and vegan ramen...
You may be able to watch basic ramen recipes being made on Youtube or through recipe books, but wouldn’t you like to immerse yourself in a deeper experience?
We’ve invited the CEO of one of the top ramen restaurants in the world to teach you a unique ramen developed for this course.
This course teaches you the recipe "Veggie-Jang Ramen" featuring the seasoning "Matcha Pepper" which alters the entire taste. The topping veggie-jang goes well with ramen and dishes like pasta or rice. Matcha pepper is a spicy topping that is perfect not only for ramen but also for Japanese-style pasta and udon soup dishes.
This course teaches you how to create a bowl of beautiful and delicious ramen like a professional. You don’t need to prepare advanced skills or special equipments. All you need is you and your passion to learn how to make ramen by yourself.

*Jang is a paste-like sauce used traditionally in Chinese cuisine.


MAIN INSTRUCTORS
Mr. Jiro Yatogi | CEO OF MENYA MUSASHI
He has dedicated more than 20 years of his life to ramen while working at Menya Musashi. A master of his craft, Mr. Yatogi has poured all the knowledge and experience of his professional ramen history into creating vegan ramens. Menya Musashi was the first ramen restaurant chain to proudly serve vegan ramen in Japan, and became a pioneer in the field.
Ms. Izumi Shoji | PLANT-BASED JAPANESE CUISINES PIONEER
A popular cook who has driven the vegan movement in Japan. She published more than 70 books that introduced vegan cuisine to the Japanese public. Her eponymous Vegetable Cooking Studio is said to be Japan's first vegan cooking studio and it’s known for its collaboration classes with top chefs in Japan and overseas.


COURSE STRUCTURE
This course consists of three chapters: introduction, cooking session, and wrap up. It is structured to learn making veggie ramen and matcha pepper in one day taught with videos.


THINGS TO MAKE
SOUP BROTH
For vegan ramens, seaweed and mushrooms are decisive factors in the taste of the broth. Menya Musashi’s style is to add other ingredients such as beans.
VEGGIE-JANG
Sauce determines the taste as a key component of ramen. Regular ramen consists of soup broth, sauce, and noodles, and the ingredients are added to complete the ramen, but the unique part of this ramen is the veggie-jang.
MATCHA PEPPER
The flavors of the ramen can be changed while eating it by adding seasoning agents, flavor oils, spices, etc.
Today we will introduce matcha pepper, which is flavorful and uses plenty of matcha powder, for enjoying different flavor.
ASSEMBLE
You will follow the steps one by one to learn how to complete your bowl of ramen.


FAQ
Q: I have never tried cooking ramen. Am I qualified for this course?
A: That won't be a problem at all! We will go through the basics of ramen making. Even if you have zero experience, you can jump straight into learning professional skills, sparing yourself from any detour!
Q: I don't have any special ramen equipment at home. Will I have to spend a fortune on cooking tools?
A: Nope! Naturally, as the course is based on professional Japanese methods, there will be some culinary equipment you can't readily source outside of Japan. But don't worry, that's why we're here. We carefully adapt our content to English speaking countries' environments. Alternative tools and ingredients are shown throughout the course.
Q: Is the course taught in English?
We partner up with local authentic ramen master. To bring out his strengths, all the videos are shot in Japanese. Hence, the video lessons are taught in Japanese with English subtitles.
target_audience: Those who want to create ramen from scratch
Those who want to brush up their ramen cooking skill
Those who want to learn something new about vegan culinary world

You will master HTML & CSS, JavaScript, GIT, Typescript, React JS, Next.JS, Node.JS, Docker, React Native, Python and SQL.  You will learn the complete Back-End and Front-End in this course. The Complete Web Development Course is a comprehensive course designed to equip you with the knowledge, skills, and confidence required to build modern, responsive, and dynamic websites from the ground up. This course takes you through every stage of the web development journey, starting with the basics of front-end design and progressing toward advanced back-end programming and deployment strategies. Whether you are absolute beginners or individuals seeking to refine your technical expertise, the course offers a structured pathway to mastering the art and science of web development.
You will learn core technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling you to create visually appealing and interactive web pages. Through hands-on practice, You will gain proficiency in crafting layouts, styling content, and adding functionality that enhances user experience. Modern frameworks and libraries such as Bootstrap, React, and jQuery are also covered, allowing you to design responsive interfaces that adapt seamlessly to different devices. This ensures that you not only understand traditional coding techniques but also stay aligned with current industry trends.
The course then transitions into back-end development, where You will explore server-side programming using languages like Node.js, Python, along with database management through MySQL and MongoDB. By learning how to connect front-end interfaces with robust back-end systems, You will acquire the ability to develop dynamic applications that handle data efficiently and securely. Core concepts such as authentication, API integration, and cloud hosting are also emphasized, ensuring you are well-prepared for real-world development challenges.
By the end of the Complete Web Development Course, You will be capable of independently designing, developing, and deploying fully functional web applications. You will possess both the technical expertise and the problem-solving mindset required to thrive as professional developers. This course empowers you to transform ideas into digital realities, making it an ideal starting point for anyone aspiring to build a career in the ever-evolving field of web development.

courses.description:
Step into the world of Moroccan cuisine and master the art of cooking authentic tajines with ease. Perfect for home cooks of all skill levels!


Follow along as traditional Moroccan chefs, known as Dadas, guide you through the secrets of creating five delicious and authentic tajine recipes in the comfort of your own kitchen.
The Dadas are highly experienced chefs who have honed their craft over decades, learning the intricate art of Moroccan cooking from their mothers and grandmothers. Today, these skilled women lead prestigious catering businesses and renowned Moroccan restaurants.


Watch the Dadas as they prepare each dish, sharing their expert tips and techniques to help you perfect these recipes at home. The course includes step-by-step video tutorials and recipe cards, ensuring you can follow along easily.
All videos come with English subtitles and either English voice-over or original audio in Moroccan Arabic. The recipe cards are in English and provide measurements in both metric and imperial units, making it easy for you to recreate these dishes no matter where you are.
Join us on this culinary journey and bring the flavors of Morocco to your table with these five incredible tajine recipes.


In this course, you will master:
Chicken Tagine with Carrots and Olives
Chicken Tagine with Chermoula
Vegetable Tagine

Whether you're an experienced cook looking to expand your repertoire or a beginner eager to explore new cuisines, this course offers something for everyone. By the end, you'll have the skills and confidence to recreate these mouth-watering dishes in your own kitchen.
Join us on this culinary journey and bring the taste of Morocco to your home!

courses.title: Learning to Brew Your Own Beer with Black Rock Home Brewing
courses.bio: The best beer is fresh beer. We will show you how you can brew your own beer and cider at home, inexpensively.

Black Rock Training 101: Black Rock Training 101: Introduction - Brewing with Concentrated Wort
Black Rock Training 101: Cleaning and Sanitizing
Black Rock Training 101: Bottling and Bottle Finishing

Black Rock Training 201: Lesson 2 - Cleaning and Sanitation for Kegging
Black Rock Training 201: Lesson 3 - Transfer to A Keg
Black Rock Training 201: Lesson 4 - Options for Carbonating
Black Rock Training 201: Lesson 5 - Pressure Transfer Between Kegs
Black Rock Training 201: Supplemental - Introduction to Brewing Recipes
Black Rock Training 201: Supplemental - Fermenting Options and Equipment
Black Rock Training 201: Supplemental - Brewing with Unhopped Wort Concentrates
Black Rock Training 301: Advanced Brewing - Partial Mashing Your Brew
Supplemental: Black Rock Supplemental: Outperforming Craft Brewers

requirements: A love for beer and cider.
Some brewing ingredients and basic brewing equipment that you will be able to buy from your nearest home brewing store or online.
An open mind and eagerness to learn fail safe techniques for making the best beer and ciders.
An eagerness to experiment and impress your friends with what you make.
courses.description:
We show you how to brew your own beer with simple ingredients and inexpensive equipment. We use Black Rock's Concentrated Wort, but you can do it with any concentrated wort you can buy at your local brew shop or online.
Brewing Beer
Did you know that the best beer is fresh beer?
Most of what you buy and drink at the store or your local brewery is already past its "best to consume date". It is like buying old stale bread. You can eat it, but it isn't terrific?
Did you know that 75 cents in every dollar you pay for beer or cider has nothing to do with the product and everything to do with taxes, levies, distribution and packaging? You think you are buying beer, but the fact is that you are purchasing the right to buy beer. Someone took your beer right out of your mouth!
Did you know that it is as easy to brew beer as it is to grill a sausage or make a cup of tea? Your local brewer doesn't want you to know that! Your government is likely of the same conviction. If you knew how easy it is to make your own good beer, chances are you would already be doing it, and you will be skipping the fees, levies and taxes.
Brewing Your Beer
Here is the payoff. You can make your own beer and cider at home, with simple equipment that you can buy at the local hardware store and ingredients you can get over the internet - the best ingredients in the world!
We guarantee that your beer and cider will taste better than what you can buy at the store or your local craft brewery? If you brew your own beer, not only will it be fresh, taste better and cost you significantly less, it will also make you more popular, better looking, a nicer person, richer, etc....
You get the picture ;-)
For the price of a beer, we will show you how to do it with Black Rock Home Brewing's ingredients. It is the best brewing ingredients in the world! But hey, you can use anyone else ingredients too if you know what you are doing. Let's help you to know what you are doing and welcome to the world of brewing your own beer!
Welcome to our world of beer!
The Two Cowboys, and Fellow Beer Lovers.
target_audience: Beginners who would love to learn how to brew their own beer and ciders, affordably.
Home brewers that would like to advance their understanding and skills for brewing beer and cider.
All grain brewers that are not impressed with the results they are getting from their brewing.
Beer lovers that want to drink better beer and cider.
Beginner home brewers that do not want to spend hundreds or thousands of dollars on brewing equipment.

courses.description:
Master the Art of Koshary: Create a $70 Gourmet Plate in Just 30 Minutes!
Welcome to "Koshary: The Ultimate Egyptian Street Food Experience!" This course invites you on a culinary journey to create one of Egypt’s most beloved dishes—Koshary. In just 30 minutes, you’ll learn how to transform this humble street food into a gourmet masterpiece that will impress your family and friends.
What You Will Learn:
The Origin of Koshary: Discover the rich history and cultural significance of this iconic dish, rooted in Egyptian tradition.
Nutritional Insights: Understand the nutritional benefits of Koshary, including its balance of carbohydrates, proteins, and essential vitamins, making it a wholesome choice for any meal.
Detailed Ingredient Breakdown: Get familiar with the ingredients, including rice, lentils, pasta, and the unique spices that create the perfect flavor profile. We'll cover quantities and preparation techniques to ensure your dish turns out perfect every time.
Fast Preparation Overview: Learn the step-by-step process to efficiently prepare each component of Koshary—from cooking the lentils and rice to frying the onions and making the signature tomato sauce. This section will guide you through the timing and methods to keep your cooking organized.
Gourmet Plating Techniques: Finally, we’ll show you how to plate your Koshary beautifully, transforming it into a restaurant-quality dish that looks as good as it tastes.
Course Features:
Hands-On Cooking: Follow along with easy-to-understand video tutorials that break down each step of the process.
Expert Tips: Gain insights on how to customize Koshary to suit your taste preferences, including options for additional toppings and spice levels.
Supportive Community: Join a community of fellow food enthusiasts where you can share your creations and get feedback.
Whether you're a seasoned chef or a curious beginner, this course will empower you to create an unforgettable Koshary dish that brings a taste of Egypt into your kitchen. Enroll now and embark on this delicious culinary adventure!
target_audience: This course is designed for Mommy looking for a new food idea to their family.

courses.title: Taste Wine Like a Pro: From Novice to Expert in an Hour!
courses.bio: Certified wine educator talks you through insider tips and tricks on how to confindently assess and describe wine!
objectives: Confidently taste and assess wine, identifying its appearance, aroma, and taste
Use key wine terms like body, acidity, tannins, and finish to describe wines
Identify key elements like sweetness, acidity, and alcohol, and detect hidden nuances in every sip
Recognise and articulate the key qualities of different wines during tastings
Navigate wine tastings with ease, feeling less intimidated by wine
Understand the impact of age, grape variety, and region on wine flavours

Sight: White wine vs. Red wine colour

requirements: No wine tasting experience needed. You will learn everything you need to know.
courses.description:
Unlock the Secrets of Wine Tasting in an Hour!


- Ever tried to describe a wine but all you could muster was “Uhh… it’s nice?”
- Ever swirled your glass and thought, "Hmm, smells like... apple?" but wished you could detect more?
- Or struggled to pinpoint a flavour, knowing it’s something familiar but just out of reach?
- Ever bought a bottle to 'age' and wondered if it'll mature gracefully or just collect dust?
- Perhaps you've nodded along as others discuss a wine's "body" and "structure," secretly thinking, "Are we still talking about wine?"


If any of these sounds familiar, you’re not alone!


As a certified wine educator, I've guided countless enthusiasts in transforming their wine tasting skills. Drawing from my extensive background, I've crafted this online wine tasting course to transition you from simply drinking wine to truly understanding and appreciating it.


In just one hour, we'll embark on a delightful journey to:


Sniff Like a Sommelier: Move beyond basic aromas and uncover the nuanced scents hiding in your glass.
Decode Wine Jargon: Understand terms like acidity, tannins, and body, so you can sip with sophistication.
Identify Flavour Layers: Recognize the complexity in wines, distinguishing between the simple and the sublime.
Speak Wine Fluently: Gain the vocabulary and confidence to describe wines like a seasoned connoisseur.
Assess Ageing Potential: Learn to evaluate a wine's structure and quality, determining if it's a keeper or best enjoyed now.
And the best part? No pretentiousness here — just practical tips to elevate your wine experience.


So, grab your favourite bottle, and let's dive in! Cheers to tasting with confidence!
target_audience: This course is for wine enthusiasts, curious learners, as well as hospitality professionals, looking to build confidence in wine tasting, pairing, and understanding.

courses.title: Simple, Healthy Fall Recipes
courses.bio: Cook Healthy Fall Recipes Easily. Celebrate Fall with Seasonal Salads, Entrees, Desserts, and Cocktails.
objectives: What fruit and veggies are at peak of season in the fall (med-Sept - mid-December).
How to balance your plate and fill it with healthy fruits and vegetables that taste great
How to prepare healthy salads
How to prepare fish without stinking up the house
How to make nutritious, yet delicious desserts
How to make festive drinks for the fall season - with or without alcohol

Salads: Roasted Winter Squash Salad with Blue Cheese
Entrees: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Chili
Fish “En Papillote” with Apple Herb Chutney
Desserts: Roasted Pears with Blue Cheese & Walnuts
Baked Apples with Pumpkin Seeds & Cranberries

courses.description:
We all know we should eat healthier, but how many of us actually know how to do so? So much of how we look and feel comes down to how we feed ourselves, yet so few of us choose to prioritize our health and invest in eating quality food. Think it's too hard? Too time consuming? To complicated? Too expensive? Let Red Jen teach you how easy it is to make simple, seasonal dishes that are as scrumptious as they are nutritious. Stop choosing the convenience of processed foods, full of sugar, sodium, preservatives and other chemicals that weigh you down, tire you out and add 10 years to your age! Isn't it time to learn to invest in your health - to improve the way you look and feel? Let Red Jen teach you how to cook simple seasonal dishes that taste delicious and are healthy for you, too.
By enrolling in this course, you'll learn step-by-step cooking lessons a la Julia Child with Certified Health Coach Red Jen Ford. Jen teaches you how to enjoy the Autumn harvest while online access allows you to learn at your own pace: to master one recipe at a time or to watch them all and dive in where you are most inspired. Never used kale or winter squashes before? Never fear! Red Jen unlocks the mysteries of hard-to-handle fruits and vegetables, shares with you how these foods can improve your health, and actually makes them taste good!
Red Jen teaches a conscious approach to eating, one in which you realize that you deserve beautiful food made from quality ingredients full of nutrition with surprisingly brilliant colors that tastes amazing without impacting your waistline; this is what she calls
target_audience: want to look and feel their best without feeling like they're sacrificing
want to increase energy levels and feel good all year long
want to align themselves with the seasons
are new to cooking and unsure how to incorporate more fruits and vegetables into their everyday diet
want a greater understanding of the real health benefits of food and seasonal eating

courses.title: How I make award winning chocolate
courses.bio: How to make small batch chocolate starting from the cocoa bean
objectives: Learn how to select cacao to make the best possible chocolate
See how many small details determine final chocolate flavor
Understand how basic, every day tools you have at home, can help you make chocolate
Make small batches of chocolate that will wow your friends
requirements: No experience necessary
courses.description: I have been working with chocolate for 20 years and know that making chocolate from the cocoa bean is very easy, but making GOOD chocolate takes years to master. In this course I show you the process I have been using for the last 5 years to produce the most awarded chocolate in Brazil. I walk you through the entire process that I go through when I am going to make a batch of chocolate. I begin with sorting my cocoa beans, then roasting, cracking, winnowing, adding the nibs to the melanger, and finally I give you all the names for the equipment necessary to start making your own chocolate. This course is a quick introduction into making chocolate and is useful for anyone that is interested in making their own chocolate at home or for those of you that want to start making chocolate for your business. I use an 8lb (4 kilo) machine, so if you want to know how Nestle makes chocolate, this course will not cover industrial machines.  There are no requirements for this course, and you do not need to have any knowledge of chocolate before hand. I am here to answer any questions after the course if you need any additional help.
target_audience: For those that want to understand how to make good high quality chocolate or those that just want to know how chocolate is made

courses.title: Pasticceria Francese - Guida per la creazione dei Croissant
courses.bio: Guida semplice e completa per realizzare Croissant perfetti a casa, completamente a mano, senza impastatrice
objectives: Creare un impasto per Croissant
Creare il burro per la sfogliatura
Imparare la tecnica di laminazione
Come tagliare e formare i Croissant
Come far lievitare perfettamente i Croissant
Come cuocere i Croissant
Creazione della glassa per lucidare i Croissant
requirements: Non è richiesta alcun tipo di esperienza
courses.description:
Questo corso è per tutte quelle persone che vogliono imparare a fare dei dolci lievitati abbastanza semplici ma molto buoni.
In questo corso troverete tutti gli aspetti, le fasi della laminazione e della cottura di un croissant, spiegati in modo semplice e coinciso, in modo da facilitare l'apprendimento di queste tecniche.
Faremo un impasto per croissant da zero senza l'utilizzo di impastatrici o macchinari e seguiremo insieme le semplici istruzioni passo passo dell'intero processo.
Vi spiegherò come scegliere di ingredienti e vi mostrerò come utilizzarli nel modo corretto.
Vi guiderò passo dopo passo nella realizzazione di una sfoglia perfettamente laminata a mano, solo utilizzando un mattarello, e vedremo come tagliare, formare i croissant e come farli lievitare correttamente; Inoltre vi guiderò nel trovare la giusta regolazione del vostro forno per ottenere una cottura ottimale dei croissant.
All'interno del corso, potrete trovare anche la ricetta per realizzare l egg-wash , un composto ottenuto mixando insieme, tuorlo d'uovo e latte, che servirà per dare un colore più brunito al nostro croissant e permette una corretta esplosione in forno; Non solo, troverete anche la ricetta della glassa, formata da acqua e zucchero, che servirà per lucidare e dare un tocco più dolce al prodotto finito.
Facendo questo corso imparerai:
Come preparare l'impasto senza macchinari
Come realizzare un blocco di burro per la laminazione
Tecnica di laminazione a mano
Come stendere l'impasto della misura giusta
Come tagliare i croissant dall'impasto
Come modellare il croissant
Le fasi della lievitazione
La cottura del croissant
La realizzazione dell'egg-wash
La realizzazione della glassa
target_audience: Panificatori casalinghi, Chef, Pasticceri amatoriali

Develop your cooking skills

Cucumber and buttermilk smoothie with original (Arabic) audio and subtitles
Learn how to make avocado smoothie 2 way: Avocado smoothie 2 ways with English voice over and susbtitles
Avocado smoothie 2 ways with original (Arabic) audio and subtitles
Learn how to make lemon and ginger juice: Lemon and ginger juice with English voice over and susbtitles

Learn how to make carrot and orange juic: Carrot and orange juice with English voice over and subtitles
Carrot and orange juice with original (Arabic) audio and subtitles

requirements: No previous knowledge needed
courses.description:
Explore the vibrant flavors of Morocco with our unique juice and smoothie recipes. Perfect for beginners seeking refreshing, healthy options!
Join this class and learn how to make 6 classic Moroccan juices and smoothies with the Flavors of Morocco chefs!


Follow the course taught by the Dadas (Chefs) in this course, and learn all the tricks to recreating the most famous Moroccan dishes.


The chefs teaching the course are Dadas, who are traditional Moroccan chefs with decades of experience in the field of cooking traditional Moroccan recipes. Many of the Dadas learned the art of Moroccan cooking at a young age from their mothers and grandmothers. Today, these women are head chefs at large catering businesses and famous Moroccan restaurants.
Watch the Dadas cook the dishes in these courses and learn all their secrets for perfecting the recipes at home.


The course includes step by step video tutorials and recipe cards to help you replicate the recipes at home. All videos include English subtitles, with English voice over or original audio (in Moroccan Arabic). All recipe cards are in English, and include measurements in both metric and imperial measurements.


In this class, you will learn how to make the following dishes:
- Moroccan beetroot juice
- Moroccan lemon juice 3 ways
- Moroccan cucumber and buttermilk smoothie
- Moroccan avocado smoothie 2 ways
- Moroccan lemon and ginger juice
- Moroccan carrot and orange juice


Watch the dadas cook these famous dishes, then replicate their techniques to create these delicious and unique dishes at home.
target_audience: Beginner to advanced cooks who are interested in exploring Moroccan cuisine

courses.description:
Advance designer cake cake by World Pastry Champion
World pastry champion 2019 Chef Loi Ming Ai in this program will teach you a world class designer cake which also include some figurines as well as many others different techniques.
This cake is made on the pound cake covered with butter cream . We have covered one of the component on the sterofoam as well so that you get a better idea as how to work on them as well. How to smoothen them and how to layer them.
You will be understanding how to measure and organise when you plan any specific part of the designer cake and give them that colour shape and structure. The entire process is civered step by step and you can easily replicate them or may be change to your own colour combination
Chef have used minimum possible equipments so that you can feel the maximum hands techniques possible. This include all those minute details like making fondant strawberry , Petal and give them that realistic look as close as possible.
One of the most important part of doing a figurie cake is the supporting wiring on which the figurine need to stand so this video will also teach you how to plan those wiring , shaping them and then build the structure on the,
One all your component of the cakes are ready then you can easily assemble these components and contruct a final cake.

courses.title: South American Cuisine by chef Gabriel Bonin
courses.bio: This program covers different set of recipes selected from different south American countries
objectives: Learn the South American Cuisine
Learn to make Brazilian chicken wings
Learn to make Ceviche
Learn to make Quinoa & Bean Salad
requirements: There is no requirement or prerequisites for learning this program
courses.description:
South American cuisine is a vibrant fusion of flavors, traditions, and ingredients, influenced by indigenous cultures, European settlers, and African heritage. Each country in the region has its own unique culinary identity, with dishes that celebrate local produce, spices, and cooking techniques.
In this program, Chef Gabriel Bonin display a selection of dishes collected from different countries of south America. Chef Gabriel is a celebrated chef with experience in many countries all over the world including Michelin star restaurants in Spain. He is currently Executive chef in APCA Malaysia. In this program, you will explore a variety of traditional South American delicacies that showcase the region’s diversity and passion for food
South American Cuisine Menu
Bandeja Paisa – A traditional Colombian platter featuring beans, rice, meats, plantains, and avocado.
Bolas de Fraile – Argentine sweet fried dough balls, often filled with dulce de leche.
Bolivian Style Chicken – Flavorful chicken simmered with Bolivian spices and herbs.
Brazilian Chicken Wings – Crispy, seasoned wings inspired by Brazilian street food flavors.
Brazilian Style Deep-Fried Fish – Lightly battered fish fried golden, served with zesty sauces.
Camaro no Leite de Coco – Brazilian shrimp cooked in creamy coconut milk.
Chilean Carbonada – A comforting Chilean beef and vegetable stew.
Colombian Chicken Stew – Slow-cooked chicken with potatoes, corn, and herbs.
Feijoada – Brazil’s iconic black bean and pork stew, rich and hearty.
Mantecada – Soft Colombian butter cake with a rich, tender crumb.
Moqueca – A fragrant Brazilian seafood stew with coconut milk, peppers, and cilantro.
Quinoa & Bean Salad – Nutritious Andean-inspired salad with quinoa, beans, and fresh vegetables.
Sancocho – A traditional stew of meats, corn, and root vegetables, popular across South America.
Seafood Ceviche – Fresh fish and seafood marinated in citrus with onions, cilantro, and chili.
Through step-by-step lessons, you’ll discover the essence of South American gastronomy—bold flavors, hearty comfort foods, and refreshing coastal specialties.
APCA Chef Online brings this program to life, giving you structured access to recipes and techniques taught by our world-class chefs, including World Pastry Champions, Asia Pastry Champions, and Master Chefs.
target_audience: This course is for everyone learn forward to south American cuisine

requirements: No previous knowledge needed.
courses.description:
We believe in presenting you with the best quality teas in the world to transport your senses and to show you firsthand all that true tea can be. Our Educational Tea Club is for tea explorers and adventurers, not just tea tourists.
Take a dive deep with us in discussions on history, quality and craftmanship in ways that allow us to continue to be perpetual students of tea and its history.
Explore the origins of tea and its fascinating history, from ancient China to its global popularity today. In this course we will focus on the unique characteristics and brewing methods of yan cha wu long teas.
Dive into the intricate process of tea production, from cultivation and harvesting to processing and packaging.
Discover the art of yan cha wu long tea tasting, including proper brewing techniques, using your own senses to evaluate aroma, flavor, and mouthfeel, and understanding the importance of proper brewing.
Immerse yourself in the rich tradition and cultural significance of Chinese yan cha wu long tea while enjoying heirloom Chinese tea cultivars sourced from historically significant terroir and crafted by age-old artisanship.
Shunan Teng, Founder of Tea Drunk guides you through brewing these exceptional yan cha wu long teas that are available for purchase on the Tea Drunk website.
target_audience: For people who want to deep dive into tea and learn about specific characteristics

courses.title: Cocina Vegana Asiática por el Chef Rodrigo Ponce
courses.bio: Aprende nuevas recetas 100% veganas, deliciosas y saludables. Eleva tus habilidades culinarias al siguiente nivel.
objectives: 21 recetas extraordinarias de la cocina Vegana asíatica
Salsas, panes, snacks, tallarines, currys y salteados
Como utilizar aderezos asiáticos y balancear sabores
El uso correcto de especias para currys perfectos.

Tallarines: Biang Biang Mien (tallarín Chino heacho a mano)

requirements: no
courses.description:
¿Aburrid@ de probar siempre la misma comida vegana? ¿Las ensaladas ya te tienen hart@?¿Estas luchando por encontrar nuevos y deliciosos sabores 100% veganos? Entonces estás en el lugar correcto!?
¿No sería genial preparar y comer tu propio Hummus de garbanzo, o unos baos al vapor de vegetales, un pad thai, un curry rojo o un reponedor ramen japonés??
En este curso, 100% online, el destacado Chef Rodrigo Ponce, te enseñará sus mejores recetas veganas de la cocina asiática. Haremos un fascinante recorrido por distintas preparaciones y estilos de cocinas como árabe, india, tailandesa, china y japonesa.
Al terminar este curso serás capaz de cocinar tus propios platos veganos y darles ese sabor de restaurant para deleitar a tu familia y amigos y porque no, comenzar tu propio negocio de delivery vegano?.
El curso consiste en 21 clases en video, los cuales puedes ver cuando quieras y cuantas veces quieras, acceso de por vida! También incluye listado de ingredientes y todo lo que necesitas para cocinar.
Muy importante: He enfocado las clases para hacerlas en casa, con ingredientes y utensilios comunes y corrientes, que se encuentran normalmente en todas partes. Si hay algún ingrediente que no puedes encontrar, te diré la alternativa para reemplazarlo, para que así no tengas ninguna excusa y te pongas en acción!??
target_audience: Vegan@s y vegetarian@s que amen la cocina y los nuevos sabores
Todo tipo de persona que quiera iniciarse en las recetas veganas
Chef y cocineros profesionales que quieran mejorar su conocimiento en la gastronomía vegana asiática

courses.title: From Spice to Profit: Home-Made Chilli Sauce Business
courses.bio: Chilli Sauce Entrepreneur: How to Turn Your Homemade Recipe into a Successful Business.
objectives: Develop a signature chilli sauce recipe and understand the equipment and ingredients needed to create it.
Create a hygienic and safe production environment and learn how to properly sterilize and preserve your product.
Understand the importance of branding and marketing in the success of your chilli sauce business.
Calculate your production costs and profits through a cost-benefit analysis.
Package and label your chilli sauce professionally to attract customers and stand out from competitors.
Run a profitable chilli sauce business from your home by leveraging your newfound recipe, production, and marketing skills.
requirements: No experience required, just an open mind to learn new things
courses.description:
Welcome to the ultimate course on how to make chilli sauce and turn it into a profitable business from the comfort of your own home!


Whether you're a foodie looking to add some spice to your dishes, a budding entrepreneur wanting to start a new venture, or just someone who wants to learn a new skill, this course is perfect for you.


In this course, you will learn everything you need to know to create your own delicious chilli sauce and take it to market. Starting from scratch, you'll discover the basic equipment and ingredients needed to begin your journey. You'll learn how to create a perfect base for your sauce and how to mix all the ingredients to achieve a great taste properly.


But that's not all! You'll also learn how to sterilize and preserve your product, as well as how to package and label it professionally. We'll cover important topics such as chilli production hygiene, branding and marketing, and even a cost-benefit analysis to ensure you make a profitable business.


Our lessons are designed to be easy to follow, with step-by-step instructions and visual aids to help you every step of the way. By the end of this course, you'll have all the skills and knowledge necessary to create a delicious chilli sauce, market it successfully, and turn it into a profitable business.


So what are you waiting for? Join us today, and let's start making your chilli sauce dreams a reality!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to start creating tasty chili sauce for their family and friends.
Anyone dreaming of starting a chili sauce business but does not know where to start.
A soon to be chili sauce producer and seller who wants to get things right the first time.

أساسيات تحضير وقياس المكونات
courses.description:
ماستر كلاس "كوكيز نيويورك المتنوعة" – دليلك الشامل لإتقان فن خبز الكوكيز


هل تحلم بخَبز كوكيز مثالي تمامًا مثل المحترفين؟ هل ترغب في تطوير مهاراتك في الخَبز والتزيين والارتقاء بها إلى مستوى جديد؟ إذا كانت الإجابة نعم، فهذه الدورة مصممة خصيصًا لك!
"ماستر كلاس كوكيز نيويورك المتنوعة" هو دليل شامل وسهل المتابعة، يأخذك في رحلة ممتعة خطوة بخطوة لتعلّم فن صناعة الكوكيز من الصفر وحتى الاحتراف.
ماذا ستتعلم في هذه الدورة؟
إعداد 6 أنواع مختلفة من الكوكيز باستخدام تقنيات سهلة ومكونات لذيذة.
إتقان خبز الكوكيز الطري والمثالي مع القوام المطلوب في كل مرة.
التعرف على أسرار التخزين والتجميد للحفاظ على نضارة الكوكيز لفترة أطول والاستعداد المسبق للمناسبات أو للأعمال التجارية.
تجنّب الأخطاء الشائعة التي قد تؤدي إلى نتائج غير مرضية أثناء الخَبز.
اكتشاف أحدث اتجاهات الخَبز مثل كوكيز الفستق الحلبي وكوكيز اللوتس.


لماذا تختار هذه الدورة؟
إرشادات واضحة وسهلة التطبيق تناسب جميع المستويات، من المبتدئين إلى المحترفين.
وصفات مجرّبة ومضمونة النجاح لضمان نتائج مثالية في كل مرة.
فرصة لتحويل شغفك إلى مشروع تجاري ناجح من خلال إتقان تقنيات خَبز وتخزين الكوكيز.
مع نهاية هذه الدورة، ستكون قادرًا على إبهار عائلتك وأصدقائك بأشهى أنواع الكوكيز، بل ويمكنك حتى إطلاق مشروعك الخاص وبيع الكوكيز المصنوع بحب واحترافية.
انضم الآن واكتشف سرّ الكوكيز المثالية!


"Assorted New York Cookies" Masterclass
Discover the art of cookie making with Assorted New York Cookies, a comprehensive, step-by-step guide designed to help you master the craft of baking. Whether you aspire to bake cookies like a professional or elevate your baking and decorating skills, this course is perfect for you.
Learn how to bake delicious, soft, and moist cookies effortlessly while avoiding the common pitfalls that often lead to baking failures. You’ll also discover the secrets to proper storage and freezing techniques, allowing you to prepare in advance for special occasions or your baking business.
This foolproof course features tried-and-tested recipes and techniques, enabling you to:
Bake six unique cookie varieties using simple methods and delightful ingredients.
Achieve the perfect soft cookie every time.
Store cookies properly for future baking sessions.
Avoid over-baking with proven strategies.
Explore new baking trends, such as pistachio and caramel cookies.
By the end of the course, you'll have the confidence to amaze your friends and family with stunning, show-stopping cookies. For those with entrepreneurial aspirations, you'll gain the skills to launch your very own cookie-baking business.
Unleash your inner baker and turn your passion for cookies into a delightful art form!

objectives: Learn about sour dough breads

courses.title: Capire il vino. Guida pratica per ristoratori e appassionati
courses.bio: Corso semplice e completo per imparare a leggere, servire, abbinare e conservare il vino con consapevolezza.
objectives: Camerieri, baristi e personale di sala che vogliono migliorare il servizio al cliente

Corso - Capire il Vino: Quiz: Dentro un bicchiere di vino
Quiz: Perchè un vino costa 3€ o 30€
Quiz: Temperature di servizio e bicchieri

requirements: Nessuna conoscenza specifica richiesta
Basta la voglia di capire meglio il vino, anche da zero
Adatto a tutti anche ai principianti
courses.description:
Vuoi capire il vino senza diventare sommelier?
Questo corso è pensato per ristoratori, appassionati e curiosi che desiderano acquisire competenze concrete e immediatamente applicabili. Non troverai nozioni eccessivamente tecniche o termini complicati, ma spiegazioni chiare, esempi pratici e consigli frutto di anni di esperienza diretta nella vendita e nel servizio del vino.
Imparerai a leggere e interpretare un’etichetta, comprendendo il significato di vitigno, annata, gradazione, denominazione e altre informazioni fondamentali. Capirai perché alcuni vini costano pochi euro mentre altri arrivano a prezzi molto più alti, e quali fattori influenzano realmente il prezzo. Scoprirai le temperature di servizio corrette per ogni tipologia di vino, l’importanza della forma del bicchiere e come questi due elementi possano valorizzare o penalizzare la degustazione.
Parleremo di abbinamenti cibo-vino, spiegando come trovare l’equilibrio giusto tra piatto e calice, senza rigidità ma con consapevolezza. Affronteremo il tema di solfiti, allergeni e istamina, chiarendo il loro ruolo e sfatando falsi miti. Imparerai anche le tecniche corrette per conservare il vino, sia a casa che in ristorante, e come prolungare la durata di una bottiglia aperta.
Il corso si compone di 10 lezioni brevi e mirate, ognuna con un quiz finale per fissare i concetti, più un test cumulativo. Al termine, saprai scegliere, servire e raccontare il vino con maggiore sicurezza, sia per uso personale che professionale.
target_audience: Camerieri, baristi e personale di sala che vogliono servire e consigliare meglio il vino ai clienti
Ristoratori, titolari di locali e gastronomie che vogliono proporre il vino con più consapevolezza
Appassionati alle prime armi che vogliono orientarsi tra etichette, prezzi, abbinamenti e falsi miti
Chi acquista vino per sé o per gli altri e vuole evitare errori comuni
Chiunque voglia imparare a parlare del vino in modo corretto ma senza tecnicismi

courses.description:
Enroll today for tips that will help to significantly lower your daily sodium intake! This course provides information on where sodium hides, how to create low sodium ingredients needed to prepare your favorite meals, and how to spice up entrees!!  It provides lectures, recipes, tips, and descriptions  to help you along your low sodium journey.
Have you or a loved one been diagnosed with a condition (my husband has Congestive Heart Failure or CHF) that requires lowering sodium levels? Have you struggled to understand how to cook low sodium meals? Have you tried to lower your sodium levels only to see small changes instead of the big drops you had hoped for? Do you feel like there is too much information on the internet about sodium, but not the information you need to create a good meal plan? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you are in the right place!
In this course, I'll provide the information you'll need to create delicious low sodium spices, condiments, sauces, and mixes, and some recipes to get you started. This course will provide the information you need to start your journey to becoming a low sodium chef for your family or when entertaining a group of friends! Judy, The Sodium Attacker, is always looking for ways to reduce sodium and keep the flavor! You will become the sodium attacker for your family.  Enroll today to receive immediate help in lowering the sodium for your loved ones!
Upon completion of this course, you will learn:
Where sodium hides
Why it is critical to read food labels, and what you can learn
The importance of knowing sodium content of every ingredient in every recipe
How to prepare some low sodium Entrees, Dips, and Appetizers
What low sodium goodies we can dip in the dips
Low sodium cooking DOES NOT have to be bland
Where to buy no sodium or low sodium spices
Items to banish from your kitchen
There are a lot of low sodium items we can cook with
How to keep (and add to) the flavor while substantially reducing sodium in food


Low Sodium Recipes and Lectures:
Recipe for low sodium Pico De Gallo and Cooked Salsa - 11 to 17 mg for 1  1/4 to 1  3/4 cup
Store bought has 300 mg to 960 mg per cup
Recipe for low sodium Au Jus and French Dip Sandwiches - Au Jus has only 33 mg sodium for 4 cups
McCormick Au Jus package has over 3000 mg sodium for 3 cups
Recipe for very low sodium Baked Tortilla Chips - 30 mg sodium for 96 (6 ounces) chips

Store bought ranges from 105 to 200 mg PER OUNCE

Panko or 4C bread crumbs - You have a choice

Store bought low sodium beef broth has 440 mg sodium PER CUP
Recipe for low Sodium Chili Powder Blend has less than 5 mg sodium per Tablespoon
McCormick chili powder has 240 mg per Tablespoon
Recipe for low Sodium Guacamole - Dip or Garnish - 15 mg sodium per 1  1/4 cup
Store bought goes up to 840 mg PER CUP
Recipe for low Sodium Onion Soup Mix - Has less than 3 mg sodium per tablespoon
Lipton Onion Soup Mix has 610 mg sodium PER TABLESPOON
Recipe for low Sodium Marinara Sauce - Sooo Good!! 43 mg sodium per cup
Store bought - 72- to 980 mg sodium PER CUP
Recipe for low sodium Sweet and Sour Sauce - Less than 5 mg per tablespoon.
Store bought - lowest at my store has 60 mg sodium
Recipe for low sodium pork Chop Rub - 4 mg for 8 teaspoons - Only need to use a sprinkle on each side of the chop
Includes what to look for on the nutrition label - some chops are packed in salt
Recipe for low Sodium Ranch Dip and Salad Dressing Mix - 3.25 for per tablespoon - Dip is less than 20 mg -Dressing less than 21 per tablespoon
Store bought ranch dip 135 mg and ranch dressing from 120 to 145 mg sodium per tablespoon
Recipe for my newest and I think best Ranch Dip and Salad Dressing. Only 14 mg sodium per Tablespoon.
Recipe for low sodium & very low sodium Potato Chips  - Add spice of your choice

Store bought goes up to 840 mg for 1/2 cup
Recipe for low sodium mayonnaise - We can decrease sodium from 70 mg per tablespoon to less than 49.
For mayonnaise lovers - it can make a substantial difference in daily sodium count.
Recipe for low Sodium Garden Dip and Salad Dressing - You choose from the list of vegies -
Your vegie choice will determine total sodium
Recipe for low sodium Sour Cream Salad Dressing and Dip - Less than 5 mg sodium per tablespoon
Lots of flavor, easy and quick to make, and wonderful to eat
Recipe for low Sodium Steak and Burger Rub - 7.5 mg sodium for 3 Tablespoons- Sprinkle a little on both sides of a burger & cook
Sprinkle on steak, rub it in, and let it sit for several hours - Great on the grill
Recipe for Low Sodium Taco Seasoning Mix - Less than 40 mg sodium for 20 teaspoons -
Mrs. Dash  has zero sodium, but not my favorite.
Old El Paso has 1920 & McCormick 30% less sodium has 1500 mg sodium
Recipe for Low Sodium Pizza Sauce - less than 25 mg per 1/4 cup
Store bought from 200 to 320 for 1/4 cup

Store bought 620 per 4 ounces
Recipe for Low Sodium Zuchinni Appetizer or Side Dish
Low sodium goodies to dip in our low sodium dips
List of items to choose from

Low Sodium Lecture only - Can we buy no sodium spices - Yes we can. Check out the lecture.

courses.title: Твой кулинарный YouTube-канал
courses.bio: Снимайте видео на кухне и зарабатывайте на своем канале.
objectives: кулинарный канал
продвижение youtube

Курс: Анализ кулинарных каналов и возможностей заработка
Выбор тем роликов и составление контент плана

requirements: нет
courses.description:
Почему именно кулинарный канал
Тема "Кулинария" очень легко набирает просмотры и дает хорошие доходы от YouTube.
Единственный риск в этом деле – это собственное время.
Вам даже не обязательно сниматься самостоятельно, вы можете просто снимать свои руки во время приготовления еды.


А можно не кулинарный?
Конечно. Правила работы с YouTube универсальны. Вы можете вести канал о музыке, садоводстве, любимых животных или на любую другую тему.
В данном курсе я описал пошаговый алгоритм запуска собственного канала. Применив знания к любой другой теме – вы точно достигните успеха.


Автор курса
Меня зовут Сергей Артеменко и более 30 лет я занимался бизнесом и руководил сетью магазинов бытовой техники.
Уже после 50 я стал искать бизнес, который бы: не требовал вложений на старте, работать в котором можно из любой точки мира и получать стабильную прибыль.
И тогда я открыл для себя YouTube, создал ряд каналов, получил серебряную кнопку и доход от просмотра видео без инвестиций.


Что входит в обучение
Видео лекции - 10 простых пошаговых лекций с разбором всех деталей
Домашние задания - Вы получаете задания, которые помогают овладеть ремеслом


Просто убрали все лишнее
✅ 10 пошаговых уроков
✅ 13 чек-листов и домашних заданий
✅ Концентрат моего 5-ти летнего опыта
Подобное обучение стоит в среднем 200-300$. Поэтому мы убрали продающие вебинары и минимизировали расходы на платформу.


Есть ли обратная связь от автора курса?
Уроки достаточно подробные, в формате раз-два-три и результат. Однако, если вам необходима помощь возможна консультация от автора курса.
target_audience: Домохозяйки, которые любят готовить
Повары
Блогеры

courses.title: Who’s Afraid of Tofu - Vegan Cooking Class
courses.bio: Learn how to make amazing tofu dishes at home
objectives: Get familiar with different kinds of tofu, how and when to use them
How to use tofu in savoury and sweet dishes
Nutrient dense recipes for quick wholesome meals
Helpful kitchen tips
How to make a variety of great tofu recipes from scratch
Recipes to feature the tofu dishes we make, and various serving options
How to create different flavour variations
Meet new ingredients and flavours
Demystify the idea that tofu is boring
Simple, delicious recipes that don’t need any special equipment

Introduction to Who’s Afraid of Tofu cla: Introduction to Who’s Afraid of Tofu
Quick Seared Tofu: Quick Seared Tofu - video + written recipe
Tofu Scramble: Tofu Scramble - video + written recipe (+ extra recipe for breakfast burrito)
Pesto Tofu: Pesto Tofu - video + written recipe (+ extra recipe for pesto tofu & greens)
Sweet & Sour Tofu: Sweet & Sour Tofu - video + written recipe (+ extra recipe for S&S noodles)
Kimchi Tofu Bunwich: Kimchi Tofu Bunwich - video + written recipe

requirements: No experience needed, you will learn everything you need to know to create your own delicious tofu dishes
No special equipment required
courses.description:
Are you not sure what to do with tofu? How to cook it? Which kind to get? You’re not alone!


Join me for a delicious class that is all about tofu!


In this fun, informative class we will make simple, wonderful recipes that don’t need any special equipment.


You will also learn recipes to feature the tofu dishes we make, and various serving options, as well as how to create different flavour variations.


I vividly remember the first time I tried eating tofu - I was a teenager and tried eating it raw - I was not impressed..
It wasn’t until years later that I tried it again, and realized that tofu is an amazing ingredient that just needs some love and care.


There are many different types of tofu - in this class I am going to focus on 4 types that are more common and are usually available in most grocery stores - extra firm, firm, medium firm, and soft tofu.


This class includes 10 dishes - appetizers, mains, condiments, sides, and dessert too - each dish has its own step by step video, written recipe, ingredient and equipment list!


Enjoy an intimate experience at your own home, as we meet new ingredients and flavours, learn helpful kitchen tips, and prepare yummy recipes from scratch, in a wonderful hands-on experience.


So join me and learn how to make your own amazing tofu dishes!


Special Notes:
Equipment required: blender (needed for 2 recipes: Tofu Spreads & Dips and Avocado Chocolate Pudding )
All recipes in this class can be made gluten-free & nut-free
target_audience: People who want to learn how to make delicious tofu dishes at home
Curious home cooks that want to develop new kitchen skills
People who enjoy exploring and playing with food
People who want to add more plant based food to their diet
People that can't eat dairy for different reasons
People who are looking for new recipes inspiration
People who want to add plant-based protein to their meals
You can enjoy my classes whether you are a beginner – as I go through every step of each recipe – or if you have been cooking for a while and are looking for some new inspiration in the kitchen.

courses.title: プロフェッショナルな料理動画の作り方
courses.bio: Adobe Premiere ProとAdobe Auditionで普段の料理風景を撮った映像をオシャレな動画に編集する方法
objectives: ストーリーも交えて、単なる料理動画では終わらせない編集方法

動画編集の際用いるBGMの尺を簡単に任意の長さに編集するテクニック
ストーリーボードを軸とした効率的な編集方法

編集前の下準備: Macの写真アプリで動画を整理する
新規プロジェクトを作成しプロジェクトパネルでビンを整理する
Epidemic Soundから音楽をダウンロードする
料理動画の編集: Premiere Proでどのシーケンスを選べばいい？
Bロールの使いたい部分をインとアウトで括る
音楽に合わせて動画を切り替える方法
かっこいいアニメーションテキストをテンプレートから作る方法
リテンションを上げるために一番魅力的な映像を最初に見せる
オープニング・ロゴ・ブランドを挿入する
ボイスオーバーをオーディオトラック2に載せる
オーディオトラックで全体の音声を調節する
新しくシーケンスを作る
ストーリーボードに合わせて動画をタイムラインにのせていく
ボイスオーバーをタイムラインにのせていく
書き出し用のFinalシーケンスを作る
音楽の長さを自由自在に変えるAdobe Auditionのリミックス機能
カラーコレクション（LUT）を当てて食材の色を際立たせる
BGM（音楽）のボリュームってどのくらいの大きさ/何dbがベスト？
旅のフッテージをBロールとして利用する
カット編集とエフェクトコントール（スケール）の使い方
ボイスオーバーの挿入とクリップの順番の入れ替え
オーディオクリップミキサーと音量を微調整する
新しくシーケンスを作りフッテージを並べる
ボイスオーバーをストーリーボードに従ってタイムラインにのせる
Adobe Auditionで指定の長さに音楽の尺を変更する

編集した動画の書き出し: 動画を書き出すときの設定

requirements: Adobe Premiere Proの基礎知識
Adobe Premiere Pro
Adobe Audition
courses.description:
「好きなことで、生きていきたい。そうだ、料理が得意だから、料理動画をアップしていくのはどうだろう。これから料理動画をたくさんアップロードして、人気が出た暁には自分の料理本まで出版しちゃったりして…グフフ。」
そこでYoutubeで料理動画を検索して見てみると、既にものすごい数の料理動画が。しかも、中にはプロの料理人の動画まで。料理動画くらい、みんなやるよなあ。と溜め息をついて諦めようとしたとき、あることに気が付きました。


確かに料理動画は溢れているけど、コンテンツのクオリティが高い料理動画はあまりないなあ。


職場で上司が言っていたような気がする、「既に同じような商品が市場に溢れているときは、差別化が大事だ。」という言葉を思い出して、いよいよ気分は高まっていきます。視聴者が料理を作りたくなる動画にするために、食材がより美味しく見えるように編集したり、その料理に必要な食材を買いに行く過程なども含めてストーリーにしたりすると面白いんじゃないだろうか？


本講座は、料理は好きだし、それを動画にしてみたいけれども、料理動画に適した編集の仕方までは知らない方のための講座です。プロフェッショナルな料理動画を作る理由は様々です。例えば、視聴者から高い評価を得るためでも良いですし、友人に自分が作ったオシャレな動画を自慢したいというのも最もな理由です。あなたが作る料理と同じように、動画編集においても完璧主義を貫きたいという方にも向いているかもしれません。


動画編集に必要なことは3つだけ。Adobe Premiere ProとAdobe Audition。後は自分だけのオリジナリティ溢れる料理動画を作りたいという気持ちだけです。Adobe CC製品に関しては、月額5000円程度の利用料がかかります。しかし、料理動画をこれからずっとアップロードしていって、Youtubeで動画に広告を付けたり、Udemyで自分の料理講座を作ったりしてお金を稼いでいくこともできると考えれば、良い投資だと言えるでしょう。最近は無料の動画編集ソフトも多くなってきましたが、やはりAdobe製品で自分好みに細かく編集したオリジナルの動画の輝き方は、無料動画編集ソフトで編集したそれとは異なります。


もちろん、パートナーや友人に料理が上手な人がいれば、その人と組んで料理動画を作っていくのも楽しいものになるかと思います。自分がいつものように料理した過程をオシャレな動画に変えてくれる人がいたとしたら、きっと嬉しく思われるに違いありません。そこらの料理動画とはレベルが違う料理動画の編集方法を学んでみませんか？
target_audience: 自慢の手料理の作り方を撮影して、オシャレな動画に編集したい方
他の料理動画とは突き抜けたクオリティの、オリジナリティ溢れる動画を作りたい方

courses.bio: Impara a realizzare un ottima pizza Napoletana a casa
objectives: Imparerai a scegliere la farina ideale per realizzare la Pizza Napoletana;
Imparerai a impastare correttamente un impasto per Pizza Napoletana in Planetaria o Impastatrice, in base alle tue esigenze;
Apprenderai il processo “step by step” di realizzazione di un perfetto impasto per pizza, in base ad ogni condizione;
Imparerai a formare le tue palline e a gestire le temperature di maturazione e lievitazione;
Imparerai inoltre a stendere correttamente la Pizza e a cuocerla nel tuo forno di casa e non solo!
Imparerai inoltre a preparare un forno a legna per una serata tra amici;

Introduzione al corso di Pizza Napoletan: La Farina - il vero segreto per una pizza d’eccellenza
Sezione dedicata all’impasto in IMPASTAT: Impasto post maturazione in frigo: come gestire la lievitazione
Stesura e Cottura nel forno a legna: MARGHERITA
Stesura e cottura nel forno a legna: BOSCAIOLA

Preparare il forno domestico alla cottura
Sezione dedicata all’impasto in IMPASTAT: Impasto post maturazione in frigo: come gestire la lievitazione
Stesura e Cottura in forno Ooni Koda16

requirements: Il corso è adatto a chiunque si voglia avvicinare al mondo della pizza napoletana, anche per  chi ha zero esperienza con gli impasti, principianti e amatoriali:
Strumenti essenziali: planetaria, forno di casa e tanta voglia di imparare!
courses.description:
Hai sempre voluto diventare un mastro pizzaiolo Napoletano ma la pizza non esce piatta, secca e mai dome desideri?
Questo è il corso per Pizza Napoletana pensato proprio per tutti!


In questo corso ti seguirò passo passo nella realizzazione del tuo impasto per pizza napoletana, raccontandoti tutti i perché di ogni cosa che faremo.
Ricorda che tutto ha una motivazione ben precisa, e solo conoscendo tutti i segreti sarai in grado di diventare il Mastro Pizzaiolo di casa tua , e ottenere sempre risultati stupefacenti.


Questo corso è pensato proprio per tutti, perché troverai 3 corsi in 1 !
Corso dedicato ai casalinghi che possiedono una planetaria e il forno di casa - qui imparerai a realizzare il giusto impasto per te e la tua attrezzatura, perché non tutti gli impasti per pizza sono uguali, qui imparerai a realizzare il migliore e come cuocerlo al meglio nel tuo forno di casa;
Corso dedicato a chi ha una impastatrice e un forno a gas tipo Ooni - qui imparerai a realizzare il giusto impasto per te e la tua attrezzatura, e vedremo come usare al meglio la potenza di un forno a gas;
Corso dedicato a chi ha una impastatrice e un forno a legna - qui imparerai a realizzare il giusto impasto per te e la tua attrezzatura, e vedremo come preparare al meglio un forno a legna e sopratutto come gestirlo durante la cottura;
Per ogni corso ci sarà la propria sezione dedicata, completa di file scaricabili con tantissime informazioni aggiuntive riguardanti la farina e tantissimi segreti importantissimi.
Con l’acquisto del corso potete accedere sempre a tutti e 3 i corsi, anche in caso di vostri futuri upgrade di attrezzatura, e all’interno troverete sempre la sezione dedicata alle domande in cui sarò proprio io a rispondere.
Cosa aspetti?
target_audience: Renderti un esperto nella realizzazione della pizza napoletana, dall’impasto alla cottura!

courses.title: All about Scandinavian Cuisine by APCA chef online
courses.bio: This program covers the Scandinavian cuisine with a touch of Nordic cuisine
objectives: Learn about scandinavian cuisine
Learn about Nordic Cuisine
Learn about Gravalax
Learn a complete scandinavian cuisine menu from start to finish
requirements: No requirement as the program is from start to finish
courses.description:
Technically, the term Scandinavia refers to a geographical region, the Scandinavian Peninsula, which encompasses Norway, Sweden, and part of Finland. It may also refer to a language group, Continental Scandinavian, that is descended from Old Norse and includes Danish, Norwegian, and Swedish
This program curated by Chef Gabriel Bonin for APCA chef online cover Scandinavian cuisine which include some great recipes from start to finish in the form of a menu. This mean you will see some starter, soups , salad, Entre, Main and desserts
Menu of the Program –
· Brunkal
· Skagen
· Creamy dilled cucumber and Radish salad
· Salmon Gravalax
· Scandinavian style beetroot apple and Walnut Soup
· Lahikeitto
· Swedish Meatballs with Celery and Apple
· Finnish Meat Pie
· Cod Fish with Pink Peppercorn and Vodka Pickle
· Frikadeller
· Salmon Skewers
· Beef Tenderloin with Coleslaw
· Mackerel with Roasted Beetroot
· White fishcake with Prawn and dill Sauce
· Swedish apple Pie


Some approach Information about Nordic Cuisine
Nordic cuisine is a culinary movement which has been developed in the Nordic countries and Scandinavia, since the 2000s. New Nordic Cuisine was propelled by, and found inspiration in, ideas and a manifesto written by food activist and chef and several Scandinavian chefs in 2004 in copenhegan. Nordic Cuisine has been used to promote local, natural, and seasonal produce as a basis for new dishes both in restaurants and in the home. As a result, several restaurants, in Denmark, have introduced local ingredients, some often new to the usual palate, in combination with traditional foods prepared in new ways.
The evolving cuisine has sought to take advantage of the possibilities inherent in traditional Scandinavian recipes for fish and meat dishes, building on the use of local products while reviving and adapting some of the older techniques, for example, those for marinating, smoking, and salting. Products such as rapeseed, Oats cheeses and older varieties of apples and pears are now being prepared with greater attention to safeguarding their natural flavours. These steps have been taken by the proponents of the New Nordic Cuisine in parallel with their awareness of a growing interest in organic food throughout the region. In addition to concerns for "purity and freshness", they have also aimed to make maximum use of seasonal produce such as new potatoes, strawberries and asparagus in the summer and baked goods and seasoned meats during the Christmas period.
target_audience: The program cover a complete menu of scandinavian cuisine covering starters, soups, salads, main course and desserts

courses.description:
Baking at home does that sound difficult. Look no further. This is the perfect course for you to learn and take your baking skills to the next level.
The course will help everyone from complete Beginners who have never baked before to PROFESSIONALS who bake in professional bakeries.
I’m going to show you every single step even some small tips, so you will get the hang of it.
You'll learn which tools and materials you'll need and how to use them for various techniques. You'll also find several recipes in the course for cakes.
In This course, we will be learning all the steps required to make cakes starting from the tools we will be using to different ingredients and techniques throughout these recipes and covers the absolute basics of how to mix, bake, assemble, and serve a cake.
Baking a cake at home can deliver a lot of joy to our friends and family. I believe if you truly love and are fascinated by baking you can make cakes that are much better than the store-bought ones in your home kitchen and I’m sure I can help you by guiding you throughout this class.
I cannot wait to guide you to learn how to improve your cake baking and decoration skills at home!
Everything you need to know to make the perfect cake, every step of the way from mixing to serving!

courses.title: ティーマスターゴールド　鈴木剛一郎が教える　紅茶教室
courses.bio: 美味しい紅茶を自信をもって入れられる人になれます　カフェやレストランで紅茶を提供することをお考えの方には是非受講いただきたいセミナーです　また産地のことや紅茶がどのように作られるのかなど必要知識を身に付けることができます
objectives: 1【講師自己紹介】　珈琲好きでこの仕事につきましたが、紅茶との出会いが私の生き方を変えてしまいました　それほどの魅力を持つ紅茶パワー　是非皆様にお伝えしたいです　各講座の内容紹介
2【紅茶って何？】　「オレンジペコーは茶葉のサイズです」　紅茶は「カメリアシネンシスから作られます」紅茶の茶葉にはどうして大きいサイズ、小さいサイズがあるのかなど　特長を学んで目的に合った紅茶を選べる知識を学びます
3【紅茶の生産国、インド編】　ダージリンの標高は２０００ｍ以上ヒマラヤ山脈の東に位置　紅茶のシャンパンと呼ばれます　高温多湿の熱帯気候で育つお茶「アッサム」はなぜ深みがある？　　　青い山と称されるサッパリテーストの「ニルギリ」　それぞれの特徴を紹介します
4【紅茶の生産国　スリランカ編】　　南の島で魅力的な紅茶が作られるのはなぜ？　ウヴァ　ディンブラなど代用的なスリランカ茶について学びます
5【紅茶の製造工程】　　発酵を変えれば紅茶、ウーロン茶、緑茶ができます　茶葉をサイズ分けすればサッパリ味、コクのあるものをに分類できます　お好みの味を見つける必修テクニックが身につきます
6【紅茶の入れ方　ゴールデンルール】　　紅茶を美味しく入れる一番の基本を細かく紐解いた「実演動画」を使って詳しくご案内　ここだけできればどんな紅茶でも完璧に入れられます　　　（ティーバックの入れ方も紹介します）
7【茶葉の保管方法】　　茶葉をダメにしないために・・・　保管する時にやってはいけないこと、どうやったら良い状態で保管できるのか？　　紅茶を使ったドイツのユニークなティータイム紹介
8【フレーバーティーのお話】　アールグレイって何？　香りを付けたお茶はどうやって作られるのか？　ジャスミン茶も香りを付けたお茶です　どうやって作られるのか？　フレーバーティーの面白さを学びます
9【アイスティーの作り方】　　アイスティーマジックをお見せします　濁ったアイスティーの経験はありませんか　どうしてクリームダウンは起きるの？　　実演動画でアイスティーの作り方を丁寧にご案内
10【ミルクティーの作り方】　　牛乳が無いとミルクティーは作れません　牛乳について勉強もします　実演動画でおいしいミルクティー作りを学びます　「鍋で作る美味しく簡単レシピ１，２，３を紹介」
11【ハーブティーについて】　　特別講座　ハーブと紅茶は全く違う飲み物です　ハーブとスパイスの違い　ハーブの効能や利用方法について学びます

紅茶の基礎知識を学び、美味しく紅茶を淹れられる人を目指します: 講師自己紹介　講座内容について解説
紅茶って何？　オレンジペコー　お茶の木　茶葉の大きさで味が変わる
インド紅茶の紹介　ダージリンは標高２０００ｍ　アッサムは標高3０ｍ　気候が変わると茶の木も変わる
スリランカ紅茶の紹介　以前紅茶は作られていなかった　現在は紅茶輸出国世界１位　ウヴァ茶は世界３大紅茶の一つです
紅茶はどうやって作られる　茶摘み、揉捻、発酵、乾燥、等級区分　それぞれ大事な工程を詳しく解説します
紅茶の入れ方　基本「ゴールデンルール」使用する道具、茶葉の分量、お湯の温度　ポイントをわかりやすく順番に解説　実演動画＆ティーバックの入れ方
茶葉の保管　茶葉の大敵は湿気や光　良い状態で保管する方法を紹介　　ドイツのおしゃれな紅茶作法　ブレーメントラディショナルティーセレモニー　キャンディスの使い方
香りを付けたお茶「フレーバーティー」いろいろな香りを付けたお茶はどうやって作るのか？　おなじみの「アールグレイ」って何？のお話
アイスティーの作り方　白く濁ったアイスティーになってしまうのはなぜ？クリアなきれいなアイスティーを作るにはどうする　実演動画で学びます
おいしいミルクティーの作り方　解説＆実演　ミルクティーを作るには牛乳が必要　牛乳についても勉強します　高級ホテルでも使われるミルクティーレシピ実演解説します
特別講座　ハーブティー　　ハーブと紅茶は全く違うものです　ハーブの特長、効能、利用方法をご紹介します

requirements: 紅茶に対する知識、道具、経験は一切必要ありません　学んで実行する気持ちがあれば十分　実演動画もしっかり解説しますので必ず紅茶を美味しく淹れられるテクニック、知識が身につきます
courses.description:
このコースでは紅茶に興味がある方はどなた様でも参加できます
紅茶の基本をマスターするため　茶樹に関すること　産地　紅茶の製造方法を学び、紅茶の茶葉が手元に来るまでの過程を知っていただきます
手に入れた紅茶をどうすれば美味しく淹れられるか、どんな特徴のある茶葉なのかを見極める力を養います
基本が理解されれば、アイスティー、ミルクティーも思いのままに作れます
自信をもって紅茶を淹れられるようにご案内していきます

courses.title: Wine, Spirits, and Beverages for Top Servers.
courses.bio: F&B knowledge that will raise your performance, increase your value, and take You to the top 10% Servers in the world.
objectives: Wine Service: opening a bottle of wine and Champagne, decanting and aerating wines, etc.
Wine Knowledge: 49 top wines in the world, wne regions, selling, presenting, tasting wines. Small talk with guests about wine.
Top alcoholic beverages, service procedures and their most popular cocktails
None-alcoholic beverages: types and service procedures
Coffee and Tea: The different types of coffee and tea, style of production, the veriaty of hot bevergaes,and service procedures.

Wine Knowledge and Service Procedures: What is wine. Wine making process and handling.
Wine grapes and the characteristics of the top 40 wines of the world

What have you learned about wine?
