Brandy: types and top brands of Cognac
Hot Beverages: What is coffee and how it is made?

requirements: No prior knowledge or experience is needed. It is a basic course for beginner servers!
courses.description:
This course is explicitly created for waiters/servers to distinguish themselves from the pack by showing knowledge, skills, and a level of service unmatched by anyone else in the industry.
We split the course into four sections:
1. Wine - you will gain the confidence to talk freely about wine with your guests, suggest the perfect bottle of wine for their meal, and present, open, and serve a bottle of wine like a pro.


2. Spirits -  the knowledge will help you perform quickly and efficiently when taking a drink order, suggesting a drink to a guest, or communicating with the guests and the bartender.


3. Non-alcoholic beverages - basic understanding of the importance of non-alcoholic drinks and their service.


4. Hot beverages - the basics of barista training! You will learn about coffee and tea, how to prepare the different coffee products, the difference between them, tea service, etc.


The goal of the training is to raise your level of knowledge and service to the top of our industry and help you grow, make more money, and live a better life.
By the end of this course, you will have the knowledge, skills, and confidence to apply to the top fine-dining restaurants in every country in the world!
Best of luck!
target_audience: The course is created for new waiters or people who intend to work as waiters to learn the basics and be prepared when they hit the floor. Waiters with some experience but with limited knowledge and skills will also find this course extremely helpful.

courses.title: Aprenda a fazer pão de fermentação natural
courses.bio: 7 passos simples para você fazer o seu
objectives: Você aprenderá, de uma forma simples e prática, como fazer seu 1° pão de fermentação natural.
requirements: Você não precisa saber cozinhar tampouco ter equipamentos profissionais para fazer o seu próprio pão de fermentação natural.
courses.description:
Se você espera um curso cheio de conceitos, textos e slides, esse curso não é pra você.
Com uma didática simples e direta, você conseguirá fazer o seu 1° pão de fermentação natural em 7 passos práticos.
Aprenderá sobre a fermentação natural, as regrinhas e e tempos de cada etapa do processo de produção para que atinja o que se espera: um pão lindão e gostoso!
Além das vídeos aulas, terá o suporte por e-mail para qualquer dúvida e um material de apoio para consultar sempre que necessário. Durante o curso, daremos os "pulos do gato" para você se sair bem nessa aventura e, ao fim do curso, algumas dicas simples mas eficientes para você consumir melhor o seu pão.
Verá que com ingredientes simples (como farinha de trigo, sal e água) e utensílios que você tem em sua casa (como bowls, fogão e colher), conseguirá entrar, com o pé direito, no mundo da panificação. Você não vai querer sair dele, nunca mais.
Aprenderá com o padeiro Thiago Albuquerque, amante da panificação há anos, que transmitirá seu conhecimento junto aos valores de sua padaria. Com certeza, sairá o curso botando a mão na massa, literalmente!
Esperamos você em nossa cozinha. Bora?
Tasca Nossa Padaria
target_audience: Você que ama pão e quer se aventurar no universo da panificação.

courses.title: HOWEXPERT VIDEO BOOK - How to Overcome Binge Eating Disorder
courses.bio: 7 Lessons to Understand, Treat, and Overcome Binge Eating Disorder and Compulsive Overeating
objectives: To understand consequences of Binge Eating

Introduction: Lesson 2: Causes of Binge Eating Disorder
Lesson 3: Short and Long Term Effects of Binge Eating Disorder
Lesson 4: What Do We Hunger For?
Lesson 5: Treatment for Binge Eating Disorder
Lesson 6: How to Cope with Binge Eating Disorder

requirements: Be able to Overcome Binge Eating
courses.description:
This course offers hope for those struggling with binge eating disorder and those who believe they may be experiencing symptoms of binge eating disorder. It aims to provide one with further understanding into the intricacy of this mental illness, as well as necessary information for beginning or maintaining the recovery process.
This course explores:
Diagnostic criteria for binge eating disorder
Distinctions between binge eating disorder and overeating, emotional eating, and food addiction
Complex factors that play into the development of binge eating disorder
Effects of binge eating disorder on an individual's physical, mental, and overall health
Potential sources of emotional emptiness that one may turn to food to fill
Various methods of treatment used to aid those suffering from binge eating disorder
Strategies for utilizing healthier coping mechanisms upon the urge to binge eat
Relapse as a part of the recovery process and how one can attain lasting recovery
Above all, this course serves to provide clarity into binge eating disorder as a serious mental illness, as well as the encouragement for one to dig deeper into the underlying roots of their compulsive behavior. An individual can then take whatever steps are necessary to cope with binge eating disorder, develop a healthier relationship with food, and live a fuller life.
Lindsay Rossum has been in recovery from binge eating disorder for over four years and has been free from compulsive overeating for over two years. She is passionate about sharing her experiences with others to encourage them that there is hope and freedom from this disease. Lindsay now works as a recovery support specialist where she walks alongside others with mental disorders including eating disorders. Lindsay is a fan of rabbits (particularly her bunny, Lily), new stationery, and spending hours at coffee shops.
target_audience: Anyone who is conscious about health and fitness.

courses.title: Buttercream Flower Piping Course For Beginners
courses.bio: Edible Buttercream Flowers for Beginners
objectives: How to make and colour buttercream
How to attach piping tips and fill piping bags
How to pipe buttercream roses, daisies and chrysanthemums
How to fix piping mistakes
How to pipe buttercream daisy

Filling piping bags and attaching piping: Filling Piping Bags and attaching Piping Tips

requirements: Skills: No experience necessary, just an open mind, you will learn everything you need to know.
Equipment: Stand or hand mixer, piping bags, piping tips, couplers, cupcakes
courses.description: In this course I will teach you everything you need to know to be successful at piping delicious edible flowers with American buttercream. I will teach you how to make your buttercream the perfect consistency for piping flowers so you get perfect results every time. I will teach you step by step how to make and colour your buttercream, including all the hints and tips that I struggled to learn as a beginner. It is often the little things that no one mentions that makes the difference in being average at something or doing it very well and in this course I will share all of these industry tips with you as I show you in practice how to master each tiny detail so you can learn to pipe beautiful edible flowers for your cakes and cupcakes. I will talk you through and show you how to attach and swap different piping tips easily, how to fill your piping bags in an easy way and  without any mess and finally I will teach you how to pipe 3 different kinds of flowers. Each flower requires different skills and I will teach you them all. These flowers are perfect for beginners as they require only basic equipment and once you learn the techniques I will show you, you will master this skill of piping beautiful buttercream flowers. The content in this course took me years to perfect but I break it down for you so that it is easy for you to learn all the little tricks and tips that it would usually take years to master.
target_audience: Beginner buttercream flower enthusiasts
Bakers seeking to improve their decorating skills

courses.title: Basis Kochen - 15 Garmethoden - Selber kochen statt Fastfood
courses.bio: Ohne vorherige Kochkenntnisse schmackhafte Gerichte zaubern.
objectives: Dieser Online Basis Kochkurs zeigt Ihnen, wie Sie ohne Vorkenntnisse superleckere und gesunde Gerichte zubereiten können.
Sie lernen die 15 Garmethoden kennen, auf denen alle Gerichte aufgebaut sind.
Dieser Kurs lässt Ihnen kreative Freiheit. Sie bekommen keine Konzepte übergestülpt, sondern können Ihrer Fantasie beim Nachkochen freien Lauf lassen.
Am Ende des Kurses werden Sie genau was Sie tun müssen, damit jedes Gericht zu einem wahren Genuss wird. Ihre Familie und Freunde werden Sie dafür lieben.
requirements: Sie brauchen eine Grundausstattung gewisser Küchenutensilien. Oder auch das ein oder andere  spezielle Küchengerät.
Und damit Sie nur solche Teile kaufen, die ihren Preis auch Wert sind nennen  wir Ihnen ausgesuchte Bezugsquellen.
courses.description:
Küchenbasics komplett:
Sie lernen die 15 verschiedenen Garmethoden kennen, denn diese bilden das Fundament beim Kochen. Sie lernen schnell und können anhand der Anleitungen sowohl einfache Rezepte wie auch komplizierte Gerichte problemlos nachkochen.
Geheime exklusive Facebook Gruppe:
In unserer geheimen Facebook-Gruppe können Sie die Fragen stellen, die sich eventuell noch ergeben. Wir werden diese beantworten und wenn nötig zusätzlich mit Videos oder Bildern erläutern – sozusagen Life Support.
Einkaufslisten:
Sie bekommen Einkaufslisten in PDF-Form und als Audio-Einkaufslisten, um bequem beim Einkaufen nicht mehr lesen zu müssen, sondern einfach zu hören, was für das jeweilige Gericht an Zutaten notwendig ist.
Rezepte anschaulich per Videos:
Kochen kann so einfach sein. Vor allem wenn man Schritt für Schritt erklärt bekommt, wie es geht und gleichzeitig das Ergebnis sieht und regelrecht sein Ergebnis riechen und schmecken kann. Beim Anschauen der Videos läuft Ihnen garantiert das Wasser im Munde zusammen. Weiter zeigen wir Ihnen Küchen-Tipps und -Tricks, die sonst nur in Insider-kreisen bekannt sind. Die Rezepte funktionieren nicht nur in einer Profiküche, sondern vor allem zu Hause. Sämtliche Rezepte sind praxiserprobt.
Bilder:
Bilder zum Unterstreichen und besseren Veranschaulichen runden den Kochkurs ab. Fangen Sie jetzt sofort an, gesunde und leckere Gerichte zu kochen!

Und das (noch) zum genialen Einsteigerpreis. (Auch hier gilt: Wer zu spät kommt…)
target_audience: Dieser Kurs ist sehr gut für Anfänger geeignet, spricht aber auch Hobbyköche mit etwas Erfahrung an, die ihr Wissen auffrischen möchten.

courses.title: All about Malaysian Cuisine by APCA chef online
courses.bio: Learn the classic Malaysian Cuisine from start to finish
objectives: Learn classic Malaysian cuisine
Learn about satay and the sauces
Learn about traditional beef rendang
Learn about cooking in banana leaf
requirements: No pre requirement for this program
courses.description:
Malaysian cuisine consists of cooking traditions and practices found in Malaysia, and reflects the multi-ethnic makeup of its population. The vast majority of Malaysia's population can roughly be divided among three major ethnic groups  Malays, Chinese and Indians. The remainder consists of the indigenous peoples of Sabah and Sarawak in Malaysian Borneo, the Orang Asli of Peninsular Malaysia, the Peranakan and Eurasian creole communities, as well as a significant number of foreign workers and expatriates.
Nasi Lemak- It's the savoury and creamy rice that carries this dish, with spicy sambal to give it that extra zing.
Kapitan chicken (Ayam Kapitan in Malay) is truly a Malaysian curry, the amalgamation of the diverse array of Malay, Chinese and Indian eating culture.
Stirfry Beef in Black pepper Sauce - Very Famous stir fry dish In Malaysia with lots of bell peppers, black pepper, onions and garlic with Marinated and stir fry beef
Cereal Chicken - Crispy fried chicken is tossed in buttery, spicy (or not) and aromatic cereal mix. A combination that is addictingly good.
Baked sambal fish in Banana Leaf- Grilled Fish with Banana Leaf -Malaysian grilled fish wrapped in banana leaves. Moist, aromatic, spicy, and full of flavor. The best grilled fish recipe!
Satay & Peanut Sauce - A Malaysian dish consisting of small pieces of meat grilled on a skewer and served with a spiced sauce that typically contains peanuts.
Asam Padas stingray fish - A classic Malay and Minangkabau dish, Asam Pedas is popular in Malacca, one of the states in Malaysia. Literally translated to 'sour spicy', Asam Pedas fish curry is tangy, spicy, appetizing and best served with rice.
Beef Rendang - Rendang is a rich and tender coconut beef stew which is explosively flavorful and beef rendang is the most popular rendang. Called “rendang daging” in local language, it's arguably the most famous beef recipe in Malaysia.
target_audience: This program is suitable for Students, home cooks and enthusiats
